original: Vālmīki: Rāmāyaṇa,
analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa

original: 7. Uttarakāṇḍa
analyzed: uttara kāṇḍa

original: 7.001.001a prāptarājyasya rāmasya rākṣasānāṃ vadhe kṛte
analyzed: prāpta rājyasya rāmasya rākṣasānām vadhe kṛte

original: 7.001.001c ājagmur ṛṣayaḥ sarve rāghavaṃ pratinanditum
analyzed: ājagmuḥ ṛṣayaḥ sarve rāghavam pratinanditum

original: 7.001.002a kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto raibhyaś cyavana eva ca
analyzed: kauśikaḥ tha yavakrītaḥ raibhyaḥ cyavanaḥ eva ca

original: 7.001.002c kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ
analyzed: kaṇvaḥ medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyām diśi ye śritāḥ

original: 7.001.003a svastyātreyaś ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucus tathā
analyzed: svastyātreyaḥ ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucuḥ tathā

original: 7.001.003c ājagmus te sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: ājagmuḥ te saha agastyāḥ ye śritāḥ dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 7.001.004a pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣaḥ dhaumyaḥ raudreyaḥ ca mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.001.004c te 'py ājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam
analyzed: te pi ājagmuḥ sa śiṣyāḥ vai ye śritāḥ paścimām diśam

original: 7.001.005a vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo 'thātrir viśvāmitro 'tha gautamaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapaḥ tha atriḥ viśvāmitraḥ gautamaḥ

original: 7.001.005c jamadagnir bharadvājas te 'pi saptamaharṣayaḥ
analyzed: jamadagniḥ bharadvājaḥ te pi sapta mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.001.006a saṃprāpyaite mahātmāno rāghavasya niveśanam
analyzed: saṃprāpya ete mahātmānaḥ rāghavasya niveśanam

original: 7.001.006c viṣṭhitāḥ pratihārārthaṃ hutāśanasamaprabhāḥ
analyzed: viṣṭhitāḥ pratihāra artham hutāśana sama prabhāḥ

original: 7.001.007a pratihāras tatas tūrṇam agastyavacanād atha
analyzed: pratihāraḥ tatas tūrṇam agastya vacanāt atha

original: 7.001.007c samīpaṃ rāghavasyāśu praviveśa mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: samīpam rāghavasya āśu praviveśa mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.001.008a sa rāmaṃ dṛśya sahasā pūrṇacandrasamadyutim
analyzed: sa rāmam dṛśya sahasā pūrṇa candra sama dyutim

original: 7.001.008c agastyaṃ kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha
analyzed: agastyam kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha

original: 7.001.009a śrutvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu bālasūryasamaprabhān
analyzed: śrutvā prāptān munīn tān tu bāla sūrya sama prabhān

original: 7.001.009c tadovāca nṛpo dvāḥsthaṃ praveśaya yathāsukham
analyzed: tadā uvāca nṛpaḥ dvāḥstham praveśaya yathāsukham

original: 7.001.010a dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīn tān tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.001.010c rāmo 'bhivādya prayata āsanāny ādideśa ha
analyzed: rāmaḥ bhivādya prayataḥ āsanāni ādideśa ha

original: 7.001.011a teṣu kāñcanacitreṣu svāstīrṇeṣu sukheṣu ca
analyzed: teṣu kāñcana citreṣu su āstīrṇeṣu sukheṣu ca

original: 7.001.011c yathārham upaviṣṭās te āsaneṣv ṛṣipuṃgavāḥ
analyzed: yathārham upaviṣṭāḥ te āsaneṣu ṛṣi puṃgavāḥ

original: 7.001.012a rāmeṇa kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyāḥ sapurogamāḥ
analyzed: rāmeṇa kuśalam pṛṣṭāḥ sa śiṣyāḥ sa purogamāḥ

original: 7.001.012c maharṣayo vedavido rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
analyzed: mahā ṛṣayaḥ veda vidaḥ rāmam vacanam abruvan

original: 7.001.013a kuśalaṃ no mahābāho sarvatra raghunandana
analyzed: kuśalam naḥ mahā bāho sarvatra raghunandana

original: 7.001.013c tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam
analyzed: tvām tu diṣṭyā kuśalinam paśyāmaḥ hata śātravam

original: 7.001.014a na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa īśvaraḥ

original: 7.001.014c sadhanus tvaṃ hi lokāṃs trīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ tvam hi lokān trīn vijayethāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.001.015a diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvayā hataḥ rāma rāvaṇaḥ putra pautravān

original: 7.001.015c diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā
analyzed: diṣṭyā vijayinam tvā adya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā

original: 7.001.016a diṣṭyā prahasto vikaṭo virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā prahastaḥ vikaṭaḥ virūpākṣaḥ mahodaraḥ

original: 7.001.016c akampanaś ca durdharṣo nihatās te niśācarāḥ
analyzed: akampanaḥ ca durdharṣaḥ nihatāḥ te niśācarāḥ

original: 7.001.017a yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
analyzed: yasya pramāṇāt vipulam pramāṇam na iha vidyate

original: 7.001.017c diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇaḥ nipātitaḥ

original: 7.001.018a diṣṭyā tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa dvandvayuddham upāgataḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvam rākṣasa indreṇa dvandva yuddham upāgataḥ

original: 7.001.018c devatānām avadhyena vijayaṃ prāptavān asi
analyzed: devatānām avadhyena vijayam prāptavān asi

original: 7.001.019a saṃkhye tasya na kiṃ cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ
analyzed: saṃkhye tasya na kim cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ

original: 7.001.019c dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ
analyzed: dvandva yuddham anuprāptaḥ diṣṭyā te rāvaṇiḥ hataḥ

original: 7.001.020a diṣṭyā tasya mahābāho kālasyevābhidhāvataḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā tasya mahā bāho kālasya iva abhidhāvataḥ

original: 7.001.020c muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaś ca vijayas tvayā
analyzed: muktaḥ suraripoḥ vīra prāptaḥ ca vijayaḥ tvayā

original: 7.001.021a vismayas tv eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam
analyzed: vismayaḥ tu eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutya indrajitam hatam

original: 7.001.021c avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ mahāmāyādharo yudhi
analyzed: avadhyaḥ sarva bhūtānām mahā māyā dharaḥ yudhi

original: 7.001.022a dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām
analyzed: dattvā puṇyām imām vīra saumyām abhaya dakṣiṇām

original: 7.001.022c diṣṭyā vardhasi kākutstha jayenāmitrakarśana
analyzed: diṣṭyā vardhasi kākutstha jayena amitra karśana

original: 7.001.023a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam teṣām ṛṣīṇām bhāvitātmanām

original: 7.001.023c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
analyzed: vismayam paramam gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjaliḥ abravīt

original: 7.001.024a bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram
analyzed: bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇam ca rāvaṇam ca niśācaram

original: 7.001.024c atikramya mahāvīryau kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim
analyzed: atikramya mahā vīryau kim praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim

original: 7.001.025a mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: mahodaram prahastam ca virūpākṣam ca rākṣasam

original: 7.001.025c atikramya mahāvīryān kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim
analyzed: atikramya mahā vīryān kim praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim

original: 7.001.026a kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ vai kim balam kaḥ parākramaḥ

original: 7.001.026c kena vā kāraṇenaiṣa rāvaṇād atiricyate
analyzed: kena vā kāraṇena eṣa rāvaṇāt atiricyate

original: 7.001.027a śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi vaḥ
analyzed: śakyam yadi mayā śrotum na khalu ājñāpayāmi vaḥ

original: 7.001.027c yadi guhyaṃ na ced vaktuṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
analyzed: yadi guhyam na ced vaktum śrotum icchāmi kathyatām

original: 7.001.027e kathaṃ śakro jitas tena kathaṃ labdhavaraś ca saḥ
analyzed: katham śakraḥ jitaḥ tena katham labdha varaḥ ca saḥ

original: 7.002.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.002.001c kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: kumbhayoniḥ mahā tejāḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.002.002a śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttam yasya tejaḥ balam mahat

original: 7.002.002c jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaś ca śatrubhiḥ
analyzed: jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathā a vadhyaḥ ca śatrubhiḥ

original: 7.002.003a ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava
analyzed: aham te rāvaṇasya idam kulam janma ca rāghava

original: 7.002.003c varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te
analyzed: vara pradānam ca tathā tasmai dattam bravīmi te

original: 7.002.004a purā kṛtayuge rāma prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: purā kṛta yuge rāma prajāpati sutaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.002.004c pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: pulastyaḥ nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣāt iva pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.002.005a nānukīrtyā guṇās tasya dharmataḥ śīlatas tathā
analyzed: na anukīrtyāḥ guṇāḥ tasya dharmataḥ śīlataḥ tathā

original: 7.002.005c prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ
analyzed: prajāpateḥ putraḥ iti vaktum śakyam hi nāmataḥ

original: 7.002.006a sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ
analyzed: sa tu dharma prasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahā gireḥ

original: 7.002.006c tṛṇabindvāśramaṃ gatvā nyavasan munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇabindu āśramam gatvā nyavasat muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.002.007a tapas tepe sa dharmātmā svādhyāyaniyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ tepe sa dharma ātmā svādhyāya niyata indriyaḥ

original: 7.002.007c gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti kanyakāḥ
analyzed: gatvā āśrama padam tasya vighnam kurvanti kanyakāḥ

original: 7.002.008a devapannagakanyāś ca rājarṣitanayāś ca yāḥ
analyzed: deva pannaga kanyāḥ ca rājarṣi tanayāḥ ca yāḥ

original: 7.002.008c krīḍantyo 'psarasaś caiva taṃ deśam upapedire
analyzed: krīḍantyāḥ psarasaḥ ca eva tam deśam upapedire

original: 7.002.009a sarvartuṣūpabhogyatvād ramyatvāt kānanasya ca
analyzed: sarva ṛtuṣu upabhogya tvāt ramya tvāt kānanasya ca

original: 7.002.009c nityaśas tās tu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ
analyzed: nityaśas tāḥ tu tam deśam gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ

original: 7.002.010a atha ruṣṭo mahātejā vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: atha ruṣṭaḥ mahā tejāḥ vyājahāra mahā muniḥ

original: 7.002.010c yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbham dhārayiṣyati

original: 7.002.011a tās tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyam mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.002.011c brahmaśāpabhayād bhītās taṃ deśaṃ nopacakramuḥ
analyzed: brahma śāpa bhayāt bhītāḥ tam deśam na upacakramuḥ

original: 7.002.012a tṛṇabindos tu rājarṣes tanayā na śṛṇoti tat
analyzed: tṛṇabindoḥ tu rājarṣeḥ tanayā na śṛṇoti tat

original: 7.002.012c gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vicacāra sunirbhayā
analyzed: gatvā āśrama padam tasya vicacāra su nirbhayā

original: 7.002.013a tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tasmin eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyaḥ mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.002.013c svādhyāyam akarot tatra tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: svādhyāyam akarot tatra tapasā dyotita prabhaḥ

original: 7.002.014a sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam
analyzed: sā tu veda dhvanim śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca eva tapodhanam

original: 7.002.014c abhavat pāṇḍudehā sā suvyañjitaśarīrajā
analyzed: abhavat pāṇḍu dehā sā su vyañjita śarīra jā

original: 7.002.015a dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā parama saṃvignā sā tu tat rūpam ātmanaḥ

original: 7.002.015c idaṃ me kiṃ nv iti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā
analyzed: idam me kim nu iti jñātvā pituḥ gatvā agratas sthitā

original: 7.002.016a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt
analyzed: tām tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtām tṛṇabinduḥ atha abravīt

original: 7.002.016c kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasy ātmano vapuḥ
analyzed: kim tvam etat tu a sadṛśam dhārayasi ātmanaḥ vapuḥ

original: 7.002.017a sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam
analyzed: sā tu kṛtvā añjalim dīnā kanyā uvāca tapodhanam

original: 7.002.017c na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam
analyzed: na jāne kāraṇam tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam

original: 7.002.018a kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmy ekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
analyzed: kim tu pūrvam gatā asmi ekā mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: 7.002.018c pulastyasyāśramaṃ divyam anveṣṭuṃ svasakhījanam
analyzed: pulastyasya āśramam divyam anveṣṭum sva sakhī janam

original: 7.002.019a na ca paśyāmy ahaṃ tatra kāṃ cid apy āgatāṃ sakhīm
analyzed: na ca paśyāmi aham tatra kām cit api āgatām sakhīm

original: 7.002.019c rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā
analyzed: rūpasya tu viparyāsam dṛṣṭvā ca aham iha āgatā

original: 7.002.020a tṛṇabindus tu rājarṣis tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇabinduḥ tu rājarṣiḥ tapasā dyotita prabhaḥ

original: 7.002.020c dhyānaṃ viveśa tac cāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam
analyzed: dhyānam viveśa tat ca api apaśyat ṛṣi karma jam

original: 7.002.021a sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa tu vijñāya tam śāpam mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: 7.002.021c gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt
analyzed: gṛhītvā tanayām gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt

original: 7.002.022a bhagavaṃs tanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām
analyzed: bhagavan tanayām me tvam guṇaiḥ svaiḥ eva bhūṣitām

original: 7.002.022c bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhāṇemāṃ maharṣe svayam udyatām
analyzed: bhikṣām pratigṛhāṇa imām mahā ṛṣe svayam udyatām

original: 7.002.023a tapaścaraṇayuktasya śrāmyamāṇendriyasya te
analyzed: tapaḥ caraṇa yuktasya śrāmyamāṇa indriyasya te

original: 7.002.023c śuśrūṣātatparā nityaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: śuśrūṣā tatparā nityam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.002.024a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā
analyzed: tam bruvāṇam tu tad vākyam rājarṣim dhārmikam tadā

original: 7.002.024c jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ity eva sa dvijaḥ
analyzed: jighṛkṣuḥ abravīt kanyām bāḍham iti eva sa dvijaḥ

original: 7.002.025a dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā
analyzed: dattvā tu sa gataḥ rājā svam āśrama padam tadā

original: 7.002.025c sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ
analyzed: sā api tatra avasat kanyā toṣayantī patim guṇaiḥ

original: 7.002.025e prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: prītaḥ sa tu mahā tejāḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.002.026a parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi bhadram te guṇānām saṃpadā bhṛśam

original: 7.002.026c tasmāt te viramāmy adya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt te viramāmi adya putram ātma samam guṇaiḥ

original: 7.002.026e ubhayor vaṃśakartāraṃ paulastya iti viśrutam
analyzed: ubhayoḥ vaṃśa kartāram paulastyaḥ iti viśrutam

original: 7.002.027a yasmāt tu viśruto vedas tvayehābhyasyato mama
analyzed: yasmāt tu viśrutaḥ vedaḥ tvayā iha abhyasyataḥ mama

original: 7.002.027c tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sa viśravāḥ nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.002.028a evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: 7.002.028c acireṇaiva kālena sūtā viśravasaṃ sutam
analyzed: acireṇa eva kālena sūtāḥ viśravasam sutam

original: 7.002.029a sa tu lokatraye khyātaḥ śaucadharmasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: sa tu lokatraye khyātaḥ śauca dharma samanvitaḥ

original: 7.002.029c piteva tapasā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: pitā iva tapasā yuktaḥ viśravāḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.003.001a atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravāḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.003.001c acireṇaiva kālena piteva tapasi sthitaḥ
analyzed: acireṇa eva kālena pitā iva tapasi sthitaḥ

original: 7.003.002a satyavāñ śīlavān dakṣaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: satyavān śīlavān dakṣaḥ svādhyāya nirataḥ śuciḥ

original: 7.003.002c sarvabhogeṣv asaṃsakto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: sarva bhogeṣu asaṃsaktaḥ nityam dharma parāyaṇaḥ

original: 7.003.003a jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: jñātvā tasya tu tat vṛttam bharadvājaḥ mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.003.003c dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm
analyzed: dadau viśravase bhāryām svām sutām devavarṇinīm

original: 7.003.004a pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvājasutāṃ tadā
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvāja sutām tadā

original: 7.003.004c mudā paramayā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: mudā paramayā yuktaḥ viśravāḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.003.005a sa tasyāṃ vīryasaṃpannam apatyaṃ paramādbhutam
analyzed: sa tasyām vīrya saṃpannam apatyam parama adbhutam

original: 7.003.005c janayām āsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam
analyzed: janayām āsa dharma ātmā sarvaiḥ brahma guṇaiḥ yutam

original: 7.003.006a tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: tasmin jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.003.006c nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhis tadā
analyzed: nāma ca asya akarot prītaḥ sārdham devarṣibhiḥ tadā

original: 7.003.007a yasmād viśravaso 'patyaṃ sādṛśyād viśravā iva
analyzed: yasmāt patyam sādṛśyāt viśravāḥ iva

original: 7.003.007c tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyaty eṣa viśrutaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vaiśravaṇaḥ nāma bhaviṣyati eṣa viśrutaḥ

original: 7.003.008a sa tu vaiśravaṇas tatra tapovanagatas tadā
analyzed: sa tu vaiśravaṇaḥ tatra tapaḥ vana gataḥ tadā

original: 7.003.008c avardhata mahātejā hutāhutir ivānalaḥ
analyzed: avardhata mahā tejāḥ huta āhutiḥ iva analaḥ

original: 7.003.009a tasyāśramapadasthasya buddhir jajñe mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya āśrama pada sthasya buddhiḥ jajñe mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.003.009c cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: cariṣye niyataḥ dharmam dharmaḥ hi paramā gatiḥ

original: 7.003.010a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
analyzed: sa tu varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ taptvā mahā vane

original: 7.003.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata
analyzed: pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu tam tam vidhim avartata

original: 7.003.011a jalāśī mārutāhāro nirāhāras tathaiva ca
analyzed: jala āśī māruta āhāraḥ nirāhāraḥ tathā eva ca

original: 7.003.011c evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmus tāny eva varṣavat
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasrāṇi jagmuḥ tāni eva varṣa vat

original: 7.003.012a atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: atha prītaḥ mahā tejāḥ sa indraiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ saha

original: 7.003.012c gatvā tasyāśramapadaṃ brahmedaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: gatvā tasya āśrama padam brahmā idam vākyam abravīt

original: 7.003.013a parituṣṭo 'smi te vatsa karmaṇānena suvrata
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi te vatsa karmaṇā anena suvrata

original: 7.003.013c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva bhadram te vara arhaḥ tvam hi me mataḥ

original: 7.003.014a athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ pitāmaham upasthitam
analyzed: atha abravīt vaiśravaṇaḥ pitāmaham upasthitam

original: 7.003.014c bhagavaṃl lokapālatvam iccheyaṃ vittarakṣaṇam
analyzed: bhagavan lokapāla tvam iccheyam vitta rakṣaṇam

original: 7.003.015a tato 'bravīd vaiśravaṇaṃ parituṣṭena cetasā
analyzed: tatas bravīt vaiśravaṇam parituṣṭena cetasā

original: 7.003.015c brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ity eva hṛṣṭavat
analyzed: brahmā sura gaṇaiḥ sārdham bāḍham iti eva hṛṣṭa vat

original: 7.003.016a ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ
analyzed: aham hi lokapālānām caturtham sraṣṭum udyataḥ

original: 7.003.016c yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam
analyzed: yama indra varuṇānām hi padam yat tava ca īpsitam

original: 7.003.017a tatkṛtaṃ gaccha dharmajña dhaneśatvam avāpnuhi
analyzed: tad kṛtam gaccha dharma jña dhaneśa tvam avāpnuhi

original: 7.003.017c yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi caturtho 'dya bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: yama indra varuṇānām hi caturthaḥ dya bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.003.018a etac ca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
analyzed: etat ca puṣpakam nāma vimānam sūrya saṃnibham

original: 7.003.018c pratigṛhṇīṣva yānārthaṃ tridaśaiḥ samatāṃ vraja
analyzed: pratigṛhṇīṣva yāna artham tridaśaiḥ sama tām vraja

original: 7.003.019a svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam
analyzed: svasti te stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarve eva yathāgatam

original: 7.003.019c kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyāḥ vayam tāta dattvā tava mahā varam

original: 7.003.020a gateṣu brahmapūrveṣu deveṣv atha nabhastalam
analyzed: gateṣu brahma pūrveṣu deveṣu atha nabhaḥ talam

original: 7.003.020c dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ
analyzed: dhaneśaḥ pitaram prāha vinayāt praṇataḥ vacaḥ

original: 7.003.021a bhagavaṃl labdhavān asmi varaṃ kamalayonitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan labdhavān asmi varam kamalayonitaḥ

original: 7.003.021c nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: nivāsam na tu me devaḥ vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.003.022a tat paśya bhagavan kaṃ cid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho
analyzed: tat paśya bhagavan kam cit deśam vāsāya naḥ prabho

original: 7.003.022c na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasya cit
analyzed: na ca pīḍā bhavet yatra prāṇinaḥ yasya kasya cit

original: 7.003.023a evam uktas tu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu putreṇa viśravāḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.003.023c vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit
analyzed: vacanam prāha dharma jña śrūyatām iti dharma vid

original: 7.003.024a laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā

original: 7.003.024c rākṣasānāṃ nivāsārthaṃ yathendrasyāmarāvatī
analyzed: rākṣasānām nivāsa artham yathā indrasya amarāvatī

original: 7.003.025a ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukmavaidūryatoraṇā
analyzed: ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukma vaidūrya toraṇā

original: 7.003.025c rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇubhayārditaiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇu bhaya arditaiḥ

original: 7.003.025e śūnyā rakṣogaṇaiḥ sarvai rasātalatalaṃ gataiḥ
analyzed: śūnyā rakṣaḥ gaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ rasātala talam gataiḥ

original: 7.003.026a sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām
analyzed: sa tvam tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matim svakām

original: 7.003.026c nirdoṣas tatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasya cit
analyzed: nirdoṣaḥ tatra te vāsaḥ na ca bādhā asti kasya cit

original: 7.003.027a etac chrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā tu dharma ātmā dharmiṣṭham vacanam pituḥ

original: 7.003.027c niveśayām āsa tadā laṅkāṃ parvatamūrdhani
analyzed: niveśayām āsa tadā laṅkām parvata mūrdhani

original: 7.003.028a nairṛtānāṃ sahasrais tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā
analyzed: nairṛtānām sahasraiḥ tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā

original: 7.003.028c acireṇaikakālena saṃpūrṇā tasya śāsanāt
analyzed: acireṇa eka kālena saṃpūrṇā tasya śāsanāt

original: 7.003.029a atha tatrāvasat prīto dharmātmā nairṛtādhipaḥ
analyzed: atha tatra avasat prītaḥ dharma ātmā nairṛta adhipaḥ

original: 7.003.029c samudraparidhānāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ viśravātmajaḥ
analyzed: samudra paridhānāyām laṅkāyām viśravas ātmajaḥ

original: 7.003.030a kāle kāle vinītātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: kāle kāle vinīta ātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 7.003.030c abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ
analyzed: abhyagacchat su saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaram mātaram ca saḥ

original: 7.003.031a sa devagandharvagaṇair abhiṣṭutas;
analyzed: sa deva gandharva gaṇaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ

original: tathaiva siddhaiḥ saha cāraṇair api
analyzed: tathā eva siddhaiḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ api

original: 7.003.031c gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivaujasā vṛtaḥ;
analyzed: gabhastibhiḥ sūryaḥ iva ojasā vṛtaḥ

original: pituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ samīpam prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ

original: 7.004.001a śrutvāgastyeritaṃ vākyaṃ rāmo vismayam āgataḥ
analyzed: śrutvā agastya īritam vākyam rāmaḥ vismayam āgataḥ

original: 7.004.001c pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyām rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ

original: 7.004.002a tataḥ śiraḥ kampayitvā tretāgnisamavigraham
analyzed: tatas śiraḥ kampayitvā tretāgni sama vigraham

original: 7.004.002c agastyaṃ taṃ muhur dṛṣṭvā smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: agastyam tam muhur dṛṣṭvā smayamānaḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 7.004.003a bhagavan pūrvam apy eṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām
analyzed: bhagavan pūrvam api eṣā laṅkā āsīt piśitāśinām

original: 7.004.003c itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama
analyzed: iti idam bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayaḥ janitaḥ mama

original: 7.004.004a pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: pulastya vaṃśāt udbhūtāḥ rākṣasāḥ iti naḥ śrutam

original: 7.004.004c idānīm anyataś cāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitas tvayā
analyzed: idānīm anyatas ca api saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitaḥ tvayā

original: 7.004.005a rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāc ca prahastād vikaṭād api
analyzed: rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāt ca prahastāt vikaṭāt api

original: 7.004.005c rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kim nu te balavattarāḥ

original: 7.004.006a ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ eṣām pūrvakaḥ brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapaḥ balaḥ

original: 7.004.006c aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā
analyzed: aparādham ca kam prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā

original: 7.004.007a etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ kathayasva mamānagha
analyzed: etat vistarataḥ sarvam kathayasva mama anagha

original: 7.004.007c kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ
analyzed: kautūhalam kṛtam mahyam nuda bhānuḥ yathā tamaḥ

original: 7.004.008a rāghavasya tu tac chrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya tu tat śrutvā saṃskāra alaṃkṛtam vacaḥ

original: 7.004.008c īṣadvismayamānas tam agastyaḥ prāha rāghavam
analyzed: īṣat vismayamānaḥ tam agastyaḥ prāha rāghavam

original: 7.004.009a prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā apaḥ salilasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā apaḥ salila saṃbhavaḥ

original: 7.004.009c tāsāṃ gopāyane sattvān asṛjat padmasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: tāsām gopāyane sattvān asṛjat padmasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 7.004.010a te sattvāḥ sattvakartāraṃ vinītavad upasthitāḥ
analyzed: te sattvāḥ sattva kartāram vinīta vat upasthitāḥ

original: 7.004.010c kiṃ kurma iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣutpipāsābhayārditāḥ
analyzed: kim kurmaḥ iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣudh pipāsā bhaya arditāḥ

original: 7.004.011a prajāpatis tu tāny āha sattvāni prahasann iva
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tu tāni āha sattvāni prahasan iva

original: 7.004.011c ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ
analyzed: ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ

original: 7.004.012a rakṣāma iti tatrānyair yakṣāmeti tathāparaiḥ
analyzed: rakṣāmaḥ iti tatra anyaiḥ yakṣāma iti tathā aparaiḥ

original: 7.004.012c bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktas tatas tān āha bhūtakṛt
7.004.013a rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasās te bhavantu vaḥ
analyzed: rakṣāmaḥ iti yaiḥ uktam rākṣasāḥ te bhavantu vaḥ

original: 7.004.013c yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ
analyzed: iti yaiḥ uktam te vai yakṣāḥ bhavantu vaḥ

original: 7.004.014a tatra hetiḥ prahetiś ca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau
analyzed: tatra hetiḥ prahetiḥ ca bhrātarau rākṣasa ṛṣabhau

original: 7.004.014c madhukaiṭabhasaṃkāśau babhūvatur ariṃdamau
analyzed: madhu kaiṭabha saṃkāśau babhūvatuḥ ariṃdamau

original: 7.004.015a prahetir dhārmikas tatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati
analyzed: prahetiḥ dhārmikaḥ tatra na dārān saḥ bhikāṅkṣati

original: 7.004.015c hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot
analyzed: hetiḥ dārakriyā artham tu yatnam param atha akarot

original: 7.004.016a sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām
analyzed: sa kāla bhaginīm kanyām bhayām nāma bhaya āvahām

original: 7.004.016c udāvahad ameyātmā svayam eva mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: udāvahat ameya ātmā svayam eva mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.004.017a sa tasyāṃ janayām āasa hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: sa tasyām hetī rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.004.017c putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam
analyzed: putram putravatām śreṣṭhaḥ vidyutkeśaḥ iti śrutam

original: 7.004.018a vidyutkeśo hetiputraḥ pradīptāgnisamaprabhaḥ
7.004.018c vyavardhata mahātejās toyamadhya ivāmbujam
analyzed: vyavardhata mahā tejāḥ toya madhye iva ambujam

original: 7.004.019a sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ
analyzed: sa yadā yauvanam bhadram anuprāptaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.004.019c tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā
analyzed: tatas dārakriyām tasya kartum vyavasitaḥ pitā

original: 7.004.020a saṃdhyāduhitaraṃ so 'tha saṃdhyātulyāṃ prabhāvataḥ
analyzed: saṃdhyāduhitaram saḥ tha saṃdhyā tulyām prabhāvataḥ

original: 7.004.020c varayām āsa putrārthaṃ hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: varayām āsa putra artham hetiḥ rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.004.021a avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā
analyzed: avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai sā iti saṃdhyayā

original: 7.004.021c cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava
analyzed: cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava

original: 7.004.022a saṃdhyāyās tanayāṃ labdhvā vidyutkeśo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: saṃdhyāyāḥ tanayām labdhvā vidyutkeśaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.004.022c ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva
analyzed: ramate sa tayā sārdham paulomyā maghavān iva

original: 7.004.023a kena cit tv atha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā
analyzed: kena cit tu atha kālena rāma sa ala kaṭaṃkaṭā

original: 7.004.023c vidyutkeśād garbham āpa ghanarājir ivārṇavāt
analyzed: vidyut keśāt garbham āpa ghana rājiḥ iva arṇavāt

original: 7.004.024a tataḥ sā rākṣasī garbhaṃ ghanagarbhasamaprabham
analyzed: tatas sā rākṣasī garbham ghana garbha sama prabham

original: 7.004.024c prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbham ivāgnijam
analyzed: prasūtā mandaram gatvā gaṅgā garbham iva agni jam

original: 7.004.025a tam utsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśād ratārthinī
analyzed: tam utsṛjya tu sā garbham vidyutkeśāt rata arthinī

original: 7.004.025c reme sā patinā sārdhaṃ vismṛtya sutam ātmajam
analyzed: reme sā patinā sārdham vismṛtya sutam ātmajam

original: 7.004.026a tayotsṛṣṭaḥ sa tu śiśuḥ śaradarkasamadyutiḥ
analyzed: tayā utsṛṣṭaḥ sa tu śiśuḥ śarad arka sama dyutiḥ

original: 7.004.026c pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghanarāḍ iva
analyzed: pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghana rāj iva

original: 7.004.027a athopariṣṭād gacchan vai vṛṣabhastho haraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: atha upariṣṭāt gacchan vai vṛṣabha sthaḥ haraḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.004.027c apaśyad umayā sārdhaṃ rudantaṃ rākṣasātmajam
analyzed: apaśyat umayā sārdham rudantam rākṣasa ātmajam

original: 7.004.028a kāruṇyabhāvāt pārvatyā bhavas tripurahā tataḥ
analyzed: kāruṇya bhāvāt pārvatyāḥ bhavaḥ tripura hā tatas

original: 7.004.028c taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātur eva vayaḥ samam
analyzed: tam rākṣasa ātmajam cakre mātuḥ eva vayaḥ samam

original: 7.004.029a amaraṃ caiva taṃ kṛtvā mahādevo 'kṣayo 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: amaram ca eva tam kṛtvā kṣayaḥ vyayaḥ

original: 7.004.029c puram ākāśagaṃ prādāt pārvatyāḥ priyakāmyayā
analyzed: puram ākāśa gam prādāt pārvatyāḥ priya kāmyayā

original: 7.004.030a umayāpi varo datto rākṣasīnāṃ nṛpātmaja
analyzed: umayā api varaḥ dattaḥ rākṣasīnām nṛpa ātmaja

original: 7.004.030c sadyopalabdhir garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca
analyzed: sadyas upalabdhiḥ garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadyas eva ca

original: 7.004.030e sadya eva vayaḥprāptir mātur eva vayaḥ samam
analyzed: sadyas eva vayaḥ prāptiḥ mātuḥ eva vayaḥ samam

original: 7.004.031a tataḥ sukeśo varadānagarvitaḥ;
analyzed: tatas sukeśaḥ vara dāna garvitaḥ

original: śriyaṃ prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvataḥ
analyzed: śriyam prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvatas

original: 7.004.031c cacāra sarvatra mahāmatiḥ khagaḥ;
analyzed: cacāra sarvatra mahāmatiḥ khagaḥ

original: khagaṃ puraṃ prāpya puraṃdaro yathā
analyzed: khagam puram prāpya puraṃdaraḥ yathā

original: 7.005.001a sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: sukeśam dhārmikam dṛṣṭvā vara labdham ca rākṣasam

original: 7.005.001c grāmaṇīr nāma gandharvo viśvāvasusamaprabhaḥ
analyzed: grāmaṇīḥ nāma gandharvaḥ viśvāvasu sama prabhaḥ

original: 7.005.002a tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīr ivātmajā
analyzed: tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīḥ iva ātmajā

original: 7.005.002c tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyaṃ yathā
analyzed: tām sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyam yathā

original: 7.005.003a varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam
analyzed: vara dāna kṛta aiśvaryam sā tam prāpya patim priyam

original: 7.005.003c āsīd devavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ
analyzed: āsīt devavatī tuṣṭā dhanam prāpya iva nirdhanaḥ

original: 7.005.004a sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ
analyzed: sa tayā saha saṃyuktaḥ rarāja rajanīcaraḥ

original: 7.005.004c añjanād abhiniṣkrāntaḥ kareṇveva mahāgajaḥ
analyzed: añjanāt abhiniṣkrāntaḥ kareṇvā iva mahā gajaḥ

original: 7.005.005a devavatyāṃ sukeśas tu janayām āsa rāghava
analyzed: devavatyām sukeśaḥ tu janayām āsa rāghava

original: 7.005.005c trīṃs trinetrasamān putrān rākṣasān rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: trīn trinetra samān putrān rākṣasān rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.005.005e mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam
analyzed: mālyavantam sumālim ca mālim ca balinām varam

original: 7.005.006a trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitās traya ivāgnayaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ lokāḥ iva avyagrāḥ sthitāḥ trayaḥ iva agnayaḥ

original: 7.005.006c trayo mantrā ivātyugrās trayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ mantrāḥ iva ati ugrāḥ trayaḥ ghorāḥ iva āmayāḥ

original: 7.005.007a trayaḥ sukeśasya sutās tretāgnisamavarcasaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ sukeśasya sutāḥ tretāgni sama varcasaḥ

original: 7.005.007c vivṛddhim agamaṃs tatra vyādhayopekṣitā iva
analyzed: vivṛddhim agaman tatra iva

original: 7.005.008a varaprāptiṃ pitus te tu jñātvaiśvaryaṃ tato mahat
analyzed: vara prāptim pituḥ te tu jñātvā aiśvaryam tatas mahat

original: 7.005.008c tapas taptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ taptum gatāḥ merum bhrātaraḥ kṛta niścayāḥ

original: 7.005.009a pragṛhya niyamān ghorān rākṣasā nṛpasattama
analyzed: pragṛhya niyamān ghorān rākṣasāḥ nṛpa sattama

original: 7.005.009c vicerus te tapo ghoraṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham
analyzed: viceruḥ te tapaḥ ghoram sarva bhūta bhaya āvaham

original: 7.005.010a satyārjavadamopetais tapobhir bhuvi duṣkaraiḥ
analyzed: satya ārjava dama upetaiḥ tapobhiḥ bhuvi duṣkaraiḥ

original: 7.005.010c saṃtāpayantas trīṃl lokān sadevāsuramānuṣān
analyzed: saṃtāpayantaḥ trīn lokān sa deva asura mānuṣān

original: 7.005.011a tato vibhuś caturvaktro vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas vibhuḥ caturvaktraḥ vimāna varam āsthitaḥ

original: 7.005.011c sukeśaputrān āmantrya varado 'smīty abhāṣata
analyzed: sukeśa putrān āmantrya vara do smi iti abhāṣata

original: 7.005.012a brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrair devagaṇair vṛtam
analyzed: brahmāṇam vara dam jñātvā sa indraiḥ deva gaṇaiḥ vṛtam

original: 7.005.012c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānāḥ iva drumāḥ

original: 7.005.013a tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam
analyzed: tapasā ārādhitaḥ deva yadi naḥ diśase varam

original: 7.005.013c ajeyāḥ śatruhantāras tathaiva cirajīvinaḥ
analyzed: ajeyāḥ śatru hantāraḥ tathā eva cira jīvinaḥ

original: 7.005.013e prabhaviṣṇavo bhavāmeti parasparam anuvratāḥ
analyzed: prabhaviṣṇavaḥ bhavāma iti parasparam anuvratāḥ

original: 7.005.014a evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktvā sukeśatanayān prabhuḥ
analyzed: evam bhaviṣyati iti uktvā sukeśa tanayān prabhuḥ

original: 7.005.014c prayayau brahmalokāya brahmā brāhmaṇavatsalaḥ
analyzed: prayayau brahma lokāya brahmā brāhmaṇa vatsalaḥ

original: 7.005.015a varaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sarve rāma rātriṃcarās tadā
analyzed: varam labdhvā tatas sarve rāma rātriṃcarāḥ tadā

original: 7.005.015c surāsurān prabādhante varadānāt sunirbhayāḥ
analyzed: sura asurān prabādhante vara dānāt su nirbhayāḥ

original: 7.005.016a tair vadhyamānās tridaśāḥ sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ
analyzed: taiḥ vadhyamānāḥ tridaśāḥ sa ṛṣi saṃghāḥ sa cāraṇāḥ

original: 7.005.016c trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti nirayasthā yathā narāḥ
analyzed: trātāram na adhigacchanti niraya sthāḥ yathā narāḥ

original: 7.005.017a atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varam avyayam
analyzed: atha te viśvakarmāṇam śilpinām varam avyayam

original: 7.005.017c ūcuḥ sametya saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasā raghusattama
analyzed: ūcuḥ sametya saṃhṛṣṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ raghu sattama

original: 7.005.018a gṛhakartā bhavān eva devānāṃ hṛdayepsitam
analyzed: gṛha kartā bhavān eva devānām hṛdaya īpsitam

original: 7.005.018c asmākam api tāvat tvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate
analyzed: asmākam api tāvat tvam gṛham kuru mahāmate

original: 7.005.019a himavantaṃ samāśritya meruṃ mandaram eva vā
analyzed: himavantam samāśritya merum mandaram eva vā

original: 7.005.019c maheśvaragṛhaprakhyaṃ gṛhaṃ naḥ kriyatāṃ mahat
analyzed: maheśvara gṛha prakhyam gṛham naḥ kriyatām mahat

original: 7.005.020a viśvakarmā tatas teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahābhujaḥ
analyzed: viśvakarmā tatas teṣām rākṣasānām mahā bhujaḥ

original: 7.005.020c nivāsaṃ kathayām āsa śakrasyevāmarāvatīm
analyzed: nivāsam kathayām āsa śakrasya iva amarāvatīm

original: 7.005.021a dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre trikūṭo nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇasya udadheḥ tīre trikūṭaḥ nāma parvataḥ

original: 7.005.021c śikhare tasya śailasya madhyame 'mbudasaṃnibhe
analyzed: śikhare tasya śailasya madhyame mbuda saṃnibhe

original: 7.005.021e śakunair api duṣprāpe ṭaṅkacchinnacaturdiśi
analyzed: śakunaiḥ api duṣprāpe ṭaṅka chinna catur diśi

original: 7.005.022a triṃśadyojanavistīrṇā svarṇaprākāratoraṇā
analyzed: triṃśat yojana vistīrṇā svarṇa prākāra toraṇā

original: 7.005.022c mayā laṅketi nagarī śakrājñaptena nirmitā
analyzed: mayā laṅkā iti nagarī śakra ājñaptena nirmitā

original: 7.005.023a tasyāṃ vasata durdharṣāḥ puryāṃ rākṣasasattamāḥ
analyzed: tasyām vasata durdharṣāḥ puryām rākṣasa sattamāḥ

original: 7.005.023c amarāvatīṃ samāsādya sendrā iva divaukasaḥ
analyzed: amarāvatīm samāsādya sa indrāḥ iva divaukasaḥ

original: 7.005.024a laṅkādurgaṃ samāsādya rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtāḥ
analyzed: laṅkā durgam samāsādya rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtāḥ

original: 7.005.024c bhaviṣyatha durādharṣāḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrusūdanāḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyatha durādharṣāḥ śatrūṇām śatru sūdanāḥ

original: 7.005.025a viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: viśvakarma vacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.005.025c sahasrānucarā gatvā laṅkāṃ tām avasan purīm
analyzed: sahasra anucarāḥ gatvā laṅkām tām avasan purīm

original: 7.005.026a dṛḍhaprākāraparikhāṃ haimair gṛhaśatair vṛtām
analyzed: dṛḍha prākāra parikhām haimaiḥ gṛha śataiḥ vṛtām

original: 7.005.026c laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭā viharanti niśācarāḥ
analyzed: laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭāḥ viharanti niśācarāḥ

original: 7.005.027a narmadā nāma gandharvī nānādharmasamedhitā
analyzed: narmadā nāma gandharvī nānā dharma samedhitā

original: 7.005.027c tasyāḥ kanyātrayaṃ hy āsīd dhīśrīkīrtisamadyuti
analyzed: tasyāḥ kanyā trayam hi āsīt dhī śrī kīrti sama dyuti

original: 7.005.028a jyeṣṭhakrameṇa sā teṣāṃ rākṣasānām arākṣasī
analyzed: jyeṣṭha krameṇa sā teṣām rākṣasānām arākṣasī

original: 7.005.028c kanyās tāḥ pradadau hṛṣṭā pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ
analyzed: kanyāḥ tāḥ pradadau hṛṣṭā pūrṇa candra nibha ānanāḥ

original: 7.005.029a trayāṇāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ tisro gandharvakanyakāḥ
analyzed: trayāṇām rākṣasa indrāṇām tisraḥ gandharva kanyakāḥ

original: 7.005.029c mātrā dattā mahābhāgā nakṣatre bhagadaivate
analyzed: mātrā dattāḥ mahābhāgāḥ nakṣatre bhaga daivate

original: 7.005.030a kṛtadārās tu te rāma sukeśatanayāḥ prabho
analyzed: kṛtadārāḥ tu te rāma sukeśa tanayāḥ prabho

original: 7.005.030c bhāryābhiḥ saha cikrīḍur apsarobhir ivāmarāḥ
analyzed: bhāryābhiḥ saha cikrīḍuḥ apsarobhiḥ iva amarāḥ

original: 7.005.031a tatra mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī
analyzed: tatra mālyavataḥ bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī

original: 7.005.031c sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ nibodha tat
analyzed: sa tasyām āsa yat apatyam nibodha tat

original: 7.005.032a vajramuṣṭir virūpākṣo durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: vajramuṣṭiḥ virūpākṣaḥ durmukhaḥ ca eva rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.005.032c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mattonmattau tathaiva ca
analyzed: suptaghnaḥ yajñakopaḥ ca matta unmattau tathā eva ca

original: 7.005.032e analā cābhavat kanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī
analyzed: analā ca abhavat kanyā sundaryām rāma sundarī

original: 7.005.033a sumālino 'pi bhāryāsīt pūrṇacandranibhānanā
analyzed: bhāryā āsīt pūrṇa candra nibha ānanā

original: 7.005.033c nāmnā ketumatī nāma prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
analyzed: nāmnā ketumatī nāma prāṇebhyaḥ pi garīyasī

original: 7.005.034a sumālī janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: sumālī janayām āsa yat apatyam niśācaraḥ

original: 7.005.034c ketumatyāṃ mahārāja tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: ketumatyām mahā rāja tat nibodha anupūrvaśas

original: 7.005.035a prahasto 'kampanaiś caiva vikaṭaḥ kālakārmukaḥ
analyzed: kampanaiḥ ca eva vikaṭaḥ kālakārmukaḥ

original: 7.005.035c dhūmrākśaś cātha daṇḍaś ca supārśvaś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: dhūmrākśaḥ ca atha daṇḍaḥ ca supārśvaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 7.005.036a saṃhrādiḥ praghasaś caiva bhāsakarṇaś ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: saṃhrādiḥ praghasaḥ ca eva bhāsakarṇaḥ ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.005.036c rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā
analyzed: rākā puṣpotkaṭā ca eva kaikasī ca śuci smitā

original: 7.005.036e kumbhīnasī ca ity ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ
analyzed: kumbhīnasī ca iti ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: 7.005.037a māles tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī
analyzed: māleḥ tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpa śālinī

original: 7.005.037c bhāryāsīt padmapatrākṣī svakṣī yakṣīvaropamā
analyzed: bhāryā āsīt padma patra akṣī su akṣī yakṣī vara upamā

original: 7.005.038a sumāler anujas tasyāṃ janayām āsa yat prabho
analyzed: sumāleḥ anujaḥ tasyām āsa yat prabho

original: 7.005.038c apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tan mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
analyzed: apatyam kathyamānam tat mayā tvam śṛṇu rāghava

original: 7.005.039a analaś cānilaś caiva haraḥ saṃpātir eva ca
analyzed: analaḥ ca anilaḥ ca eva haraḥ saṃpātiḥ eva ca

original: 7.005.039c ete vibhīṣaṇāmātyā māleyās te niśācarāḥ
analyzed: ete vibhīṣaṇa amātyāḥ māleyāḥ te niśācarāḥ

original: 7.005.040a tatas tu te rākṣasapuṃgavās trayo;
analyzed: tatas tu te rākṣasa puṃgavāḥ

original: niśācaraiḥ putraśataiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
analyzed: niśācaraiḥ putra śataiḥ ca saṃvṛtāḥ

original: 7.005.040c surān sahendrān ṛṣināgadānavān;
analyzed: surān saha indrān ṛṣi nāga dānavān

original: babādhire te balavīryadarpitāḥ
analyzed: babādhire te bala vīrya darpitāḥ

original: 7.005.041a jagad bhramanto 'nilavad durāsadā;
analyzed: jagat bhramantaḥ nila vat durāsadā

original: raṇe ca mṛtyupratimāḥ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: raṇe ca mṛtyu pratimāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: 7.005.041c varapradānād abhigarvitā bhṛśaṃ;
analyzed: vara pradānāt abhigarvitā bhṛśam

original: kratukriyāṇāṃ praśamaṃkarāḥ sadā
analyzed: kratu kriyāṇām praśamaṃkarāḥ sadā

original: 7.006.001a tair vadhyamānā devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: taiḥ vadhyamānāḥ devāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ

original: 7.006.001c bhayārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmur devadevaṃ maheśvaram
analyzed: bhaya ārtāḥ śaraṇam jagmuḥ devadevam maheśvaram

original: 7.006.002a te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam
analyzed: te sametya tu kāmārim tripurārim trilocanam

original: 7.006.002c ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā bhayagadgadabhāṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ devāḥ bhaya gadgada bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: 7.006.003a sukeśaputrair bhagavan pitāmahavaroddhataiḥ
analyzed: sukeśa putraiḥ bhagavan pitāmaha vara uddhataiḥ

original: 7.006.003c prajādhyakṣa prajāḥ sarvā bādhyante ripubādhana
analyzed: prajādhyakṣa prajāḥ sarvāḥ bādhyante ripu bādhana

original: 7.006.004a śaraṇyāny aśaraṇyāni āśramāṇi kṛtāni naḥ
analyzed: śaraṇyāni a śaraṇyāni āśramāṇi kṛtāni naḥ

original: 7.006.004c svargāc ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakravat
analyzed: svargāt ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakra vat

original: 7.006.005a ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍ aham
analyzed: aham viṣṇuḥ aham rudraḥ brahmā aham devarāj aham

original: 7.006.005c ahaṃ yamo 'haṃ varuṇaś candro 'haṃ ravir apy aham
analyzed: aham yamaḥ ham varuṇaḥ candraḥ ham raviḥ api aham

original: 7.006.006a iti te rākṣasā deva varadānena darpitāḥ
analyzed: iti te rākṣasāḥ deva vara dānena darpitāḥ

original: 7.006.006c bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
analyzed: bādhante samara uddharṣāḥ ye ca teṣām puraḥsarāḥ

original: 7.006.007a tan no devabhayārtānām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
analyzed: tat naḥ deva bhaya ārtānām abhayam dātum arhasi

original: 7.006.007c aśivaṃ vapur āsthāya jahi daivatakaṇṭakān
analyzed: aśivam vapuḥ āsthāya jahi daivata kaṇṭakān

original: 7.006.008a ity uktas tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ

original: 7.006.008c sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣa āha devagaṇān prabhuḥ
analyzed: sukeśam prati sa apekṣaḥ āha deva gaṇān prabhuḥ

original: 7.006.009a nāhaṃ tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyā mama te 'surāḥ
analyzed: na aham tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyāḥ mama te surāḥ

original: 7.006.009c kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
analyzed: kim tu mantram pradāsyāmi yaḥ vai tān nihaniṣyati

original: 7.006.010a evam eva samudyogaṃ puraskṛtya surarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: evam eva samudyogam puraskṛtya sura ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 7.006.010c gacchantu śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ
analyzed: gacchantu śaraṇam viṣṇum haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ

original: 7.006.011a tatas te jayaśabdena pratinandya maheśvaram
analyzed: tatas te jaya śabdena pratinandya maheśvaram

original: 7.006.011c viṣṇoḥ samīpam ājagmur niśācarabhayārditāḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ samīpam ājagmuḥ niśācara bhaya arditāḥ

original: 7.006.012a śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ praṇamya bahumānya ca
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra dharam devam praṇamya bahu mānya ca

original: 7.006.012c ūcuḥ saṃbhrāntavad vākyaṃ sukeśatanayārditāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ saṃbhrānta vat vākyam sukeśa tanaya arditāḥ

original: 7.006.013a sukeśatanayair devatribhis tretāgnisaṃnibhaiḥ
analyzed: sukeśa tanayaiḥ deva tribhiḥ tretāgni saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 7.006.013c ākramya varadānena sthānāny apahṛtāni naḥ
analyzed: ākramya vara dānena sthānāni apahṛtāni naḥ

original: 7.006.014a laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭaśikhare sthitā
analyzed: laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭa śikhare sthitā

original: 7.006.014c tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ
analyzed: tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadā carāḥ

original: 7.006.015a sa tvam asmatpriyārthaṃ tu jahi tān madhusūdana
analyzed: sa tvam asmad priya artham tu jahi tān madhusūdana

original: 7.006.015c cakrakṛttāsyakamalān nivedaya yamāya vai
analyzed: cakra kṛtta āsya kamalān nivedaya yamāya vai

original: 7.006.016a bhayeṣv abhayado 'smākaṃ nānyo 'sti bhavatā samaḥ
analyzed: bhayeṣu abhaya daḥ smākam na anyaḥ sti bhavatā samaḥ

original: 7.006.016c nuda tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: nuda tvam naḥ bhayam deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ

original: 7.006.017a ity evaṃ daivatair ukto devadevo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: iti evam daivataiḥ uktaḥ devadevaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: 7.006.017c abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devān uvāca ha
analyzed: abhayam bhaya daḥ rīṇām dattvā devān uvāca ha

original: 7.006.018a sukeśaṃ rākṣasaṃ jāne īśāna varadarpitam
analyzed: sukeśam rākṣasam jāne īśāna vara darpitam

original: 7.006.018c tāṃś cāsya tanayāñ jāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān
analyzed: tān ca asya tanayām jāne yeṣām jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān

original: 7.006.019a tān ahaṃ samatikrāntamaryādān rākṣasādhamān
analyzed: tān aham samatikrānta maryādān rākṣasa adhamān

original: 7.006.019c sūdayiṣyāmi saṃgrāme surā bhavata vijvarāḥ
analyzed: sūdayiṣyāmi saṃgrāme surāḥ bhavata vijvarāḥ

original: 7.006.020a ity uktās te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
analyzed: iti uktāḥ te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: 7.006.020c yathā vāsaṃ yayur hṛṣṭāḥ praśamanto janārdanam
analyzed: yathā vāsam yayuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ praśamantaḥ janārdanam

original: 7.006.021a vibudhānāṃ samudyogaṃ mālyavān sa niśācaraḥ
analyzed: vibudhānām samudyogam mālyavān sa niśācaraḥ

original: 7.006.021c śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrau idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.006.022a amarā ṛṣayaś caiva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram
analyzed: amarāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca eva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram

original: 7.006.022c asmadvadhaṃ parīpsanta idam ūcus trilocanam
analyzed: asmad vadham parīpsantaḥ idam ūcuḥ trilocanam

original: 7.006.023a sukeśatanayā deva varadānabaloddhatāḥ
analyzed: sukeśa tanayāḥ deva vara dāna bala uddhatāḥ

original: 7.006.023c bādhante 'smān samudyuktā ghorarūpāḥ pade pade
analyzed: bādhante smān samudyuktāḥ ghora rūpāḥ pade pade

original: 7.006.024a rākṣasair abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma umāpate
analyzed: rākṣasaiḥ abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ smaḥ umāpate

original: 7.006.024c sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayāt teṣāṃ durātmanām
analyzed: sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātum bhayāt teṣām durātmanām

original: 7.006.025a tad asmākaṃ hitārthe tvaṃ jahi tāṃs tāṃs trilocana
analyzed: tat asmākam hita arthe tvam jahi tān tān trilocana

original: 7.006.025c rākṣasān huṃkṛtenaiva daha pradahatāṃ vara
analyzed: rākṣasān huṃkṛtena eva daha pradahatām vara

original: 7.006.026a ity evaṃ tridaśair ukto niśamyāndhakasūdanaḥ
analyzed: iti evam tridaśaiḥ uktaḥ niśamya andhaka sūdanaḥ

original: 7.006.026c śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: śiraḥ karam ca dhunvānaḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.006.027a avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe
analyzed: avadhyāḥ mama te devāḥ sukeśa tanayāḥ raṇe

original: 7.006.027c mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati
analyzed: mantram tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yaḥ vai tān nihaniṣyati

original: 7.006.028a yaḥ sa cakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsā janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sa cakra gadā pāṇiḥ pīta vāsāḥ janārdanaḥ

original: 7.006.028c haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha
analyzed: haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇam tam prapadyatha

original: 7.006.029a harān nāvāpya te kāmaṃ kāmārim abhivādya ca
analyzed: harān na avāpya te kāmam kāmārim abhivādya ca

original: 7.006.029c nārāyaṇālayaṃ prāptās tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayan
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ālayam prāptāḥ tasmai sarvam nyavedayan

original: 7.006.030a tato nārāyaṇenoktā devā indrapurogamāḥ
analyzed: tatas nārāyaṇena uktāḥ devāḥ indra purogamāḥ

original: 7.006.030c surārīn sūdayiṣyāmi surā bhavata vijvarāḥ
analyzed: surārīn sūdayiṣyāmi surāḥ bhavata vijvarāḥ

original: 7.006.031a devānāṃ bhayabhītānāṃ hariṇā rākṣasarṣabhau
analyzed: devānām bhaya bhītānām hariṇā rākṣasa ṛṣabhau

original: 7.006.031c pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ tac cintayatha yat kṣamam
analyzed: pratijñātaḥ vadhaḥ smākam tat cintayatha yat kṣamam

original: 7.006.032a hiraṇyakaśipor mṛtyur anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ mṛtyuḥ anyeṣām ca suradviṣām

original: 7.006.032c duḥkhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ jetuṃ yo no hantum abhīpsati
analyzed: duḥkham nārāyaṇam jetum yaḥ naḥ hantum abhīpsati

original: 7.006.033a tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ
analyzed: tatas sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavataḥ vacaḥ

original: 7.006.033c ūcatur bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāv iva vāsavam
analyzed: ūcatuḥ bhrātaram jyeṣṭham bhaga aṃśau iva vāsavam

original: 7.006.034a svadhītaṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ paripālitam
analyzed: su adhītam dattam iṣṭam ca aiśvaryam paripālitam

original: 7.006.034c āyur nirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ svadharmaḥ sthāpitaś ca naḥ
analyzed: āyuḥ nirāmayam prāptam svadharmaḥ sthāpitaḥ ca naḥ

original: 7.006.035a devasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ śastraughaiḥ pravigāhya ca
analyzed: deva sāgaram akṣobhyam śastra oghaiḥ pravigāhya ca

original: 7.006.035c jitā devā raṇe nityaṃ na no mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam
analyzed: jitāḥ devāḥ raṇe nityam na naḥ mṛtyu kṛtam bhayam

original: 7.006.036a nārāyaṇaś ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi yamas tathā
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ca rudraḥ ca śakraḥ ca api yamaḥ tathā

original: 7.006.036c asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarva eva hi bibhyati
analyzed: asmākam pramukhe sthātum sarve eva hi bibhyati

original: 7.006.037a viṣṇor doṣaś ca nāsty atra kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ doṣaḥ ca nā asti atra kāraṇam rākṣasa īśvara

original: 7.006.037c devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitam manaḥ

original: 7.006.038a tasmād adya samudyuktāḥ sarvasainyasamāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt adya samudyuktāḥ sarva sainya samāvṛtāḥ

original: 7.006.038c devān eva jighāṃsāmo yebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ
analyzed: devān eva jighāṃsāmaḥ yebhyaḥ doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ

original: 7.006.039a iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.006.039c udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvātha rākṣasāḥ sarva eva te
analyzed: udyogam ghoṣayitvā atha rākṣasāḥ sarve eva te

original: 7.006.039e yuddhāya niryayuḥ kruddhā jambhavṛtrabalā iva
analyzed: yuddhāya niryayuḥ kruddhāḥ jambha vṛtra balāḥ iva

original: 7.006.040a syandanair vāraṇendraiś ca hayaiś ca girisaṃnibhaiḥ
analyzed: syandanaiḥ vāraṇa indraiḥ ca hayaiḥ ca giri saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 7.006.040c kharair gobhir athoṣṭraiś ca śiṃśumārair bhujaṃ gamaiḥ
analyzed: kharaiḥ gobhiḥ atha uṣṭraiḥ ca śiṃśumāraiḥ bhujam gamaiḥ

original: 7.006.041a makaraiḥ kacchapair mīnair vihaṃgair garuḍopamaiḥ
analyzed: makaraiḥ kacchapaiḥ mīnaiḥ vihaṃgaiḥ garuḍa upamaiḥ

original: 7.006.041c siṃhair vyāghrair varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair api
analyzed: siṃhaiḥ vyāghraiḥ varāhaiḥ ca sṛmaraiḥ camaraiḥ api

original: 7.006.042a tyaktvā laṅkāṃ tataḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā laṅkām tatas sarve rākṣasāḥ bala garvitāḥ

original: 7.006.042c prayātā devalokāya yoddhuṃ daivataśatravaḥ
analyzed: prayātā deva lokāya yoddhum daivata śatravaḥ

original: 7.006.043a laṅkāviparyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāni laṅkālayāny atha
analyzed: laṅkā viparyayam dṛṣṭvā yāni laṅkā ālayāni atha

original: 7.006.043c bhūtāni bhayadarśīni vimanaskāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni bhaya darśīni vimanaskāni sarvaśas

original: 7.006.044a bhaumās tathāntarikṣāś ca kālājñaptā bhayāvahāḥ
analyzed: bhaumāḥ tathā āntarikṣāḥ ca kāla ājñaptāḥ bhaya āvahāḥ

original: 7.006.044c utpātā rākṣasendrāṇām abhāvāyotthitā drutam
analyzed: utpātāḥ rākṣasa indrāṇām abhāvāya utthitāḥ drutam

original: 7.006.045a asthīni meghā varṣanti uṣṇaṃ śoṇitam eva ca
analyzed: asthīni meghāḥ varṣanti uṣṇam śoṇitam eva ca

original: 7.006.045c velāṃ samudro 'py utkrāntaś calante cācalottamāḥ
analyzed: velām samudraḥ u pi utkrāntaḥ calante ca acala uttamāḥ

original: 7.006.046a aṭṭahāsān vimuñcanto ghananādasamasvanān
analyzed: aṭṭahāsān vimuñcantaḥ ghana nāda sama svanān

original: 7.006.046c bhūtāḥ paripatanti sma nṛtyamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāḥ paripatanti sma nṛtyamānāḥ sahasraśas

original: 7.006.047a gṛdhracakraṃ mahac cāpi jvalanodgāribhir mukhaiḥ
analyzed: gṛdhra cakram mahat ca api jvalana udgāribhiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: 7.006.047c rākṣasānām upari vai bhramate kālacakravat
analyzed: rākṣasānām upari vai bhramate kālacakra vat

original: 7.006.048a tān acintyamahotpātān rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
analyzed: tān acintya mahā utpātān rākṣasāḥ bala garvitāḥ

original: 7.006.048c yanty eva na nivartante mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ
analyzed: yanti eva na nivartante mṛtyu pāśa avapāśitāḥ

original: 7.006.049a mālyavāṃś ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ
analyzed: mālyavān ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ

original: 7.006.049c āsan puraḥsarās teṣāṃ kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ
analyzed: āsan puraḥsarāḥ teṣām kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ

original: 7.006.050a mālyavantaṃ tu te sarve mālyavantam ivācalam
analyzed: mālyavantam tu te sarve mālyavantam iva acalam

original: 7.006.050c niśācarā āśrayante dhātāram iva dehinaḥ
analyzed: niśācarāḥ āśrayante dhātāram iva dehinaḥ

original: 7.006.051a tad balaṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ mahābhraghananāditam
analyzed: tat balam rākṣasa indrāṇām mahā abhra ghana nāditam

original: 7.006.051c jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālī vaśe sthitam
analyzed: jaya īpsayā deva lokam yayau mālī vaśe sthitam

original: 7.006.052a rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām samudyogam tam tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.006.052c devadūtād upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tato manaḥ
analyzed: deva dūtāt upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tatas manaḥ

original: 7.006.053a sa devasiddharṣimahoragaiś ca;
analyzed: sa deva siddha ṛṣi mahā uragaiḥ ca

original: gandharvamukhyāpsarasopagītaḥ
analyzed: gandharva mukhya apsarasā upagītaḥ

original: 7.006.053c samāsasādāmaraśatrusainyaṃ;
analyzed: samāsasāda amara śatru sainyam

original: cakrāsisīrapravarādidhārī
7.006.054a suparṇapakṣānilanunnapakṣaṃ;
analyzed: suparṇa pakṣa anila nunna pakṣam

original: bhramatpatākaṃ pravikīrṇaśastram
analyzed: bhramat patākam pravikīrṇa śastram

original: 7.006.054c cacāla tad rākṣasarājasainyaṃ;
analyzed: cacāla tat rākṣasa rāja sainyam

original: calopalo nīla ivācalendraḥ
analyzed: cala upalaḥ nīlaḥ iva acala indraḥ

original: 7.006.055a tatha śitaiḥ śoṇitamāṃsarūṣitair;
analyzed: tathā śitaiḥ śoṇita māṃsa rūṣitaiḥ

original: yugāntavaiśvānaratulyavigrahaiḥ
analyzed: yugānta vaiśvānara tulya vigrahaiḥ

original: 7.006.055c niśācarāḥ saṃparivārya mādhavaṃ;
analyzed: niśācarāḥ saṃparivārya mādhavam

original: varāyudhair nirbibhiduḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: vara āyudhaiḥ nirbibhiduḥ sahasraśas

original: 7.007.001a nārāyaṇagiriṃ te tu garjanto rākṣasāmbudāḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa girim te tu garjantaḥ rākṣasa ambudāḥ

original: 7.007.001c avarṣann iṣuvarṣeṇa varṣeṇādrim ivāmbudāḥ
analyzed: avarṣan iṣu varṣeṇa varṣeṇa adrim iva ambudāḥ

original: 7.007.002a śyāmāvadātas tair viṣṇur nīlair naktaṃcarottamaiḥ
analyzed: śyāma avadātaḥ taiḥ viṣṇuḥ nīlaiḥ naktaṃcara uttamaiḥ

original: 7.007.002c vṛto 'ñjanagirīvāsīd varṣamāṇaiḥ payodharaiḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ ñjana giri iva āsīt varṣamāṇaiḥ payodharaiḥ

original: 7.007.003a śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam
analyzed: śalabhāḥ iva kedāram maśakāḥ iva parvatam

original: 7.007.003c yathāmṛtaghaṭaṃ jīvā makarā iva cārṇavam
analyzed: yathā amṛta ghaṭam jīvāḥ makarāḥ iva ca arṇavam

original: 7.007.004a tathā rakṣodhanur muktā vajrānilamanojavāḥ
analyzed: tathā rakṣaḥ dhanuḥ muktāḥ vajra anila manojavāḥ

original: 7.007.004c hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokāstam iva paryaye
analyzed: harim viśanti sma śarāḥ lokāḥ tam iva paryaye

original: 7.007.005a syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiś ca gajadhūr gatāḥ
analyzed: syandanaiḥ syandana gatāḥ gajaiḥ ca gaja dhūḥ gatāḥ

original: 7.007.005c aśvārohāḥ sadaśvaiś ca pādātāś cāmbare carāḥ
analyzed: aśva ārohāḥ sat aśvaiḥ ca pādātāḥ ca ambare carāḥ

original: 7.007.006a rākṣasendrā girinibhāḥ śaraśaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥ
analyzed: rākṣasa indrāḥ giri nibhāḥ śara śakti ṛṣṭi tomaraiḥ

original: 7.007.006c nirucchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāma iva dvijam
analyzed: nirucchvāsam harim cakruḥ prāṇāyāme iva dvijam

original: 7.007.007a niśācarais tudyamāno mīnair iva mahātimiḥ
analyzed: niśācaraiḥ tudyamānaḥ mīnaiḥ iva mahā timiḥ

original: 7.007.007c śārṅgam āyamya gātrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ mahāhave
analyzed: śārṅgam āyamya gātrāṇi rākṣasānām mahā āhave

original: 7.007.008a śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair vajravaktrair manojavaiḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ pūrṇa āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ vajra vaktraiḥ manojavaiḥ

original: 7.007.008c ciccheda tilaśo viṣṇuḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: ciccheda tilaśas viṣṇuḥ sahasraśas

original: 7.007.009a vidrāvya śaravarṣaṃ taṃ varṣaṃ vāyur ivotthitam
analyzed: vidrāvya śara varṣam tam varṣam vāyuḥ iva utthitam

original: 7.007.009c pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhaṃ pradadhmau puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: pāñcajanyam mahā śaṅkham pradadhmau puruṣottamaḥ

original: 7.007.010a so 'mbujo hariṇā dhmātaḥ sarvaprāṇena śaṅkharāṭ
analyzed: saḥ mbujaḥ hariṇā dhmātaḥ sarva prāṇena śaṅkha rāj

original: 7.007.010c rarāsa bhīmanihrādo yugānte jalado yathā
analyzed: rarāsa bhīma nihrādaḥ yuga ante jaladaḥ yathā

original: 7.007.011a śaṅkharājaravaḥ so 'tha trāsayām āsa rākṣasān
analyzed: śaṅkha rāja ravaḥ saḥ tha trāsayām āsa rākṣasān

original: 7.007.011c mṛgarāja ivāraṇye samadān iva kuñjarān
analyzed: mṛgarājaḥ iva araṇye samadān iva kuñjarān

original: 7.007.012a na śekur aśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan
analyzed: na śekuḥ aśvāḥ saṃsthātum vimadāḥ kuñjarāḥ abhavan

original: 7.007.012c syandanebhyaś cyutā yodhāḥ śaṅkharāvitadurbalāḥ
analyzed: syandanebhyaḥ cyutāḥ yodhāḥ śaṅkha rāvita durbalāḥ

original: 7.007.013a śārṅgacāpavinirmuktā vajratulyānanāḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: śārṅga cāpa vinirmuktāḥ vajra tulya ānanāḥ śarāḥ

original: 7.007.013c vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim
analyzed: vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi su puṅkhāḥ viviśuḥ kṣitim

original: 7.007.014a bhidyamānāḥ śaraiś cānye nārāyaṇadhanuścyutaiḥ
analyzed: bhidyamānāḥ śaraiḥ ca anye nārāyaṇa dhanuḥ cyutaiḥ

original: 7.007.014c nipetū rākṣasā bhīmāḥ śailā vajrahatā iva
analyzed: nipetuḥ rākṣasāḥ bhīmāḥ śailāḥ vajra hatāḥ iva

original: 7.007.015a vraṇair vraṇakarārīṇām adhokṣajaśarodbhavaiḥ
analyzed: vraṇaiḥ vraṇa kara arīṇām adhokṣaja śara udbhavaiḥ

original: 7.007.015c asṛk kṣaranti dhārābhiḥ svarṇadhārām ivācalāḥ
analyzed: asṛj kṣaranti dhārābhiḥ svarṇa dhārām iva acalāḥ

original: 7.007.016a śaṅkharājaravaś cāpi śārṅgacāparavas tathā
analyzed: śaṅkha rāja ravaḥ ca api śārṅga cāpa ravaḥ tathā

original: 7.007.016c rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃś cāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām ravān ca api grasate vaiṣṇavaḥ ravaḥ

original: 7.007.017a sūryād iva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarād iva
analyzed: sūryāt iva karāḥ ghorāḥ ūrmayaḥ sāgarāt iva

original: 7.007.017c parvatād iva nāgendrā vāryoghā iva cāmbudāt
analyzed: parvatāt iva nāga indrāḥ vāri oghāḥ iva ca ambudāt

original: 7.007.018a tathā bāṇā vinirmuktāḥ śārṅgān narāyaṇeritāḥ
analyzed: tathā bāṇāḥ vinirmuktāḥ śārṅgāt narāyaṇa īritāḥ

original: 7.007.018c nirdhāvantīṣavas tūrṇaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: nirdhāvanti iṣavaḥ tūrṇam sahasraśas

original: 7.007.019a śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā
analyzed: śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradāḥ yathā

original: 7.007.019c dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā
analyzed: dviradena yathā vyāghrāḥ vyāghreṇa dvīpinaḥ yathā

original: 7.007.020a dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā
analyzed: dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakāḥ yathā

original: 7.007.020c mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathākhavaḥ
analyzed: mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathā ākhavaḥ

original: 7.007.021a tathā te rākṣasā yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
analyzed: tathā te rākṣasāḥ yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: 7.007.021c dravanti drāvitāś caiva śāyitāś ca mahītale
analyzed: dravanti drāvitāḥ ca eva śāyitāḥ ca mahī tale

original: 7.007.022a rākṣasānāṃ sahasrāṇi nihatya madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām sahasrāṇi nihatya madhusūdanaḥ

original: 7.007.022c vārijaṃ nādayām āsa toyadaṃ surarāḍ iva
analyzed: vārijam nādayām āsa toyadam surarāj iva

original: 7.007.023a nārāyaṇaśaragrastaṃ śaṅkhanādasuvihvalam
analyzed: nārāyaṇa śara grastam śaṅkha nāda su vihvalam

original: 7.007.023c yayau laṅkām abhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam
analyzed: yayau laṅkām abhimukham prabhagnam rākṣasam balam

original: 7.007.024a prabhagne rākṣasabale nārāyaṇaśarāhate
analyzed: prabhagne rākṣasa bale nārāyaṇa śara āhate

original: 7.007.024c sumālī śaravarṣeṇa āvavāra raṇe harim
analyzed: sumālī śara varṣeṇa āvavāra raṇe harim

original: 7.007.025a utkṣipya hemābharaṇaṃ karaṃ karam iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: utkṣipya hema ābharaṇam karam karam iva dvipaḥ

original: 7.007.025c rarāsa rākṣaso harṣāt sataḍit toyado yathā
analyzed: rarāsa rākṣasaḥ harṣāt sa taḍit toyadaḥ yathā

original: 7.007.026a sumāler nardatas tasya śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
analyzed: sumāleḥ nardataḥ tasya śiraḥ jvalita kuṇḍalam

original: 7.007.026c ciccheda yantur aśvāś ca bhrāntās tasya tu rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: ciccheda yantuḥ aśvāḥ ca bhrāntāḥ tasya tu rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.007.027a tair aśvair bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: taiḥ aśvaiḥ bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣasa īśvaraḥ

original: 7.007.027c indriyāśvair yathā bhrāntair dhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ
analyzed: indriya aśvaiḥ yathā bhrāntaiḥ dhṛti hīnaḥ yathā naraḥ

original: 7.007.028a mālī cābhyadravad yuddhe pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: mālī ca abhyadravat yuddhe pragṛhya sa śaram dhanuḥ

original: 7.007.028c māler dhanuścyutā bāṇāḥ kārtasvaravibhūṣitāḥ
analyzed: māleḥ dhanuḥ cyutāḥ bāṇāḥ kārtasvara vibhūṣitāḥ

original: 7.007.028e viviśur harim āsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva
analyzed: viviśuḥ harim āsādya krauñcam patra rathāḥ iva

original: 7.007.029a ardyamānaḥ śaraiḥ so 'tha mālimuktaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: ardyamānaḥ śaraiḥ saḥ tha māli muktaiḥ sahasraśas

original: 7.007.029c cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇur jitendriya ivādhibhiḥ
analyzed: cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇuḥ jita indriyaḥ iva ādhibhiḥ

original: 7.007.030a atha maurvī svanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: atha maurvī svanam kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: 7.007.030c mālinaṃ prati bāṇaughān sasarjāsigadādharaḥ
analyzed: mālinam prati bāṇa oghān sasarja asi gadā dharaḥ

original: 7.007.031a te mālideham āsādya vajravidyutprabhāḥ śarāḥ
analyzed: te māli deham āsādya vajra vidyut prabhāḥ śarāḥ

original: 7.007.031c pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva purāmṛtam
analyzed: pibanti rudhiram tasya nāgāḥ iva purā amṛtam

original: 7.007.032a mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā mālimauliṃ harir balāt
analyzed: mālinam vimukham kṛtvā māli maulim hariḥ balāt

original: 7.007.032c rathaṃ ca sadhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaś ca nyapātayat
analyzed: ratham ca sa dhvajam cāpam vājinaḥ ca nyapātayat

original: 7.007.033a virathas tu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktaṃcarottamaḥ
analyzed: virathaḥ tu gadām gṛhya mālī naktaṃcara uttamaḥ

original: 7.007.033c āpupluve gadāpāṇir giryagrād iva keṣarī
analyzed: āpupluve gadā pāṇiḥ giri agrāt iva keṣarī

original: 7.007.034a sa tayā garuḍaṃ saṃkhye īśānam iva cāntakaḥ
analyzed: sa tayā garuḍam saṃkhye īśānam iva ca antakaḥ

original: 7.007.034c lalāṭadeśe 'bhyahanad vajreṇendro yathācalam
analyzed: lalāṭa deśe bhyahanat vajreṇa indraḥ yathā acalam

original: 7.007.035a gadayābhihatas tena mālinā garuḍo bhṛśam
analyzed: gadayā abhihataḥ tena mālinā garuḍaḥ bhṛśam

original: 7.007.035c raṇāt parāṅmukhaṃ devaṃ kṛtavān vedanāturaḥ
analyzed: raṇāt parāṅmukham devam kṛtavān vedanā āturaḥ

original: 7.007.036a parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai
analyzed: parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai

original: 7.007.036c udatiṣṭhan mahānādo rakṣasām abhinardatām
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat mahā nādaḥ rakṣasām abhinardatām

original: 7.007.037a rakṣasāṃ nadatāṃ nādaṃ śrutvā harihayānujaḥ
analyzed: rakṣasām nadatām nādam śrutvā hari haya anujaḥ

original: 7.007.037c parāṅmukho 'py utsasarja cakraṃ mālijighāṃsayā
analyzed: parāṅmukhaḥ pi utsasarja cakram māli jighāṃsayā

original: 7.007.038a tat sūryamaṇḍalābhāsaṃ svabhāsā bhāsayan nabhaḥ
analyzed: tat sūrya maṇḍala ābhāsam sva bhāsā bhāsayan nabhaḥ

original: 7.007.038c kālacakranibhaṃ cakraṃ māleḥ śīrṣam apātayat
analyzed: kāla cakra nibham cakram māleḥ śīrṣam apātayat

original: 7.007.039a tacchiro rākṣasendrasya cakrotkṛttaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: tat śiraḥ rākṣasa indrasya cakra utkṛttam vibhīṣaṇam

original: 7.007.039c papāta rudhirodgāri purā rāhuśiro yathā
analyzed: papāta rudhira udgāri purā rāhu śiraḥ yathā

original: 7.007.040a tataḥ suraiḥ susaṃhṛṣṭaiḥ sarvaprāṇasamīritaḥ
analyzed: tatas suraiḥ su saṃhṛṣṭaiḥ sarva prāṇa samīritaḥ

original: 7.007.040c siṃhanādaravo muktaḥ sādhu deveti vādibhiḥ
analyzed: siṃhanāda ravaḥ muktaḥ sādhu deva iti vādibhiḥ

original: 7.007.041a mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api
analyzed: mālinam nihatam dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api

original: 7.007.041c sabalau śokasaṃtaptau laṅkāaṃ prati vidhāvitau
analyzed: sa balau śoka saṃtaptau laṅkāam prati vidhāvitau

original: 7.007.042a garuḍas tu samāśvastaḥ saṃnivṛtya mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: garuḍaḥ tu samāśvastaḥ saṃnivṛtya mahā manāḥ

original: 7.007.042c rākṣasān drāvayām āsa pakṣavātena kopitaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasān drāvayām āsa pakṣa vātena kopitaḥ

original: 7.007.043a nārāyaṇo 'pīṣuvarāśanībhir;
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ pīṣuvara aśanībhiḥ

original: vidārayām āsa dhanuḥpramuktaiḥ
analyzed: vidārayām āsa dhanuḥ pramuktaiḥ

original: 7.007.043c naktaṃcarān muktavidhūtakeśān;
analyzed: naktaṃcarān mukta vidhūta keśān

original: yathāśanībhiḥ sataḍinmahendraḥ
analyzed: yathā aśanībhiḥ sa taḍit mahā indraḥ

original: 7.007.044a bhinnātapatraṃ patamānaśastraṃ;
analyzed: bhinna ātapatram patamāna śastram

original: śarair apadhvastaviśīrṇadeham
analyzed: śaraiḥ apadhvasta viśīrṇa deham

original: 7.007.044c viniḥsṛtāntraṃ bhayalolanetraṃ;
analyzed: viniḥsṛta antram bhaya lola netram

original: balaṃ tad unmattanibhaṃ babhūva
analyzed: balam tat unmatta nibham babhūva

original: 7.007.045a siṃhārditānām iva kuñjarāṇāṃ;
analyzed: siṃha arditānām iva kuñjarāṇām

original: niśācarāṇāṃ saha kuñjarāṇām
analyzed: niśācarāṇām saha kuñjarāṇām

original: 7.007.045c ravāś ca vegāś ca samaṃ babhūvuḥ;
analyzed: ravāḥ ca vegāḥ ca samam babhūvuḥ

original: purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām
analyzed: purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām

original: 7.007.046a saṃchādyamānā haribāṇajālaiḥ;
analyzed: saṃchādyamānāḥ hari bāṇa jālaiḥ

original: svabāṇajāalāni samutsṛjantaḥ
analyzed: sva bāṇajāalāni samutsṛjantaḥ

original: 7.007.046c dhāvanti naktaṃcarakālameghā;
analyzed: dhāvanti naktaṃcara kāla meghā

original: vāyupraṇunnā iva kālameghāḥ
analyzed: vāyu praṇunnāḥ iva kāla meghāḥ

original: 7.007.047a cakraprahārair vinikṛttaśīrṣāḥ;
analyzed: cakra prahāraiḥ vinikṛtta śīrṣāḥ

original: saṃcūrṇitāṅgāś ca gadāprahāraiḥ
analyzed: saṃcūrṇita aṅgāḥ ca gadā prahāraiḥ

original: 7.007.047c asiprahārair bahudhā vibhaktāḥ;
analyzed: asi prahāraiḥ bahudhā vibhaktāḥ

original: patanti śailā iva rākṣasendrāḥ
analyzed: patanti śailāḥ iva rākṣasa indrāḥ

original: 7.007.048a cakrakṛttāsyakamalā gadāsaṃcūrṇitorasaḥ
analyzed: cakra kṛtta āsya kamalāḥ gadā saṃcūrṇita urasaḥ

original: 7.007.048c lāṅgalaglapitagrīvā musalair bhinnamastakāḥ
analyzed: lāṅgala glapita grīvāḥ musalaiḥ bhinna mastakāḥ

original: 7.007.049a ke cic caivāsinā chinnās tathānye śaratāḍitāḥ
analyzed: ke cit ca eva asinā chinnāḥ tathā anye śara tāḍitāḥ

original: 7.007.049c nipetur ambarāt tūrṇaṃ rākṣasāḥ sāgarāmbhasi
analyzed: nipetuḥ ambarāt tūrṇam rākṣasāḥ sāgara ambhasi

original: 7.007.050a tadāmbaraṃ vigalitahārakuṇḍalair;
analyzed: tadā ambaram vigalita hāra kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ
analyzed: niśācaraiḥ nīla balāhaka upamaiḥ

original: 7.007.050c nipātyamānair dadṛśe nirantaraṃ;
analyzed: nipātyamānaiḥ dadṛśe nirantaram

original: nipātyamānair iva nīlaparvataiḥ
analyzed: nipātyamānaiḥ iva nīla parvataiḥ

original: 7.008.001a hanyamāne bale tasmin padmanābhena pṛṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: hanyamāne bale tasmin padmanābhena pṛṣṭhatas

original: 7.008.001c mālyavān saṃnivṛtto 'tha velātiga ivārṇavaḥ
analyzed: mālyavān saṃnivṛttaḥ tha velā atige iva arṇavaḥ

original: 7.008.002a saṃraktanayanaḥ kopāc calan maulir niśācaraḥ
analyzed: saṃrakta nayanaḥ kopāt calan mauliḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.008.002c padmanābham idaṃ prāha vacanaṃ paruṣaṃ tadā
analyzed: padmanābham idam prāha vacanam paruṣam tadā

original: 7.008.003a nārāyaṇa na jānīṣe kṣatradharmaṃ sanātanam
analyzed: nārāyaṇa na jānīṣe kṣatra dharmam sanātanam

original: 7.008.003c ayuddhamanaso bhagnān yo 'smān haṃsi yathetaraḥ
analyzed: a yuddha manasaḥ bhagnān yaḥ smān haṃsi yathā itaraḥ

original: 7.008.004a parāṅmukhavadhaṃ pāpaṃ yaḥ karoti sureśvara
analyzed: parāṅmukha vadham pāpam yaḥ karoti sureśvara

original: 7.008.004c sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām
analyzed: sa hantā na gataḥ svargam labhate puṇya karmaṇām

original: 7.008.005a yuddhaśraddhātha vā te 'sti śaṅkhacakragadādhara
analyzed: yuddha śraddhā atha vā te sti śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: 7.008.005c ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yat tava
analyzed: aham sthitaḥ smi paśyāmi balam darśaya yat tava

original: 7.008.006a uvāca rākṣasendraṃ taṃ devarājānujo balī
analyzed: uvāca rākṣasa indram tam devarāja anujaḥ balī

original: 7.008.006c yuṣmatto bhayabhītānāṃ devānāṃ vai mayābhayam
analyzed: yuṣmattaḥ bhaya bhītānām devānām vai mayā abhayam

original: 7.008.006e rākṣasotsādanaṃ dattaṃ tad etad anupālyate
analyzed: rākṣasa utsādanam dattam tat etat anupālyate

original: 7.008.007a prāṇair api priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ api priyam kāryam devānām hi sadā mayā

original: 7.008.007c so 'haṃ vo nihaniṣyāmi rasātalagatān api
analyzed: saḥ ham vaḥ nihaniṣyāmi rasātala gatān api

original: 7.008.008a devam evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu raktāmburuhalocanam
analyzed: devam evam bruvāṇam tu rakta amburuha locanam

original: 7.008.008c śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddho rākṣasendro rarāsa ca
analyzed: śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ rarāsa ca

original: 7.008.009a mālyavad bhujanirmuktā śaktir ghaṇṭākṛtasvanā
analyzed: mālya vat bhuja nirmuktā śaktiḥ ghaṇṭā kṛta svanā

original: 7.008.009c harer urasi babhrāja meghastheva śatahradā
analyzed: hareḥ urasi babhrāja megha sthā iva śatahradā

original: 7.008.010a tatas tām eva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ
analyzed: tatas tām eva ca utkṛṣya śaktim śakti dhara priyaḥ

original: 7.008.010c mālyavantaṃ samuddiśya cikṣepāmburuhekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: mālyavantam samuddiśya cikṣepa amburuha īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.008.011a skandotsṛṣṭeva sā śaktir govindakaraniḥsṛtā
analyzed: skanda utsṛṣṭā iva sā śaktiḥ govinda kara niḥsṛtā

original: 7.008.011c kāṅkṣantī rākṣasaṃ prāyān maholkevāñjanācalam
analyzed: kāṅkṣantī rākṣasam prāyāt mahā ulkā iva añjana acalam

original: 7.008.012a sā tasyorasi vistīrṇe hārabhāsāvabhāsite
analyzed: sā tasya urasi vistīrṇe hāra bhāsa avabhāsite

original: 7.008.012c apatad rākṣasendrasya girikūṭa ivāśaniḥ
analyzed: apatat rākṣasa indrasya giri kūṭe iva aśaniḥ

original: 7.008.013a tayā bhinnatanutrāṇāḥ prāviśad vipulaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: tayā bhinna tanutrāṇāḥ prāviśat vipulam tamaḥ

original: 7.008.013c mālyavān punar āśvastas tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
analyzed: mālyavān punar āśvastaḥ tasthau giriḥ iva acalaḥ

original: 7.008.014a tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakair bahubhiś citam
analyzed: tatas kārṣṇāyasam śūlam kaṇṭakaiḥ bahubhiḥ citam

original: 7.008.014c pragṛhyābhyahanad devaṃ stanayor antare dṛḍham
analyzed: pragṛhya abhyahanat devam stanayoḥ antare dṛḍham

original: 7.008.015a tathaiva raṇaraktas tu muṣṭinā vāsavānujam
analyzed: tathā eva raṇa raktaḥ tu muṣṭinā vāsava anujam

original: 7.008.015c tāḍayitvā dhanurmātram apakrānto niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tāḍayitvā dhanuḥ mātram apakrāntaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.008.016a tato 'mbare mahāñ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cotthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas mbare mahān śabdaḥ sādhu sādhu iti ca utthitaḥ

original: 7.008.016c āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpy atāḍayat
analyzed: āhatya rākṣasaḥ viṣṇum garuḍam ca api atāḍayat

original: 7.008.017a vainateyas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pakṣavātena rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: vainateyaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ pakṣa vātena rākṣasam

original: 7.008.017c vyapohad balavān vāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayaṃ yathā
analyzed: vyapohat balavān vāyuḥ śuṣka parṇa cayam yathā

original: 7.008.018a dvijendrapakṣavātena drāvitaṃ dṛśya pūrvajam
analyzed: dvijendra pakṣa vātena drāvitam dṛśya pūrvajam

original: 7.008.018c sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkām abhimukho yayau
analyzed: sumālī sva balaiḥ sārdham laṅkām abhimukhaḥ yayau

original: 7.008.019a pakṣavātabaloddhūto mālyavān api rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: pakṣa vāta bala uddhūtaḥ mālyavān api rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.008.019c svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sva balena samāgamya yayau laṅkām hriyā vṛtaḥ

original: 7.008.020a evaṃ te rākṣasā rāma hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa
analyzed: evam te rākṣasāḥ rāma hariṇā kamala īkṣaṇa

original: 7.008.020c bahuśaḥ saṃyuge bhagnā hatapravaranāyakāḥ
analyzed: bahuśas saṃyuge bhagnāḥ hata pravara nāyakāḥ

original: 7.008.021a aśaknuvantas te viṣṇuṃ pratiyoddhuṃ bhayārditāḥ
analyzed: a śaknuvantaḥ te viṣṇum pratiyoddhum bhaya arditāḥ

original: 7.008.021c tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā laṅkām gatāḥ vastum pātālam saha patnayaḥ

original: 7.008.022a sumālinaṃ samāsādya rākṣasaṃ raghunandana
analyzed: sumālinam samāsādya rākṣasam raghunandana

original: 7.008.022c sthitāḥ prakhyātavīryās te vaṃśe sālakaṭaṅkaṭe
analyzed: sthitāḥ prakhyāta vīryāḥ te vaṃśe sāla kaṭaṅkaṭe

original: 7.008.023a ye tvayā nihatās te vai paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: ye tvayā nihatāḥ te vai paulastyāḥ nāma rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.008.023c sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
analyzed: sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣām puraḥsarāḥ

original: 7.008.023e sarva ete mahābhāga rāvaṇād balavattarāḥ
analyzed: sarve ete mahābhāga rāvaṇāt balavattarāḥ

original: 7.008.024a na cānyo rakṣasāṃ hantā sureṣv api puraṃjaya
analyzed: na ca anyaḥ rakṣasām hantā sureṣu api puraṃjaya

original: 7.008.024c ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam
analyzed: ṛte nārāyaṇam devam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: 7.008.025a bhavān nārāyaṇo devaś caturbāhuḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: bhavān nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ catur bāhuḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 7.008.025c rākṣasān hantum utpanno ajeyaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasān hantum utpannaḥ ajeyaḥ prabhuḥ avyayaḥ

original: 7.009.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.009.001c rasātalān martyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāara ha
analyzed: rasātalāt martya lokam sarvam vai vicacāara ha

original: 7.009.002a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ
analyzed: nīla jīmūta saṃkāśaḥ tapta kāñcana kuṇḍalaḥ

original: 7.009.002c kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam
analyzed: kanyām duhitaram gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam

original: 7.009.002e athāpaśyat sa gacchantaṃ puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaram
analyzed: athā apaśyat sa gacchantam puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaram

original: 7.009.003a taṃ dṛṣṭvāmarasaṃkāśaṃ gacchantaṃ pāvakopamam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā amara saṃkāśam gacchantam pāvaka upamam

original: 7.009.003c athābbravīt sutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: athā abbravīt sutām rakṣaḥ kaikasīm nāma nāmataḥ

original: 7.009.004a putri pradānakālo 'yaṃ yauvanaṃ te 'tivartate
analyzed: putri pradāna kālaḥ yam yauvanam te tivartate

original: 7.009.004c tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ
analyzed: tvad kṛte ca vayam sarve yantritāḥ dharma buddhayaḥ

original: 7.009.005a tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sapadmeva putrike
analyzed: tvam hi sarva guṇa upetā śrīḥ sa padmā iva putrike

original: 7.009.005c pratyākhyānāc ca bhītais tvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase
analyzed: pratyākhyānāt ca bhītaiḥ tvam na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase

original: 7.009.006a kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām
analyzed: kanyā pitṛ tvam duḥkham hi sarveṣām māna kāṅkṣiṇām

original: 7.009.006c na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayed iti putrike
analyzed: na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyām varayet iti putrike

original: 7.009.007a mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate
analyzed: mātuḥ kulam pitṛ kulam yatra ca eva pradīyate

original: 7.009.007c kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: kula trayam sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati

original: 7.009.008a sā tvaṃ munivaraśreṣṭhaṃ prajāpatikulodbhavam
analyzed: sā tvam muni vara śreṣṭham prajāpati kula udbhavam

original: 7.009.008c gaccha viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam
analyzed: gaccha viśravasam putri paulastyam varaya svayam

original: 7.009.009a īdṛśās te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: īdṛśāḥ te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.009.009c tejasā bhāskarasamā yādṛśo 'yaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: tejasā bhāskara samāḥ yādṛśaḥ yam dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 7.009.010a etasminn antare rāma pulastyatanayo dvijaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare rāma pulastya tanayaḥ dvijaḥ

original: 7.009.010c agnihotram upātiṣṭhac caturtha iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: agnihotram upātiṣṭhat caturthaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: 7.009.011a sā tu tāṃ dāruṇāṃ velām acintya pitṛgauravāt
analyzed: sā tu tām dāruṇām velām a cintya pitṛ gauravāt

original: 7.009.011c upasṛtyāgratas tasya caraṇādhomukhī sthitā
analyzed: upasṛtya agratas tasya caraṇa adhomukhī sthitā

original: 7.009.012a sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
analyzed: sa tu tām vīkṣya su śroṇīm pūrṇa candra nibha ānanām

original: 7.009.012c abravīt paramodāro dīpyamāna ivaujasā
analyzed: abravīt parama udāraḥ dīpyamānaḥ iva ojasā

original: 7.009.013a bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvam ihāgatā
analyzed: bhadre kasya asi duhitā kutas vā tvam iha āgatā

original: 7.009.013c kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetos tattvato brūhi śobhane
analyzed: kim kāryam kasya vā hetoḥ tattvataḥ brūhi śobhane

original: 7.009.014a evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalir athābravīt
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjaliḥ atha abravīt

original: 7.009.014c ātmaprabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam
analyzed: ātma prabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam

original: 7.009.015a kiṃ tu viddhi hi māṃ brahmañ śāsanāt pitur āgatām
analyzed: kim tu viddhi hi mām brahmam śāsanāt pituḥ āgatām

original: 7.009.015c kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasi
analyzed: kaikasī nāma nāmnā aham śeṣam tvam jñātum arhasi

original: 7.009.016a sa tu gatvā munir dhyānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: sa tu gatvā muniḥ dhyānam vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.009.016c vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yan manogatam
analyzed: vijñātam te mayā bhadre kāraṇam yat manogatam

original: 7.009.017a dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ mām upasthitā
analyzed: dāruṇāyām tu velāyām yasmāt tvam mām upasthitā

original: 7.009.017c śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśāñ janayiṣyasi
analyzed: śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśām janayiṣyasi

original: 7.009.018a dāruṇān dāruṇākārān dāruṇābhijanapriyān
analyzed: dāruṇān dāruṇa ākārān dāruṇa abhijana priyān

original: 7.009.018c prasaviṣyasi suśroṇi rākṣasān krūrakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: prasaviṣyasi su śroṇi rākṣasān krūra karmaṇaḥ
