original: 7.009.019a sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: sā tu tad vacanam śrutvā praṇipatya abravīt vacaḥ

original: 7.009.019c bhagavan nedṛśāḥ putrās tvatto 'rhā brahmayonitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat na īdṛśāḥ putrāḥ tvattaḥ rhāḥ brahma yonitaḥ

original: 7.009.020a athābravīn munis tatra paścimo yas tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: athā bravīt muniḥ tatra paścimaḥ yaḥ tava ātmajaḥ

original: 7.009.020c mama vaṃśānurūpaś ca dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati
analyzed: mama vaṃśa anurūpaḥ ca dharma ātmā ca bhaviṣyati

original: 7.009.021a evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit

original: 7.009.021c janayām āsa bībhatsaṃ rakṣorūpaṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: janayām āsa bībhatsam rakṣaḥ rūpam su dāruṇam

original: 7.009.022a daśaśīrṣaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam
analyzed: daśa śīrṣam mahā daṃṣṭram nīlāñjana caya upamam

original: 7.009.022c tāmrauṣṭhaṃ viṃśatibhujaṃ mahāsyaṃ dīptamūrdhajam
analyzed: tāmra oṣṭham viṃśati bhujam mahā āsyam dīpta mūrdhajam

original: 7.009.023a jātamātre tatas tasmin sajvālakavalāḥ śivāḥ
analyzed: jāta mātre tatas tasmin sa jvāla kavalāḥ śivāḥ

original: 7.009.023c kravyādāś cāpasavyāni maṇḍalāni pracakrire
analyzed: kravyādāḥ ca apasavyāni maṇḍalāni pracakrire

original: 7.009.024a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāś ca kharanisvanāḥ
analyzed: vavarṣa rudhiram devaḥ meghāḥ ca khara nisvanāḥ

original: 7.009.024c prababhau na ca khe sūryo maholkāś cāpatan bhuvi
analyzed: prababhau na ca khe sūryaḥ mahā ulkāḥ ca apatan bhuvi

original: 7.009.025a atha nāmākarot tasya pitāmahasamaḥ pitā
analyzed: atha nāma akarot tasya pitāmaha samaḥ pitā

original: 7.009.025c daśaśīrṣaḥ prasūto 'yaṃ daśagrīvo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: daśa śīrṣaḥ prasūtaḥ yam daśagrīvaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.009.026a tasya tv anantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tasya tu anantaram jātaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 7.009.026c pramāṇād yasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
analyzed: pramāṇāt yasya vipulam pramāṇam na iha vidyate

original: 7.009.027a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma saṃjajñe vikṛtānanā
analyzed: tatas śūrpaṇakhā nāma saṃjajñe vikṛta ānanā

original: 7.009.027c vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca dharma ātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ

original: 7.009.028a te tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhuḥ sumahaujasaḥ
analyzed: te tu tatra mahā araṇye vavṛdhuḥ su mahā ojasaḥ

original: 7.009.028c teṣāṃ krūro daśagrīvo lokodvegakaro 'bhavat
analyzed: teṣām krūraḥ daśagrīvaḥ loka udvega karaḥ bhavat

original: 7.009.029a kumbhakarṇaḥ pramattas tu maharṣīn dharmasaṃśritān
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ pramattaḥ tu mahā ṛṣīn dharma saṃśritān

original: 7.009.029c trailokyaṃ trāsayan duṣṭo bhakṣayan vicacāra ha
analyzed: trailokyam trāsayan duṣṭaḥ bhakṣayan vicacāra ha

original: 7.009.030a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā nityam dharma pathe sthitaḥ

original: 7.009.030c svādhyāyaniyatāhāra uvāsa niyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: svādhyāya niyata āhāraḥ uvāsa niyata indriyaḥ

original: 7.009.031a atha vitteśvaro devas tatra kālena kena cit
analyzed: atha vitteśvaraḥ devaḥ tatra kālena kena cid

original: 7.009.031c āgacchat pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ puṣpakeṇa mahaujasaṃ
analyzed: āgacchat pitaram draṣṭum puṣpakeṇa mahā ojasam

original: 7.009.032a taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 7.009.032c āsthāya rākṣasīṃ buddhiṃ daśagrīvam uvāca ha
analyzed: āsthāya rākṣasīm buddhim daśagrīvam uvāca ha

original: 7.009.033a putravaiśravaṇaṃ paśya bhrātaraṃ tejasā vṛtam
analyzed: putra vaiśravaṇam paśya bhrātaram tejasā vṛtam

original: 7.009.033c bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvam īdṛśam
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhāve same ca api paśya ātmānam tvam īdṛśam

original: 7.009.034a daśagrīva tathā yatnaṃ kuruṣvāmitavikrama
analyzed: daśagrīva tathā yatnam kuruṣva amita vikrama

original: 7.009.034c yathā bhavasi me putra śīghraṃ vaiśvaraṇopamaḥ
analyzed: yathā bhavasi me putra śīghram vaiśvaraṇa upamaḥ

original: 7.009.035a mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: mātuḥ tat vacanam śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān

original: 7.009.035c amarṣam atulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarot tadā
analyzed: amarṣam atulam lebhe pratijñām ca akarot tadā

original: 7.009.036a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi tulyo bhrātrādhiko 'pi vā
analyzed: satyam te pratijānāmi tulyaḥ vā

original: 7.009.036c bhaviṣyāmy acirān mātaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam
analyzed: bhaviṣyāmi acirāt mātar saṃtāpam tyaja hṛd gatam

original: 7.009.037a tataḥ krodhena tenaiva daśagrīvaḥ sahānujaḥ
analyzed: tatas krodhena tena eva daśagrīvaḥ sahānujaḥ

original: 7.009.037c prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvādhyavasya ca
analyzed: prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvā adhyavasya ca

original: 7.009.037e āgacchad ātmasiddhyarthaṃ gokarṇasyāśramaṃ śubham
analyzed: āgacchat ātma siddhi artham gokarṇasya āśramam śubham

original: 7.010.001a athābravīd dvijaṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane
analyzed: atha abravīt dvijam rāmaḥ katham te bhrātaraḥ vane

original: 7.010.001c kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃs tapaś cerur mahāvratāḥ
analyzed: kīdṛśam tu tadā brahman tapaḥ ceruḥ mahā vratāḥ

original: 7.010.002a agastyas tv abravīt tatra rāmaṃ prayata mānasaṃ
analyzed: agastyaḥ tu abravīt tatra rāmam prayata mānasam

original: 7.010.002c tāṃs tān dharmavidhīṃs tatra bhrātaras te samāviśan
analyzed: tān tān dharma vidhīn tatra bhrātaraḥ te samāviśan

original: 7.010.003a kumbhakarṇas tadā yatto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tadā yattaḥ nityam dharma parāyaṇaḥ

original: 7.010.003c tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasv agniṣv avasthitaḥ
analyzed: tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasu agniṣu avasthitaḥ

original: 7.010.004a varṣe meghodakaklinno vīrāsanam asevata
analyzed: varṣe megha udaka klinnaḥ vīrāsanam asevata

original: 7.010.004c nityaṃ ca śaiśire kāle jalamadhyapratiśrayaḥ
analyzed: nityam ca śaiśire kāle jala madhya pratiśrayaḥ

original: 7.010.005a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśa tasyāticakramuḥ
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasrāṇi daśa tasya aticakramuḥ

original: 7.010.005c dharme prayatamānasya satpathe niṣṭhitasya ca
analyzed: dharme prayatamānasya sat pathe niṣṭhitasya ca

original: 7.010.006a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā nityam dharma paraḥ śuciḥ

original: 7.010.006c pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi pādenaikena tasthivān
analyzed: pañca varṣa sahasrāṇi pādena ekena tasthivān

original: 7.010.007a samāpte niyame tasya nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
analyzed: samāpte niyame tasya nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: 7.010.007c papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāś cāpi devatāḥ
analyzed: papāta puṣpa varṣam ca kṣubhitāḥ ca api devatāḥ

original: 7.010.008a pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi sūryaṃ caivānvavartata
analyzed: pañca varṣa sahasrāṇi sūryam ca eva anvavartata

original: 7.010.008c tasthau cordhvaśiro bāhuḥ svādhyāyadhṛtamānasaḥ
analyzed: tasthau ca ūrdhva śiraḥ bāhuḥ svādhyāya dhṛta mānasaḥ

original: 7.010.009a evaṃ vibhīṣaṇasyāpi gatāni niyatātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam vibhīṣaṇasya api gatāni niyata ātmanaḥ

original: 7.010.009c daśavarṣasahasrāṇi svargasthasyeva nandane
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi svarga sthasya iva nandane

original: 7.010.010a daśavarṣasahasraṃ tu nirāhāro daśānanaḥ
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasram tu nirāhāraḥ daśānanaḥ

original: 7.010.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraś cāgnau juhāva saḥ
analyzed: pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu śiraḥ ca agnau juhāva saḥ

original: 7.010.011a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi nava tasyāticakramuḥ
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasrāṇi nava tasya aticakramuḥ

original: 7.010.011c śirāṃsi nava cāpy asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam
analyzed: śirāṃsi nava ca api asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam

original: 7.010.012a atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ
analyzed: atha varṣa sahasre tu daśame daśamam śiraḥ

original: 7.010.012c chettukāmaḥ sa dharmātmā prāptaś cātra pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: chettu kāmaḥ sa dharma ātmā prāptaḥ ca atra pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.010.013a pitāmahas tu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devair upasthitaḥ
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ tu su prītaḥ sārdham devaiḥ upasthitaḥ

original: 7.010.013c vatsa vatsa daśagrīva prīto 'smīty abhyabhāṣata
analyzed: vatsa vatsa daśagrīva smi iti abhyabhāṣata

original: 7.010.014a śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yas te 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ
analyzed: śīghram varaya dharma jña varaḥ yaḥ te bhikāṅkṣitaḥ

original: 7.010.014c kiṃ te kāmaṃ karomy adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ
analyzed: kim te kāmam karomi adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ

original: 7.010.015a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
analyzed: tatas bravīt daśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: 7.010.015c praṇamya śirasā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā devam harṣa gadgadayā girā

original: 7.010.016a bhagavan prāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
analyzed: bhagavan prāṇinām nityam na anyatra maraṇāt bhayam

original: 7.010.016c nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatrur amaratvam ato vṛṇe
analyzed: na asti mṛtyu samaḥ śatruḥ amara tvam atas vṛṇe

original: 7.010.017a suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām
analyzed: suparṇa nāga yakṣāṇām daitya dānava rakṣasām

original: 7.010.017c avadhyaḥ syāṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: avadhyaḥ syām prajādhyakṣa devatānām ca śāśvatam

original: 7.010.018a na hi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣv amarapūjita
analyzed: na hi cintā mama anyeṣu prāṇiṣu amara pūjita

original: 7.010.018c tṛṇabhūtā hi me sarve prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇa bhūtāḥ hi me sarve prāṇinaḥ mānuṣa ādayaḥ

original: 7.010.019a evam uktas tu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā

original: 7.010.019c uvāca vacanaṃ rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: uvāca vacanam rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.010.020a bhaviṣyaty evam evaitat tava rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: bhaviṣyati evam eva etat tava rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 7.010.020c śṛṇu cāpi vaco bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubhaṃ mama
analyzed: śṛṇu ca api vacaḥ bhūyas prītasya iha śubham mama

original: 7.010.021a hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayānagha
analyzed: hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayā anagha

original: 7.010.021c punas tāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa
analyzed: punar tāni bhaviṣyanti tathā eva tava rākṣasa

original: 7.010.022a evaṃ pitāmahoktasya daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: evam pitāmaha uktasya daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.010.022c agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāny utthitāni vai
analyzed: agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāni utthitāni vai

original: 7.010.023a evam uktvvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tam rāma daśagrīvam prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.010.023c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca vākyaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇam athā uvāca vākyam lokapitāmahaḥ

original: 7.010.024a vibhīṣaṇa tvayā vatsa dharmasaṃhitabuddhinā
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇa tvayā vatsa dharma saṃhita buddhinā

original: 7.010.024c parituṣṭo 'smi dharmajña varaṃ varaya suvrata
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ smi dharma jña varam varaya suvrata

original: 7.010.025a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā vacanam prāha sa añjaliḥ

original: 7.010.025c vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇair nityaṃ candramā iva raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ sarva guṇaiḥ nityam candramāḥ iva raśmibhiḥ

original: 7.010.026a bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yan me lokaguruḥ svayam
analyzed: bhagavan kṛtakṛtyaḥ ham yat me lokaguruḥ svayam

original: 7.010.026c prīto yadi tvaṃ dātavyaṃ varaṃ me śṛṇu suvrata
analyzed: prītaḥ yadi tvam dātavyam varam me śṛṇu suvrata

original: 7.010.027a yā yā me jāyate buddhir yeṣu yeṣv āśrameṣv iha
analyzed: yā yā me jāyate buddhiḥ yeṣu yeṣu āśrameṣu iha

original: 7.010.027c sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ ca pālaye
analyzed: sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā tam tam dharmam ca pālaye

original: 7.010.028a eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ
analyzed: eṣa me parama udāra varaḥ paramakaḥ mataḥ

original: 7.010.028c na hi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cana durlabham
analyzed: na hi dharma abhiraktānām loke kim cana durlabham

original: 7.010.029a atha prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
analyzed: atha prajāpatiḥ prītaḥ vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha

original: 7.010.029c dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitad bhaviṣyati
analyzed: dharmiṣṭhaḥ tvam yathā vatsa tathā ca etat bhaviṣyati

original: 7.010.030a yasmād rākṣasayonau te jātasyāmitrakarṣaṇa
analyzed: yasmāt rākṣasa yonau te jātasya amitra karṣaṇa

original: 7.010.030c nādharme jāyate buddhir amaratvaṃ dadāmi te
analyzed: na adharme jāyate buddhiḥ amara tvam dadāmi te

original: 7.010.031a kumbhakarṇāya tu varaṃ prayacchantam ariṃdama
analyzed: kumbhakarṇāya tu varam prayacchantam ariṃdama

original: 7.010.031c prajāpatiṃ surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ prāñjalayo 'bruvan
analyzed: prajāpatim surāḥ sarve vākyam prāñjalayaḥ bruvan

original: 7.010.032a na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varas tvayā
analyzed: na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyaḥ varaḥ tvayā

original: 7.010.032c jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃs trāsayaty eṣa durmatiḥ
analyzed: jānīṣe hi yathā lokān trāsayati eṣa durmatiḥ

original: 7.010.033a nandane 'psarasaḥ sapta mahendrānucarā daśa
analyzed: nandane psarasaḥ sapta mahā indra anucarāḥ daśa

original: 7.010.033c anena bhakṣitā brahman ṛṣayo mānuṣās tathā
analyzed: anena bhakṣitāḥ brahman ṛṣayaḥ mānuṣāḥ tathā

original: 7.010.034a varavyājena moho 'smai dīyatām amitaprabha
analyzed: vara vyājena mohaḥ smai dīyatām amita prabha

original: 7.010.034c lokānāṃ svasti caiva syād bhaved asya ca saṃnatiḥ
analyzed: lokānām svasti ca eva syāt bhavet asya ca saṃnatiḥ

original: 7.010.035a evam uktaḥ surair brahmācintayat padmasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ suraiḥ brahmā acintayat padmasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 7.010.035c cintitā copatasthe 'sya pārśvaṃ devī sarasvatī
analyzed: cintitā ca upatasthe sya pārśvam devī sarasvatī

original: 7.010.036a prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśva sthā prāha vākyam sarasvatī

original: 7.010.036c iyam asmy āgatā devakiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇy aham
analyzed: iyam asmi āgatā devakim kāryam karavāṇi aham

original: 7.010.037a prajāpatis tu tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tu tām prāptām prāha vākyam sarasvatīm

original: 7.010.037c vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā
analyzed: vāṇi tvam rākṣasa indrasya bhava yā devatā īpsitā

original: 7.010.038a tathety uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatir athābravīt
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatiḥ atha abravīt

original: 7.010.038c kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇa mahā bāho varam varaya yaḥ mataḥ

original: 7.010.039a kumbhakarṇas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vacanam abravīt
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tu tat vākyam śrutvā vacanam abravīt

original: 7.010.039c svaptuṃ varṣāṇy anekāni devadeva mamepsitam
analyzed: svaptum varṣāṇi anekāni devadeva mama īpsitam

original: 7.010.040a evam astv iti taṃ coktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: evam astu iti tam ca uktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.010.040c devī sarasvatī caiva muktvā taṃ prayayau divam
analyzed: devī sarasvatī ca eva muktvā tam prayayau divam

original: 7.010.041a kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tu duṣṭa ātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ

original: 7.010.041c kīrdṛśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāc cyutam
analyzed: kīrdṛśam kim nu idam vākyam mama adya vadanāt cyutam

original: 7.010.042a evaṃ labdhavarāḥ sarve bhrātaro dīptatejasaḥ
analyzed: evam labdha varāḥ sarve bhrātaraḥ dīpta tejasaḥ

original: 7.010.042c śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham
analyzed: śleṣmātakavanam gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham

original: 7.011.001a sumālī varalabdhāṃs tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān
analyzed: sumālī vara labdhān tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān

original: 7.011.001c udatiṣṭhad bhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat bhayam tyaktvā sa anugaḥ sa rasātalāt

original: 7.011.002a mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca prahastaḥ ca virūpākṣaḥ mahodaraḥ

original: 7.011.002c udatiṣṭhan susaṃrabdhāḥ sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: udatiṣṭhan su saṃrabdhāḥ sacivāḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.011.003a sumālī caiva taiḥ sarvair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaiḥ
analyzed: sumālī ca eva taiḥ sarvaiḥ vṛtaḥ rākṣasa puṃgavaiḥ

original: 7.011.003c abhigamya daśagrīvaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
analyzed: abhigamya daśagrīvam pariṣvajya idam abravīt

original: 7.011.004a diṣṭyā te putrasaṃprāptaś cintito 'yamṃ manorathaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā te putra saṃprāptaḥ cintitaḥ yamam manorathaḥ

original: 7.011.004c yas tvaṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhāl labdhavān varam īdṛśam
analyzed: yaḥ tvam tribhuvaṇa śreṣṭhāt labdhavān varam īdṛśam

original: 7.011.005a yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyaktvā yātā rasātalam
analyzed: yatkṛte ca vayam laṅkām tyaktvā yātāḥ rasātalam

original: 7.011.005c tad gataṃ no mahābāho mahad viṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam
analyzed: tat gatam naḥ mahā bāho mahat viṣṇu kṛtam bhayam

original: 7.011.006a asakṛt tena bhagnā hi parityajya svam ālayam
analyzed: asakṛt tena bhagnāḥ hi parityajya svam ālayam

original: 7.011.006c vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam
analyzed: vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam

original: 7.011.007a asmadīyā ca laṅkeyaṃ nagarī rākṣasoṣitā
analyzed: asmadīyā ca laṅkā iyam nagarī rākṣasa uṣitā

original: 7.011.007c niveśitā tava bhrātrā dhanādhyakṣeṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: niveśitā tava bhrātrā dhanādhyakṣeṇa dhīmatā

original: 7.011.008a yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syāt sāmnā dānena vānagha
analyzed: yadi nāma atra śakyam syāt sāmnā dānena vā anagha

original: 7.011.008c tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet
analyzed: tarasā vā mahā bāho pratyānetum kṛtam bhavet

original: 7.011.009a tvaṃ ca laṅkeśvaras tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tvam ca laṅkā īśvaraḥ tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.011.009c sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuś caiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala
analyzed: sarveṣām naḥ prabhuḥ ca eva bhaviṣyasi mahā bala

original: 7.011.010a athābravīd daśagrīvo mātāmaham upasthitam
analyzed: atha abravīt daśagrīvaḥ mātāmaham upasthitam

original: 7.011.010c vitteśo gurur asmākaṃ nārhasy evaṃ prabhāṣitum
analyzed: vitteśaḥ guruḥ asmākam na arhasi evam prabhāṣitum

original: 7.011.011a uktavantaṃ tathā vākyaṃ daśagrīvaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: uktavantam tathā vākyam daśagrīvam niśācaraḥ

original: 7.011.011c prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam idam āha sakāraṇam
analyzed: prahastaḥ praśritam vākyam idam āha sa kāraṇam

original: 7.011.012a daśagrīva mahābāho nārhas tvaṃ vaktum īdṛśam
analyzed: daśagrīva mahā bāho na arhaḥ tvam vaktum īdṛśam

original: 7.011.012c saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
analyzed: saubhrātram nā asti śūrāṇām śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ mama

original: 7.011.013a aditiś ca ditiś caiva bhaginyau sahite kila
analyzed: aditiḥ ca ditiḥ ca eva bhaginyau sahite kila

original: 7.011.013c bhārye paramarūpiṇyau kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ
analyzed: bhārye parama rūpiṇyau kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ

original: 7.011.014a aditir janayām āsa devāṃs tribhuvaṇeśvarān
analyzed: aditiḥ janayām āsa devān tribhuvaṇa īśvarān

original: 7.011.014c ditis tv ajanayad daityān kaśyapasyātmasaṃbhavān
analyzed: ditiḥ tu ajanayat daityān kaśyapasya ātmasaṃbhavān

original: 7.011.015a daityānāṃ kila dharmajña pureyaṃ savanārṇavā
analyzed: daityānām kila dharma jña purā iyam sa vana arṇavā

original: 7.011.015c saparvatā mahī vīra te 'bhavan prabhaviṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: sa parvatā mahī vīra te bhavan prabhaviṣṇavaḥ

original: 7.011.016a nihatya tāṃs tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
analyzed: nihatya tān tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: 7.011.016c devānāṃ vaśam ānītaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam
analyzed: devānām vaśam ānītam trailokyam idam avyayam

original: 7.011.017a naitad eko bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam
analyzed: na etat ekaḥ bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam

original: 7.011.017c surair ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ kuruṣvaitad vaco mama
analyzed: suraiḥ ācaritam pūrvam kuruṣva etat vacaḥ mama

original: 7.011.018a evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ prahastena durātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ daśagrīvaḥ prahastena durātmanā

original: 7.011.018c cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
analyzed: cintayitvā muhūrtam vai bāḍham iti eva saḥ bravīt

original: 7.011.019a sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminn ahani vīryavān
analyzed: sa tu tena eva harṣeṇa tasmin ahani vīryavān

original: 7.011.019c vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ
analyzed: vanam gataḥ daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ

original: 7.011.020a trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: trikūṭa sthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.011.020c preṣayām āsa dautyena prahastaṃ vākyakovidam
analyzed: preṣayām āsa dautyena prahastam vākya kovidam

original: 7.011.021a prahasta śīghraṃ gatvā tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṃgavam
analyzed: prahasta śīghram gatvā tvam brūhi nairṛta puṃgavam

original: 7.011.021c vacanān mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: vacanāt mama vitteśam sāma pūrvam idam vacaḥ

original: 7.011.022a iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: iyam laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānām mahātmanām

original: 7.011.022c tvayā niveśitā saumya naitad yuktaṃ tavānagha
analyzed: tvayā niveśitā saumya na etat yuktam tava anagha

original: 7.011.023a tad bhavān yadi sāmnaitāṃ dadyād atulavikrama
analyzed: tat bhavān yadi sāmnā etām dadyāt atula vikrama

original: 7.011.023c kṛtā bhaven mama prītir dharmaś caivānupālitaḥ
analyzed: kṛtā bhavet mama prītiḥ dharmaḥ ca eva anupālitaḥ

original: 7.011.024a ity uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahasto vākyakovidaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahastaḥ vākya kovidaḥ

original: 7.011.024c daśagrīvavacaḥ sarvaṃ vitteśāya nyavedayat
analyzed: daśagrīva vacaḥ sarvam vitteśāya nyavedayat

original: 7.011.025a prahastād api saṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ
analyzed: prahastāt api saṃśrutya devaḥ vaiśravaṇaḥ vacaḥ

original: 7.011.025c pratyuvāca prahastaṃ taṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: pratyuvāca prahastam tam vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 7.011.026a brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ purī rājyaṃ ca yan mama
analyzed: brūhi gaccha daśagrīvam purī rājyam ca yat mama

original: 7.011.026c tavāpy etan mahābāho bhuṅkṣvaitad dhatakaṇṭakam
analyzed: tava api etat mahā bāho bhuṅkṣva etat hata kaṇṭakam

original: 7.011.027a sarvaṃ kartāsmi bhadraṃ te rākṣaseśa vaco 'cirāt
analyzed: sarvam kartāsmi bhadram te rākṣasa īśa vacaḥ cirāt

original: 7.011.027c kiṃ tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pitur yāvan nivedaye
analyzed: kim tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pituḥ yāvat nivedaye

original: 7.011.028a evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma pitur antikam
analyzed: evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣaḥ jagāma pituḥ antikam

original: 7.011.028c abhivādya guruṃ prāha rāvaṇasya yadīpsitam
analyzed: abhivādya gurum prāha rāvaṇasya yat īpsitam

original: 7.011.029a eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavān mama
analyzed: eṣa tāta daśagrīvaḥ dūtam preṣitavān mama

original: 7.011.029c dīyatāṃ nagarī laṅkā pūrvaṃ rakṣogaṇoṣitā
analyzed: dīyatām nagarī laṅkā pūrvam rakṣaḥ gaṇa uṣitā

original: 7.011.029e mayātra yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tan mamācakṣva suvrata
analyzed: mayā atra yat anuṣṭheyam tat mama ācakṣva suvrata

original: 7.011.030a brahmarṣis tv evam ukto 'sau viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣiḥ tu evam sau viśravāḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.011.030c uvāca dhanadaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu putra vaco mama
analyzed: uvāca dhanadam vākyam śṛṇu putra vacaḥ mama

original: 7.011.031a daśagrīvo mahābāhur uktavān mama saṃnidhau
analyzed: daśagrīvaḥ mahā bāhuḥ uktavān mama saṃnidhau

original: 7.011.031c mayā nirbhartsitaś cāsīd bahudhoktaḥ sudurmatiḥ
analyzed: mayā nirbhartsitaḥ ca āsīt bahudhā uktaḥ su durmatiḥ

original: 7.011.032a sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsasveti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sa krodhena mayā ca uktaḥ dhvaṃsasva iti punar punar

original: 7.011.032c śreyo'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama
analyzed: śreyaḥ abhiyuktam dharmyam ca śṛṇu putra vacaḥ mama

original: 7.011.033a varapradānasaṃmūḍho mānyāmānyaṃ sudurmatiḥ
analyzed: vara pradāna saṃmūḍhaḥ mānya amānyam su durmatiḥ

original: 7.011.033c na vetti mama śāpāc ca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: na vetti mama śāpāt ca prakṛtim dāruṇām gataḥ

original: 7.011.034a tasmād gaccha mahābāho kailāsaṃ dharaṇīdharam
analyzed: tasmāt gaccha mahā bāho kailāsam dharaṇīdharam

original: 7.011.034c niveśaya nivāsārthaṃ tyaja laṅkāṃ sahānugaḥ
analyzed: niveśaya nivāsa artham tyaja laṅkām sahānugaḥ

original: 7.011.035a tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāṃ pravarā nadī
analyzed: tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnām pravarā nadī

original: 7.011.035c kāñcanaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ saṃvṛtodakā
analyzed: kāñcanaiḥ sūrya saṃkāśaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ saṃvṛta udakā

original: 7.011.036a na hi kṣamaṃ tvayā tena vairaṃ dhanadarakṣasā
analyzed: na hi kṣamam tvayā tena vairam dhanada rakṣasā

original: 7.011.036c jānīṣe hi yathānena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ
analyzed: jānīṣe hi yathā anena labdhaḥ paramakaḥ varaḥ

original: 7.011.037a evam ukto gṛhītvā tu tad vacaḥ pitṛgauravāt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ gṛhītvā tu tat vacaḥ pitṛ gauravāt

original: 7.011.037c sadāra pauraḥ sāmātyaḥ savāhanadhano gataḥ
analyzed: sa dāra pauraḥ sa amātyaḥ sa vāhana dhanaḥ gataḥ

original: 7.011.038a prahastas tu daśagrīvaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ nyavedayat
analyzed: prahastaḥ tu daśagrīvam gatvā sarvam nyavedayat

original: 7.011.038c śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśadyojanam āyatā
analyzed: śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśat yojanam āyatā

original: 7.011.038e praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ tatra pālaya
analyzed: praviśya tām saha asmābhiḥ svadharmam tatra pālaya

original: 7.011.039a evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇo rākṣasas tadā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasaḥ tadā

original: 7.011.039c viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sabhrātā sabalānugaḥ
analyzed: viveśa nagarīm laṅkām sa bhrātā sa bala anugaḥ

original: 7.011.040a sa cābhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācarais tadā;
analyzed: sa ca abhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ tadā

original: niveśayām āsa purīṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: niveśayām āsa purīm daśānanaḥ

original: 7.011.040c nikāmapūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī;
analyzed: nikāma pūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī

original: niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ
analyzed: niśācaraiḥ nīla balāhaka upamaiḥ

original: 7.011.041a dhaneśvaras tv atha pitṛvākyagauravān;
analyzed: dhaneśvaraḥ tu atha pitṛ vākya gauravān

original: nyaveśayac chaśivimale girau purīm
analyzed: nyaveśayat śaśi vimale girau purīm

original: 7.011.041c svalaṃkṛtair bhavanavarair vibhūṣitāṃ;
analyzed: su alaṃkṛtaiḥ bhavana varaiḥ vibhūṣitām

original: puraṃdarasyeva tadāmarāvatīm
analyzed: puraṃdarasya iva tadā amarāvatīm

original: 7.012.001a rākṣasendro 'bhiṣiktas tu bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitas tadā
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ bhiṣiktaḥ tu bhrātṛbhyām sahitaḥ tadā

original: 7.012.001c tataḥ pradānaṃ rākṣasyā bhaginyāḥ samacintayat
analyzed: tatas pradānam rākṣasyāḥ bhaginyāḥ samacintayat

original: 7.012.002a dadau tāṃ kālakeyāya dānavendrāya rākṣasīm
analyzed: dadau tām kālakeyāya dānava indrāya rākṣasīm

original: 7.012.002c svasāṃ śūrpaṇakhāṃ nāma vidyujjihvāya nāmataḥ
analyzed: svasām śūrpaṇakhām nāma vidyujjihvāya nāmataḥ

original: 7.012.003a atha dattvā svasāraṃ sa mṛgayāṃ paryaṭan nṛpaḥ
analyzed: atha dattvā svasāram sa mṛgayām paryaṭan nṛpaḥ

original: 7.012.003c tatrāpaśyat tato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam
analyzed: tatra apaśyat tatas rāma mayam nāma diteḥ sutam

original: 7.012.004a kanyāsahāyaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: kanyā sahāyam tam dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.012.004c apṛcchat ko bhavan eko nirmanuṣya mṛge vane
analyzed: apṛcchat kaḥ bhavan ekaḥ nirmanuṣya mṛge vane

original: 7.012.005a mayas tv athābravīd rāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram
analyzed: mayaḥ tu atha abravīt rāma pṛcchantam tam niśācaram

original: 7.012.005c śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idaṃ mama
analyzed: śrūyatām sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idam mama

original: 7.012.006a hemā nāmāpsarās tāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā
analyzed: hemāḥ nāma apsarāḥ tāta śruta pūrvāḥ yadi tvayā

original: 7.012.006c daivatair mama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ
analyzed: daivataiḥ mama sā dattā paulomī iva śatakratoḥ

original: 7.012.007a tasyāṃ saktamanās tāta pañcavarṣaśatāny aham
analyzed: tasyām sakta manāḥ tāta pañca varṣa śatāni aham

original: 7.012.007c sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣaṃ caturdaśam
analyzed: sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣam caturdaśam

original: 7.012.008a tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvaṃ hemapuraṃ mayā
analyzed: tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvam hema puram mayā

original: 7.012.008c vajravaidūryacitraṃ ca māyayā nirmitaṃ tadā
analyzed: vajra vaidūrya citram ca māyayā nirmitam tadā

original: 7.012.009a tatrāham aratiṃ vindaṃs tayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: tatra aham aratim vindan tayā hīnaḥ su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 7.012.009c tasmāt purād duhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt purāt duhitaram gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ

original: 7.012.010a iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃs tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā
analyzed: iyam mama ātmajā rājan tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā

original: 7.012.010c bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum
analyzed: bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāptaḥ smi mārgitum

original: 7.012.011a kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi narāṇāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām
analyzed: kanyā pitṛ tvam duḥkham hi narāṇām māna kāṅkṣiṇām

original: 7.012.011c kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: kanyā hi dve kule nityam saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati

original: 7.012.012a dvau sutau tu mama tv asyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ saṃbabhūvatuḥ
analyzed: dvau sutau tu mama tu asyām bhāryāyām saṃbabhūvatuḥ

original: 7.012.012c māyāvī prathamas tāta dundubhis tadanantaram
analyzed: māyāvī prathamaḥ tāta dundubhiḥ tad anantaram

original: 7.012.013a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ

original: 7.012.013c tvām idānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavān iti
analyzed: tvām idānīm katham tāta jānīyām kaḥ bhavān iti

original: 7.012.014a evam ukto rākṣasendro vinītam idam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ vinītam idam abravīt

original: 7.012.014c ahaṃ paulastya tanayo daśagrīvaś ca nāmataḥ
analyzed: aham paulastya tanayaḥ daśagrīvaḥ ca nāmataḥ

original: 7.012.015a brahmarṣes taṃ sutaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣam upāgataḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣeḥ tam sutam jñātvā mayaḥ harṣam upāgataḥ

original: 7.012.015c dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai
analyzed: dātum duhitaram tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai

original: 7.012.016a prahasan prāha daityendro rākṣasendram idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: prahasan prāha daitya indraḥ rākṣasa indram idam vacaḥ

original: 7.012.016c iyaṃ mamātmajā rājan hemayāpsarasā dhṛtā
analyzed: iyam mama ātmajā rājan hemayā apsarasā dhṛtā

original: 7.012.016e kanyā mandodarī nāma patnyarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām
analyzed: kanyā mandodarī nāma patnī artham pratigṛhyatām

original: 7.012.017a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva tam rāma daśagrīvaḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 7.012.017c prajvālya tatra caivāgnim akarot pāṇisaṃgraham
analyzed: prajvālya tatra ca eva agnim akarot pāṇisaṃgraham

original: 7.012.018a na hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñas tapodhanāt
analyzed: na hi tasya mayaḥ rāma śāpa abhijñaḥ tapodhanāt

original: 7.012.018c viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam
analyzed: viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmaham kulam

original: 7.012.019a amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām
analyzed: amoghām tasya śaktim ca pradadau parama adbhutām

original: 7.012.019c pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ yayā
analyzed: pareṇa tapasā labdhām jaghnivān lakṣmaṇam yayā

original: 7.012.020a evaṃ sa kṛtadāro vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: evam sa kṛta dāraḥ vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.012.020c gatvā tu nagaraṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samudāvahat
analyzed: gatvā tu nagaram bhārye bhrātṛbhyām samudāvahat

original: 7.012.021a vairocanasya dauhitrīṃ vajrajvāleti nāmataḥ
analyzed: vairocanasya dauhitrīm vajrajvālā iti nāmataḥ

original: 7.012.021c tāṃ bhāryāṃ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ samudāvahat
analyzed: tām bhāryām kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ samudāvahat

original: 7.012.022a gandharvarājasya sutāṃ śailūṣasya mahātmana
analyzed: gandharva rājasya sutām śailūṣasya mahātmana

original: 7.012.022c saramā nāma dharmajño lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: saramā nāma dharma jñaḥ lebhe bhāryām vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.012.023a tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca
analyzed: tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca

original: 7.012.023c mānasaṃ ca saras tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame
analyzed: mānasam ca saraḥ tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame

original: 7.012.024a mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehanākranditaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehana ākranditam vacaḥ

original: 7.012.024c saro mā vardhatety uktaṃ tataḥ sā saramābhavat
analyzed: saraḥ mā vardhata iti uktam tatas sā saramā abhavat

original: 7.012.025a evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: evam te kṛta dārāḥ vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.012.025c svāṃ svāṃ bhāryām upādāya gandharvā iva nandane
analyzed: svām svām bhāryām upādāya gandharvāḥ iva nandane

original: 7.012.026a tato mandodarī putraṃ meghanādam asūyata
analyzed: tatas mandodarī putram meghanādam asūyata

original: 7.012.026c sa eṣa indrajin nāma yuṣmābhir abhidhīyate
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ indrajit nāma yuṣmābhiḥ abhidhīyate

original: 7.012.027a jātamātreṇa hi purā tena rākṣasasūnunā
analyzed: jāta mātreṇa hi purā tena rākṣasa sūnunā

original: 7.012.027c rudatā sumahān mukto nādo jaladharopamaḥ
analyzed: rudatā su mahān muktaḥ nādaḥ jaladhara upamaḥ

original: 7.012.028a jaḍīkṛtāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ tena nādena tasya vai
analyzed: jaḍīkṛtāyām laṅkāyām tena nādena tasya vai

original: 7.012.028c pitā tasyākaron nāma meghanāda iti svayam
analyzed: pitā tasya akarot nāma meghanādaḥ iti svayam

original: 7.012.029a so 'vardhata tadā rāma rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhe
analyzed: saḥ vardhata tadā rāma rāvaṇa antaḥpure śubhe

original: 7.012.029c rakṣyamāṇo varastrībhiś channaḥ kāṣṭhair ivānalaḥ
analyzed: rakṣyamāṇaḥ vara strībhiḥ channaḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ iva analaḥ

original: 7.013.001a atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit
analyzed: atha lokeśvara utsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit

original: 7.013.001c nidrā samabhavat tīvrā kumbhakarṇasya rūpiṇī
analyzed: nidrā samabhavat tīvrā kumbhakarṇasya rūpiṇī

original: 7.013.002a tato bhrātaram āsīnaṃ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhrātaram āsīnam kumbhakarṇaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: 7.013.002c nidrā māṃ bādhate rājan kārayasva mamālayam
analyzed: nidrā mām bādhate rājan kārayasva mama ālayam

original: 7.013.003a viniyuktās tato rājñā śilpino viśvakarmavat
analyzed: viniyuktāḥ tatas rājñā śilpinaḥ viśvakarma vat

original: 7.013.003c akurvan kumbhakarṇasya kailāsasamam ālayam
analyzed: akurvan kumbhakarṇasya kailāsa samam ālayam

original: 7.013.004a vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇam āyatam
analyzed: vistīrṇam yojanam śubhram tatas dviguṇam āyatam

original: 7.013.004c darśanīyaṃ nirābādhaṃ kumbhakarṇasya cakrire
analyzed: darśanīyam nirābādham kumbhakarṇasya cakrire

original: 7.013.005a sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiś citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam
analyzed: sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam

original: 7.013.005c vaidūryakṛtaśobhaṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālakaṃ tathā
analyzed: vaidūrya kṛta śobham ca kiṅkiṇī jālakam tathā

original: 7.013.006a dantatoraṇavinyastaṃ vajrasphaṭikavedikam
analyzed: danta toraṇa vinyastam vajra sphaṭika vedikam

original: 7.013.006c sarvartusukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhām iva
analyzed: sarva ṛtu sukha dam nityam meroḥ puṇyām guhām iva

original: 7.013.007a tatra nidrāṃ samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tatra nidrām samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.013.007c bahūny abdasahasrāṇi śayāno nāvabudhyate
analyzed: bahūni abda sahasrāṇi śayānaḥ na avabudhyate

original: 7.013.008a nidrābhibhūte tu tadā kumbhakarṇe daśānanaḥ
analyzed: nidrā abhibhūte tu tadā kumbhakarṇe daśānanaḥ

original: 7.013.008c devarṣiyakṣagandharvān bādhate sma sa nityaśaḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi yakṣa gandharvān bādhate sma sa nityaśas

original: 7.013.009a udyānāni vicitrāṇi nandanādīni yāni ca
analyzed: udyānāni vicitrāṇi nandana ādīni yāni ca

original: 7.013.009c tāni gatvā susaṃkruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tāni gatvā su saṃkruddhaḥ bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ

original: 7.013.010a nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyur iva kṣipan
analyzed: nadīm gajaḥ iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyuḥ iva kṣipan

original: 7.013.010c nagān vajra iva sṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati nityaśaḥ
analyzed: nagān vajraḥ iva sṛṣṭaḥ vidhvaṃsayati nityaśas

original: 7.013.011a tathā vṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: tathā vṛttam tu vijñāya daśagrīvam dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 7.013.011c kulānurūpaṃ dharmajña vṛttaṃ saṃsmṛtya cātmanaḥ
analyzed: kula anurūpam dharma jña vṛttam saṃsmṛtya ca ātmanaḥ

original: 7.013.012a saubhrātradarśanārthaṃ tu dūtaṃ vaiśvaraṇas tadā
analyzed: saubhrātra darśana artham tu dūtam vaiśvaraṇaḥ tadā

original: 7.013.012c laṅkāṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam
analyzed: laṅkām saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam

original: 7.013.013a sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam
analyzed: sa gatvā nagarīm laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam

original: 7.013.013c mānitas tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaś cāgamanaṃ prati
analyzed: mānitaḥ tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaḥ ca āgamanam prati

original: 7.013.014a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīn api ca bāndhavān
analyzed: pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalam rājñaḥ jñātīn api ca bāndhavān

original: 7.013.014c sabhāyāṃ darśayām āsa tam āsīnaṃ daśānanam
analyzed: sabhāyām darśayām āsa tam āsīnam daśānanam

original: 7.013.015a sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānam dīpyamānam sva tejasā

original: 7.013.015c jayena cābhisaṃpūjya tūṣṇīm āsīn muhūrtakam
analyzed: jayena ca abhisaṃpūjya tūṣṇīm āsīt muhūrtakam

original: 7.013.016a tasyopanīte paryaṅke varāstaraṇasaṃvṛte
analyzed: tasya upanīte paryaṅke vara āstaraṇa saṃvṛte

original: 7.013.016c upaviśya daśagrīvaṃ dūto vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: upaviśya daśagrīvam dūtaḥ vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.013.017a rājan vadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yad abravīt
analyzed: rājan vadāmi te sarvam bhrātā tava yat abravīt

original: 7.013.017c ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
analyzed: ubhayoḥ sadṛśam saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca

original: 7.013.018a sādhu paryāptam etāvat kṛtaś cāritrasaṃgrahaḥ
analyzed: sādhu paryāptam etāvat kṛtaḥ cāritra saṃgrahaḥ

original: 7.013.018c sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate
analyzed: sādhu dharme vyavasthānam kriyatām yadi śakyate

original: 7.013.019a dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnam ṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭam me nandanam bhagnam ṛṣayaḥ nihatāḥ śrutāḥ

original: 7.013.019c devānāṃ tu samudyogas tvatto rājañ śrutaś ca me
analyzed: devānām tu samudyogaḥ tvattaḥ rājam śrutaḥ ca me

original: 7.013.020a nirākṛtaś ca bahuśas tvayāhaṃ rākṣasādhipa
analyzed: nirākṛtaḥ ca bahuśas tvayā aham rākṣasa adhipa

original: 7.013.020c aparāddhā hi bālyāc ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ
analyzed: aparāddhāḥ hi bālyāt ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ sva bāndhavāḥ

original: 7.013.021a ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmam upāsitum
analyzed: aham tu himavat pṛṣṭham gataḥ dharmam upāsitum

original: 7.013.021c raudraṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya niyato niyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: raudram vratam samāsthāya niyataḥ niyata indriyaḥ

original: 7.013.022a tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyomayā prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatra devaḥ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyā umayā prabhuḥ

original: 7.013.022c savyaṃ cakṣur mayā caiva tatra devyāṃ nipātitam
analyzed: savyam cakṣuḥ mayā ca eva tatra devyām nipātitam

original: 7.013.023a kā nv iyaṃ syād iti śubhā na khalv anyena hetunā
analyzed: kā nu iyam syāt iti śubhā na khalu anyena hetunā

original: 7.013.023c rūpaṃ hy anupamaṃ kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī
analyzed: rūpam hi anupamam kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī

original: 7.013.024a tato devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdham savyam mama īkṣaṇam

original: 7.013.024c reṇudhvastam iva jyotiḥ piṅgalatvam upāgatam
analyzed: reṇu dhvastam iva jyotiḥ piṅgala tvam upāgatam

original: 7.013.025a tato 'ham anyad vistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya gires taṭam
analyzed: tatas ham anyat vistīrṇam gatvā tasya gireḥ taṭam

original: 7.013.025c pūrṇaṃ varṣaśatāny aṣṭau samavāpa mahāvratam
analyzed: pūrṇam varṣa śatāni aṣṭau samavāpa mahā vratam

original: 7.013.026a samāpte niyame tasmiṃs tatra devo maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: samāpte niyame tasmin tatra devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: 7.013.026c prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idam prabhuḥ

original: 7.013.027a prīto 'smi tava dharmajña tapasānena suvrata
analyzed: prītaḥ smi tava dharma jña tapasā anena suvrata

original: 7.013.027c mayā caitad vrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa
analyzed: mayā ca etat vratam cīrṇam tvayā ca eva dhanādhipa

original: 7.013.028a tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaś cared vratam īdṛśam
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ puruṣaḥ na asti yaḥ caret vratam īdṛśam

original: 7.013.028c vrataṃ suduścaraṃ hy etan mayaivotpāditaṃ purā
analyzed: vratam su duścaram hi etat mayā evā utpāditam purā

original: 7.013.029a tat sakhitvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ rocayasva dhaneśvara
analyzed: tat sakhi tvam mayā sārdham rocayasva dhaneśvara

original: 7.013.029c tapasā nirjitatvād dhi sakhā bhava mamānagha
analyzed: tapasā nirjita tvāt hi sakhā bhava mama anagha

original: 7.013.030a devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāvena yac ca sāvyaṃ tavekṣaṇam
analyzed: devyāḥ dagdham prabhāvena yat ca sāvyam tava īkṣaṇam

original: 7.013.030c ekākṣi piṅgalety eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam
analyzed: eka akṣi piṅgalā iti eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam

original: 7.013.031a evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṃkarāt
analyzed: evam tena sakhi tvam ca prāpya anujñām ca śaṃkarāt

original: 7.013.031c āgamya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ
analyzed: āgamya ca śrutaḥ yam me tava pāpa viniścayaḥ

original: 7.013.032a tadadharmiṣṭhasaṃyogān nivarta kuladūṣaṇa
analyzed: tad adharmiṣṭha saṃyogāt nivarta kula dūṣaṇa

original: 7.013.032c cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṃghaiḥ surais tava
analyzed: cintyate hi vadha upāyaḥ sa ṛṣi saṃghaiḥ suraiḥ tava

original: 7.013.033a evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 7.013.033c hastān dantāṃś a saṃpīḍya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: hastān dantān a saṃpīḍya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.013.034a vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ prabhāṣase
analyzed: vijñātam te mayā dūta vākyam yat tvam prabhāṣase

original: 7.013.034c naiva tvam asi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi preṣitaḥ
analyzed: na eva tvam asi na eva asau bhrātrā yena asi preṣitaḥ

original: 7.013.035a hitaṃ na sa mamaitad dhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ
analyzed: hitam na sa mama etat hi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ

original: 7.013.035c maheśvarasakhitvaṃ tu mūḍha śrāvayase kila
analyzed: maheśvara sakhi tvam tu mūḍha śrāvayase kila

original: 7.013.036a na hantavyo gurur jyeṣṭho mamāyam iti manyate
analyzed: na hantavyaḥ guruḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ mama ayam iti manyate

original: 7.013.036c tasya tv idānīṃ śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ
analyzed: tasya tu idānīm śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ

original: 7.013.037a trīṃl lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryam upāśritaḥ
analyzed: trīn lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhu vīryam upāśritaḥ

original: 7.013.037c etan muhūrtam eṣo 'haṃ tasyaikasya kṛte ca vai
analyzed: etat muhūrtam eṣaḥ ham tasya ekasya kṛte ca vai

original: 7.013.037e caturo lokapālāṃs tān nayiṣyāmi yamakṣayam
analyzed: caturaḥ lokapālān tān nayiṣyāmi yama kṣayam

original: 7.013.038a evam uktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān
analyzed: evam uktvā tu laṅkeśaḥ dūtam khaḍgena jaghnivān

original: 7.013.038c dadau bhakṣayituṃ hy enaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām
analyzed: dadau bhakṣayitum hi enam rākṣasānām durātmanām

original: 7.013.039a tataḥ kṛtasvastyayano ratham āruhya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas kṛta svastyayanaḥ ratham āruhya rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.013.039c trailokyavijayākāṅkṣī yayau tatra dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: trailokya vijaya ākāṅkṣī yayau tatra dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 7.014.001a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ
analyzed: tatas sa sacivaiḥ sārdham ṣaḍbhiḥ nityam bala utkaṭaiḥ

original: 7.014.001c mahodaraprahastābhyāṃ mārīcaśukasāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: mahodara prahastābhyām mārīca śuka sāraṇaiḥ

original: 7.014.002a dhūmrākṣeṇa ca vīreṇa nityaṃ samaragṛdhnunā
analyzed: dhūmrākṣeṇa ca vīreṇa nityam samara gṛdhnunā

original: 7.014.002c vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāl lokān dahann iva
analyzed: vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāt lokān dahan iva

original: 7.014.003a purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāny upavanāni ca
analyzed: purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāni upavanāni ca

original: 7.014.003c atikramya muhūrtena kailāsaṃ girim āviśat
analyzed: atikramya muhūrtena kailāsam girim āviśat

original: 7.014.004a taṃ niviṣṭaṃ girau tasmin rākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu
analyzed: tam niviṣṭam girau tasmin rākṣasa indram niśamya tu

original: 7.014.004c rājño bhrātāyam ity uktvā gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ bhrātā ayam iti uktvā gatāḥ yatra dhaneśvaraḥ

original: 7.014.005a gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyur bhrātus tasya viniścayam
analyzed: gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyuḥ bhrātuḥ tasya viniścayam

original: 7.014.005c anujñātā yayuś caiva yuddhāya dhanadena te
analyzed: anujñātāḥ yayuḥ ca eva yuddhāya dhanadena te

original: 7.014.006a tato balasya saṃkṣobhaḥ sāgarasyeva vardhataḥ
analyzed: tatas balasya saṃkṣobhaḥ sāgarasya iva vardhataḥ

original: 7.014.006c abhūn nairṛtarājasya giriṃ saṃcālayann iva
analyzed: abhūt nairṛta rājasya girim saṃcālayan iva

original: 7.014.007a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulam
analyzed: tatas yuddham samabhavat yakṣa rākṣasa saṃkulam

original: 7.014.007c vyathitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: vyathitāḥ ca abhavan tatra sacivāḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.014.008a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tādṛśam sainyam daśagrīvaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.014.008c harṣān nādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata
analyzed: harṣāt nādam tatas kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata

original: 7.014.009a ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramaḥ
analyzed: ye tu te rākṣasa indrasya sacivāḥ ghora vikramaḥ

original: 7.014.009c te sahasraṃ sahasrāṇām ekaikaṃ samayodhayan
analyzed: te sahasram sahasrāṇām ekaikam samayodhayan

original: 7.014.010a tato gadābhiḥ parighair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
analyzed: tatas gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ asibhiḥ śakti tomaraiḥ

original: 7.014.010c vadhyamāno daśagrīvas tat sainyaṃ samagāhata
analyzed: vadhyamānaḥ daśagrīvaḥ tat sainyam samagāhata

original: 7.014.011a tair nirucchvāsavat tatra vadhyamāno daśānanaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ nirucchvāsa vat tatra vadhyamānaḥ daśānanaḥ

original: 7.014.011c varṣamāṇair iva ghanair yakṣendraiḥ saṃnirudhyata
analyzed: varṣamāṇaiḥ iva ghanaiḥ yakṣa indraiḥ saṃnirudhyata

original: 7.014.012a sa durātmā samudyamya kāladaṇḍopamāṃ gadām
analyzed: sa durātmā samudyamya kāla daṇḍa upamām gadām

original: 7.014.012c praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayan yakṣān yamakṣayam
analyzed: praviveśa tatas sainyam nayan yakṣān yama kṣayam

original: 7.014.013a sa kakṣam iva vistīrṇaṃ śuṣkendhanasamākulam
analyzed: sa kakṣam iva vistīrṇam śuṣka indhana samākulam

original: 7.014.013c vātenāgnir ivāyatto 'dahat sainyaṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: vātena agniḥ iva āyattaḥ dahat sainyam su dāruṇam

original: 7.014.014a tais tu tasya mṛdhe 'mātyair mahodaraśukādibhiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tu tasya mṛdhe mātyaiḥ mahodara śuka ādibhiḥ

original: 7.014.014c alpāvaśiṣṭās te yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātair ivāmbudāḥ
analyzed: alpa avaśiṣṭāḥ te yakṣāḥ kṛtāḥ vātaiḥ iva ambudāḥ

original: 7.014.015a ke cit tv āyudhabhagnāṅgāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau
analyzed: ke cit tu āyudha bhagna aṅgāḥ patitāḥ samara kṣitau

original: 7.014.015c oṣṭhān svadaśanais tīkṣṇair daṃśanto bhuvi pātitāḥ
analyzed: oṣṭhān sva daśanaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ daṃśantaḥ bhuvi pātitāḥ

original: 7.014.016a bhayād anyonyam āliṅgya bhraṣṭaśastrā raṇājire
analyzed: bhayāt anyonyam āliṅgya bhraṣṭa śastrāḥ raṇa ajire

original: 7.014.016c niṣedus te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā jalahatā iva
analyzed: niṣeduḥ te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlāḥ jala hatāḥ iva

original: 7.014.017a hatānāṃ svargasaṃsthānāṃ yudhyatāṃ pṛthivītale
analyzed: hatānām svarga saṃsthānām yudhyatām pṛthivī tale

original: 7.014.017c prekṣatām ṛṣisaṃghānāṃ na babhūvāntaraṃ divi
analyzed: prekṣatām ṛṣi saṃghānām na babhūva antaram divi

original: 7.014.018a etasminn antare rāma vistīrṇabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare rāma vistīrṇa bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.014.018c agamat sumahān yakṣo nāmnā saṃyodhakaṇṭakaḥ
analyzed: agamat su mahān yakṣaḥ nāmnā saṃyodhakaṇṭakaḥ

original: 7.014.019a tena yakṣeṇa mārīco viṣṇuneva samāhataḥ
analyzed: tena yakṣeṇa mārīcaḥ viṣṇunā iva samāhataḥ

original: 7.014.019c patitaḥ pṛthivīṃ bheje kṣīṇapuṇya ivāmbarāt
analyzed: patitaḥ pṛthivīm bheje kṣīṇa puṇyaḥ iva ambarāt

original: 7.014.020a prāptasaṃjño muhūrtena viśramya ca niśācaraḥ
analyzed: prāpta saṃjñaḥ muhūrtena viśramya ca niśācaraḥ

original: 7.014.020c taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve
analyzed: tam yakṣam yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve

original: 7.014.021a tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaidūryarajatokṣitam
analyzed: tatas kāñcana citra aṅgam vaidūrya rajata ukṣitam

original: 7.014.021c maryādāṃ dvārapālānāṃ toraṇaṃ tat samāviśat
analyzed: maryādām dvārapālānām toraṇam tat samāviśat

original: 7.014.022a tato rāma daśagrīvaṃ praviśantaṃ niśācaram
analyzed: tatas rāma daśagrīvam praviśantam niśācaram

original: 7.014.022c sūryabhānur iti khyāto dvārapālo nyavārayat
analyzed: sūryabhānuḥ iti khyātaḥ dvārapālaḥ nyavārayat

original: 7.014.023a tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ
analyzed: tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ

original: 7.014.023c rākṣaso yakṣasṛṣṭena toraṇena samāhataḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ yakṣa sṛṣṭena toraṇena samāhataḥ

original: 7.014.023e na kṣitiṃ prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ
analyzed: na kṣitim prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ

original: 7.014.024a sa tu tenaiva taṃ yakṣaṃ toraṇena samāhanat
analyzed: sa tu tena eva tam yakṣam toraṇena samāhanat

original: 7.014.024c nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasma tena kṛtas tu saḥ
analyzed: na adṛśyata tadā yakṣaḥ bhasma tena kṛtaḥ tu saḥ

original: 7.014.025a tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣā dṛṣṭvā parākramam
analyzed: tatas pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣāḥ dṛṣṭvā parākramam

original: 7.014.025c tato nadīr guhāś caiva viviśur bhayapīḍitāḥ
analyzed: tatas nadīḥ guhāḥ ca eva viviśuḥ bhaya pīḍitāḥ

original: 7.015.001a tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣām śata sahasraśas

original: 7.015.001c svayam eva dhanādhyakṣo nirjagāma raṇaṃ prati
analyzed: svayam eva dhanādhyakṣaḥ nirjagāma raṇam prati

original: 7.015.002a tatra māṇicāro nāma yakṣaḥ paramadurjayaḥ
analyzed: tatra māṇicāraḥ nāma yakṣaḥ parama durjayaḥ

original: 7.015.002c vṛto yakṣasahasraiḥ sa caturbhiḥ samayodhayat
analyzed: vṛtaḥ yakṣa sahasraiḥ sa caturbhiḥ samayodhayat

original: 7.015.003a te gadāmusalaprāsaśaktitomaramudgaraiḥ
analyzed: te gadā musala prāsa śakti tomara mudgaraiḥ

original: 7.015.003c abhighnanto raṇe yakṣā rākṣasān abhidudruvuḥ
analyzed: abhighnantaḥ raṇe yakṣāḥ rākṣasān abhidudruvuḥ

original: 7.015.004a tataḥ prahastena tadā sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
analyzed: tatas prahastena tadā sahasram nihatam raṇe

original: 7.015.004c mahodareṇa gadayā sahasram aparaṃ hatam
analyzed: mahodareṇa gadayā sahasram aparam hatam

original: 7.015.005a kruddhena ca tadā rāma mārīcena durātmanā
analyzed: kruddhena ca tadā rāma mārīcena durātmanā

original: 7.015.005c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa dve sahasre nipātite
analyzed: nimeṣa antara mātreṇa dve sahasre nipātite

original: 7.015.006a dhūmrākṣeṇa samāgamya māṇibhadro mahāraṇe
analyzed: dhūmrākṣeṇa samāgamya māṇibhadraḥ mahā raṇe

original: 7.015.006c musalenorasi krodhāt tāḍito na ca kampitaḥ
analyzed: musalena urasi krodhāt tāḍitaḥ na ca kampitaḥ

original: 7.015.007a tato gadāṃ samāvidhya māṇibhadreṇa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tatas gadām samāvidhya māṇibhadreṇa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.015.007c dhūmrākṣas tāḍito mūrdhni vihvalo nipapāta ha
analyzed: dhūmrākṣaḥ tāḍitaḥ mūrdhni vihvalaḥ nipapāta ha

original: 7.015.008a dhūmrākṣaṃ tāḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam
analyzed: dhūmrākṣam tāḍitam dṛṣṭvā patitam śoṇita ukṣitam

original: 7.015.008c abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddho māṇibhadraṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: abhyadhāvat su saṃkruddhaḥ māṇibhadram daśānanaḥ

original: 7.015.009a taṃ kruddham abhidhāvantaṃ yugāntāgnim ivotthitam
analyzed: tam kruddham abhidhāvantam yugānta agnim iva utthitam

original: 7.015.009c śaktibhis tāḍayām āsa tisṛbhir yakṣapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: śaktibhiḥ tāḍayām āsa tisṛbhiḥ yakṣa puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.015.010a tato rākṣasarājena tāḍito gadayā raṇe
analyzed: tatas rākṣasa rājena tāḍitaḥ gadayā raṇe

original: 7.015.010c tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ
analyzed: tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ

original: 7.015.010e tadā prabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamaulir iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti sau pārśvamauliḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 7.015.011a tasmiṃs tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani
analyzed: tasmin tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani

original: 7.015.011c saṃnādaḥ sumahān rāma tasmiñ śaile vyavardhata
analyzed: saṃnādaḥ su mahān rāma tasmin śaile vyavardhata

original: 7.015.012a tato dūrāt pradadṛśe dhanādhyakṣo gadādharaḥ
analyzed: tatas dūrāt pradadṛśe dhanādhyakṣaḥ gadā dharaḥ

original: 7.015.012c śukraproṣṭaḥpadābhyāṃ ca śaṅkhapadmasamāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: śukra proṣṭaḥpadābhyām ca śaṅkha padma samāvṛtaḥ

original: 7.015.013a sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaram saṃkhye śāpāt vibhraṣṭa gauravam

original: 7.015.013c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule
analyzed: uvāca vacanam dhīmān yuktam paitāmahe kule

original: 7.015.014a mayā tvaṃ vāryamāṇo 'pi nāvagacchasi durmate
analyzed: mayā tvam vāryamāṇaḥ na avagacchasi durmate

original: 7.015.014c paścād asya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: paścāt asya phalam prāpya jñāsyase nirayam gataḥ

original: 7.015.015a yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi mohāt viṣam pītvā na avagacchati mānavaḥ

original: 7.015.015c pariṇāme sa vi mūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam
analyzed: pariṇāme sa vi mūḍhaḥ jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: 7.015.016a daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kena cit
analyzed: daivatāni hi nandanti dharma yuktena kena cit

original: 7.015.016c yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītas tac ca na budhyase
analyzed: yena tvam īdṛśam bhāvam nītaḥ tat ca na budhyase

original: 7.015.017a yo hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryāṃś cāvamanyate
analyzed: yaḥ hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryān ca avamanyate

original: 7.015.017c sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: sa paśyati phalam tasya pretarāja vaśam gataḥ

original: 7.015.018a adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo 'rjanam
analyzed: adhruve hi śarīre yaḥ na karoti tapaḥ rjanam

original: 7.015.018c sa paścāt tapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvātmano gatim
analyzed: sa paścāt tapyate mūḍhaḥ mṛtaḥ dṛṣṭvā ātmanaḥ gatim

original: 7.015.019a kasya cin na hi durbudheś chandato jāyate matiḥ
analyzed: kasya cit na hi durbudheḥ chandataḥ jāyate matiḥ

original: 7.015.019c yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
analyzed: yādṛśam kurute karma tādṛśam phalam aśnute

original: 7.015.020a buddhiṃ rūpaṃ balaṃ vittaṃ putrān māhātmyam eva ca
analyzed: buddhim rūpam balam vittam putrān māhātmyam eva ca

original: 7.015.020c prapnuvanti narāḥ sarvaṃ svakṛtaiḥ pūrvakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: prapnuvanti narāḥ sarvam sva kṛtaiḥ pūrva karmabhiḥ

original: 7.015.021a evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
analyzed: evam niraya gāmī tvam yasya te matiḥ īdṛśī

original: 7.015.021c na tvāṃ samabhibhāṣiṣye durvṛttasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ
analyzed: na tvām samabhibhāṣiṣye durvṛttasya eṣa nirṇayaḥ

original: 7.015.022a evam uktvā tatas tena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas tena tasya amātyāḥ samāhatāḥ

original: 7.015.022c mārīcapramukhāḥ sarve vimukhā vipradudruvuḥ
analyzed: mārīca pramukhāḥ sarve vimukhāḥ vipradudruvuḥ

original: 7.015.023a tatas tena daśagrīvo yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: tatas tena daśagrīvaḥ yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā

original: 7.015.023c gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānād vyakampata
analyzed: gadayā abhihataḥ mūrdhni na ca sthānāt vyakampata

original: 7.015.024a tatas tau rāma nighnantāv anyonyaṃ paramāhave
analyzed: tatas tau rāma nighnantau anyonyam parama āhave

original: 7.015.024c na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatur amarṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatuḥ amarṣaṇaiḥ

original: 7.015.025a āgneyam astraṃ sa tato mumoca dhanado raṇe
analyzed: āgneyam astram sa tatas mumoca dhanadaḥ raṇe

original: 7.015.025c vāruṇena daśagrīvas tad astraṃ pratyavārayat
analyzed: vāruṇena daśagrīvaḥ tat astram pratyavārayat

original: 7.015.026a tato māyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: tatas māyām praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīm rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 7.015.026c jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāvidhya mahatīṃ gadām
analyzed: jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadam vyāvidhya mahatīm gadām

original: 7.015.027a evaṃ sa tenābhihato vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ
analyzed: evam sa tena abhihataḥ vihvalaḥ śoṇita ukṣitaḥ

original: 7.015.027c kṛttamūla ivāśoko nipapāta dhanādhipaḥ
analyzed: kṛtta mūlaḥ iva aśokaḥ nipapāta dhanādhipaḥ

original: 7.015.028a tataḥ padmādibhis tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas padma ādibhiḥ tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ

original: 7.015.028c nandanaṃ vanam ānīya dhanado śvāsitas tadā
analyzed: nandanam vanam ānīya dhanadaḥ śvāsitaḥ tadā

original: 7.015.029a tato nirjitya taṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas nirjitya tam rāma dhanadam rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.015.029c puṣpakaṃ tasya jagrāha vimānaṃ jayalakṣaṇam
analyzed: puṣpakam tasya jagrāha vimānam jaya lakṣaṇam

original: 7.015.030a kāñcanastambhasaṃvītaṃ vaidūryamaṇitoraṇam
analyzed: kāñcana stambha saṃvītam vaidūrya maṇi toraṇam

original: 7.015.030c muktājālapraticchannaṃ sarvakāmaphaladrumam
analyzed: muktā jāla praticchannam sarva kāma phala drumam

original: 7.015.031a tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam
analyzed: tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagam vīrya nirjitam

original: 7.015.031c jitvā vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ kailāsād avarohata
analyzed: jitvā vaiśravaṇam devam kailāsāt avarohata

original: 7.016.001a sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa jitvā bhrātaram rāma dhanadam rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.016.001c mahāsenaprasūtiṃ tu yayau śaravaṇaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: mahāsena prasūtim tu yayau śaravaṇam tatas

original: 7.016.002a athāpaśyad daśagrīvo raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ tadā
analyzed: athā apaśyat daśagrīvaḥ raukmam śaravaṇam tadā

original: 7.016.002c gabhastijālasaṃvītaṃ dvitīyam iva bhāskaram
analyzed: gabhasti jāla saṃvītam dvitīyam iva bhāskaram

original: 7.016.003a parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃ cid ramyavanāntaram
analyzed: parvatam sa samāsādya kiṃcid ramya vana antaram

original: 7.016.003c apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāma viṣṭambhitaṃ divi
analyzed: apaśyat puṣpakam tatra rāma viṣṭambhitam divi

original: 7.016.004a viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmagaṃ hy agamaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: viṣṭabdham puṣpakam dṛṣṭvā kāmagam hi agamam kṛtam

original: 7.016.004c rākṣasaś cintayām āsa sacivais taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ cintayām āsa sacivaiḥ taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ

original: 7.016.005a kim idaṃ yannimittaṃ me na ca gacchati puṣpakam
analyzed: kim idam yat nimittam me na ca gacchati puṣpakam

original: 7.016.005c parvatasyoparisthasya kasya karma tv idaṃ bhavet
analyzed: parvatasya upari sthasya kasya karma tu idam bhavet

original: 7.016.006a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaṃ mārīco buddhikovidaḥ
analyzed: tatas bravīt daśagrīvam mārīcaḥ buddhi kovidaḥ

original: 7.016.006c naitan niṣkāraṇaṃ rājan puṣpako 'yaṃ na gacchati
analyzed: na etat niṣkāraṇam rājan puṣpakaḥ yam na gacchati

original: 7.016.007a tataḥ pārśvam upāgamya bhavasyānucaro balī
analyzed: tatas pārśvam upāgamya bhavasya anucaraḥ balī

original: 7.016.007c nandīśvara uvācedaṃ rākṣasendram aśaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: nandīśvaraḥ uvāca idam rākṣasa indram aśaṅkitaḥ

original: 7.016.008a nivartasva daśagrīva śaile krīḍati śaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: nivartasva daśagrīva śaile krīḍati śaṃkaraḥ

original: 7.016.009a suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām
analyzed: suparṇa nāga yakṣāṇām daitya dānava rakṣasām

original: 7.016.009c prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ

original: 7.016.010a sa roṣāt tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakād avaruhya ca
analyzed: sa roṣāt tāmra nayanaḥ puṣpakāt avaruhya ca

original: 7.016.010c ko 'yaṃ śaṃkara ity uktvā śailamūlam upāgamat
analyzed: kaḥ yam śaṃkaraḥ iti uktvā śaila mūlam upāgamat

original: 7.016.011a nandīśvaram athāpaśyad avidūrasthitaṃ prabhum
analyzed: nandīśvaram athā apaśyat avidūra sthitam prabhum

original: 7.016.011c dīptaṃ śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram
analyzed: dīptam śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram

original: 7.016.012a sa vānaramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: sa vānara mukham dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.016.012c prahāsaṃ mumuce maurkhyāt satoya iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: prahāsam mumuce maurkhyāt sa toyaḥ iva toyadaḥ

original: 7.016.013a saṃkruddho bhagavān nandī śaṃkarasyāparā tanuḥ
analyzed: saṃkruddhaḥ bhagavān nandī śaṃkarasya aparā tanuḥ

original: 7.016.013c abravīd rākṣasaṃ tatra daśagrīvam upasthitam
analyzed: abravīt rākṣasam tatra daśagrīvam upasthitam

original: 7.016.014a yasmād vānaramūrtiṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasadurmate
analyzed: yasmāt vānara mūrtim mām dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa durmate

original: 7.016.014c maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsaṃ ca muñcasi
analyzed: maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsam ca muñcasi

original: 7.016.015a tasmān madrūpasaṃyuktā madvīryasamatejasaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt mad rūpa saṃyuktāḥ mad vīrya sama tejasaḥ

original: 7.016.015c utpatsyante vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ
analyzed: utpatsyante vadha artham hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ

original: 7.016.016a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ yat tvāṃ niśācara
analyzed: kim tu idānīm mayā śakyam kartum yat tvām niśācara

original: 7.016.016c na hantavyo hatas tvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: na hantavyaḥ hataḥ tvam hi pūrvam eva sva karmabhiḥ

original: 7.016.017a acintayitvā sa tadā nandivākyaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: a cintayitvā sa tadā nandi vākyam niśācaraḥ

original: 7.016.017c parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: parvatam tam samāsādya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.016.018a puṣpakasya gatiś chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ
analyzed: puṣpakasya gatiḥ chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ

original: 7.016.018c tad etac chailam unmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate
analyzed: tat etat śailam unmūlam karomi tava gopate

original: 7.016.019a kena prabhāvena bhavas tatra krīḍati rājavat
analyzed: kena prabhāvena bhavaḥ tatra krīḍati rāja vat

original: 7.016.019c vijñātavyaṃ na jānīṣe bhayasthānam upasthitam
analyzed: vijñātavyam na jānīṣe bhaya sthānam upasthitam

original: 7.016.020a evam uktvā tato rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate

original: 7.016.020c tolayām āsa taṃ śailaṃ samṛgavyālapādapam
analyzed: tolayām āsa tam śailam sa mṛga vyāla pādapam

original: 7.016.021a tato rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tatkṛtam
analyzed: tatas rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tad kṛtam

original: 7.016.021c pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayām āsa līlayā
analyzed: pāda aṅguṣṭhena tam śailam pīḍayām āsa līlayā

original: 7.016.022a tatas te pīḍitās tasya śailasyādho gatā bhujāḥ
analyzed: tatas te pīḍitāḥ tasya śailasya adhas gatāḥ bhujāḥ

original: 7.016.022c vismitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: vismitāḥ ca abhavan tatra sacivāḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.016.023a rakṣasā tena roṣāc ca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāt tathā
analyzed: rakṣasā tena roṣāt ca bhujānām pīḍanāt tathā

original: 7.016.023c mukto virāvaḥ sumahāṃs trailokyaṃ yena pūritam
analyzed: muktaḥ virāvaḥ su mahān trailokyam yena pūritam

original: 7.016.024a mānuṣāḥ śabdavitrastā menire lokasaṃkṣayam
analyzed: mānuṣāḥ śabda vitrastāḥ menire loka saṃkṣayam

original: 7.016.024c devatāś cāpi saṃkṣubdhāś calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu
analyzed: devatāḥ ca api saṃkṣubdhāḥ calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu

original: 7.016.025a tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitas tadā
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ mahādevaḥ śaila agre viṣṭhitaḥ tadā

original: 7.016.025c muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam
analyzed: muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyam daśānanam

original: 7.016.026a prīto 'smi tava vīryāc ca śauṇḍīryāc ca niśācara
analyzed: prītaḥ smi tava vīryāt ca śauṇḍīryāt ca niśācara

original: 7.016.026c ravato vedanā muktaḥ svaraḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
analyzed: ravataḥ vedanā muktaḥ svaraḥ parama dāruṇaḥ

original: 7.016.027a yasmāl lokatrayaṃ tv etad rāvitaṃ bhayam āgatam
analyzed: yasmāt lokatrayam tu etat rāvitam bhayam āgatam

original: 7.016.027c tasmāt tvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: tasmāt tvam rāvaṇaḥ nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.016.028a devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale
analyzed: devatāḥ mānuṣāḥ yakṣāḥ ye ca anye jagatī tale

original: 7.016.028c evaṃ tvām abhidhāsyanti rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam
analyzed: evam tvām abhidhāsyanti rāvaṇam loka rāvaṇam

original: 7.016.029a gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi
analyzed: gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi

original: 7.016.029c mayā tvam abhyanujñāto rākṣasādhipa gamyatām
analyzed: mayā tvam abhyanujñātaḥ rākṣasa adhipa gamyatām

original: 7.016.030a sākṣān maheśvareṇaivaṃ kṛtanāmā sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sākṣāt maheśvareṇa evam kṛta nāmā sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.016.030c abhivādya mahādevaṃ vimānaṃ tat samāruhat
analyzed: abhivādya mahādevam vimānam tat samāruhat

original: 7.016.031a tato mahītale rāma paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas mahī tale rāma paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.016.031c kṣatriyān sumahāvīryān bādhamānas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyān su mahā vīryān bādhamānaḥ tatas tatas

original: 7.017.001a atha rājan mahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam
analyzed: atha rājan mahā bāhuḥ vicaran sa mahī talam

original: 7.017.001c himavadvanam āsādya paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: himavat vanam āsādya paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.017.002a tatrāpaśyata vai kanyāṃ kṛṣṭājinajaṭādharām
analyzed: tatra apaśyata vai kanyām kṛṣṭa ajina jaṭā dharām

original: 7.017.002c ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ tapantīṃ devatām iva
analyzed: ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktām tapantīm devatām iva

original: 7.017.003a sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā rūpa saṃpannām kanyām tām su mahā vratām

original: 7.017.003c kāmamohaparītātmā papraccha prahasann iva
analyzed: kāma moha parīta ātmā papraccha prahasan iva

original: 7.017.004a kim idaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te
analyzed: kim idam vartase bhadre viruddham yauvanasya te

original: 7.017.004c na hi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyeyaṃ pratikriyā
analyzed: na hi yuktā tava etasya rūpasya iyam pratikriyā

original: 7.017.005a kasyāsi duhitā bhadre ko vā bhartā tavānaghe
analyzed: kasya asi duhitā bhadre kaḥ vā bhartā tava anaghe

original: 7.017.005c pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghraṃ ko vā hetus tapo'rjane
analyzed: pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghram kaḥ vā hetuḥ tapoḥ jane

original: 7.017.006a evam uktā tu sā kanyā tenānāryeṇa rakṣasā
analyzed: evam uktā tu sā kanyā tena anāryeṇa rakṣasā

original: 7.017.006c abravīd vidhivat kṛtvā tasyātithyaṃ tapodhanā
analyzed: abravīt vidhivat kṛtvā tasya ātithyam tapodhanā

original: 7.017.007a kuśadhvajo nāma pitā brahmarṣir mama dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: kuśadhvajaḥ nāma pitā brahmarṣiḥ mama dhārmikaḥ

original: 7.017.007c bṛhaspatisutaḥ śrīmān buddhyā tulyo bṛhaspateḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspati sutaḥ śrīmān buddhyā tulyaḥ bṛhaspateḥ

original: 7.017.008a tasyāhaṃ kurvato nityaṃ vedābhyāsaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham kurvataḥ nityam veda abhyāsam mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.017.008c saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā
analyzed: saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā

original: 7.017.009a tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ

original: 7.017.009c te cāpi gatvā pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me
analyzed: te ca api gatvā pitaram varaṇam rocayanti me

original: 7.017.010a na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavān rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: na ca mām sa pitā tebhyaḥ dattavān rākṣasa īśvara

original: 7.017.010c kāraṇaṃ tad vadiṣyāmi niśāmaya mahābhuja
analyzed: kāraṇam tat vadiṣyāmi niśāmaya mahā bhuja

original: 7.017.011a pitus tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ

original: 7.017.011c abhipretas trilokeśas tasmān nānyasya me pitāḥ
analyzed: abhipretaḥ triloka īśaḥ tasmāt na anyasya me pitā

original: 7.017.012a dātum icchati dharmātmā tac chrutvā baladarpitaḥ
analyzed: dātum icchati dharma ātmā tat śrutvā bala darpitaḥ

original: 7.017.012c śambhur nāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat
analyzed: śambhuḥ nāma tatas rājā daityānām kupitaḥ bhavat

original: 7.017.012e tena rātrau prasupto me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ
analyzed: tena rātrau prasuptaḥ me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ

original: 7.017.013a tato me jananī dīnā tac charīraṃ pitur mama
analyzed: tatas me jananī dīnā tat śarīram pituḥ mama

original: 7.017.013c pariṣvajya mahābhāgā praviṣṭā dahanaṃ saha
analyzed: pariṣvajya mahābhāgā praviṣṭā dahanam saha

original: 7.017.014a tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ pitur nārāyaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: tatas manoratham satyam pituḥ nārāyaṇam prati

original: 7.017.014c karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā
analyzed: karomi iti mama icchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā

original: 7.017.015a ahaṃ pretagatasyāpi kariṣye kāṅkṣitaṃ pituḥ
analyzed: aham preta gatasya api kariṣye kāṅkṣitam pituḥ

original: 7.017.015c iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulam tapaḥ

original: 7.017.016a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam mayā rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 7.017.016c āśritāṃ viddhi māṃ dharmaṃ nārāyaṇapatīcchayā
analyzed: āśritām viddhi mām dharmam nārāyaṇa pati icchayā

original: 7.017.017a vijñātas tvaṃ hi me rājan gaccha paulastyanandana
analyzed: vijñātaḥ tvam hi me rājan gaccha paulastya nandana

original: 7.017.017c jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yad dhi vartate
analyzed: jānāmi tapasā sarvam trailokye yat hi vartate

original: 7.017.018a so 'bravīd rāvaṇas tatra tāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām
analyzed: saḥ bravīt rāvaṇaḥ tatra tām kanyām su mahā vratām

original: 7.017.018c avaruhya vimānāgrāt kandarpaśarapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: avaruhya vimāna agrāt kandarpa śara pīḍitaḥ

original: 7.017.019a avaliptāsi suśroṇi yasyās te matir īdṛśī
analyzed: avaliptā asi su śroṇi yasyāḥ te matiḥ īdṛśī

original: 7.017.019c vṛddhānāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣi bhrājate dharmasaṃcayaḥ
analyzed: vṛddhānām mṛgaśāvākṣi bhrājate dharma saṃcayaḥ

original: 7.017.020a tvaṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannā nārhase kartum īdṛśam
analyzed: tvam sarva guṇa saṃpannā na arhase kartum īdṛśam

original: 7.017.020c trailokyasundarī bhīru yauvane vārdhakaṃ vidhim
analyzed: trailokya sundarī bhīru yauvane vārddhakam vidhim

original: 7.017.021a kaś ca tāvad asau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇur ity abhibhāṣase
analyzed: kaḥ ca tāvat asau yam tvam viṣṇuḥ iti abhibhāṣase

original: 7.017.021c vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca
analyzed: vīryeṇa tapasā ca eva bhogena ca balena ca

original: 7.017.021e na mayāsau samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane
analyzed: na mayā asau samaḥ bhadre yam tvam kāmayase ṅgane

original: 7.017.022a ma maivam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram
analyzed: ma mā evam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram

original: 7.017.022c mūrdhajeṣu ca tāṃ rakṣaḥ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat
analyzed: mūrdhajeṣu ca tām rakṣaḥ kara agreṇa parāmṛśat

original: 7.017.023a tato vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sācchinat
analyzed: tatas vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sā ācchinat

original: 7.017.023c uvācāgniṃ samādhāya maraṇāya kṛtatvarā
analyzed: uvāca agnim samādhāya maraṇāya kṛta tvarā

original: 7.017.024a dharṣitāyās tvayānārya nedānīṃ mama jīvitam
analyzed: dharṣitāyāḥ tvayā anārya na idānīm mama jīvitam

original: 7.017.024c rakṣas tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyatas te hutāśanam
analyzed: rakṣaḥ tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyataḥ te hutāśanam

original: 7.017.025a yasmāt tu dharṣitā cāham apāpā cāpy anāthavat
analyzed: yasmāt tu dharṣitā ca aham apāpā ca api anātha vat

original: 7.017.025c tasmāt tava vadhārthaṃ vai samutpatsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt tava vadha artham vai samutpatsyāmi aham punar

original: 7.017.026a na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantuṃ tvaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantum tvam tu viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.017.026c śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaś ca vyayo bhavet
analyzed: śāpe tvayi mayā utsṛṣṭe tapasaḥ ca vyayaḥ bhavet

original: 7.017.027a yadi tv asti mayā kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā
analyzed: yadi tu asti mayā kim cit kṛtam dattam hutam tathā

original: 7.017.027c tena hy ayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā
analyzed: tena hi a yoni jā sādhvī bhaveyam dharmiṇaḥ sutā

original: 7.017.028a evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantaṃ vai hutāśanam
analyzed: evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantam vai hutāśanam

original: 7.017.028c papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: papāta ca divaḥ divyā puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ

original: 7.017.029a pūrvaṃ krodhahataḥ śatrur yayāsau nihatas tvayā
analyzed: pūrvam krodha hataḥ śatruḥ yayā asau nihataḥ tvayā

original: 7.017.029c samupāśritya śailābhaṃ tava vīryam amānuṣam
analyzed: samupāśritya śaila ābham tava vīryam amānuṣam

original: 7.017.030a evam eṣā mahābhāgā martyeṣūtpadyate punaḥ
analyzed: evam eṣā mahābhāgā martyeṣu utpadyate punar

original: 7.017.030c kṣetre halamukhagraste vedyām agniśikhopamā
analyzed: kṣetre halamukha graste vedyām agni śikhā upamā

original: 7.017.031a eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge
analyzed: eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge

original: 7.017.031c tretāyugam anuprāpya vadhārthaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: tretā yugam anuprāpya vadha artham tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.017.031e sītotpanneti sītaiṣā mānuṣaiḥ punar ucyate
analyzed: sītā utpannā iti sītā eṣā mānuṣaiḥ punar ucyate

original: 7.018.001a praviṣṭāyāaṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭāyām hutāśam tu vedavatyām sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.018.001c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya paricakrāma medinīm
analyzed: puṣpakam tat samāruhya paricakrāma medinīm

original: 7.018.002a tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ
analyzed: tatas maruttam nṛpatim yajantam saha daivataiḥ

original: 7.018.002c uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.018.003a saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣir bhrātā sākṣād bṛhaspateḥ
analyzed: saṃvartaḥ nāma brahmarṣiḥ bhrātā sākṣāt bṛhaspateḥ

original: 7.018.003c yājayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvair brahmagaṇair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yājayām āsa dharma jñaḥ sarvaiḥ brahma gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 7.018.004a dṛṣṭvā devās tu tad rakṣo varadānena durjayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā devāḥ tu tat rakṣaḥ vara dānena durjayam

original: 7.018.004c tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ samāpannās tasya dharṣaṇabhīravaḥ
analyzed: tām tām yonim samāpannāḥ tasya dharṣaṇa bhīravaḥ

original: 7.018.005a indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājas tu vāyasaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ mayūraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ dharmarājaḥ tu vāyasaḥ

original: 7.018.005c kṛkalāso dhanādhyakṣo haṃso vai varuṇo 'bhavat
analyzed: kṛkalāsaḥ dhanādhyakṣaḥ haṃsaḥ vai varuṇaḥ bhavat

original: 7.018.006a taṃ ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tam ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.018.006c prāha yuddhaṃ prayacceti nirjito 'smīti vā vada
analyzed: prāha yuddham prayacca iti nirjitaḥ smi iti vā vada

original: 7.018.007a tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavān ity uvāca tam
analyzed: tatas maruttaḥ nṛpatiḥ kaḥ bhavān iti uvāca tam

original: 7.018.007c avahāsaṃ tato muktvā rākṣaso vākyam abravīt
analyzed: avahāsam tatas muktvā rākṣasaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.018.008a akutūhalabhāvena prīto 'smi tava pārthiva
analyzed: akutūhala bhāvena prītaḥ smi tava pārthiva

original: 7.018.008c dhanadasyānujaṃ yo māṃ nāvagacchasi rāvaṇam
analyzed: dhanadasya anujam yaḥ mām na avagacchasi rāvaṇam

original: 7.018.009a triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ so 'sti yo na jānāti me balam
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ saḥ sti yaḥ na jānāti me balam

original: 7.018.009c bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam
analyzed: bhrātaram yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam

original: 7.018.010a tato marutto nṛpatis taṃ rākṣasam athābravīt
analyzed: tatas maruttaḥ nṛpatiḥ tam rākṣasam atha abravīt

original: 7.018.010c dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ
analyzed: dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ

original: 7.018.011a nādharmasahitaṃ ślāghyaṃ na lokapratisaṃhitam
analyzed: na adharma sahitam ślāghyam na loka pratisaṃhitam

original: 7.018.011c karma daurātmyakaṃ kṛtvā ślāghase bhrātṛnirjayāt
analyzed: karma daurātmyakam kṛtvā ślāghase bhrātṛ nirjayāt

original: 7.018.012a kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam
analyzed: kim tvam prāk kevalam dharmam caritvā labdhavān varam

original: 7.018.012c śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam
analyzed: śruta pūrvam hi na mayā yādṛśam bhāṣase svayam

original: 7.018.013a tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃś ca sa pārthivaḥ
analyzed: tatas śarāsanam gṛhya sāyakān ca sa pārthivaḥ

original: 7.018.013c raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgam āvṛṇot
analyzed: raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvartaḥ mārgam āvṛṇot

original: 7.018.014a so 'bravīt snehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: saḥ bravīt sneha saṃyuktam maruttam tam mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.018.014c śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ
analyzed: śrotavyam yadi mad vākyam saṃprahāraḥ na te kṣamaḥ

original: 7.018.015a māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet
analyzed: māheśvaram idam satram a samāptam kulam dahet

original: 7.018.015c dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ
analyzed: dīkṣitasya kutas yuddham krūra tvam dīkṣite kutas

original: 7.018.016a saṃśayaś ca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaś caiṣa durjayaḥ
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ ca raṇe nityam rākṣasaḥ ca eṣa durjayaḥ

original: 7.018.016c sa nivṛtto guror vākyān maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
analyzed: sa nivṛttaḥ guroḥ vākyāt maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 7.018.016e visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ svastho makhamukho 'bhavat
analyzed: visṛjya sa śaram cāpam svasthaḥ makha mukhaḥ bhavat

original: 7.018.017a tatas taṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ
analyzed: tatas tam nirjitam matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ

original: 7.018.017c rāvaṇo jitavāṃś ceti harṣān nādaṃ ca muktavān
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ jitavān ca iti harṣāt nādam ca muktavān

original: 7.018.018a tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān maharṣīn yajñam āgatān
analyzed: tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān mahā ṛṣīn yajñam āgatān

original: 7.018.018c vitṛpto rudhirais teṣāṃ punaḥ saṃprayayau mahīm
analyzed: vitṛptaḥ rudhiraiḥ teṣām punar saṃprayayau mahīm

original: 7.018.019a rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāś caiva divaukasaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sa indrāḥ ca eva divaukasaḥ

original: 7.018.019c tataḥ svāṃ yonim āsādya tāni sattvāny athābruvan
analyzed: tatas svām yonim āsādya tāni sattvāni atha abruvan

original: 7.018.020a harṣāt tadābravīd indro mayūraṃ nīlabarhiṇam
analyzed: harṣāt tadā abravīt indraḥ mayūram nīla barhiṇam

original: 7.018.020c prīto 'smi tava dharmajña upakārād vihaṃgama
analyzed: prītaḥ smi tava dharma jñaḥ upakārāt vihaṃgama

original: 7.018.021a mama netrasahasraṃ yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati
analyzed: mama netra sahasram yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati

original: 7.018.021c varṣamāṇe mayi mudaṃ prāpsyase prītilakṣaṇam
analyzed: varṣamāṇe mayi mudam prāpsyase prīti lakṣaṇam

original: 7.018.022a nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa
analyzed: nīlāḥ kila purā barhāḥ mayūrāṇām narādhipa

original: 7.018.022c surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām
analyzed: surādhipāt varam prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitra tām

original: 7.018.023a dharmarājo 'bravīd rāma prāgvaṃśe vāyasaṃ sthitam
analyzed: dharmarājaḥ bravīt rāma prāc vaṃśe vāyasam sthitam

original: 7.018.023c pakṣiṃs tavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: pakṣin tava asmi su prītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu

original: 7.018.024a yathānye vividhai rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇino mayā
analyzed: yathā anye vividhaiḥ rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇinaḥ mayā

original: 7.018.024c te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.018.025a mṛtyutas te bhayaṃ nāsti varān mama vihaṃgama
analyzed: mṛtyutaḥ te bhayam nā asti varāt mama vihaṃgama

original: 7.018.025c yāvat tvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narās tāvad bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: yāvat tvām na vadhiṣyanti narāḥ tāvat bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.018.026a ye ca madviṣayasthās tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ
analyzed: ye ca mad viṣaya sthāḥ tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayā arditāḥ

original: 7.018.026c tvayi bhukte tu tṛptās te bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ
