analyzed: tvayi bhukte tu tṛptāḥ te bhaviṣyanti sa bāndhavāḥ

original: 7.018.027a varuṇas tv abravīd dhaṃsaṃ gaṅgātoyavicāriṇam
analyzed: varuṇaḥ tu abravīt haṃsam gaṅgā toya vicāriṇam

original: 7.018.027c śrūyatāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ vacaḥ patraratheśvara
analyzed: śrūyatām prīti saṃyuktam vacaḥ patraratha īśvara

original: 7.018.028a varṇo manoharaḥ saumyaś candramaṇḍalasaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: varṇaḥ manoharaḥ saumyaḥ candra maṇḍala saṃnibhaḥ

original: 7.018.028c bhaviṣyati tavodagraḥ śuklaphenasamaprabhaḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati tava udagraḥ śukla phena sama prabhaḥ

original: 7.018.029a maccharīraṃ samāsādya kānto nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: mad śarīram samāsādya kāntaḥ nityam bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.018.029c prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītim etan me prītilakṣaṇam
analyzed: prāpsyase ca atulām prītim etat me prīti lakṣaṇam

original: 7.018.030a haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarvapāṇḍuraḥ
analyzed: haṃsānām hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarva pāṇḍuraḥ

original: 7.018.030c pakṣā nīlāgrasaṃvītāḥ kroḍāḥ śaṣpāgranirmalāḥ
analyzed: pakṣāḥ nīla agra saṃvītāḥ kroḍāḥ śaṣpa agra nirmalāḥ

original: 7.018.031a athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ kṛkalāsaṃ girau sthitam
analyzed: atha abravīt vaiśravaṇaḥ kṛkalāsam girau sthitam

original: 7.018.031c hairaṇyaṃ saṃprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītis tavāpy aham
analyzed: hairaṇyam saṃprayacchāmi varṇam prītiḥ tava api aham

original: 7.018.032a sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam
analyzed: sa dravyam ca śiraḥ nityam bhaviṣyati tava akṣayam

original: 7.018.032c eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati
analyzed: eṣa kāñcanakaḥ varṇaḥ mad prītyā te bhaviṣyati

original: 7.018.033a evaṃ dattvā varāṃs tebhyas tasmin yajñotsave surāḥ
analyzed: evam dattvā varān tebhyaḥ tasmin yajña utsave surāḥ

original: 7.018.033c nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punar sva bhavanam gatāḥ

original: 7.019.001a atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: atha jitvā maruttam sa prayayau rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.019.001c nagarāṇi narendrāṇāṃ yuddhakāṅkṣī daśānanaḥ
analyzed: nagarāṇi narendrāṇām yuddha kāṅkṣī daśānanaḥ

original: 7.019.002a sa samāsādya rājendrān mahendravaruṇopamān
analyzed: sa samāsādya rāja indrān mahā indra varuṇa upamān

original: 7.019.002c abravīd rākṣasendras tu yuddhaṃ me dīyatām iti
analyzed: abravīt rākṣasa indraḥ tu yuddham me dīyatām iti

original: 7.019.003a nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣo hi mama niścayaḥ
analyzed: nirjitāḥ sma iti vā brūta eṣaḥ hi mama niścayaḥ

original: 7.019.003c anyathā kurvatām evaṃ mokṣo vo nopapadyate
analyzed: anyathā kurvatām evam mokṣaḥ vaḥ nā upapadyate

original: 7.019.004a tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaṇiścayāḥ
analyzed: tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivāḥ dharma niścayāḥ

original: 7.019.004c nirjitāḥ smety abhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: nirjitāḥ sma iti abhāṣanta jñātvā vara balam ripoḥ

original: 7.019.005a duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhir gayo rājā purūravāḥ
analyzed: duṣyantaḥ surathaḥ gādhiḥ gayaḥ rājā purūravāḥ

original: 7.019.005c ete sarve 'bruvaṃs tāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ
analyzed: ete sarve bruvan tāta nirjitāḥ sma iti pārthivāḥ

original: 7.019.006a athāyodhyāṃ samāsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: atha ayodhyām samāsādya rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.019.006c suguptām anaraṇyena śakreṇevāmarāvatīm
analyzed: su guptām an araṇyena śakreṇa iva amarāvatīm

original: 7.019.007a prāha rājānam āsādya yuddhaṃ me saṃpradīyatām
analyzed: prāha rājānam āsādya yuddham me saṃpradīyatām

original: 7.019.007c nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi mamaitad iha śāsanam
analyzed: nirjitaḥ smi iti vā brūhi mama etat iha śāsanam

original: 7.019.008a anaraṇyaḥ susaṃkruddho rākṣasendram athābravīt
analyzed: anaraṇyaḥ su saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasa indram atha abravīt

original: 7.019.008c dīyate dvandvayuddhaṃ te rākṣasādhipate mayā
analyzed: dīyate dvandva yuddham te rākṣasa adhipate mayā

original: 7.019.009a atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena sajjitaṃ sumahad dhi yat
analyzed: atha pūrvam śruta arthena sat jitam su mahat hi yat

original: 7.019.009c niṣkrāmat tan narendrasya balaṃ rakṣovadhodyatam
analyzed: niṣkrāmat tat narendrasya balam rakṣaḥ vadha udyatam

original: 7.019.010a nāgānāṃ bahusāhasraṃ vājinām ayutaṃ tathā
analyzed: nāgānām bahu sāhasram vājinām ayutam tathā

original: 7.019.010c mahīṃ saṃchādya niṣkrāntaṃ sapadātirathaṃ kṣaṇāt
analyzed: mahīm saṃchādya niṣkrāntam sa padāti ratham kṣaṇāt

original: 7.019.011a tad rāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ
analyzed: tat rāvaṇa balam prāpya balam tasya mahīpateḥ

original: 7.019.011c prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyaṃ hutam ivānale
analyzed: prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyam hutam iva anale

original: 7.019.012a so 'paśyata narendras tu naśyamānaṃ mahad balam
analyzed: saḥ paśyata narendraḥ tu naśyamānam mahat balam

original: 7.019.012c mahārṇavaṃ samāsādya yathā pañcāpagā jalam
analyzed: mahā arṇavam samāsādya yathā pañca āpagāḥ jalam

original: 7.019.013a tataḥ śakradhanuḥprakhyaṃ dhanur visphārayan svayam
analyzed: tatas śakradhanuḥ prakhyam dhanuḥ visphārayan svayam

original: 7.019.013c āsadāda narendrās taṃ rāvaṇaṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: āsadāda narendrāḥ tam rāvaṇam krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 7.019.014a tato bāṇaśatāny aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani
analyzed: tatas bāṇa śatāni aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani

original: 7.019.014c tasya rākṣasarājasya ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ
analyzed: tasya rākṣasa rājasya ikṣvāku kula nandanaḥ

original: 7.019.015a tasya bāṇāḥ patantas te cakrire na kṣataṃ kva cit
analyzed: tasya bāṇāḥ patantaḥ te cakrire na kṣatam kva cit

original: 7.019.015c vāridhārā ivābhrebhyaḥ patantyo nagamūrdhani
analyzed: vāri dhārāḥ iva abhrebhyaḥ patantyaḥ naga mūrdhani

original: 7.019.016a tato rākṣasarājena kruddhena nṛpatis tadā
analyzed: tatas rākṣasa rājena kruddhena nṛpatiḥ tadā

original: 7.019.016c talena bhihato mūrdhni sa rathān nipapāta ha
analyzed: talena bhihataḥ mūrdhni sa rathāt nipapāta ha

original: 7.019.017a sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ
analyzed: sa rājā patitaḥ bhūmau vihvala aṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ

original: 7.019.017c vajradagdha ivāraṇye sālo nipatito mahān
analyzed: vajra dagdhaḥ iva araṇye sālaḥ nipatitaḥ mahān

original: 7.019.018a taṃ prahasyābravīd rakṣa ikṣvākuṃ pṛthivīpatim
analyzed: tam prahasya abravīt rakṣaḥ ikṣvākum pṛthivīpatim

original: 7.019.018c kim idānīṃ tvayā prāptaṃ phalaṃ māṃ prati yudhyatā
analyzed: kim idānīm tvayā prāptam phalam mām prati yudhyatā

original: 7.019.019a trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyān narādhipa
analyzed: trailokye nā asti yaḥ dvandvam mama dadyāt narādhipa

original: 7.019.019c śaṅke pramatto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama
analyzed: śaṅke pramattaḥ bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balam mama

original: 7.019.020a tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsur vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tasya evam bruvataḥ rājā mandāsuḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.019.020c kiṃ śakyam iha kartuṃ vai yat kālo duratikramaḥ
analyzed: kim śakyam iha kartum vai yat kālaḥ duratikramaḥ

original: 7.019.021a na hy ahaṃ nirjito rakṣas tvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā
analyzed: na hi aham nirjitaḥ rakṣaḥ tvayā ca ātma praśaṃsinā

original: 7.019.021c kāleneha vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtas tu me bhavān
analyzed: kālena iha vipannaḥ ham hetu bhūtaḥ tu me bhavān

original: 7.019.022a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye
analyzed: kim tu idānīm mayā śakyam kartum prāṇa parikṣaye

original: 7.019.022c ikṣvākuparibhāvitvād vaco vakṣyāmi rākṣasa
analyzed: ikṣvāku paribhāvi tvāt vacaḥ vakṣyāmi rākṣasa

original: 7.019.023a yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: yadi dattam yadi hutam yadi me su kṛtam tapaḥ

original: 7.019.023c yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me
analyzed: yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyam vacaḥ stu me

original: 7.019.024a utpatsyate kule hy asminn ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: utpatsyate kule hi asmin ikṣvākūṇām mahātmanām

original: 7.019.024c rājā paramatejasvī yas te prāṇān hariṣyati
analyzed: rājā parama tejasvī yaḥ te prāṇān hariṣyati

original: 7.019.025a tato jaladharodagras tāḍito devadundubhiḥ
analyzed: tatas jaladhara udagraḥ tāḍitaḥ deva dundubhiḥ

original: 7.019.025c tasminn udāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
analyzed: tasmin udāhṛte śāpe puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ ca khāt cyutā

original: 7.019.026a tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam
analyzed: tatas sa rājā rāja indra gataḥ sthānam triviṣṭapam

original: 7.019.026c svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata
analyzed: svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata

original: 7.020.001a tato vitrāsayan martyān pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas vitrāsayan martyān pṛthivyām rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.020.001c āsasāda ghane tasmin nāradaṃ munisattamam
analyzed: āsasāda ghane tasmin nāradam muni sattamam

original: 7.020.002a nāradas tu mahātejā devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: nāradaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ devarṣiḥ amita prabhaḥ

original: 7.020.002c abravīn meghapṛṣṭhastho rāvaṇaṃ puṣpake sthitam
analyzed: abravīt megha pṛṣṭha sthaḥ rāvaṇam puṣpake sthitam

original: 7.020.003a rākṣasādhipate saumya tiṣṭha viśravasaḥ suta
analyzed: rākṣasa adhipate saumya tiṣṭha viśravasaḥ suta

original: 7.020.003c prīto 'smy abhijanopeta vikramair ūrjitais tava
analyzed: prītaḥ smi abhijana upeta vikramaiḥ ūrjitaiḥ tava

original: 7.020.004a viṣṇunā daityaghātaiś ca tārkṣyasyoragadharṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: viṣṇunā daitya ghātaiḥ ca tārkṣyasya uraga dharṣaṇaiḥ

original: 7.020.004c tvayā samaramardaiś ca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ
analyzed: tvayā samara mardaiḥ ca bhṛśam hi paritoṣitaḥ

original: 7.020.005a kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi
analyzed: kim cit vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyam śroṣyase yadi

original: 7.020.005c śrutvā cānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tvayā rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: śrutvā ca anantaram kāryam tvayā rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 7.020.006a kim ayaṃ vadhyate lokas tvayāvadhyena daivataiḥ
analyzed: kim ayam vadhyate lokaḥ tvayā avadhyena daivataiḥ

original: 7.020.006c hata eva hy ayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: hataḥ eva hi ayam lokaḥ yadā mṛtyu vaśam gataḥ

original: 7.020.007a paśya tāvan mahābāho rākṣaseśvaramānuṣam
analyzed: paśya tāvat mahā bāho rākṣasa īśvara mānuṣam

original: 7.020.007c lokam enaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ
analyzed: lokam enam vicitra artham yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ

original: 7.020.008a kva cid vāditranṛttāni sevyante muditair janaiḥ
analyzed: kva cit vāditra nṛttāni sevyante muditaiḥ janaiḥ

original: 7.020.008c rudyate cāparair ārtair dhārāśrunayanānanaiḥ
analyzed: rudyate ca aparaiḥ ārtaiḥ dhārā aśru nayana ānanaiḥ

original: 7.020.009a mātā pitṛsutasnehair bhāryā bandhumanoramaiḥ
analyzed: mātā pitṛ suta snehaiḥ bhāryā bandhu manoramaiḥ

original: 7.020.009c mohenāyaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate
analyzed: mohena ayam janaḥ dhvastaḥ kleśam svam na avabudhyate

original: 7.020.010a tat kim evaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam
analyzed: tat kim evam parikliśya lokam moha nirākṛtam

original: 7.020.010c jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: jitaḥ eva tvayā saumya martya lokaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.020.011a evam uktas tu laṅkeśo dīpyamāna ivaujasā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu laṅkeśaḥ dīpyamānaḥ iva ojasā

original: 7.020.011c abravīn nāradaṃ tatra saṃprahasyābhivādya ca
analyzed: abravīt nāradam tatra saṃprahasya abhivādya ca

original: 7.020.012a maharṣe devagandharvavihāra samarapriya
analyzed: mahā ṛṣe deva gandharva vihāra samara priya

original: 7.020.012c ahaṃ khalūdyato gantuṃ vijayārthī rasātalam
analyzed: aham khalu udyataḥ gantum vijaya arthī rasātalam

original: 7.020.013a tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe
analyzed: tatas lokatrayam jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe

original: 7.020.013c samudram amṛtārthaṃ vai mathiṣyāmi rasālayam
analyzed: samudram amṛta artham vai mathiṣyāmi rasa ālayam

original: 7.020.014a athābravīd daśagrīvaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: atha abravīt daśagrīvam nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.020.014c kva khalv idānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayānena gamiṣyate
analyzed: kva khalu idānīm mārgeṇa tvayā anena gamiṣyate

original: 7.020.015a ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puraṃ prati
analyzed: ayam khalu su durgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puram prati

original: 7.020.015c mārgo gacchati durdharṣo yamasyāmitrakarśana
analyzed: mārgaḥ gacchati durdharṣaḥ yamasya amitra karśana

original: 7.020.016a sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ muktvā hāsaṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: sa tu śārada megha ābham muktvā hāsam daśānanaḥ

original: 7.020.016c uvāca kṛtam ity eva vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: uvāca kṛtam iti eva vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 7.020.017a tasmād eṣa mahābrahman vaivasvatavadhodyataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt eṣa mahā brahman vaivasvata vadha udyataḥ

original: 7.020.017c gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśām yatra sūrya ātmajaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.020.018a mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā
analyzed: mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātam raṇa arthinā

original: 7.020.018c avajeṣyāmi caturo lokapālān iti prabho
analyzed: avajeṣyāmi caturaḥ lokapālān iti prabho

original: 7.020.019a tenaiṣa prasthito 'haṃ vai pitṛrājapuraṃ prati
analyzed: tena eṣa prasthitaḥ ham vai pitṛrāja puram prati

original: 7.020.019c prāṇisaṃkleśakartāraṃ yojayiṣyāmi mṛtyunā
analyzed: prāṇi saṃkleśa kartāram yojayiṣyāmi mṛtyunā

original: 7.020.020a evam uktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tam abhivādya ca
analyzed: evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ munim tam abhivādya ca

original: 7.020.020c prayayau dakṣiṇām āśāṃ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
analyzed: prayayau dakṣiṇām āśām prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ

original: 7.020.021a nāradas tu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: nāradaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ muhūrtam dhyānam āsthitaḥ

original: 7.020.021c cintayām āsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: cintayām āsa vipra indraḥ vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: 7.020.022a yena lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ
analyzed: yena lokāḥ trayaḥ sa indrāḥ kliśyante sa carācarāḥ

original: 7.020.022c kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharme ca sa kālo hiṃsyate katham
analyzed: kṣīṇe ca āyuṣi dharme ca sa kālaḥ hiṃsyate katham

original: 7.020.023a yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ
analyzed: yasya nityam trayaḥ lokāḥ vidravanti bhaya arditāḥ

original: 7.020.023c taṃ kathaṃ rākṣasendro 'sau svayam evābhigacchati
analyzed: tam katham rākṣasa indraḥ sau svayam eva abhigacchati

original: 7.020.024a yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā
analyzed: yaḥ vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā

original: 7.020.024c trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ nu vijeṣyati
analyzed: trailokyam vijitam yena tam katham nu vijeṣyati

original: 7.020.025a aparaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtvaivaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati
analyzed: aparam kim nu kṛtvā evam vidhānam saṃvidhāsyati

original: 7.020.025c kautūhalasamutpanno yāsyāmi yamasādanam
analyzed: kautūhala samutpannaḥ yāsyāmi yama sādanam

original: 7.021.001a evaṃ saṃcintya viprendro jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: evam saṃcintya vipra indraḥ jagāma laghu vikramaḥ

original: 7.021.001c ākhyātuṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati
analyzed: ākhyātum tat yathāvṛttam yamasya sadanam prati

original: 7.021.002a apaśyat sa yamaṃ tatra devam agnipuraskṛtam
analyzed: apaśyat sa yamam tatra devam agni puraskṛtam

original: 7.021.002c vidhānam upatiṣṭhantaṃ prāṇino yasya yādṛśam
analyzed: vidhānam upatiṣṭhantam prāṇinaḥ yasya yādṛśam

original: 7.021.003a sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptam mahā ṛṣim tatra nāradam

original: 7.021.003c abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ
analyzed: abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ

original: 7.021.004a kaccit kṣemaṃ nu devarṣe kaccid dharmo na naśyati
analyzed: kaccit kṣemam nu deva ṛṣe kaccit dharmaḥ na naśyati

original: 7.021.004c kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te devagandharvasevita
analyzed: kim āgamana kṛtyam te deva gandharva sevita

original: 7.021.005a abravīt tu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: abravīt tu tadā vākyam nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.021.005c śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vidhānaṃ ca vidhīyatām
analyzed: śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vidhānam ca vidhīyatām

original: 7.021.006a eṣa nāmnā daśagrīvaḥ pitṛrāja niśācaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa nāmnā daśagrīvaḥ pitṛrāja niśācaraḥ

original: 7.021.006c upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramais tvāṃ sudurjayam
analyzed: upayāti vaśam netum vikramaiḥ tvām su durjayam

original: 7.021.007a etena kāraṇenāhaṃ tvarito 'smy āgataḥ prabho
analyzed: etena kāraṇena aham smi āgataḥ prabho

original: 7.021.007c daṇḍapraharaṇasyādya tava kiṃ nu kariṣyati
analyzed: daṇḍa praharaṇasya adya tava kim nu kariṣyati

original: 7.021.008a etasminn antare dūrād aṃśumantam ivoditam
analyzed: etasmin antare dūrāt aṃśumantam iva uditam

original: 7.021.008c dadṛśe divyam āyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: dadṛśe divyam āyāntam vimānam tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.021.009a taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tam deśam prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahā balaḥ

original: 7.021.009c kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvaṃ samīpaṃ samavartata
analyzed: kṛtvā vitimiram sarvam samīpam samavartata

original: 7.021.010a sa tv apaśyan mahābāhur daśagrīvas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: sa tu apaśyat mahā bāhuḥ daśagrīvaḥ tatas tatas

original: 7.021.010c prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃś caiva duṣkṛtam
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ su kṛtam karma bhuñjānān ca eva duṣkṛtam

original: 7.021.011a tatas tān vadhyamānāṃs tu karmabhir duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ
analyzed: tatas tān vadhyamānān tu karmabhiḥ duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ

original: 7.021.011c rāvaṇo mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balād balī
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balāt balī

original: 7.021.012a preteṣu mucyamāneṣu rākṣasena balīyasā
analyzed: preteṣu mucyamāneṣu rākṣasena balīyasā

original: 7.021.012c pretagopāḥ susaṃrabdhā rākṣasendram abhidravan
analyzed: pretagopāḥ su saṃrabdhāḥ rākṣasa indram abhidravan

original: 7.021.013a te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair mudgaraiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
analyzed: te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlaiḥ mudgaraiḥ śakti tomaraiḥ

original: 7.021.013c puṣpakaṃ samavarṣanta śūrāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: puṣpakam samavarṣanta śūrāḥ śata sahasraśas

original: 7.021.014a tasyāsanāni prāsādān vedikāstaraṇāni ca
analyzed: tasya āsanāni prāsādān vedikā āstaraṇāni ca

original: 7.021.014c puṣpakasya babhañjus te śīghraṃ madhukarā iva
analyzed: puṣpakasya babhañjuḥ te śīghram madhukarāḥ iva

original: 7.021.015a devaniṣṭhānabhūtaṃ tad vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: deva niṣṭhāna bhūtam tat vimānam puṣpakam mṛdhe

original: 7.021.015c bhajyamānaṃ tathaivāsīd akṣayaṃ brahmatejasā
analyzed: bhajyamānam tathā eva āsīt akṣayam brahma tejasā

original: 7.021.016a tatas te rāvaṇāmātyā yathākāmaṃ yathābalam
analyzed: tatas te rāvaṇa amātyāḥ yathākāmam yathābalam

original: 7.021.016c ayudhyanta mahāvīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ
analyzed: ayudhyanta mahā vīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ

original: 7.021.017a te tu śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ sarvaśastrasamāhatāḥ
analyzed: te tu śoṇita digdha aṅgāḥ sarva śastra samāhatāḥ

original: 7.021.017c amātyā rākṣasendrasya cakrur āyodhanaṃ mahat
analyzed: amātyāḥ rākṣasa indrasya cakruḥ āyodhanam mahat

original: 7.021.018a anyonyaṃ ca mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇair yudhi
analyzed: anyonyam ca mahābhāgāḥ jaghnuḥ praharaṇaiḥ yudhi

original: 7.021.018c yamasya ca mahat sainyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: yamasya ca mahat sainyam rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ

original: 7.021.019a amātyāṃs tāṃs tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: amātyān tān tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahā ojasaḥ

original: 7.021.019c tam eva samadhāvanta śūlavarṣair daśānanam
analyzed: tam eva samadhāvanta śūla varṣaiḥ daśānanam

original: 7.021.020a tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ prahārair jarjarīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas śoṇita digdha aṅgaḥ prahāraiḥ jarjarīkṛtaḥ

original: 7.021.020c vimāne rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ phullāśoka ivābabhau
analyzed: vimāne rākṣasa śreṣṭhaḥ phulla aśokaḥ iva ābabhau

original: 7.021.021a sa śūlāni gadāḥ prāsāñ śaktitomarasāyakān
analyzed: sa śūlāni gadāḥ prāsām śakti tomara sāyakān

original: 7.021.021c musalāni śilāvṛkṣān mumocāstrabalād balī
analyzed: musalāni śilā vṛkṣān mumoca astra balāt balī

original: 7.021.022a tāṃs tu sarvān samākṣipya tad astram apahatya ca
analyzed: tān tu sarvān samākṣipya tat astram apahatya ca

original: 7.021.022c jaghnus te rākṣasaṃ ghoram ekaṃ śatasahasrakaḥ
analyzed: jaghnuḥ te rākṣasam ghoram ekam śata sahasrakaḥ

original: 7.021.023a parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ meghotkarā iva
analyzed: parivārya ca tam sarve śailam megha utkarāḥ iva

original: 7.021.023c bhindipālaiś ca śūlaiś ca nirucchvāsam akārayan
analyzed: bhindipālaiḥ ca śūlaiḥ ca nirucchvāsam akārayan

original: 7.021.024a vimuktakavacaḥ kruddho siktaḥ śoṇitavisravaiḥ
analyzed: vimukta kavacaḥ kruddhaḥ siktaḥ śoṇita visravaiḥ

original: 7.021.024c sa puṣpakaṃ parityajya pṛthivyām avatiṣṭhata
analyzed: sa puṣpakam parityajya pṛthivyām avatiṣṭhata

original: 7.021.025a tataḥ sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyām rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.021.025c labdhasaṃjño muhūrtena kruddhas tasthau yathāntakaḥ
analyzed: labdha saṃjñaḥ muhūrtena kruddhaḥ tasthau yathā antakaḥ

original: 7.021.026a tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam astraṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
analyzed: tatas pāśupatam divyam astram saṃdhāya kārmuke

original: 7.021.026c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tān uktvā tac cāpaṃ vyapakarṣata
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti tān uktvā tat cāpam vyapakarṣata

original: 7.021.027a jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe
analyzed: jvālā mālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyāda anugataḥ raṇe

original: 7.021.027c mukto gulmān drumāṃś caiva bhasmakṛtvā pradhāvati
analyzed: muktaḥ gulmān drumān ca eva bhasma kṛtvā pradhāvati

original: 7.021.028a te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu
analyzed: te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyāḥ vaivasvatasya tu

original: 7.021.028c raṇe tasmin nipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva
analyzed: raṇe tasmin nipatitāḥ dāva dagdhāḥ nagāḥ iva

original: 7.021.029a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa sacivaiḥ sārdham rākṣasaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ

original: 7.021.029c nanāda sumahānādaṃ kampayann iva medinīm
analyzed: nanāda su mahā nādam kampayan iva medinīm

original: 7.022.001a sa tu tasya mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvato yamaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tasya mahā nādam śrutvā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ

original: 7.022.001c śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam
analyzed: śatrum vijayinam mene sva balasya ca saṃkṣayam

original: 7.022.002a sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodha paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.022.002c abravīt tvaritaṃ sūtaṃ rathaḥ samupanīyatām
analyzed: abravīt tvaritam sūtam rathaḥ samupanīyatām

original: 7.022.003a tasya sūto rathaṃ divyam upasthāpya mahāsvanam
analyzed: tasya sūtaḥ ratham divyam upasthāpya mahā svanam

original: 7.022.003c sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā āruroha mahāratham
analyzed: sthitaḥ sa ca mahā tejāḥ āruroha mahā ratham

original: 7.022.004a pāśamudgarahastaś ca mṛtyus tasyāgrato sthitaḥ
analyzed: pāśa mudgara hastaḥ ca mṛtyuḥ tasya agratas sthitaḥ

original: 7.022.004c yena saṃkṣipyate sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
analyzed: yena saṃkṣipyate sarvam trailokyam sa carācaram

original: 7.022.005a kāladaṇḍaś ca pārśvastho mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ
analyzed: kāladaṇḍaḥ ca pārśva sthaḥ mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ

original: 7.022.005c yamapraharaṇaṃ divyaṃ prajvalann iva tejasā
analyzed: yama praharaṇam divyam prajvalan iva tejasā

original: 7.022.006a tato lokās trayas trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas lokāḥ trayaḥ trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ

original: 7.022.006c kālaṃ kruddhaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā lokatrayabhayāvaham
analyzed: kālam kruddham tadā dṛṣṭvā lokatraya bhaya āvaham

original: 7.022.007a dṛṣṭvā tu te taṃ vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu te tam vikṛtam ratham mṛtyu samanvitam

original: 7.022.007c sacivā rākṣasendrasya sarvalokabhayāvaham
analyzed: sacivāḥ rākṣasa indrasya sarva loka bhaya āvaham

original: 7.022.008a laghusattvatayā sarve naṣṭasaṃjñā bhayārditāḥ
analyzed: laghu sattva tayā sarve naṣṭa saṃjñāḥ bhaya arditāḥ

original: 7.022.008c nātra yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ity uktvā vipradudruvuḥ
analyzed: na atra yoddhum samarthāḥ smaḥ iti uktvā vipradudruvuḥ

original: 7.022.009a sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham
analyzed: sa tu tam tādṛśam dṛṣṭvā ratham loka bhaya āvaham

original: 7.022.009c nākṣubhyata tadā rakṣo vyathā caivāsya nābhavat
analyzed: na akṣubhyata tadā rakṣaḥ vyathā ca eva asya na abhavat

original: 7.022.010a sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjañ śaktitomarān
analyzed: sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjam śakti tomarān

original: 7.022.010c yamo marmāṇi saṃkruddho rākṣasasya nyakṛntata
analyzed: yamaḥ marmāṇi saṃkruddhaḥ rākṣasasya nyakṛntata

original: 7.022.011a rāvaṇas tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śara varṣam mumoca ha

original: 7.022.011c tasmin vaivasvatarathe toyavarṣam ivāmbudaḥ
analyzed: tasmin vaivasvata rathe toya varṣam iva ambudaḥ

original: 7.022.012a tato mahāśaktiśataiḥ pātyamānair mahorasi
analyzed: tatas mahā śakti śataiḥ pātyamānaiḥ mahā urasi

original: 7.022.012c pratikartuṃ sa nāśaknod rākṣasaḥ śalyapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: pratikartum sa na aśaknot rākṣasaḥ śalya pīḍitaḥ

original: 7.022.013a nānāpraharaṇair evaṃ yamenāmitrakarśinā
analyzed: nānā praharaṇaiḥ evam yamena amitra karśinā

original: 7.022.013c saptarātraṃ kṛte saṃkhye na bhagno vijito 'pi vā
analyzed: sapta rātram kṛte saṃkhye na bhagnaḥ vijitaḥ vā

original: 7.022.014a tato 'bhavat punar yuddhaṃ yamarākṣasayos tadā
analyzed: tatas bhavat punar yuddham yama rākṣasayoḥ tadā

original: 7.022.014c vijayākāṅkṣiṇos tatra samareṣv anivartinoḥ
analyzed: vijaya ākāṅkṣiṇoḥ tatra samareṣu anivartinoḥ

original: 7.022.015a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.022.015c prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya dadṛśus tad raṇājiram
analyzed: prajāpatim puraskṛtya dadṛśuḥ tat raṇa ajiram

original: 7.022.016a saṃvarta iva lokānām abhavad yudhyatos tayoḥ
analyzed: saṃvartaḥ iva lokānām abhavat yudhyatoḥ tayoḥ

original: 7.022.016c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca
analyzed: rākṣasānām ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca

original: 7.022.017a rākṣasendras tataḥ kruddhaś cāpam āyamya saṃyuge
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ tatas kruddhaḥ cāpam āyamya saṃyuge

original: 7.022.017c nirantaram ivākāśaṃ kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha
analyzed: nirantaram iva ākāśam kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha

original: 7.022.018a mṛtyuṃ caturbhir viśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhir ardayat
analyzed: mṛtyum caturbhiḥ viśikhaiḥ sūtam saptabhiḥ ardayat

original: 7.022.018c yamaṃ śarasahasreṇa śīghraṃ marmasv atāḍayat
analyzed: yamam śara sahasreṇa śīghram marmasu atāḍayat

original: 7.022.019a tataḥ kruddhasya sahasā yamasyābhiviniḥsṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatas kruddhasya sahasā yamasya abhiviniḥsṛtaḥ

original: 7.022.019c jvālāmālo viniśvāso vadanāt krodhapāvakaḥ
7.022.020a tato 'paśyaṃs tadāścaryaṃ devadānavarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: paśyan tat āścaryam deva dānava rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.022.020c krodhajaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptaṃ didhakṣantaṃ ripor balam
analyzed: krodha jam pāvakam dīptam didhakṣantam ripoḥ balam

original: 7.022.021a mṛtyus tu paramakruddho vaivasvatam athābravīt
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ tu parama kruddhaḥ vaivasvatam atha abravīt

original: 7.022.021c muñca māṃ deva śīghraṃ tvaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
analyzed: muñca mām deva śīghram tvam nihanmi samare ripum

original: 7.022.022a narakaḥ śambaro vṛtraḥ śambhuḥ kārtasvaro balī
7.022.022c namucir virocanaś caiva tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
analyzed: namuciḥ virocanaḥ ca eva tau ubhau madhu kaiṭabhau

original: 7.022.023a ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ balavantaḥ durāsadāḥ

original: 7.022.023c vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintāsmin niśācare
analyzed: vinipannāḥ mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintā asmin niśācare

original: 7.022.024a muñca māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
analyzed: muñca mām sādhu dharma jña yāvat enam nihanmi aham

original: 7.022.024c na hi kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo muhūrtam api jīvati
analyzed: na hi kaḥ cit mayā dṛṣṭaḥ muhūrtam api jīvati

original: 7.022.025a balaṃ mama na khalv etan maryādaiṣā nisargataḥ
analyzed: balam mama na khalu etat maryādā eṣā nisargataḥ

original: 7.022.025c saṃspṛṣṭo hi mayā kaś cin na jīved iti niścayaḥ
analyzed: saṃspṛṣṭaḥ hi mayā kaḥ cit na jīvet iti niścayaḥ

original: 7.022.026a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān

original: 7.022.026c abravīt tatra taṃ mṛtyumayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
analyzed: abravīt tatra tam mṛtyum ayam enam nihanmi aham

original: 7.022.027a tataḥ saṃraktanayanaḥ kruddho vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃrakta nayanaḥ kruddhaḥ vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.022.027c kāladaṇḍam amoghaṃ taṃ tolayām āsa pāṇinā
analyzed: kāladaṇḍam amogham tam tolayām āsa pāṇinā

original: 7.022.028a yasya pārśveṣu niśchidrāḥ kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: yasya pārśveṣu niśchidrāḥ kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: 7.022.028c pāvakasparśasaṃkāśo mudgaro mūrtimān sthitaḥ
analyzed: pāvaka sparśa saṃkāśaḥ mudgaraḥ mūrtimān sthitaḥ

original: 7.022.029a darśanād eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati
analyzed: darśanāt eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati

original: 7.022.029c kiṃ punas tāḍanād vāpi pīḍanād vāpi dehinaḥ
analyzed: kim punar tāḍanāt vā api pīḍanāt vā api dehinaḥ

original: 7.022.030a sa jvālāparivāras tu pibann iva niśācaram
analyzed: sa jvālā parivāraḥ tu piban iva niśācaram

original: 7.022.030c karaspṛṣṭo balavatā daṇḍaḥ kruddhaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
analyzed: kara spṛṣṭaḥ balavatā daṇḍaḥ kruddhaḥ su dāruṇaḥ

original: 7.022.031a tato vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvās tasmād raṇājirāt
analyzed: tatas vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvāḥ tasmāt raṇa ajirāt

original: 7.022.031c surāś ca kṣubhitā dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍodyataṃ yamam
analyzed: surāḥ ca kṣubhitāḥ dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍa udyatam yamam

original: 7.022.032a tasmin prahartukāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam
analyzed: tasmin prahartu kāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam

original: 7.022.032c yamaṃ pitāmahaḥ sākṣād darśayitvedam abravīt
analyzed: yamam pitāmahaḥ sākṣāt darśayitvā idam abravīt

original: 7.022.033a vaivasvata mahābāho na khalv atulavikrama
analyzed: vaivasvata mahā bāho na khalu atula vikrama

original: 7.022.033c prahartavyaṃ tvayaitena daṇḍenāsmin niśācare
analyzed: prahartavyam tvayā etena daṇḍena asmin niśācare

original: 7.022.034a varaḥ khalu mayā dattas tasya tridaśapuṃgava
analyzed: varaḥ khalu mayā dattaḥ tasya tridaśa puṃgava

original: 7.022.034c tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tat tvayā na anṛtam kāryam yat mayā vyāhṛtam vacaḥ

original: 7.022.035a amogho hy eṣa sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ vinipātane
analyzed: amoghaḥ hi eṣa sarvāsām prajānām vinipātane

original: 7.022.035c kāladaṇḍo mayā sṛṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtyupuraskṛtaḥ
analyzed: kāladaṇḍaḥ mayā sṛṣṭaḥ pūrvam mṛtyu puraskṛtaḥ

original: 7.022.036a tan na khalv eṣa te saumya pātyo rākṣasamūrdhani
analyzed: tat na khalu eṣa te saumya pātyaḥ rākṣasa mūrdhani

original: 7.022.036c na hy asmin patite kaś cin muhūrtam api jīvati
analyzed: na hi asmin patite kaḥ cit muhūrtam api jīvati

original: 7.022.037a yadi hy asmin nipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: yadi hi asmin nipatite na mriyeta eṣa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.022.037c mriyeta vā daśagrīvas tathāpy ubhayato 'nṛtam
analyzed: mriyeta vā daśagrīvaḥ tathā api ubhayatas

original: 7.022.038a rākṣasendrān niyacchādya daṇḍam enaṃ vadhodyatam
analyzed: rākṣasa indrāt niyaccha adya daṇḍam enam vadha udyatam

original: 7.022.038c satyaṃ mama kuruṣvedaṃ lokāṃs tvaṃ samavekṣya ca
analyzed: satyam mama kuruṣva idam lokān tvam samavekṣya ca

original: 7.022.039a evam uktas tu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamas tadā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā pratyuvāca yamaḥ tadā

original: 7.022.039c eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇur bhavān hi naḥ
analyzed: eṣa vyāvartitaḥ daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ bhavān hi naḥ

original: 7.022.040a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi
analyzed: kim tu idānīm mayā śakyam kartum raṇa gatena hi

original: 7.022.040c yan mayā yan na hantavyo rākṣaso varadarpitaḥ
analyzed: yat mayā yat na hantavyaḥ rākṣasaḥ vara darpitaḥ

original: 7.022.041a eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanād asya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanāt asya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.022.041c ity uktvā sarathaḥ sāśvas tatraivāntaradhīyata
analyzed: iti uktvā sa rathaḥ sa aśvaḥ tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: 7.022.042a daśagrīvas tu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
analyzed: daśagrīvaḥ tu tam jitvā nāma viśrāvya ca ātmanaḥ

original: 7.022.042c puṣpakeṇa tu saṃhṛṣṭo niṣkrānto yamasādanāt
analyzed: puṣpakeṇa tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ niṣkrāntaḥ yama sādanāt

original: 7.022.043a tato vaivasvato devaiḥ saha brahmapurogamaiḥ
analyzed: tatas vaivasvataḥ devaiḥ saha brahma purogamaiḥ

original: 7.022.043c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: jagāma tridivam hṛṣṭaḥ nāradaḥ ca mahā muniḥ

original: 7.023.001a sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam
analyzed: sa tu jitvā daśagrīvaḥ yamam tridaśa puṃgavam

original: 7.023.001c rāvaṇas tu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu jaya ślāghī sva sahāyān dadarśa ha

original: 7.023.002a jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīcapramukhās tataḥ
analyzed: jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīca pramukhāḥ tatas

original: 7.023.002c puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā ravaṇena ha
analyzed: puṣpakam bhejire sarve sāntvitāḥ ravaṇena ha

original: 7.023.003a tato rasātalaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payaso nidhim
analyzed: tatas rasātalam hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payasaḥ nidhim

original: 7.023.003c daityoraga gaṇādhyuṣṭaṃ varuṇena surakṣitam
analyzed: daitya uraga gaṇa adhyuṣṭam varuṇena su rakṣitam

original: 7.023.004a sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām
analyzed: sa tu bhogavatīm gatvā purīm vāsuki pālitām

original: 7.023.004c sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīṃ purīm
analyzed: sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīm purīm

original: 7.023.005a nivātakavacās tatra daityā labdhavarā vasan
analyzed: nivāta kavacāḥ tatra daityāḥ labdha varāḥ vasan

original: 7.023.005c rākṣasas tān samāsādya yuddhena samupāhvayat
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ tān samāsādya yuddhena samupāhvayat

original: 7.023.006a te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ
analyzed: te tu sarve su vikrāntāḥ daiteyāḥ bala śālinaḥ

original: 7.023.006c nānāpraharaṇās tatra prayuddhā yuddhadurmadāḥ
analyzed: nānā praharaṇāḥ tatra prayuddhāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ

original: 7.023.007a teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu yudhyamānānām sāgraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ gataḥ

original: 7.023.007c na cānyatarayos tatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā
analyzed: na ca anyatarayoḥ tatra vijayaḥ vā vā

original: 7.023.008a tataḥ pitāmahas tatra trailokyagatir avyayaḥ
analyzed: tatas pitāmahaḥ tatra trailokya gatiḥ avyayaḥ

original: 7.023.008c ājagāma drutaṃ devo vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
analyzed: ājagāma drutam devaḥ vimāna varam āsthitaḥ

original: 7.023.009a nivātakavacānāṃ tu nivārya raṇakarma tat
analyzed: nivāta kavacānām tu nivārya raṇa karma tat

original: 7.023.009c vṛddhaḥ pitāmaho vākyam uvāca viditārthavat
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ vākyam uvāca vidita artha vat

original: 7.023.010a na hy ayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: na hi ayam rāvaṇaḥ yuddhe śakyaḥ jetum sura asuraiḥ

original: 7.023.010c na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ śakyāḥ sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: na bhavantaḥ kṣayam netum śakyāḥ sa indraiḥ sura asuraiḥ

original: 7.023.011a rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate
analyzed: rākṣasasya sakhi tvam vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate

original: 7.023.011c avibhaktā hi sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: avibhaktāḥ hi sarva arthāḥ suhṛdām na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.023.012a tato 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakhyaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas gni sākṣikam sakhyam kṛtavān tatra rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.023.012c nivātakavacaiḥ sārdhaṃ prītimān abhavat tadā
analyzed: nivāta kavacaiḥ sārdham prītimān abhavat tadā

original: 7.023.013a arcitas tair yathānyāyaṃ saṃvatsarasukhoṣitaḥ
analyzed: arcitaḥ taiḥ yathānyāyam saṃvatsara sukha uṣitaḥ

original: 7.023.013c svapurān nirviśeṣaṃ ca pūjāṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ
analyzed: sva purāt nirviśeṣam ca pūjām prāptaḥ daśānanaḥ

original: 7.023.014a sa tūpadhārya māyānāṃ śatam ekonam ātmavān
analyzed: sa tu upadhārya māyānām śatam eka ūnam ātmavān

original: 7.023.014c salilendrapurānveṣī sa babhrāma rasātalam
analyzed: salila indra pura anveṣī sa babhrāma rasātalam

original: 7.023.015a tato 'śmanagaraṃ nāma kālakeyābhirakṣitam
analyzed: tatas śmanagaram nāma kālakeya abhirakṣitam

original: 7.023.015c taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃś catuḥśatam
analyzed: tam vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityān catuḥśatam

original: 7.023.016a tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsam iva saṃsthitam
analyzed: tatas pāṇḍura megha ābham kailāsam iva saṃsthitam

original: 7.023.016c varuṇasyālayaṃ divyam apaśyad rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: varuṇasya ālayam divyam apaśyat rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.023.017a kṣarantīṃ ca payo nityaṃ surabhiṃ gām avasthitām
analyzed: kṣarantīm ca payaḥ nityam surabhim gām avasthitām

original: 7.023.017c yasyāḥ payoviniṣyandāt kṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ
analyzed: yasyāḥ payaḥ viniṣyandāt kṣīrodaḥ nāma sāgaraḥ

original: 7.023.018a yasmāc candraḥ prabhavati śītaraśmiḥ prajāhitaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt candraḥ prabhavati śīta raśmiḥ prajā hitaḥ

original: 7.023.018c yaṃ samāsādya jīvanti phenapāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: yam samāsādya jīvanti phenapāḥ parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.023.018e amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ surā cāpi surāśinām
analyzed: amṛtam yatra ca utpannam surā ca api surā āśinām

original: 7.023.019a yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: yām bruvanti narāḥ loke surabhim nāma nāmataḥ

original: 7.023.019c pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam tu tām kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ parama adbhutām

original: 7.023.019e praviveśa mahāghoraṃ guptaṃ bahuvidhair balaiḥ
analyzed: praviveśa mahā ghoram guptam bahuvidhaiḥ balaiḥ

original: 7.023.020a tato dhārāśatākīrṇaṃ śāradābhranibhaṃ tadā
analyzed: tatas dhārā śata ākīrṇam śārada abhra nibham tadā

original: 7.023.020c nityaprahṛṣṭaṃ dadṛśe varuṇasya gṛhottamam
analyzed: nitya prahṛṣṭam dadṛśe varuṇasya gṛha uttamam

original: 7.023.021a tato hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiś ca tāḍitaḥ
analyzed: tatas hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiḥ ca tāḍitaḥ

original: 7.023.021c abravīt kva gato yo vo rājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām
analyzed: abravīt kva gataḥ yaḥ vaḥ rājā śīghram nivedyatām

original: 7.023.022a yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptas tasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām
analyzed: yuddha arthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ tasya yuddham pradīyatām

original: 7.023.022c vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ
analyzed: vada vā na bhayam te sti nirjitaḥ smi iti sa añjaliḥ

original: 7.023.023a etasminn antare kruddhā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare kruddhāḥ varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.023.023c putrāḥ pautrāś ca niṣkrāman gauś ca puṣkara eva ca
analyzed: putrāḥ pautrāḥ ca niṣkrāman gauḥ ca puṣkare eva ca

original: 7.023.024a te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ
analyzed: te tu vīrya guṇa upetāḥ balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ

original: 7.023.024c yuktvā rathān kāmagamān udyadbhāskaravarcasaḥ
analyzed: yuktvā rathān kāma gamān udyat bhāskara varcasaḥ

original: 7.023.025a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas yuddham samabhavat dāruṇam loma harṣaṇam

original: 7.023.025c salilendrasya putrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: salilendrasya putrāṇām rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.023.026a amātyais tu mahāvīryair daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: amātyaiḥ tu mahā vīryaiḥ daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.023.026c vāruṇaṃ tad balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam
analyzed: vāruṇam tat balam kṛtsnam kṣaṇena vinipātitam

original: 7.023.027a samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṃkhye varuṇasyā sutās tadā
analyzed: samīkṣya sva balam saṃkhye varuṇasya ā sutāḥ tadā

original: 7.023.027c arditāḥ śarajālena nivṛttā raṇakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: arditāḥ śara jālena nivṛttāḥ raṇa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.023.028a mahītalagatās te tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake
analyzed: mahī tala gatāḥ te tu rāvaṇam dṛśya puṣpake

original: 7.023.028c ākāśam āśu viviśuḥ syandanaiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥ
analyzed: ākāśam āśu viviśuḥ syandanaiḥ śīghra gāmibhiḥ

original: 7.023.029a mahad āsīt tatas teṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānam avāpya tat
analyzed: mahat āsīt tatas teṣām tulyam sthānam avāpya tat

original: 7.023.029c ākāśayuddhaṃ tumulaṃ devadānavayor iva
analyzed: ākāśa yuddham tumulam deva dānavayoḥ iva

original: 7.023.030a tatas te rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasaṃnibhaiḥ
analyzed: tatas te rāvaṇam yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvaka saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 7.023.030c vimukhīkṛtya saṃhṛṣṭā vinedur vividhān ravān
analyzed: vimukhīkṛtya saṃhṛṣṭāḥ vineduḥ vividhān ravān

original: 7.023.031a tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam
analyzed: tatas mahodaraḥ kruddhaḥ rājānam dṛśya dharṣitam

original: 7.023.031c tyaktvā mṛtyubhayaṃ vīro yuddhakāṅkṣī vyalokayat
analyzed: tyaktvā mṛtyu bhayam vīraḥ yuddha kāṅkṣī vyalokayat

original: 7.023.032a tena teṣāṃ hayā ye ca kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ
analyzed: tena teṣām hayāḥ ye ca kāmagāḥ pavana upamāḥ

original: 7.023.032c mahodareṇa gadayā hatās te prayayuḥ kṣitim
analyzed: mahodareṇa gadayā hatāḥ te prayayuḥ kṣitim

original: 7.023.033a teṣāṃ varuṇasūnūnāṃ hatvā yodhān hayāṃś ca tān
analyzed: teṣām varuṇa sūnūnām hatvā yodhān hayān ca tān

original: 7.023.033c mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān
analyzed: mumoca āśu mahā nādam virathān prekṣya tān sthitān

original: 7.023.034a te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhir varaiḥ
analyzed: te tu teṣām rathāḥ sa aśvāḥ saha sārathibhiḥ varaiḥ

original: 7.023.034c mahodareṇa nihatāḥ patitāḥ pṛthivītale
analyzed: mahodareṇa nihatāḥ patitāḥ pṛthivī tale

original: 7.023.035a te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: te tu tyaktvā rathān putrāḥ varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.023.035c ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvān na vivyathuḥ
analyzed: ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ sva prabhāvāt na vivyathuḥ

original: 7.023.036a dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajyāni vinirbhidya mahodaram
analyzed: dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajyāni vinirbhidya mahodaram

original: 7.023.036c rāvaṇaṃ samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan
analyzed: rāvaṇam samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan

original: 7.023.037a tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ daśagrīvaḥ kālāgniḥ iva viṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.023.037c śaravarṣaṃ mahāvegaṃ teṣāṃ marmasv apātayat
analyzed: śara varṣam mahā vegam teṣām marmasu apātayat

original: 7.023.038a musalāni vicitrāṇi tato bhallaśatāni ca
analyzed: musalāni vicitrāṇi tatas bhalla śatāni ca

original: 7.023.038c paṭṭasāṃś caiva śaktīś ca śataghnīs tomarāṃs tathā
analyzed: paṭṭasān ca eva śaktīḥ ca śataghnīḥ tomarān tathā

original: 7.023.038e pātayām āsa durdharṣas teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: pātayām āsa durdharṣaḥ teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.023.039a atha viddhās tu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ
analyzed: atha viddhāḥ tu te vīrāḥ viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ

original: 7.023.040a tato rakṣo mahānādaṃ muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān
analyzed: tatas rakṣaḥ mahā nādam muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān

original: 7.023.040c nānāpraharaṇair ghorair dhārāpātair ivāmbudaḥ
analyzed: nānā praharaṇaiḥ ghoraiḥ dhārā pātaiḥ iva ambudaḥ

original: 7.023.041a tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale
analyzed: tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitāḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 7.023.041c raṇāt svapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇy eva praveśitāḥ
analyzed: raṇāt sva puruṣaiḥ śīghram gṛhāṇi eva praveśitāḥ

original: 7.023.042a tān abravīt tato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām
analyzed: tān abravīt tatas rakṣaḥ varuṇāya nivedyatām

original: 7.023.042c rāvaṇaṃ cābravīn mantrī prabhāso nāma vāruṇaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam ca abravīt mantrī prabhāsaḥ nāma vāruṇaḥ

original: 7.023.043a gataḥ khalu mahātejā brahmalokaṃ jaleśvaraḥ
analyzed: gataḥ khalu mahā tejāḥ brahma lokam jaleśvaraḥ

original: 7.023.043c gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvam āhvayase yudhi
analyzed: gāndharvam varuṇaḥ śrotum yam tvam āhvayase yudhi

original: 7.023.044a tat kiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe
analyzed: tat kim tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe

original: 7.023.044c ye tu saṃnihitā vīrāḥ kumārās te parājitāḥ
analyzed: ye tu saṃnihitāḥ vīrāḥ kumārāḥ te parājitāḥ

original: 7.023.045a rākṣasendras tu tac chrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ tu tat śrutvā nāma viśrāvya ca ātmanaḥ

original: 7.023.045c harṣān nādaṃ vimuñcan vai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt
analyzed: harṣāt nādam vimuñcan vai niṣkrāntaḥ varuṇa ālayāt

original: 7.023.046a āgatas tu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ
analyzed: āgataḥ tu pathā yena tena eva vinivṛtya saḥ

original: 7.023.046c laṅkām abhimukho rakṣo nabhastalagato yayau
analyzed: laṅkām abhimukhaḥ rakṣaḥ nabhaḥ tala gataḥ yayau

original: 7.024.001a nivartamānaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇaḥ sa durātmavān
analyzed: nivartamānaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaḥ rāvaṇaḥ sa durātmavān

original: 7.024.001c jahre pathi narendrarṣidevagandharvakanyakāḥ
analyzed: jahre pathi narendra ṛṣi deva gandharva kanyakāḥ

original: 7.024.002a darśanīyāṃ hi yāṃ rakṣaḥ kanyāṃ strīṃ vātha paśyati
analyzed: darśanīyām hi yām rakṣaḥ kanyām strīm vā atha paśyati

original: 7.024.002c hatvā bandhujanaṃ tasyā vimāne saṃnyaveśayat
analyzed: hatvā bandhu janam tasyāḥ vimāne saṃnyaveśayat

original: 7.024.003a tatra pannagayakṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām
analyzed: tatra pannaga yakṣāṇām mānuṣāṇām ca rakṣasām

original: 7.024.003c daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca kanyā jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: daityānām dānavānām ca kanyāḥ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.024.004a dīrghakeśyaḥ sucārvaṅgyaḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ
analyzed: dīrgha keśyaḥ su cāru aṅgyaḥ pūrṇa candra nibha ānanāḥ

original: 7.024.004c śokāyattās taruṇyaś ca samastā stananamritāḥ
analyzed: śoka āyattāḥ taruṇyaḥ ca samastāḥ stana namritāḥ

original: 7.024.005a tulyam agnyarciṣāṃ tatra śokāgnibhayasaṃbhavam
analyzed: tulyam agni arciṣām tatra śoka agni bhaya saṃbhavam

original: 7.024.005c pravepamānā duḥkhārtā mumucur bāṣpajaṃ jalam
analyzed: pravepamānāḥ duḥkha ārtāḥ mumucuḥ bāṣpa jam jalam

original: 7.024.006a tāsāṃ niśvasamānānāṃ niśvasaiḥ saṃpradīpitam
analyzed: tāsām niśvasamānānām niśvasaiḥ saṃpradīpitam

original: 7.024.006c agnihotram ivābhāti saṃniruddhāgnipuṣpakam
analyzed: agni hotram iva ābhāti saṃniruddha agni puṣpakam

original: 7.024.007a kā cid dadhyau suduḥkhārtā hanyād api hi mām ayam
analyzed: kā cit dadhyau su duḥkha ārtā hanyāt api hi mām ayam

original: 7.024.007c smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api
analyzed: smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api

original: 7.024.007e duḥkhaśokasamāviṣṭā vilepuḥ sahitāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: duḥkha śoka samāviṣṭāḥ vilepuḥ sahitāḥ striyaḥ

original: 7.024.008a kathaṃ nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā
analyzed: katham nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā

original: 7.024.008c kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
analyzed: katham mātā katham bhrātā nimagnāḥ śoka sāgare

original: 7.024.009a hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartāraṃ daivataṃ vinā
analyzed: hā katham nu kariṣyāmi bhartāram daivatam vinā

original: 7.024.009c mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvāṃ naya māṃ yamasādanam
analyzed: mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvām naya mām yama sādanam

original: 7.024.010a kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ dehāntare purā
analyzed: kim nu me duṣkṛtam karma kṛtam deha antare purā

original: 7.024.010c tato 'smi dharṣitānena patitā śokasāgare
analyzed: tatas smi dharṣitā anena patitā śoka sāgare

original: 7.024.011a na khalv idānīṃ paśyāmi duḥkhasyāntam ihātmanaḥ
analyzed: na khalu idānīm paśyāmi duḥkhasya antam iha ātmanaḥ

original: 7.024.011c aho dhin mānuṣāṃl lokān nāsti khalv adhamaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: aho dhik mānuṣān lokān na asti khalu adhamaḥ paraḥ

original: 7.024.012a yad durbalā balavatā bāndhavā rāvaṇena me
analyzed: yat durbalāḥ balavatā bāndhavāḥ rāvaṇena me

original: 7.024.012c uditenaiva sūryeṇa tārakā iva nāśitāḥ
analyzed: uditena eva sūryeṇa tārakāḥ iva nāśitāḥ

original: 7.024.013a aho subalavad rakṣo vadhopāyeṣu rajyate
analyzed: aho su balavat rakṣaḥ vadha upāyeṣu rajyate

original: 7.024.013c aho durvṛttam ātmānaṃ svayam eva na budhyate
analyzed: aho durvṛttam ātmānam svayam eva na budhyate

original: 7.024.014a sarvathā sadṛśas tāvad vikramo 'sya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā sadṛśaḥ tāvat vikramaḥ sya durātmanaḥ

original: 7.024.014c idaṃ tv asadṛśaṃ karma paradārābhimarśanam
analyzed: idam tu a sadṛśam karma para dāra abhimarśanam

original: 7.024.015a yasmād eṣa parakhyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ
analyzed: yasmāt eṣa para khyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ

original: 7.024.015c tasmād dhi strīkṛtenaiva vadhaṃ prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt hi strī kṛtena eva vadham prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ

original: 7.024.016a śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hatatejāḥ suniṣprabha
analyzed: śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hata tejāḥ su niṣprabha

original: 7.024.016c pativratābhiḥ sādhvībhiḥ sthitābhiḥ sādhu vartmani
analyzed: pativratābhiḥ sādhvībhiḥ sthitābhiḥ sādhu vartmani

original: 7.024.017a evaṃ vilapamānāsu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: evam vilapamānāsu rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.024.017c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ
analyzed: praviveśa purīm laṅkām pūjyamānaḥ niśācaraiḥ

original: 7.024.018a tato rākṣasarājasya svasā paramaduḥkhitā
analyzed: tatas rākṣasa rājasya svasā parama duḥkhitā

original: 7.024.018c pādayoḥ patitā tasya vaktum evopacakrame
analyzed: pādayoḥ patitā tasya vaktum eva upacakrame

original: 7.024.019a tataḥ svasāram utthāpya rāvaṇaḥ parisāntvayan
analyzed: tatas svasāram utthāpya rāvaṇaḥ parisāntvayan

original: 7.024.019c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam
analyzed: abravīt kim idam bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam

original: 7.024.020a sā bāṣpapariruddhākṣī rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: sā bāṣpa pariruddha akṣī rākṣasī vākyam abravīt

original: 7.024.020c hatāsmi vidhavā rājaṃs tvayā balavatā kṛtā
analyzed: hatā asmi vidhavā rājan tvayā balavatā kṛtā

original: 7.024.021a ete viryāt tvayā rājan daityā vinihatā raṇe
analyzed: ete tvayā rājan daityāḥ vinihatāḥ raṇe

original: 7.024.021c kālakeyā iti khyātā mahābalaparākramāḥ
analyzed: kālakeyāḥ iti khyātāḥ mahā bala parākramāḥ

original: 7.024.022a tatra me nihato bhartā garīyāñ jīvitād api
analyzed: tatra me nihataḥ bhartā garīyām jīvitāt api

original: 7.024.022c sa tvayā dayitas tatra bhrātrā śatrusamena vai
analyzed: sa tvayā dayitaḥ tatra bhrātrā śatru samena vai

original: 7.024.023a yā tvayāsmi hatā rājan svayam eveha bandhunā
analyzed: yā tvayā asmi hatā rājan svayam evā iha bandhunā

original: 7.024.023c duḥkhaṃ vaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca dattaṃ bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
analyzed: duḥkham vaidhavya śabdam ca dattam bhokṣyāmi aham tvayā

original: 7.024.024a nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣv api
analyzed: nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyaḥ jāmātā samareṣu api

original: 7.024.024c taṃ nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase
analyzed: tam nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase

original: 7.024.025a evam uktas tayā rakṣo bhaginyā krośamānayā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tayā rakṣaḥ bhaginyā krośamānayā

original: 7.024.025c abravīt sāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: abravīt sāntvayitvā tām sāma pūrvam idam vacaḥ

original: 7.024.026a alaṃ vatse viṣādena na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: alam vatse viṣādena na bhetavyam ca sarvaśas

original: 7.024.026c mānadānaviśeṣais tvāṃ toṣayiṣyāmi nityaśaḥ
analyzed: māna dāna viśeṣaiḥ tvām toṣayiṣyāmi nityaśas

original: 7.024.027a yuddhe pramatto vyākṣipto jayakāṅkṣī kṣipañ śarān
analyzed: yuddhe pramattaḥ vyākṣiptaḥ jaya kāṅkṣī kṣipam śarān

original: 7.024.027c nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vāpy ahaṃ śubhe
analyzed: na avagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vā api aham śubhe

original: 7.024.027e tenāsau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ
analyzed: tena asau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ

original: 7.024.028a asmin kāle tu yat prāptaṃ tat kariṣyāmi te hitam
analyzed: asmin kāle tu yat prāptam tat kariṣyāmi te hitam

original: 7.024.028c bhrātur aiśvaryasaṃsthasya kharasya bhava pārśvataḥ
analyzed: bhrātuḥ aiśvarya saṃsthasya kharasya bhava pārśvatas

original: 7.024.029a caturdaśānāṃ bhrātā te sahasrāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: caturdaśānām bhrātā te sahasrāṇām bhaviṣyati

original: 7.024.029c prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahaujasām
analyzed: prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānām mahā ojasām

original: 7.024.030a tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putro bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putraḥ bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.024.030c bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yad vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam
analyzed: bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yat vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam

original: 7.024.031a śīghraṃ gacchatv ayaṃ śūro daṇḍakān parirakṣitum
analyzed: śīghram gacchatu ayam śūraḥ daṇḍakān parirakṣitum

original: 7.024.031c dūṣaṇo 'sya balādhyakṣo bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ
analyzed: dūṣaṇaḥ sya balādhyakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati mahā balaḥ

original: 7.024.032a sa hi śapto vanoddeśaḥ kruddhenośanasā purā
analyzed: sa hi śaptaḥ vana uddeśaḥ kruddhena uśanasā purā

original: 7.024.032c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasānām ayam vāsaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.024.033a evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyaṃ tasyādideśa ha
analyzed: evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyam tasya ādideśa ha

original: 7.024.033c caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām
analyzed: caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasām kāmarūpiṇām

original: 7.024.034a sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto rākṣasair ghoradarśanaiḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ rākṣasaiḥ ghora darśanaiḥ

original: 7.024.034c kharaḥ saṃprayayau śīghraṃ daṇḍakān akutobhayaḥ
analyzed: kharaḥ saṃprayayau śīghram daṇḍakān akutobhayaḥ

original: 7.024.035a sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
analyzed: sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyam nihata kaṇṭakam

original: 7.024.035c sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasad daṇḍakāvane
analyzed: sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasat daṇḍaka vane

original: 7.025.001a sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ kharasya tat
analyzed: sa tu dattvā daśagrīvaḥ vanam ghoram kharasya tat

original: 7.025.001c bhaginīṃ ca samāśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ svasthataro 'bhavat
analyzed: bhaginīm ca samāśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ svasthataraḥ bhavat

original: 7.025.002a tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatas nikumbhilāḥ nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanam mahat

original: 7.025.002c mahātmā rākṣasendras tat praviveśa sahānugaḥ
analyzed: mahātmā rākṣasa indraḥ tat praviveśa saha anugaḥ

original: 7.025.003a tatra yūpaśatākīrṇaṃ saumyacaityopaśobhitam
analyzed: tatra yūpa śata ākīrṇam saumya caitya upaśobhitam

original: 7.025.003c dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ saṃpradīptam iva śriyā
analyzed: dadarśa viṣṭhitam yajñam saṃpradīptam iva śriyā

original: 7.025.004a tataḥ kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ kamaṇḍaluśikhādhvajam
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇa ajina dharam kamaṇḍalu śikhā dhvajam

original: 7.025.004c dadarśa svasutaṃ tatra meghanādam ariṃdamam
analyzed: dadarśa sva sutam tatra meghanādam ariṃdamam

original: 7.025.005a rakṣaḥpatiḥ samāsādya samāśliṣya ca bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: rakṣaḥ patiḥ samāsādya samāśliṣya ca bāhubhiḥ

original: 7.025.005c abravīt kim idaṃ vatsa vartate tad bravīhi me
analyzed: abravīt kim idam vatsa vartate tat bravīhi me

original: 7.025.006a uśanā tv abravīt tatra gurur yajñasamṛddhaye
analyzed: uśanāḥ tu abravīt tatra guruḥ yajña samṛddhaye

original: 7.025.006c rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam rākṣasa śreṣṭham dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.025.007a aham ākhyāmi te rājañ śrūyatāṃ sarvam eva ca
analyzed: aham ākhyāmi te rājam śrūyatām sarvam eva ca

original: 7.025.007c yajñās te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ subahuvistarāḥ
analyzed: yajñāḥ te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ su bahu vistarāḥ

original: 7.025.008a agniṣṭomo 'śvamedhaś ca yajño bahusuvarṇakaḥ
analyzed: agniṣṭomaḥ śvamedhaḥ ca yajñaḥ bahu suvarṇakaḥ

original: 7.025.008c rājasūyas tathā yajño gomedho vaiṣṇavas tathā
analyzed: rājasūyaḥ tathā yajñaḥ gomedhaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ tathā

original: 7.025.009a māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe
analyzed: māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ su durlabhe

original: 7.025.009c varāṃs te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupater iha
analyzed: varān te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupateḥ iha

original: 7.025.010a kāmagaṃ syandanaṃ divyam antarikṣacaraṃ dhruvam
analyzed: kāma gam syandanam divyam antarikṣa caram dhruvam

original: 7.025.010c māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ
analyzed: māyām ca tāmasīm nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ

original: 7.025.011a etayā kila saṃgrāme māyayā rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: etayā kila saṃgrāme māyayā rākṣasa īśvara

original: 7.025.011c prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātum sura asuraiḥ

original: 7.025.012a akṣayāv iṣudhī bāṇaiś cāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam
analyzed: akṣayau iṣudhī bāṇaiḥ cāpam ca api su durjayam

original: 7.025.012c astraṃ ca balavat saumya śatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe
analyzed: astram ca balavat saumya śatru vidhvaṃsanam raṇe

original: 7.025.013a etān sarvān varāṃl labdhvā putras te 'yaṃ daśānana
analyzed: etān sarvān varān labdhvā putraḥ te yam daśānana

original: 7.025.013c adya yajñasamāptau ca tvatpratīkṣaḥ sthito aham
analyzed: adya yajña samāptau ca tvad pratīkṣaḥ sthitaḥ aham

original: 7.025.014a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvo na śobhanam idaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: tatas bravīt daśagrīvaḥ na śobhanam idam kṛtam

original: 7.025.014c pūjitāḥ śatravo yasmād dravyair indrapurogamāḥ
analyzed: pūjitāḥ śatravaḥ yasmāt dravyaiḥ indra purogamāḥ

original: 7.025.015a ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ yad dhi tad akartuṃ na śakyate
analyzed: ehi idānīm kṛtam yat hi tat a kartum na śakyate

original: 7.025.015c āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanaṃ prati
analyzed: āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanam prati

original: 7.025.016a tato gatvā daśagrīvaḥ saputraḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas gatvā daśagrīvaḥ sa putraḥ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.025.016c striyo 'vatārayām āsa sarvās tā bāṣpaviklavāḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ vatārayām āsa sarvāḥ tāḥ bāṣpa viklavāḥ

original: 7.025.017a lakṣiṇyo ratnabūtāś ca devadānavarakṣasām
analyzed: lakṣiṇyaḥ ratna būtāḥ ca deva dānava rakṣasām

original: 7.025.017c nānābhūṣaṇasaṃpannā jvalantyaḥ svena tejasā
analyzed: nānā bhūṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ jvalantyaḥ svena tejasā

original: 7.025.018a vibhīṣaṇas tu tā nārīr dṛṣṭvā śokasamākulāḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu tāḥ nārīḥ dṛṣṭvā śoka samākulāḥ

original: 7.025.018c tasya tāṃ ca matiṃ jñātvā dharmātmā vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tasya tām ca matim jñātvā dharma ātmā vākyam abravīt

original: 7.025.019a īdṛśais taiḥ samācārair yaśo'rthakulanāśanaiḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaiḥ taiḥ samācāraiḥ yaśaḥ ṛtha kula nāśanaiḥ

original: 7.025.019c dharṣaṇaṃ prāṇināṃ dattvā svamatena viceṣṭase
analyzed: dharṣaṇam prāṇinām dattvā sva matena viceṣṭase

original: 7.025.020a jñātīn vai dharṣayitvemās tvayānītā varāṅganāḥ
analyzed: jñātīn vai dharṣayitvā imāḥ tvayā ānītāḥ vara aṅganāḥ

original: 7.025.020c tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā
analyzed: tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā

original: 7.025.021a rāvaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tv idam
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu abravīt vākyam na avagacchāmi kim tu idam

original: 7.025.021c ko vāyaṃ yas tvayākhyāto madhur ity eva nāmataḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vā ayam yaḥ tvayā ākhyātaḥ madhuḥ iti eva nāmataḥ

original: 7.025.022a vibhīṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ bhrātaram vākyam abravīt

original: 7.025.022c śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam
analyzed: śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam

original: 7.025.023a mātāmahasya yo 'smākaṃ jyeṣṭho bhrātā sumālinaḥ
analyzed: mātāmahasya yaḥ smākam jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā sumālinaḥ

original: 7.025.023c mālyavān iti vikhyāto vṛddhaprājño niśācaraḥ
analyzed: mālyavān iti vikhyātaḥ vṛddha prājñaḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.025.024a pitur jyeṣṭho jananyāś ca asmākaṃ tv āryako 'bhavat
analyzed: pituḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ jananyāḥ ca asmākam tu āryakaḥ bhavat

original: 7.025.024c tasya kumbhīnasī nāma duhitur duhitābhavat
analyzed: tasya kumbhīnasī nāma duhituḥ duhitā bhavat

original: 7.025.025a mātṛṣvasur athāsmākaṃ sā kanyā cānalodbhavā
analyzed: mātṛṣvasuḥ atha asmākam sā kanyā ca anala udbhavā

original: 7.025.025c bhavaty asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā
analyzed: bhavati asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇām dharmataḥ svasā

original: 7.025.026a sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā
analyzed: sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā

original: 7.025.026c yajñapravṛtte putre te mayi cāntarjaloṣite
analyzed: yajña pravṛtte putre te mayi ca antar jala uṣite

original: 7.025.027a nihatya rākṣasaśreṣṭhān amātyāṃs tava saṃmatān
analyzed: nihatya rākṣasa śreṣṭhān amātyān tava saṃmatān

original: 7.025.027c dharṣayitvā hṛtā rājan guptā hy antaḥpure tava
analyzed: dharṣayitvā hṛtāḥ rājan guptāḥ hi antaḥpure tava

original: 7.025.028a śrutvā tv etan mahārāja kṣāntam eva hato na saḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu etat mahā rāja kṣāntam eva hataḥ na saḥ

original: 7.025.028c yasmād avaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ
analyzed: yasmāt avaśyam dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ

original: 7.025.028e asminn evābhisaṃprāptaṃ loke viditam astu te
analyzed: asmin eva abhisaṃprāptam loke viditam astu te

original: 7.025.029a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: tatas bravīt daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 7.025.029c kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca
analyzed: kalpyatām me rathaḥ śīghram śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca

original: 7.025.030a bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaś ca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ
analyzed: bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaḥ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ niśācarāḥ

original: 7.025.030c vāhanāny adhirohantu nānāpraharaṇāyudhāḥ
analyzed: vāhanāni adhirohantu nānā praharaṇa āyudhāḥ

original: 7.025.031a adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam
analyzed: adya tam samare hatvā madhum rāvaṇa nirbhayam

original: 7.025.031c indralokaṃ gamiṣyāmi yuddhakāṅkṣī suhṛdvṛtaḥ
analyzed: indra lokam gamiṣyāmi yuddha kāṅkṣī suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: 7.025.032a tato vijitya tridivaṃ vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram
analyzed: tatas vijitya tridivam vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram

original: 7.025.032c nirvṛto vihariṣyāmi trailokyaiśvaryaśobhitaḥ
analyzed: nirvṛtaḥ vihariṣyāmi trailokya aiśvarya śobhitaḥ

original: 7.025.033a akṣauhiṇīsahasrāṇi catvāry ugrāṇi rakṣasām
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī sahasrāṇi catvāri ugrāṇi rakṣasām

original: 7.025.033c nānāpraharaṇāny āśu niryayur yuddhakāṅkṣiṇām
analyzed: nānā praharaṇāni āśu niryayuḥ yuddha kāṅkṣiṇām

original: 7.025.034a indrajit tv agrataḥ sainyaṃ sainikān parigṛhya ca
analyzed: indrajit tu agratas sainyam sainikān parigṛhya ca

original: 7.025.034c rāvaṇo madhyataḥ śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ madhyatas śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ca pṛṣṭhatas

original: 7.025.035a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmam ācarat
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā laṅkāyām dharmam ācarat

original: 7.025.035c te tu sarve mahābhāgā yayur madhupuraṃ prati
analyzed: te tu sarve mahābhāgāḥ yayuḥ madhupuram prati

original: 7.025.036a rathair nāgaiḥ kharair uṣṭrair hayair dīptair mahoragaiḥ
analyzed: rathaiḥ nāgaiḥ kharaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ hayaiḥ dīptaiḥ mahā uragaiḥ

original: 7.025.036c rākṣasāḥ prayayuḥ sarve kṛtvākāśaṃ nirantaram
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ prayayuḥ sarve kṛtvā ākāśam nirantaram

original: 7.025.037a daityāś ca śataśas tatra kṛtavairāḥ suraiḥ saha
analyzed: daityāḥ ca śataśas tatra kṛta vairāḥ suraiḥ saha

original: 7.025.037c rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya gacchantam anvagacchanta pṛṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam prekṣya gacchantam anvagacchanta pṛṣṭhatas

original: 7.025.038a sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ
analyzed: sa tu gatvā madhupuram praviśya ca daśānanaḥ

original: 7.025.038c na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān
analyzed: na dadarśa madhum tatra bhaginīm tatra dṛṣṭavān

original: 7.025.039a sā prahvā prāñjalir bhūtvā śirasā pādayor gatā
analyzed: sā prahvā prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā śirasā pādayoḥ gatā

original: 7.025.039c tasya rākṣasarājasya trastā kumbhīnasī svasā
analyzed: tasya rākṣasa rājasya trastā kumbhīnasī svasā

original: 7.025.040a tāṃ samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan
analyzed: tām samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan

original: 7.025.040c rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa śreṣṭhaḥ kim ca api karavāṇi te

original: 7.025.041a sābravīd yadi me rājan prasannas tvaṃ mahābala
analyzed: sā bravīt yadi me rājan prasannaḥ tvam mahā bala

original: 7.025.041c bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hantum arhasi mānada
analyzed: bhartāram na mama iha adya hantum arhasi mānada

original: 7.025.042a satyavāg bhava rājendra mām avekṣasva yācatīm
analyzed: satya vāc bhava rāja indra mām avekṣasva yācatīm

original: 7.025.042c tvayā hy uktaṃ mahābāho na bhetavyam iti svayam
analyzed: tvayā hi uktam mahā bāho na bhetavyam iti svayam

original: 7.025.043a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāram tatra saṃsthitām

original: 7.025.043c kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām
analyzed: kva ca asau tava bhartā vai mama śīghram nivedyatām

original: 7.025.044a saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāya vai
analyzed: saha tena gamiṣyāmi sura lokam jayāya vai

original: 7.025.044c tava kāruṇyasauhārdān nivṛtto 'smi madhor vadhāt
analyzed: tava kāruṇya sauhārdāt nivṛttaḥ smi madhoḥ vadhāt

original: 7.025.045a ity uktā sā prasuptaṃ taṃ samutthāpya niśācaram
analyzed: iti uktā sā prasuptam tam samutthāpya niśācaram

original: 7.025.045c abravīt saṃprahṛṣṭeva rākṣasī suvipaścitam
analyzed: abravīt saṃprahṛṣṭā iva rākṣasī su vipaścitam

original: 7.025.046a eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa prāptaḥ daśagrīvaḥ mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ

original: 7.025.046c suralokajayākāṅkṣī sāhāyye tvāṃ vṛṇoti ca
analyzed: sura loka jaya ākāṅkṣī sāhāyye tvām vṛṇoti ca

original: 7.025.047a tad asya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhur gaccha rākṣasa
analyzed: tat asya tvam sahāya artham sabandhuḥ gaccha rākṣasa

original: 7.025.047c snigdhasya bhajamānasya yuktam arthāya kalpitum
analyzed: snigdhasya bhajamānasya yuktam arthāya kalpitum

original: 7.025.048a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āha madhur vacaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā tathā iti āha madhuḥ vacaḥ

original: 7.025.048c dadarśa rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ yathānyāyam upetya saḥ
analyzed: dadarśa rākṣasa śreṣṭham yathānyāyam upetya saḥ

original: 7.025.049a pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam
analyzed: pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 7.025.049c prāptapūjo daśagrīvo madhuveśmani vīryavān
analyzed: prāpta pūjaḥ daśagrīvaḥ madhu veśmani vīryavān

original: 7.025.049e tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya gamanāyopacakrame
analyzed: tatra ca ekām niśām uṣya gamanāya upacakrame

original: 7.025.050a tataḥ kailāsam āsādya śailaṃ vaiśravaṇālayam
analyzed: tatas kailāsam āsādya śailam vaiśravaṇālayam

original: 7.025.050c rākṣasendro mahendrābhaḥ senām upaniveśayat
analyzed: rākṣasa indraḥ mahā indra ābhaḥ senām upaniveśayat

original: 7.026.001a sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān
analyzed: sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān

original: 7.026.001c astaṃ prāpte dinakare nivāsaṃ samarocayat
analyzed: astam prāpte dinakare nivāsam samarocayat

original: 7.026.002a udite vimale candre tulyaparvatavarcasi
analyzed: udite vimale candre tulya parvata varcasi

original: 7.026.002c sa dadarśa guṇāṃs tatra candrapādopaśobhitān
analyzed: sa dadarśa guṇān tatra candra pāda upaśobhitān

original: 7.026.003a karṇikāravanair divyaiḥ kadambagahanais tathā
analyzed: karṇikāra vanaiḥ divyaiḥ kadamba gahanaiḥ tathā

original: 7.026.003c padminībhiś ca phullābhir mandākinyā jalair api
analyzed: padminībhiḥ ca phullābhiḥ mandākinyāḥ jalaiḥ api

original: 7.026.004a ghaṇṭānām iva saṃnādaḥ śuśruve madhurasvanaḥ
analyzed: ghaṇṭānām iva saṃnādaḥ śuśruve madhura svanaḥ

original: 7.026.004c apsarogaṇasaṃghanāṃ gāyatāṃ dhanadālaye
analyzed: apsaraḥ gaṇa saṃgha nām gāyatām dhanada ālaye

original: 7.026.005a puṣpavarṣāṇi muñcanto nagāḥ pavanatāḍitāḥ
analyzed: puṣpa varṣāṇi muñcantaḥ nagāḥ pavana tāḍitāḥ

original: 7.026.005c śailaṃ taṃ vāsayantīva madhumādhavagandhinaḥ
analyzed: śailam tam vāsayanti iva madhu mādhava gandhinaḥ

original: 7.026.006a madhupuṣparajaḥpṛktaṃ gandham ādāya puṣkalam
7.026.006c pravavau vardhayan kāmaṃ rāvaṇasya sukho 'nilaḥ
analyzed: pravavau vardhayan kāmam rāvaṇasya sukhaḥ nilaḥ

original: 7.026.007a geyāt puṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityād vāyor guṇair gireḥ
analyzed: geyāt puṣpa samṛddhyā ca śaityāt vāyoḥ guṇaiḥ gireḥ

original: 7.026.007c pravṛttāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca candrasyodayanena ca
analyzed: pravṛttāyām rajanyām ca candrasya udayanena ca

original: 7.026.008a rāvaṇaḥ sumahāvīryaḥ kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ su mahā vīryaḥ kāma bāṇa vaśam gataḥ

original: 7.026.008c viniśvasya viniśvasya śaśinaṃ samavaikṣata
analyzed: viniśvasya viniśvasya śaśinam samavaikṣata

original: 7.026.009a etasminn antare tatra divyapuṣpavibhūṣitā
analyzed: etasmin antare tatra divya puṣpa vibhūṣitā

original: 7.026.009c sarvāpsarovarā rambhā pūrṇacandranibhānanā
analyzed: sarva apsaraḥ varā rambhā pūrṇa candra nibha ānanā

original: 7.026.010a kṛtair viśeṣakair ārdraiḥ ṣaḍartukusumotsavaiḥ
analyzed: kṛtaiḥ viśeṣakaiḥ ārdraiḥ ṣaṣ ṛtu kusuma utsavaiḥ

original: 7.026.010c nīlaṃ satoyameghābhaṃ vastraṃ samavaguṇṭhitā
analyzed: nīlam sa toya megha ābham vastram samavaguṇṭhitā

original: 7.026.011a yasya vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe
analyzed: yasya vaktram śaśi nibham bhruvau cāpa nibhe śubhe

original: 7.026.011c ūrū karikarākārau karau pallavakomalau
analyzed: ūrū kari kara ākārau karau pallava komalau

original: 7.026.011e sainyamadhyena gacchantī rāvaṇenopalakṣitā
analyzed: sainya madhyena gacchantī rāvaṇena upalakṣitā

original: 7.026.012a tāṃ samutthāya rakṣendraḥ kāmabāṇabalārditaḥ
analyzed: tām samutthāya rakṣa indraḥ kāma bāṇa bala arditaḥ

original: 7.026.012c kare gṛhītvā gacchantīṃ smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: kare gṛhītvā gacchantīm smayamānaḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 7.026.013a kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam
analyzed: kva gacchasi varārohe kām siddhim bhajase svayam

original: 7.026.013c kasyābhyudayakālo 'yaṃ yas tvāṃ samupabhokṣyate
analyzed: kasya abhyudaya kālaḥ yam yaḥ tvām samupabhokṣyate

original: 7.026.014a tavānanarasasyādya padmotpalasugandhinaḥ
analyzed: tava ānana rasasya adya padma utpala sugandhinaḥ

original: 7.026.014c sudhāmṛtarasasyeva ko 'dya tṛptiṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: sudhā amṛta rasasya iva kaḥ tṛptim gamiṣyati

original: 7.026.015a svarṇakumbhanibhau pīnau śubhau bhīru nirantarau
analyzed: svarṇa kumbha nibhau pīnau śubhau bhīru nirantarau

original: 7.026.015c kasyorasthalasaṃsparśaṃ dāsyatas te kucāv imau
analyzed: kasya urasthala saṃsparśam dāsyataḥ te kucau imau

original: 7.026.016a suvarṇacakrapratimaṃ svarṇadāmacitaṃ pṛthu
analyzed: suvarṇa cakra pratimam svarṇa dāma citam pṛthu

original: 7.026.016c adhyārokṣyati kas te 'dya svargaṃ jaghanarūpiṇam
analyzed: adhyārokṣyati kaḥ te dya svargam jaghana rūpiṇam

original: 7.026.017a madviśiṣṭaḥ pumān ko 'nyaḥ śakro viṣṇur athāśvinau
analyzed: mad viśiṣṭaḥ pumān kaḥ nyaḥ śakraḥ viṣṇuḥ atha aśvinau

original: 7.026.017c mām atītya hi yasya tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam
analyzed: mām atītya hi yasya tvam yāsi bhīru na śobhanam

original: 7.026.018a viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalam idaṃ śubham
analyzed: viśrama tvam pṛthu śroṇi śilā talam idam śubham

original: 7.026.018c trailokye yaḥ prabhuś caiva tulyo mama na vidyate
analyzed: trailokye yaḥ prabhuḥ ca eva tulyaḥ mama na vidyate

original: 7.026.019a tad eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tat eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ yācate tvām daśānanaḥ

original: 7.026.019c yaḥ prabhuś cāpi bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām
analyzed: yaḥ prabhuḥ ca api bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām

original: 7.026.020a evam uktābravīd rambhā vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam uktā abravīt rambhā vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.026.020c prasīda nārhase vaktum īdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ
analyzed: prasīda nā arhase vaktum īdṛśam tvam hi me guruḥ

original: 7.026.021a anyebhyo 'pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyām dharṣaṇam yadi

original: 7.026.021c dharmataś ca snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvam etad bravīmi te
analyzed: dharmataḥ ca snuṣā te ham tattvam etat bravīmi te

original: 7.026.022a abravīt tāṃ daśagrīvaś caraṇādhomukhīṃ sthitām
analyzed: abravīt tām daśagrīvaḥ caraṇa adhomukhīm sthitām

original: 7.026.022c sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvaṃ me snuṣā bhaveḥ
analyzed: sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvam me snuṣā bhaveḥ

original: 7.026.023a bāḍham ity eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram

original: 7.026.023c dharmatas te sutasyāhaṃ bhāryā rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: dharmataḥ te sutasya aham bhāryā rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 7.026.024a putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇair bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya te
analyzed: putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇaiḥ bhrātuḥ vaiśravaṇasya te

original: 7.026.024c khyāto yas triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ity asau
analyzed: khyātaḥ yaḥ triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbaraḥ iti asau

original: 7.026.025a dharmato yo bhaved vipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet
analyzed: dharmataḥ yaḥ bhavet vipraḥ kṣatriyaḥ vīryataḥ bhavet

original: 7.026.025c krodhād yaś ca bhaved agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ
analyzed: krodhāt yaḥ ca bhavet agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhā samaḥ

original: 7.026.026a tasyāsmi kṛtasaṃketā lokapālasutasya vai
analyzed: tasya asmi kṛta saṃketā lokapāla sutasya vai

original: 7.026.026c tam uddiśya ca me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam idaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: tam uddiśya ca me sarvam vibhūṣaṇam idam kṛtam

original: 7.026.027a yasya tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati
analyzed: yasya tasya hi na anyasya bhāvaḥ mām prati tiṣṭhati

original: 7.026.027c tena satyena māṃ rājan moktum arhasy ariṃdama
analyzed: tena satyena mām rājan moktum arhasi ariṃdama

original: 7.026.028a sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā sāmprataṃ matsamutsukaḥ
analyzed: sa hi tiṣṭhati dharma ātmā sāmpratam mad samutsukaḥ

original: 7.026.028c tan na vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartum arhasi muñca mām
analyzed: tat na vighnam sutasya iha kartum arhasi muñca mām

original: 7.026.029a sadbhir ācaritaṃ mārgaṃ gaccha rākṣasapuṃgava
analyzed: sadbhiḥ ācaritam mārgam gaccha rākṣasa puṃgava

original: 7.026.029c mānanīyo mayā hi tvaṃ lālanīyā tathāsmi te
analyzed: mānanīyaḥ mayā hi tvam lālanīyā tathā asmi te

original: 7.026.030a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ rambhāṃ tāṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇām rambhām tām dharma artha sahitam vacaḥ

original: 7.026.030c nirbhartsya rākṣaso mohāt pratigṛhya balād balī
analyzed: nirbhartsya rākṣasaḥ mohāt pratigṛhya balāt balī

original: 7.026.030e kāmamohābhisaṃrabdho maithunāyopacakrame
analyzed: kāma moha abhisaṃrabdhaḥ maithunāya upacakrame

original: 7.026.031a sā vimuktā tato rambhā bhraṣṭamālyavibhūṣaṇā
analyzed: sā vimuktā tatas rambhā bhraṣṭa mālya vibhūṣaṇā

original: 7.026.031c gajendrākrīḍamathitā nadīvākulatāṃ gatā
analyzed: gaja indra ākrīḍa mathitā nadī iva ākula tām gatā

original: 7.026.032a sā vepamānā lajjantī bhītā karakṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sā vepamānā lajjantī bhītā kara kṛta añjaliḥ

original: 7.026.032c nalakūbaram āsādya pādayor nipapāta ha
analyzed: nalakūbaram āsādya pādayoḥ nipapāta ha

original: 7.026.033a tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ
analyzed: tad avasthām ca tām dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ

original: 7.026.033c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitāsi me
analyzed: abravīt kim idam bhadre pādayoḥ patitā asi me

original: 7.026.034a sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānātha sāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānā atha sa añjaliḥ

original: 7.026.034c tasmai sarvaṃ yathātathyam ākhyātum upacakrame
analyzed: tasmai sarvam yathātathyam ākhyātum upacakrame

original: 7.026.035a eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam
analyzed: eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāptaḥ gantum triviṣṭapam

original: 7.026.035c tena sainyasahāyena niśeha pariṇāmyate
analyzed: tena sainya sahāyena niśā iha pariṇāmyate

original: 7.026.036a āyāntī tena dṛṣṭāsmi tvatsakāśam ariṃdama
analyzed: āyāntī tena dṛṣṭā asmi tvad sakāśam ariṃdama

original: 7.026.036c gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭāsmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā
analyzed: gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭā asmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā

original: 7.026.037a mayā tu sarvaṃ yat satyaṃ tad dhi tasmai niveditam
analyzed: mayā tu sarvam yat satyam tat hi tasmai niveditam

original: 7.026.037c kāmamohābhibhūtātmā nāśrauṣīt tad vaco mama
analyzed: kāma moha abhibhūta ātmā na aśrauṣīt tat vacaḥ mama

original: 7.026.038a yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'ham iti prabho
analyzed: yācyamānaḥ mayā deva snuṣā te ham iti prabho

original: 7.026.038c tat sarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāt tenāsmi dharṣitā
analyzed: tat sarvam pṛṣṭhatas kṛtvā balāt tena asmi dharṣitā

original: 7.026.039a evaṃ tvam aparādhaṃ me kṣantum arhasi mānada
analyzed: evam tvam aparādham me kṣantum arhasi mānada

original: 7.026.039c na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāś ca puruṣasya ca
analyzed: na hi tulyam balam saumya striyāḥ ca puruṣasya ca

original: 7.026.040a evaṃ śrutvā tu saṃkruddhas tadā vaiśvaraṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: evam śrutvā tu saṃkruddhaḥ tadā vaiśvaraṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 7.026.040c dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
analyzed: dharṣaṇām tām parām śrutvā dhyānam saṃpraviveśa ha

original: 7.026.041a tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 7.026.041c muhūrtād roṣatāmrākṣas toyaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
analyzed: muhūrtāt roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ toyam jagrāha pāṇinā

original: 7.026.042a gṛhītvā salilaṃ divyam upaspṛśya yathāvidhi
analyzed: gṛhītvā salilam divyam upaspṛśya yathāvidhi

original: 7.026.042c utsasarja tadā śāpaṃ rākṣasendrāya dāruṇam
analyzed: utsasarja tadā śāpam rākṣasa indrāya dāruṇam

original: 7.026.043a akāmā tena yasmāt tvaṃ balād bhadre pradharṣitā
analyzed: akāmā tena yasmāt tvam balāt bhadre pradharṣitā

original: 7.026.043c tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyāṃ nākāmām upayāsyati
analyzed: tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyām na akāmām upayāsyati

original: 7.026.044a yadā tv akāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam
analyzed: yadā tu akāmām kāma ārtaḥ dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam

original: 7.026.044c mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā
analyzed: mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā

original: 7.026.045a tasminn udāhṛte śāpe jvalitāgnisamaprabhe
analyzed: tasmin udāhṛte śāpe jvalita agni sama prabhe

original: 7.026.045c devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
analyzed: deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ ca khāt cyutā

original: 7.026.046a prajāpatimukhāś cāpi sarve devāḥ praharṣitāḥ
analyzed: prajāpati mukhāḥ ca api sarve devāḥ praharṣitāḥ

original: 7.026.046c jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā loka gatim sarvām tasya mṛtyum ca rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.026.047a śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvas taṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvaḥ tam śāpam roma harṣaṇam

original: 7.026.047c nārīṣu maithunaṃ bhāvaṃ nākāmāsv abhyarocayat
analyzed: nārīṣu maithunam bhāvam na akāmāsu abhyarocayat

original: 7.027.001a kailāsaṃ laṅghayitvātha daśagrīvaḥ sarākṣasaḥ
analyzed: kailāsam laṅghayitvā atha daśagrīvaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.027.001c āsasāda mahātejā indralokaṃ niśācaraḥ
analyzed: āsasāda mahā tejāḥ indra lokam niśācaraḥ

original: 7.027.002a tasya rākṣasasainyasya samantād upayāsyataḥ
analyzed: tasya rākṣasa sainyasya samantāt upayāsyataḥ

original: 7.027.002c devalokaṃ yayau śabdo bhidyamānārṇavopamaḥ
analyzed: deva lokam yayau śabdaḥ bhidyamāna arṇava upamaḥ

original: 7.027.003a śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptam indraḥ saṃcalitāsanaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu rāvaṇam prāptam indraḥ saṃcalita āsanaḥ

original: 7.027.003c abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān
analyzed: abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān

original: 7.027.004a ādityān savasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marudgaṇān
analyzed: ādityān sa vasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marut gaṇān

original: 7.027.004c sajjībhavata yuddhārthaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: sajjībhavata yuddha artham rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 7.027.005a evam uktās tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakra samāḥ yudhi

original: 7.027.005c saṃnahyanta mahāsattvā yuddhaśraddhāsamanvitāḥ
analyzed: saṃnahyanta mahā sattvāḥ yuddha śraddhā samanvitāḥ

original: 7.027.006a sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: sa tu dīnaḥ paritrastaḥ mahā indraḥ rāvaṇam prati

original: 7.027.006c viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.027.007a viṣṇo kathaṃ kariṣyāmo mahāvīryaparākrama
analyzed: viṣṇo katham kariṣyāmaḥ mahā vīrya parākrama

original: 7.027.007c asau hi balavān rakṣo yuddhārtham abhivartate
