analyzed: asau hi balavān rakṣaḥ yuddha artham abhivartate

original: 7.027.008a varapradānād balavān na khalv anyena hetunā
analyzed: vara pradānāt balavān na khalu anyena hetunā

original: 7.027.008c tac ca satyaṃ hi kartavyaṃ vākyaṃ deva prajāpateḥ
analyzed: tat ca satyam hi kartavyam vākyam deva prajāpateḥ

original: 7.027.009a tad yathā namucir vṛtro balir narakaśambarau
analyzed: tat yathā namuciḥ vṛtraḥ baliḥ naraka śambarau

original: 7.027.009c tvan mataṃ samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhās tathā kuru
analyzed: tvat matam samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhāḥ tathā kuru

original: 7.027.010a na hy anyo deva devānām āpatsu sumahābala
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ deva devānām āpatsu su mahā bala

original: 7.027.010c gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ vāsti tvām ṛte puruṣottama
analyzed: gatiḥ parāyaṇam vā asti tvām ṛte puruṣottama

original: 7.027.011a tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 7.027.011c tvayāhaṃ sthāpitaś caiva devarājye sanātane
analyzed: tvayā aham sthāpitaḥ ca eva deva rājye sanātane

original: 7.027.012a tad ākhyāhi yathātattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam
analyzed: tat ākhyāhi yathātattvam devadeva mama svayam

original: 7.027.012c asicakrasahāyas tvaṃ yudhyase saṃyuge ripum
analyzed: asi cakra sahāyaḥ tvam yudhyase saṃyuge ripum

original: 7.027.013a evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.027.013c abravīn na paritrāsaḥ kāryas te śrūyatāṃ ca me
analyzed: abravīt na paritrāsaḥ kāryaḥ te śrūyatām ca me

original: 7.027.014a na tāvad eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyo daivatadānavaiḥ
analyzed: na tāvat eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyaḥ daivata dānavaiḥ

original: 7.027.014c hantuṃ yudhi samāsādya varadānena durjayaḥ
analyzed: hantum yudhi samāsādya vara dānena durjayaḥ

original: 7.027.015a sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati bala utkaṭaḥ

original: 7.027.015c rakṣaḥ putrasahāyo 'sau dṛṣṭam etan nisargataḥ
analyzed: rakṣaḥ dṛṣṭam etat nisargataḥ

original: 7.027.016a bravīṣi yat tu māṃ śakra saṃyuge yotsyasīti ha
analyzed: bravīṣi yat tu mām śakra saṃyuge yotsyasi iti ha

original: 7.027.016c naivāhaṃ pratiyotsye taṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam
analyzed: na eva aham pratiyotsye tam rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 7.027.017a anihatya ripuṃ viṣṇur na hi pratinivartate
analyzed: a nihatya ripum viṣṇuḥ na hi pratinivartate

original: 7.027.017c durlabhaś caiṣa kāmo 'dya varam āsādya rākṣase
analyzed: durlabhaḥ ca eṣa kāmaḥ varam āsādya rākṣase

original: 7.027.018a pratijānāmi devendra tvatsamīpaṃ śatakrato
analyzed: pratijānāmi deva indra tvad samīpam śatakrato

original: 7.027.018c rākṣasasyāham evāsya bhavitā mṛtyukāraṇam
analyzed: rākṣasasya aham eva asya bhavitā mṛtyu kāraṇam

original: 7.027.019a aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ yudhi
analyzed: aham enam vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇam sa sutam yudhi

original: 7.027.019c devatās toṣayiṣyāmi jñātvā kālam upasthitam
analyzed: devatāḥ toṣayiṣyāmi jñātvā kālam upasthitam

original: 7.027.020a etasminn antare nādaḥ śuśruve rajanīkṣaye
analyzed: etasmin antare nādaḥ śuśruve rajanī kṣaye

original: 7.027.020c tasya rāvaṇasainyasya prayuddhasya samantataḥ
analyzed: tasya rāvaṇa sainyasya prayuddhasya samantataḥ

original: 7.027.021a atha yuddhaṃ samabhavad devarākṣasayos tadā
analyzed: atha yuddham samabhavat deva rākṣasayoḥ tadā

original: 7.027.021c ghoraṃ tumulanirhrādaṃ nānāpraharaṇāyudham
analyzed: ghoram tumula nirhrādam nānā praharaṇa āyudham

original: 7.027.022a etasminn antare śūrā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare śūrāḥ rākṣasāḥ ghora darśanāḥ

original: 7.027.022c yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta sacivā rāvaṇājñayā
analyzed: yuddha artham abhyadhāvanta sacivāḥ rāvaṇa ājñayā

original: 7.027.023a mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca mahāpārśvamahodarau
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca prahastaḥ ca mahāpārśva mahodarau

original: 7.027.023c akampano nikumbhaś ca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca
analyzed: akampanaḥ nikumbhaḥ ca śukaḥ sāraṇaḥ eva ca

original: 7.027.024a saṃhrādir dhūmaketuś ca mahādaṃṣṭro mahāmukhaḥ
analyzed: saṃhrādiḥ dhūmaketuḥ ca mahādaṃṣṭraḥ mahāmukhaḥ

original: 7.027.024c jambumālī mahāmālī virūpākṣaś ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: jambumālī mahā mālī virūpākṣaḥ ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.027.025a etaiḥ sarvair mahāvīryair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ sarvaiḥ mahā vīryaiḥ vṛtaḥ rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.027.025c rāvaṇasyāryakaḥ sainyaṃ sumālī praviveśa ha
analyzed: rāvaṇasya āryakaḥ sainyam sumālī praviveśa ha

original: 7.027.026a sa hi devagaṇān sarvān nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: sa hi deva gaṇān sarvān nānā praharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 7.027.026c vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddhaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ
analyzed: vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddhaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ

original: 7.027.027a etasminn antare śūro vasūnām aṣṭamo vasuḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare śūraḥ vasūnām aṣṭamaḥ vasuḥ

original: 7.027.027c sāvitra iti vikhyātaḥ praviveśa mahāraṇam
analyzed: sāvitraḥ iti vikhyātaḥ praviveśa mahā raṇam

original: 7.027.028a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas yuddham samabhavat surāṇām rākṣasaiḥ saha

original: 7.027.028c kruddhānāṃ rakṣasāṃ kīrtiṃ samareṣv anivartinām
analyzed: kruddhānām rakṣasām kīrtim samareṣu anivartinām

original: 7.027.029a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā devāṃs tān samare sthitān
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrāḥ devān tān samare sthitān

original: 7.027.029c nānāpraharaṇair ghorair jaghnuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: nānā praharaṇaiḥ ghoraiḥ jaghnuḥ śata sahasraśas

original: 7.027.030a surās tu rākṣasān ghorān mahāvīryān svatejasā
analyzed: surāḥ tu rākṣasān ghorān mahā vīryān sva tejasā

original: 7.027.030c samare vividhaiḥ śastrair anayan yamasādanam
analyzed: samare vividhaiḥ śastraiḥ anayan yama sādanam

original: 7.027.031a etasminn antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.027.031c nānāpraharaṇaiḥ kruddho raṇam evābhyavartata
analyzed: nānā praharaṇaiḥ kruddhaḥ raṇam eva abhyavartata

original: 7.027.032a devānāṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: devānām tat balam sarvam nānā praharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 7.027.032c vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddho vāyur jaladharān iva
analyzed: vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddhaḥ vāyuḥ jaladharān iva

original: 7.027.033a te mahābāṇavarṣaiś ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ
analyzed: te mahā bāṇa varṣaiḥ ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ ca dāruṇaiḥ

original: 7.027.033c pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ
analyzed: pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ

original: 7.027.034a tato vidrāvyamāṇeṣu tridaśeṣu sumālinā
analyzed: tatas vidrāvyamāṇeṣu tridaśeṣu sumālinā

original: 7.027.034c vasūnām aṣṭamo devaḥ sāvitro vyavatiṣṭhata
analyzed: vasūnām aṣṭamaḥ devaḥ sāvitraḥ vyavatiṣṭhata

original: 7.027.035a saṃvṛtaḥ svair anīkais tu praharantaṃ niśācaram
analyzed: saṃvṛtaḥ svaiḥ anīkaiḥ tu praharantam niśācaram

original: 7.027.035c vikrameṇa mahātejā vārayām āsa saṃyuge
analyzed: vikrameṇa mahā tejāḥ vārayām āsa saṃyuge

original: 7.027.036a sumattayos tayor āsīd yuddhaṃ loke sudāruṇam
analyzed: su mattayoḥ tayoḥ āsīt yuddham loke su dāruṇam

original: 7.027.036c sumālino vasoś caiva samareṣv anivartinoḥ
analyzed: sumālinaḥ vasoḥ ca eva samareṣu anivartinoḥ

original: 7.027.037a tatas tasya mahābāṇair vasunā sumahātmanā
analyzed: tatas tasya mahā bāṇaiḥ vasunā su mahātmanā

original: 7.027.037c mahān sa pannagarathaḥ kṣaṇena vinipātitaḥ
analyzed: mahān sa pannaga rathaḥ kṣaṇena vinipātitaḥ

original: 7.027.038a hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya ratham bāṇa śataiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 7.027.038c gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasur jagrāha pāṇinā
analyzed: gadām tasya vadha arthāya vasuḥ jagrāha pāṇinā

original: 7.027.039a tāṃ pradīptāṃ pragṛhyāśu kāladaṇḍanibhāṃ śubhām
analyzed: tām pradīptām pragṛhya āśu kāla daṇḍa nibhām śubhām

original: 7.027.039c tasya mūrdhani sāvitraḥ sumāler vinipātayat
analyzed: tasya mūrdhani sāvitraḥ sumāleḥ vinipātayat

original: 7.027.040a tasya mūrdhani solkābhā patantī ca tadā babhau
analyzed: tasya mūrdhani sa ulkā ābhā patantī ca tadā babhau

original: 7.027.040c sahasrākṣasamutsṛṣṭā girāv iva mahāśaniḥ
analyzed: sahasrākṣa samutsṛṣṭā girau iva mahā aśaniḥ

original: 7.027.041a tasya naivāsthi kāyo vā na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā
analyzed: tasya na eva asthi kāyaḥ vā na māṃsam dadṛśe tadā

original: 7.027.041c gadayā bhasmasādbhūto raṇe tasmin nipātitaḥ
analyzed: gadayā bhasmasāt bhūtaḥ raṇe tasmin nipātitaḥ

original: 7.027.042a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye rākṣasās te samantataḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā nihatam saṃkhye rākṣasāḥ te samantataḥ

original: 7.027.042c dudruvuḥ sahitāḥ sarve krośamānā mahāsvanam
analyzed: dudruvuḥ sahitāḥ sarve krośamānāḥ mahā svanam

original: 7.028.001a sumālinaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam
analyzed: sumālinam hatam dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam

original: 7.028.001c vidrutaṃ cāpi svaṃ sainyaṃ lakṣayitvārditaṃ śaraiḥ
analyzed: vidrutam ca api svam sainyam lakṣayitvā arditam śaraiḥ

original: 7.028.002a tataḥ sa balavān kruddho rāvaṇasya suto yudhi
analyzed: tatas sa balavān kruddhaḥ rāvaṇasya sutaḥ yudhi

original: 7.028.002c nivartya rākṣasān sarvān meghanādo vyatiṣṭhata
analyzed: nivartya rākṣasān sarvān meghanādaḥ vyatiṣṭhata

original: 7.028.003a sa rathenāgnivarṇena kāmagena mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa rathena agni varṇena kāmagena mahā rathaḥ

original: 7.028.003c abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanāny agnir iva jvalan
analyzed: abhidudrāva senām tām vanāni agniḥ iva jvalan

original: 7.028.004a tataḥ praviśatas tasya vividhāyudhadhāriṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas praviśataḥ tasya vividha āyudha dhāriṇaḥ

original: 7.028.004c vidudruvur diśaḥ sarvā devās tasya ca darśanāt
analyzed: vidudruvuḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ devāḥ tasya ca darśanāt

original: 7.028.005a na tatrāvasthitaḥ kaś cid raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ
analyzed: na tatra avasthitaḥ kaḥ cit raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ

original: 7.028.005c sarvān āvidhya vitrastān dṛṣṭvā śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: sarvān āvidhya vitrastān dṛṣṭvā śakraḥ bhyabhāṣata

original: 7.028.006a na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇaṃ prati
analyzed: na bhetavyam na gantavyam nivartadhvam raṇam prati

original: 7.028.006c eṣa gacchati me putro yuddhārtham aparājitaḥ
analyzed: eṣa gacchati me putraḥ yuddha artham aparājitaḥ

original: 7.028.007a tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: tatas śakra sutaḥ devaḥ jayantaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 7.028.007c rathenādbhutakalpena saṃgrāmam abhivartata
analyzed: rathena adbhuta kalpena saṃgrāmam abhivartata

original: 7.028.008a tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam
analyzed: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacī sutam

original: 7.028.008c rāvaṇasya sutaṃ yuddhe samāsādya vyavasthitāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya sutam yuddhe samāsādya vyavasthitāḥ

original: 7.028.009a teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahad abhūt sadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām
analyzed: teṣām yuddham mahat abhūt sadṛśam deva rakṣasām

original: 7.028.009c kṛte mahendraputrasya rākṣasendrasutasya ca
analyzed: kṛte mahā indra putrasya rākṣasa indra sutasya ca

original: 7.028.010a tato mātaliputre tu gomukhe rākṣasātmajaḥ
analyzed: tatas mātali putre tu gomukhe rākṣasa ātmajaḥ

original: 7.028.010c sārathau pātayām āsa śarān kāñcanabhūṣaṇān
analyzed: sārathau pātayām āsa śarān kāñcana bhūṣaṇān

original: 7.028.011a śacīsutas tv api tathā jayantas tasya sārathim
analyzed: śacī sutaḥ tu api tathā jayantaḥ tasya sārathim

original: 7.028.011c taṃ caiva rāvaṇiṃ kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
analyzed: tam ca eva rāvaṇim kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyat raṇa ajire

original: 7.028.012a tataḥ kruddho mahātejā rakṣo visphāritekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ mahā tejāḥ rakṣaḥ visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.028.012c rāvaṇiḥ śakraputraṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirat
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ śakra putram tam śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 7.028.013a tataḥ pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca
analyzed: tatas pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca

original: 7.028.013c śataghnīs tomarān prāsān gadākhaḍgaparaśvadhān
analyzed: śataghnīḥ tomarān prāsān gadā khaḍga paraśvadhān

original: 7.028.013e sumahānty adriśṛṅgāṇi pātayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: su mahānti adri śṛṅgāṇi pātayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ

original: 7.028.014a tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamo mahat
analyzed: tatas pravyathitāḥ lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamaḥ mahat

original: 7.028.014c tasya rāvaṇaputrasya tadā śatrūn abhighnataḥ
analyzed: tasya rāvaṇa putrasya tadā śatrūn abhighnataḥ

original: 7.028.015a tatas tad daivatabalaṃ samantāt taṃ śacīsutam
analyzed: tatas tat daivata balam samantāt tam śacī sutam

original: 7.028.015c bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ tatra tatra sma dhāvati
analyzed: bahu prakāram asvastham tatra tatra sma dhāvati

original: 7.028.016a nābhyajānaṃs tadānyonyaṃ śatrūn vā daivatāni vā
analyzed: na abhyajānan tadā anyonyam śatrūn vā daivatāni vā

original: 7.028.016c tatra tatra viparyastaṃ samantāt paridhāvitam
analyzed: tatra tatra viparyastam samantāt paridhāvitam

original: 7.028.017a etasminn antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān
analyzed: etasmin antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān

original: 7.028.017c daiteyas tena saṃgṛhya śacīputro 'pavāhitaḥ
analyzed: daiteyaḥ tena saṃgṛhya śacī putraḥ upavāhitaḥ

original: 7.028.018a gṛhītvā taṃ tu naptāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa mahodadhim
analyzed: gṛhītvā tam tu naptāram praviṣṭaḥ sa mahā udadhim

original: 7.028.018c mātāmaho 'ryakas tasya paulomī yena sā śacī
analyzed: mātāmahaḥ ryakaḥ tasya paulomī yena sā śacī

original: 7.028.019a praṇāśaṃ dṛśya tu surā jayantasyātidāruṇam
analyzed: praṇāśam dṛśya tu surāḥ jayantasya ati dāruṇam

original: 7.028.019c vyathitāś cāprahṛṣṭāś ca samantād vipradudruvuḥ
analyzed: vyathitāḥ ca a prahṛṣṭāḥ ca samantāt vipradudruvuḥ

original: 7.028.020a rāvaṇis tv atha saṃhṛṣṭo balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ tu atha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ

original: 7.028.020c abhyadhāvata devāṃs tān mumoca ca mahāsvanam
analyzed: abhyadhāvata devān tān mumoca ca mahā svanam

original: 7.028.021a dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya rāvaṇeś cāpi vikramam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā praṇāśam putrasya rāvaṇeḥ ca api vikramam

original: 7.028.021c mātaliṃ prāha devendro rathaḥ samupanīyatām
analyzed: mātalim prāha deva indraḥ rathaḥ samupanīyatām

original: 7.028.022a sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa tu divyaḥ mahā bhīmaḥ sajjaḥ eva mahā rathaḥ

original: 7.028.022c upasthito mātalinā vāhyamāno manojavaḥ
analyzed: upasthitaḥ mātalinā vāhyamānaḥ manojavaḥ

original: 7.028.023a tato meghā rathe tasmiṃs taḍidvanto mahāsvanāḥ
analyzed: tatas meghāḥ rathe tasmin taḍidvantaḥ mahā svanāḥ

original: 7.028.023c agrato vāyucapalā gacchanto vyanadaṃs tadā
analyzed: agratas vāyu capalāḥ gacchantaḥ vyanadan tadā

original: 7.028.024a nānāvādyāni vādyanta stutayaś ca samāhitāḥ
analyzed: nānā vādyāni vādyanta stutayaḥ ca samāhitāḥ

original: 7.028.024c nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghāḥ prayāte vāsave raṇam
analyzed: nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ saṃghāḥ prayāte vāsave raṇam

original: 7.028.025a rudrair vasubhir ādityaiḥ sādhyaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ ādityaiḥ sādhyaiḥ ca sa marut gaṇaiḥ

original: 7.028.025c vṛto nānāpraharaṇair niryayau tridaśādhipaḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ nānā praharaṇaiḥ niryayau tridaśādhipaḥ

original: 7.028.026a nirgacchatas tu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau
analyzed: nirgacchataḥ tu śakrasya paruṣam pavanaḥ vavau

original: 7.028.026c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cāsīn maholkāś ca prapedire
analyzed: bhāskaraḥ niṣprabhaḥ ca āsīt mahā ulkāḥ ca prapedire

original: 7.028.027a etasminn antare śūro daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: etasmin antare śūraḥ daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān

original: 7.028.027c āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: āruroha ratham divyam nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā

original: 7.028.028a pannagaiḥ sumahākāyair veṣṭitaṃ lomaharṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: pannagaiḥ su mahā kāyaiḥ veṣṭitam loma harṣaṇaiḥ

original: 7.028.028c yeṣāṃ niśvāsavātena pradīptam iva saṃyugam
analyzed: yeṣām niśvāsa vātena pradīptam iva saṃyugam

original: 7.028.029a daityair niśācaraiḥ śūrai rathaḥ saṃparivāritaḥ
analyzed: daityaiḥ niśācaraiḥ śūraiḥ rathaḥ saṃparivāritaḥ

original: 7.028.029c samarābhimukho divyo mahendram abhivartata
analyzed: samara abhimukhaḥ divyaḥ mahā indram abhivartata

original: 7.028.030a putraṃ taṃ vārayitvāsau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: putram tam vārayitvā asau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ

original: 7.028.030c so 'pi yuddhād viniṣkramya rāvaṇiḥ samupāviśat
analyzed: saḥ pi yuddhāt viniṣkramya rāvaṇiḥ samupāviśat

original: 7.028.031a tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas yuddham pravṛttam tu surāṇām rākṣasaiḥ saha

original: 7.028.031c śastrābhivarṣaṇaṃ ghoraṃ meghānām iva saṃyuge
analyzed: śastra abhivarṣaṇam ghoram meghānām iva saṃyuge

original: 7.028.032a kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā nānāpraharaṇodyataḥ
analyzed: kumbhakarṇaḥ tu duṣṭa ātmā nānā praharaṇa udyataḥ

original: 7.028.032c nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpy ayudhyata
analyzed: na ajñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kena api ayudhyata

original: 7.028.033a dantair bhujābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ ca śaktitomarasāyakaiḥ
analyzed: dantaiḥ bhujābhyām padbhyām ca śakti tomara sāyakaiḥ

original: 7.028.033c yena kenaiva saṃrabdhas tāḍayām āsa vai surān
analyzed: yena kena eva saṃrabdhaḥ tāḍayām āsa vai surān

original: 7.028.034a tato rudrair mahābhāgaiḥ sahādityair niśācaraḥ
analyzed: tatas rudraiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ saha ādityaiḥ niśācaraḥ

original: 7.028.034c prayuddhas taiś ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastrair nirantaram
analyzed: prayuddhaḥ taiḥ ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastraiḥ nirantaram

original: 7.028.035a tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ tridaśaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: tatas tat rākṣasam sainyam tridaśaiḥ sa marut gaṇaiḥ

original: 7.028.035c raṇe vidrāvitaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: raṇe vidrāvitam sarvam nānā praharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 7.028.036a ke cid vinihatāḥ śastrair veṣṭanti sma mahītale
analyzed: ke cid vinihatāḥ śastraiḥ veṣṭanti sma mahī tale

original: 7.028.036c vāhaneṣv avasaktāś ca sthitā evāpare raṇe
analyzed: vāhaneṣu avasaktāḥ ca sthitāḥ eva apare raṇe

original: 7.028.037a rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagāṃs turagāṃs tathā
analyzed: rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagān turagān tathā

original: 7.028.037c śiṃśumārān varāhāṃś ca piśācavadanāṃs tathā
analyzed: śiṃśumārān varāhān ca piśāca vadanān tathā

original: 7.028.038a tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ
analyzed: tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyām viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ

original: 7.028.038c devais tu śastrasaṃviddhā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ
analyzed: devaiḥ tu śastra saṃviddhāḥ mamrire ca niśācarāḥ

original: 7.028.039a citrakarma ivābhāti sa teṣāṃ raṇasaṃplavaḥ
analyzed: citra karma iva ābhāti sa teṣām raṇa saṃplavaḥ

original: 7.028.039c nihatānāṃ pramattānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahītale
analyzed: nihatānām pramattānām rākṣasānām mahī tale

original: 7.028.040a śoṇitodaka niṣyandākaṅkagṛdhrasamākulā
7.028.040c pravṛttā saṃyugamukhe śastragrāhavatī nadī
analyzed: pravṛttā saṃyuga mukhe śastra grāhavatī nadī

original: 7.028.041a etasminn antare kruddho daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: etasmin antare kruddhaḥ daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān

original: 7.028.041c nirīkṣya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ daivatair vinipātitam
analyzed: nirīkṣya tat balam sarvam daivataiḥ vinipātitam

original: 7.028.042a sa taṃ prativigāhyāśu pravṛddhaṃ sainyasāgaram
analyzed: sa tam prativigāhya āśu pravṛddham sainya sāgaram

original: 7.028.042c tridaśān samare nighnañ śakram evābhyavartata
analyzed: tridaśān samare nighnam śakram eva abhyavartata

original: 7.028.043a tataḥ śakro mahac cāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam
analyzed: tatas śakraḥ mahat cāpam visphārya su mahā svanam

original: 7.028.043c yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśo daśa
analyzed: yasya visphāra ghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśaḥ daśa

original: 7.028.044a tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpam indro rāvaṇamūrdhani
analyzed: tat vikṛṣya mahat cāpam indraḥ rāvaṇa mūrdhani

original: 7.028.044c nipātayām āsa śarān pāvakādityavarcasaḥ
analyzed: nipātayām āsa śarān pāvaka āditya varcasaḥ

original: 7.028.045a tathaiva ca mahābāhur daśagrīvo vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: tathā eva ca mahā bāhuḥ daśagrīvaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 7.028.045c śakraṃ kārmukavibhraṣṭaiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat
analyzed: śakram kārmuka vibhraṣṭaiḥ śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 7.028.046a prayudhyator atha tayor bāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: prayudhyatoḥ atha tayoḥ bāṇa varṣaiḥ samantataḥ

original: 7.028.046c nājñāyata tadā kiṃ cit sarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam
analyzed: na ajñāyata tadā kim cit sarvam hi tamasā vṛtam

original: 7.029.001a tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasāḥ daivataiḥ saha

original: 7.029.001c ayudhyanta balonmattāḥ sūdayantaḥ parasparam
analyzed: ayudhyanta bala unmattāḥ sūdayantaḥ parasparam

original: 7.029.002a tatas tu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
analyzed: tatas tu deva sainyena rākṣasānām mahat balam

original: 7.029.002c daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam
analyzed: daśa aṃśam sthāpitam yuddhe śeṣam nītam yama kṣayam

original: 7.029.003a tasmiṃs tu tamasā naddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tasmin tu tamasā naddhe sarve te deva rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.029.003c anyonyaṃ nābhyajānanta yudhyamānāḥ parasparam
analyzed: anyonyam na abhyajānanta yudhyamānāḥ parasparam

original: 7.029.004a indraś ca rāvaṇaś caiva rāvaṇiś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ ca rāvaṇaḥ ca eva rāvaṇiḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 7.029.004c tasmiṃs tamojālavṛte moham īyur na te trayaḥ
analyzed: tasmin tamaḥ jāla vṛte moham īyuḥ na te trayaḥ

original: 7.029.005a sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ nihataṃ rāvaṇo raṇe
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭvā balam sarvam nihatam rāvaṇaḥ raṇe

original: 7.029.005c krodham abhyāgamat tīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān
analyzed: krodham abhyāgamat tīvram mahā nādam ca muktavān

original: 7.029.006a krodhāt sūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanastham uvāca ha
analyzed: krodhāt sūtam ca durdharṣaḥ syandana stham uvāca ha

original: 7.029.006c parasainyasya madhyena yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām
analyzed: para sainyasya madhyena yāvat antam nayasva mām

original: 7.029.007a adyaitāṃs tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam
analyzed: adya etān tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam

original: 7.029.007c nānāśastrair mahāsārair nāśayāmi nabhastalāt
analyzed: nānā śastraiḥ mahā sāraiḥ nāśayāmi nabhastalāt

original: 7.029.008a aham indraṃ vadhiṣyāmi varuṇaṃ dhanadaṃ yamam
analyzed: aham indram vadhiṣyāmi varuṇam dhana dam yamam

original: 7.029.008c tridaśān vinihatyāśu svayaṃ sthāsyāmy athopari
analyzed: tridaśān vinihatya āśu svayam sthāsyāmi atha upari

original: 7.029.009a viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham
analyzed: viṣādaḥ na ca kartavyaḥ śīghram vāhaya me ratham

original: 7.029.009c dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmy adya yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām
analyzed: dvis khalu tvām bravīmi adya yāvat antam nayasva mām

original: 7.029.010a ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam
analyzed: ayam sa nandana uddeśaḥ yatra vartāmahe vayam

original: 7.029.010c naya mām adya tatra tvam udayo yatra parvataḥ
analyzed: naya mām adya tatra tvam udayaḥ yatra parvataḥ

original: 7.029.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagān sa manojavān
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā turagān sa manojavān

original: 7.029.011c ādideśātha śatrūṇāṃ madhyenaiva ca sārathiḥ
analyzed: ādideśa atha śatrūṇām madhyena eva ca sārathiḥ

original: 7.029.012a tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvaras tadā
analyzed: tasya tam niścayam jñātvā śakraḥ deva īśvaraḥ tadā

original: 7.029.012c rathasthaḥ samarasthāṃs tān devān vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: ratha sthaḥ samara sthān tān devān vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.029.013a surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yat tāvan mama rocate
analyzed: surāḥ śṛṇuta mad vākyam yat tāvat mama rocate

original: 7.029.013c jīvann eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām
analyzed: jīvan eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣaḥ nigṛhyatām

original: 7.029.014a eṣa hy atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavanaujasā
analyzed: eṣa hi atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavana ojasā

original: 7.029.014c gamiṣyati pravṛddhormiḥ samudra iva parvaṇi
analyzed: gamiṣyati pravṛddha ūrmiḥ samudraḥ iva parvaṇi

original: 7.029.015a na hy eṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānāt sunirbhayaḥ
analyzed: na hi eṣa hantum śakyaḥ vara dānāt su nirbhayaḥ

original: 7.029.015c tad grahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge
analyzed: tat grahīṣyāmahe rakṣaḥ yattāḥ bhavata saṃyuge

original: 7.029.016a yathā baliṃ nigṛhyaitat trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā
analyzed: yathā balim nigṛhya etat trailokyam bhujyate mayā

original: 7.029.016c evam etasya pāpasya nigraho mama rocate
analyzed: evam etasya pāpasya nigrahaḥ mama rocate

original: 7.029.017a tato 'nyaṃ deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam
analyzed: tatas deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam

original: 7.029.017c ayudhyata mahātejā rākṣasān nāśayan raṇe
analyzed: ayudhyata mahā tejāḥ rākṣasān nāśayan raṇe

original: 7.029.018a uttareṇa daśagrīvaḥ praviveśānivartitaḥ
analyzed: uttareṇa daśagrīvaḥ praviveśa anivartitaḥ

original: 7.029.018c dakṣiṇena tu pārśvena praviveśa śatakratuḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇena tu pārśvena praviveśa śatakratuḥ

original: 7.029.019a tataḥ sa yojanaśataṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa yojana śatam praviṣṭaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.029.019c devatānāṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat
analyzed: devatānām balam kṛtsnam śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 7.029.020a tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha praviṣṭaṃ taṃ balaṃ svakam
analyzed: tatas śakraḥ nirīkṣya atha praviṣṭam tam balam svakam

original: 7.029.020c nyavartayad asaṃbhrāntaḥ samāvṛtya daśānanam
analyzed: nyavartayat asaṃbhrāntaḥ samāvṛtya daśānanam

original: 7.029.021a etasminn antare nādo mukto dānavarākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare nādaḥ muktaḥ dānava rākṣasaiḥ

original: 7.029.021c hā hatāḥ smeti taṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ śakreṇa rāvaṇam
analyzed: hā hatāḥ sma iti tam dṛṣṭvā grastam śakreṇa rāvaṇam

original: 7.029.022a tato rathaṃ samāruhya rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: tatas ratham samāruhya rāvaṇiḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 7.029.022c tat sainyam atisaṃkruddhaḥ praviveśa sudāruṇam
analyzed: tat sainyam ati saṃkruddhaḥ praviveśa su dāruṇam

original: 7.029.023a sa tāṃ praviśya māyāṃ tu dattāṃ gopatinā purā
analyzed: sa tām praviśya māyām tu dattām gopatinā purā

original: 7.029.023c adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tat sainyaṃ samavākirat
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ sarva bhūtānām tat sainyam samavākirat

original: 7.029.024a tataḥ sa devān saṃtyajya śakram evābhyayād drutam
analyzed: tatas sa devān saṃtyajya śakram eva abhyayāt drutam

original: 7.029.024c mahendraś ca mahātejā na dadarśa sutaṃ ripoḥ
analyzed: mahā indraḥ ca mahā tejāḥ na dadarśa sutam ripoḥ

original: 7.029.025a sa mātaliṃ hayāṃś caiva tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ
analyzed: sa mātalim hayān ca eva tāḍayitvā śara uttamaiḥ

original: 7.029.025c mahendraṃ bāṇavarṣeṇa śīghrahasto hy avākirat
analyzed: mahā indram bāṇa varṣeṇa śīghra hastaḥ hi avākirat

original: 7.029.026a tataḥ śakro rathaṃ tyaktva visṛjya ca sa mātalim
analyzed: tatas śakraḥ ratham tyaktvā visṛjya ca sa mātalim

original: 7.029.026c airāvataṃ samāruhya mṛgayām āsa rāvaṇim
analyzed: airāvatam samāruhya mṛgayām āsa rāvaṇim

original: 7.029.027a sa tu māyā balād rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme nābhyadṛśyata
analyzed: sa tu māyā balāt rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme na abhyadṛśyata

original: 7.029.027c kiramāṇaḥ śaraughena mahendram amitaujasaṃ
analyzed: kiramāṇaḥ śara oghena mahā indram amita ojasam

original: 7.029.028a sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntam indraṃ mene 'tha rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: sa tam yadā pariśrāntam indram mene rāvaṇiḥ

original: 7.029.028c tadainaṃ māyayā baddhvā svasainyam abhito 'nayat
analyzed: tadā enam māyayā baddhvā sva sainyam abhitas nayat

original: 7.029.029a taṃ dṛṣṭvātha balāt tasmin māyayāpahṛtaṃ raṇe
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā atha balāt tasmin māyayā apahṛtam raṇe

original: 7.029.029c mahendram amarāḥ sarve kiṃ nv etad iti cukruśuḥ
analyzed: mahā indram amarāḥ sarve kim nu etat iti cukruśuḥ

original: 7.029.029e na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate
analyzed: na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate

original: 7.029.030a etasminn antare cāpi sarve suragaṇās tadā
analyzed: etasmin antare ca api sarve sura gaṇāḥ tadā

original: 7.029.030c abhyadravan susaṃkruddhā rāvaṇaṃ śastravṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: abhyadravan su saṃkruddhāḥ rāvaṇam śastra vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: 7.029.031a rāvaṇas tu samāsādya vasvādityamarudgaṇān
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tu samāsādya vasu āditya marut gaṇān

original: 7.029.031c na śaśāka raṇe sthātuṃ na yoddhuṃ śastrapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: na śaśāka raṇe sthātum na yoddhum śastra pīḍitaḥ

original: 7.029.032a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntaṃ prahārair jarjaracchavim
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntam prahāraiḥ jarjara chavim

original: 7.029.032c rāvaṇiḥ pitaraṃ yuddhe 'darśanastho 'bravīd idam
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ pitaram yuddhe darśana sthaḥ bravīt idam

original: 7.029.033a āgaccha tāta gacchāvo nivṛttaṃ raṇakarma tat
analyzed: āgaccha tāta gacchāvaḥ nivṛttam raṇa karma tat

original: 7.029.033c jitaṃ te viditaṃ bho 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ
analyzed: jitam te viditam bho stu svasthaḥ bhava gata jvaraḥ

original: 7.029.034a ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: ayam hi sura sainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.029.034c sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: sa gṛhītaḥ mayā śakraḥ bhagna mānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: 7.029.035a yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva trailokyaṃ nigṛhya ripum ojasā
analyzed: yathā iṣṭam bhuṅkṣva trailokyam nigṛhya ripum ojasā

original: 7.029.035c vṛthā te kiṃ śramaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ hi tava niṣphalam
analyzed: vṛthā te kim śramam kṛtvā yuddham hi tava niṣphalam

original: 7.029.036a sa daivatabalāt tasmān nivṛtto raṇakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa daivata balāt tasmāt nivṛttaḥ raṇa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.029.036c tac chrutvā rāvaṇer vākyaṃ svasthacetā daśānanaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā rāvaṇeḥ vākyam svastha cetāḥ daśānanaḥ

original: 7.029.037a atha raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhur;
analyzed: atha raṇa vigata jvaraḥ prabhuḥ

original: vijayam avāpya niśācarādhipaḥ
analyzed: vijayam avāpya niśācara adhipaḥ

original: 7.029.037c bhavanam abhi tato jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ;
analyzed: bhavanam abhi tatas jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ

original: svasutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt
analyzed: sva sutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt

original: 7.029.038a atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramais tair;
analyzed: ati bala sadṛśaiḥ parākramaiḥ taiḥ

original: mama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: mama kula māna vivardhanam kṛtam

original: 7.029.038c yad amarasamavikrama tvayā;
analyzed: yat amara sama vikrama tvayā

original: tridaśapatis tridaśāś ca nirjitāḥ
analyzed: tridaśa patiḥ tridaśāḥ ca nirjitāḥ

original: 7.029.039a tvaritam upanayasva vāsavaṃ;
analyzed: tvaritam upanayasva vāsavam

original: nagaram ito vraja sainyasaṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: nagaram itas vraja sainya saṃvṛtaḥ

original: 7.029.039c aham api tava gacchato drutaṃ;
analyzed: aham api tava gacchataḥ drutam

original: saha sacivair anuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ
analyzed: saha sacivaiḥ anuyāmi pṛṣṭhatas

original: 7.029.040a atha sa balavṛtaḥ savāhanas;
analyzed: atha sa bala vṛtaḥ sa vāhanaḥ

original: tridaśapatiṃ parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: tridaśa patim parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ

original: 7.029.040c svabhavanam upagamya rākṣaso;
analyzed: sva bhavanam upagamya rākṣaso

original: muditamanā visasarja rākṣasān
analyzed: mudita manāḥ visasarja rākṣasān

original: 7.030.001a jite mahendre 'tibale rāvaṇasya sutena vai
analyzed: jite mahā indre tibale rāvaṇasya sutena vai

original: 7.030.001c prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surās tadā
analyzed: prajāpatim puraskṛtya gatāḥ laṅkām surāḥ tadā

original: 7.030.002a taṃ rāvaṇaṃ samāsādya putrabhrātṛbhir āvṛtam
analyzed: tam rāvaṇam samāsādya putra bhrātṛbhiḥ āvṛtam

original: 7.030.002c abravīd gagane tiṣṭhan sāntvapūrvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: abravīt gagane tiṣṭhan sāntva pūrvam prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.030.003a vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi tava putrasya saṃyuge
analyzed: vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭaḥ smi tava putrasya saṃyuge

original: 7.030.003c aho 'sya vikramaudāryaṃ tava tulyo 'dhiko 'pi vā
analyzed: aho sya vikrama audāryam tava tulyaḥ vā

original: 7.030.004a jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā
analyzed: jitam hi bhavatā sarvam trailokyam svena tejasā

original: 7.030.004c kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai
analyzed: kṛtā pratijñā saphalā smi sva sutena vai

original: 7.030.005a ayaṃ ca putro 'tibalas tava rāvaṇarāvaṇiḥ
analyzed: ayam ca tava rāvaṇa rāvaṇiḥ

original: 7.030.005c indrajit tv iti vikhyāto jagaty eṣa bhaviṣyati
analyzed: indrajit tu iti vikhyātaḥ jagati eṣa bhaviṣyati

original: 7.030.006a balavāñ śatrunirjetā bhaviṣyaty eṣa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: balavān śatru nirjetā bhaviṣyati eṣa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.030.006c yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitās tridaśā vaśe
analyzed: yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitāḥ tridaśāḥ vaśe

original: 7.030.007a tan mucyatāṃ mahābāho mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
analyzed: tat mucyatām mahā bāho mahā indraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 7.030.007c kiṃ cāsya mokṣaṇārthāya prayacchanti divaukasaḥ
analyzed: kim ca asya mokṣaṇa arthāya prayacchanti divaukasaḥ

original: 7.030.008a athābravīn mahātejā indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ
analyzed: atha abravīt mahā tejāḥ indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ

original: 7.030.008c amaratvam ahaṃ deva vṛṇomīhāsya mokṣaṇe
analyzed: amara tvam aham deva vṛṇomi iha asya mokṣaṇe

original: 7.030.009a abravīt tu tadā devo rāvaṇiṃ kamalodbhavaḥ
analyzed: abravīt tu tadā devaḥ rāvaṇim kamalodbhavaḥ

original: 7.030.009c nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi keṣāṃ cit prāṇināṃ bhuvi
analyzed: na asti sarva amara tvam hi keṣām cit prāṇinām bhuvi

original: 7.030.010a athābravīt sa tatrastham indrajit padmasaṃbhavam
analyzed: athā bravīt sa tatrastham indrajit padmasaṃbhavam

original: 7.030.010c śrūyatāṃ yā bhavet siddhiḥ śatakratuvimokṣaṇe
analyzed: śrūyatām yā bhavet siddhiḥ śatakratu vimokṣaṇe

original: 7.030.011a mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam
analyzed: mama iṣṭam nityaśas deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam

original: 7.030.011c saṃgrāmam avatartuṃ vai śatrunirjayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: saṃgrāmam avatartum vai śatru nirjaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 7.030.012a tasmiṃś ced asamāpte tu japyahome vibhāvasoḥ
analyzed: tasmin ced a samāpte tu japya home vibhāvasoḥ

original: 7.030.012c yudhyeyaṃ deva saṃgrāme tadā me syād vināśanam
analyzed: yudhyeyam deva saṃgrāme tadā me syāt vināśanam

original: 7.030.013a sarvo hi tapasā caiva vṛṇoty amaratāṃ pumān
analyzed: sarvaḥ hi tapasā ca eva vṛṇoti amara tām pumān

original: 7.030.013c vikrameṇa mayā tv etad amaratvaṃ pravartitam
analyzed: vikrameṇa mayā tu etat amara tvam pravartitam

original: 7.030.014a evam astv iti taṃ prāha vākyaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: evam astu iti tam prāha vākyam devaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.030.014c muktaś cendrajitā śakro gatāś ca tridivaṃ surāḥ
analyzed: muktaḥ ca indrajitā śakraḥ gatāḥ ca tridivam surāḥ

original: 7.030.015a etasminn antare śakro dīno bhraṣṭāmbarasrajaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare śakraḥ dīnaḥ bhraṣṭa ambara srajaḥ

original: 7.030.015c rāma cintāparītātmā dhyānatatparatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: rāma cintā parīta ātmā dhyāna tatpara tām gataḥ

original: 7.030.016a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtam prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.030.016c śakrakrato kim utkaṇṭhāṃ karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam
analyzed: śakra krato kim utkaṇṭhām karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam

original: 7.030.017a amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho
analyzed: amara indra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho

original: 7.030.017c ekavarṇāḥ samābhāṣā ekarūpāś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: eka varṇāḥ sama ābhāṣāḥ eka rūpāḥ ca sarvaśas

original: 7.030.018a tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā
analyzed: tāsām na asti viśeṣaḥ hi darśane lakṣaṇe vā

original: 7.030.018c tato 'ham ekāgramanās tāḥ prajāḥ paryacintayam
analyzed: tatas ham ekāgra manāḥ tāḥ prajāḥ paryacintayam

original: 7.030.019a so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyam ekāṃ vinirmame
analyzed: saḥ ham tāsām viśeṣa artham striyam ekām vinirmame

original: 7.030.019c yad yat prajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tat tad uddhṛtam
analyzed: yat yat prajānām pratyaṅgam viśiṣṭam tat tat uddhṛtam

original: 7.030.020a tato mayā rūpaguṇair ahalyā strī vinirmitā
analyzed: tatas mayā rūpa guṇaiḥ ahalyā strī vinirmitā

original: 7.030.020c ahalyety eva ca mayā tasyā nāma pravartitam
analyzed: ahalyā iti eva ca mayā tasyāḥ nāma pravartitam

original: 7.030.021a nirmitāyāṃ tu devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha
analyzed: nirmitāyām tu deva indra tasyām nāryām surarṣabha

original: 7.030.021c bhaviṣyatīti kasyaiṣā mama cintā tato 'bhavat
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti kasya eṣā mama cintā tatas bhavat

original: 7.030.022a tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho
analyzed: tvam tu śakra tadā nārīm jānīṣe manasā prabho

original: 7.030.022c sthānādhikatayā patnī mamaiṣeti puraṃdara
analyzed: sthāna adhika tayā patnī mama eṣā iti puraṃdara

original: 7.030.023a sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: sā mayā nyāsa bhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.030.023c nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā
analyzed: nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā

original: 7.030.024a tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ
analyzed: tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyam mahā muneḥ

original: 7.030.024c jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā
analyzed: jñātvā tapasi siddhim ca patnī artham sparśitā tadā

original: 7.030.025a sa tayā saha dharmātmā ramate sma mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: sa tayā saha dharma ātmā ramate sma mahā muniḥ

original: 7.030.025c āsan nirāśā devās tu gautame dattayā tayā
analyzed: āsan nirāśāḥ devāḥ tu gautame dattayā tayā

original: 7.030.026a tvaṃ kruddhas tv iha kāmātmā gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ
analyzed: tvam kruddhaḥ tu iha kāma ātmā gatvā tasya āśramam muneḥ

original: 7.030.026c dṛṣṭavāṃś ca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
analyzed: dṛṣṭavān ca tadā tām strīm dīptām agni śikhām iva

original: 7.030.027a sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā
analyzed: sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kām ārtena sa manyunā

original: 7.030.027c dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca tadā tena āśrame paramarṣiṇā
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ tvam ca tadā tena āśrame parama ṛṣiṇā

original: 7.030.028a tataḥ kruddhena tenāsi śaptaḥ paramatejasā
analyzed: tatas kruddhena tena asi śaptaḥ parama tejasā

original: 7.030.028c gato 'si yena devendra daśābhāgaviparyayam
analyzed: gataḥ si yena deva indra daśā bhāga viparyayam

original: 7.030.029a yasmān me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam
analyzed: yasmāt me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam

original: 7.030.029c tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañ śatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: tasmāt tvam samare rājam śatru hastam gamiṣyasi

original: 7.030.030a ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu bhāvaḥ durbuddhe yaḥ tvayā iha pravartitaḥ

original: 7.030.030c mānuṣeṣv api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mānuṣeṣu api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.030.031a tatrādharmaḥ subalavān samutthāsyati yo mahān
analyzed: tatra adharmaḥ su balavān samutthāsyati yaḥ mahān

original: 7.030.031c tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayy ardhaṃ nipatiṣyati
analyzed: tatra ardham tasya yaḥ kartā tvayi ardham nipatiṣyati

original: 7.030.032a na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara
analyzed: na ca te sthāvaram sthānam bhaviṣyati puraṃdara

original: 7.030.032c etenādharmayogena yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ
analyzed: etena adharma yogena yaḥ tvayā iha pravartitaḥ

original: 7.030.033a yaś ca yaś ca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ ca yaḥ ca sura indraḥ syāt dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati

original: 7.030.033c eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ity asau tvāṃ tadābravīt
analyzed: eṣa śāpaḥ mayā muktaḥ iti asau tvām tadā bravīt

original: 7.030.034a tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ
analyzed: tām tu bhāryām vinirbhartsya saḥ bravīt su mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.030.034c durvinīte vinidhvaṃsa mamāśramasamīpataḥ
analyzed: durvinīte vinidhvaṃsa mama āśrama samīpataḥ

original: 7.030.035a rūpayauvanasaṃpannā yasmāt tvam anavasthitā
analyzed: rūpa yauvana saṃpannā yasmāt tvam anavasthitā

original: 7.030.035c tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: tasmāt rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.030.036a rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham
analyzed: rūpam ca tat prajāḥ sarvāḥ gamiṣyanti su durlabham

original: 7.030.036c yat tavedaṃ samāśritya vibhrame 'yam upasthitaḥ
analyzed: yat tava idam samāśritya vibhrame yam upasthitaḥ

original: 7.030.037a tadā prabhṛti bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prajā rūpasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti bhūyiṣṭham prajāḥ rūpa samanvitāḥ

original: 7.030.037c śāpotsargād dhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam
analyzed: śāpa utsargāt hi tasya idam muneḥ sarvam upāgatam

original: 7.030.038a tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam
analyzed: tat smara tvam mahā bāho duṣkṛtam yat tvayā kṛtam

original: 7.030.038c yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava
analyzed: yena tvam grahaṇam śatroḥ gataḥ na anyena vāsava

original: 7.030.039a śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: śīghram yajasva yajñam tvam vaiṣṇavam su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.030.039c pāvitas tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: pāvitaḥ tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivam tatas

original: 7.030.040a putraś ca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe
analyzed: putraḥ ca tava deva indra na vinaṣṭaḥ mahā raṇe

original: 7.030.040c nītaḥ saṃnihitaś caiva aryakeṇa mahodadhau
analyzed: nītaḥ saṃnihitaḥ ca eva aryakeṇa mahā udadhau

original: 7.030.041a etac chrutvā mahendras tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam
analyzed: etat śrutvā mahā indraḥ tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam

original: 7.030.041c punas tridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsac ca devatāḥ
analyzed: punar tridivam ākrāmat anvaśāsat ca devatāḥ

original: 7.030.042a etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā
analyzed: etat indrajitaḥ rāma balam yat kīrtitam mayā

original: 7.030.042c nirjitas tena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: nirjitaḥ tena devendraḥ prāṇinaḥ nye ca kim punar

original: 7.031.001a tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ vismayāt punar eva hi

original: 7.031.001c uvāca praṇato vākyam agastyam ṛṣisattamam
analyzed: uvāca praṇataḥ vākyam agastyam ṛṣi sattamam

original: 7.031.002a bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama
analyzed: bhagavan kim tadā lokāḥ śūnyāḥ āsan dvijottama

original: 7.031.002c dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: dharṣaṇām yatra na prāptaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 7.031.003a utāho hīnavīryās te babhuvuḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: uta aho hīna vīryāḥ te babhuvuḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ

original: 7.031.003c bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiś ca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: bahiṣkṛtāḥ vara astraiḥ ca bahavaḥ nirjitāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: 7.031.004a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.031.004c uvāca rāmaṃ prahasan pitāmaha iveśvaram
analyzed: uvāca rāmam prahasan pitāmahaḥ iva īśvaram

original: 7.031.005a sa evaṃ bādhamānas tu pārthivān pārthivarṣabha
analyzed: saḥ evam bādhamānaḥ tu pārthivān pārthiva ṛṣabha

original: 7.031.005c cacāra rāvaṇo rāma pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpate
analyzed: cacāra rāvaṇaḥ rāma pṛthivyām pṛthivīpate

original: 7.031.006a tato māhiṣmatīṃ nāma purīṃ svargapurīprabhām
analyzed: tatas māhiṣmatīm nāma purīm svarga purī prabhām

original: 7.031.006c saṃprāpto yatra sāmnidhyaṃ paramaṃ vasuretasaḥ
analyzed: saṃprāptaḥ yatra sāmnidhyam paramam vasuretasaḥ

original: 7.031.007a tulya āsīn nṛpas tasya pratāpād vasuretasaḥ
analyzed: tulyaḥ āsīt nṛpaḥ tasya pratāpāt vasuretasaḥ

original: 7.031.007c arjuno nāma yasyāgniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā
analyzed: arjunaḥ nāma yasya agniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā

original: 7.031.008a tam eva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatir balī
analyzed: tam eva divasam saḥ tha haihaya adhipatiḥ balī

original: 7.031.008c arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ narmadām rantum gataḥ strībhiḥ saha īśvaraḥ

original: 7.031.009a rāvaṇo rākṣasendras tu tasyāmātyān apṛcchata
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ tu tasya amātyān apṛcchata

original: 7.031.009c kvārjuno vo nṛpaḥ so 'dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha
analyzed: kva arjunaḥ vaḥ nṛpaḥ saḥ dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha

original: 7.031.010a rāvaṇo 'ham anuprāpto yuddhepsur nṛvareṇa tu
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ham anuprāptaḥ yuddha īpsuḥ nṛvareṇa tu

original: 7.031.010c mamāgamanam avyagrair yuṣmābhiḥ saṃnivedyatām
analyzed: mama āgamanam avyagraiḥ yuṣmābhiḥ saṃnivedyatām

original: 7.031.011a ity evaṃ rāvaṇenoktās te 'mātyāḥ suvipaścitaḥ
analyzed: iti evam rāvaṇena uktāḥ te mātyāḥ su vipaścitaḥ

original: 7.031.011c abruvan rākṣasapatim asāmnidhyaṃ mahīpateḥ
analyzed: abruvan rākṣasa patim a sāmnidhyam mahīpateḥ

original: 7.031.012a śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunaṃ gatam
analyzed: śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunam gatam

original: 7.031.012c apasṛtyāgato vindhyaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim
analyzed: apasṛtya āgataḥ vindhyam himavat saṃnibham girim

original: 7.031.013a sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm
analyzed: sa tam abhram iva āviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm

original: 7.031.013c apaśyad rāvaṇo vindhyam ālikhantam ivāmbaram
analyzed: apaśyat rāvaṇaḥ vindhyam ālikhantam iva ambaram

original: 7.031.014a sahasraśikharopetaṃ siṃhādhyuṣitakandaram
analyzed: sahasra śikhara upetam siṃha adhyuṣita kandaram

original: 7.031.014c prapāta patitaiḥ śītaiḥ sāṭṭahāsam ivāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: prapāta patitaiḥ śītaiḥ sa aṭṭahāsam iva ambuṣu

original: 7.031.015a devadānavagandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇakiṃnaraiḥ
analyzed: deva dānava gandharvaiḥ sa apsaraḥ gaṇa kiṃnaraiḥ

original: 7.031.015c sāha strībhiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ svargabhūtaṃ mahocchrayam
analyzed: sā āha strībhiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ svarga bhūtam mahā ucchrayam

original: 7.031.016a nadībhiḥ syandamānābhir agatipratimaṃ jalam
analyzed: nadībhiḥ syandamānābhiḥ agati pratimam jalam

original: 7.031.016c sphuṭībhiś calajihvābhir vamantam iva viṣṭhitam
analyzed: sphuṭībhiḥ cala jihvābhiḥ vamantam iva viṣṭhitam

original: 7.031.017a ulkāvantaṃ darīvantaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim
analyzed: ulkāvantam darīvantam himavat saṃnibham girim

original: 7.031.017c paśyamānas tato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau
analyzed: paśyamānaḥ tatas vindhyam rāvaṇaḥ narmadām yayau

original: 7.031.018a calopalajalāṃ puṇyāṃ paścimodadhigāminīm
analyzed: cala upala jalām puṇyām paścima udadhi gāminīm

original: 7.031.018c mahiṣaiḥ sṛmaraiḥ siṃhaiḥ śārdūlarkṣagajottamaiḥ
analyzed: mahiṣaiḥ sṛmaraiḥ siṃhaiḥ śārdūla ṛkṣa gaja uttamaiḥ

original: 7.031.018e uṣṇābhitaptais tṛṣitaiḥ saṃkṣobhitajalāśayām
analyzed: uṣṇa abhitaptaiḥ tṛṣitaiḥ saṃkṣobhita jalāśayām

original: 7.031.019a cakravākaiḥ sakāraṇḍaiḥ sahaṃsajalakukkuṭaiḥ
analyzed: cakravākaiḥ sa kāraṇḍaiḥ sa haṃsa jalakukkuṭaiḥ

original: 7.031.019c sārasaiś ca sadāmattaiḥ kokūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām
analyzed: sārasaiḥ ca sadāmattaiḥ kokūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām

original: 7.031.020a phulladrumakṛtottaṃsāṃ cakravākayugastanīm
analyzed: phulla druma kṛta uttaṃsām cakravāka yuga stanīm

original: 7.031.020c vistīrṇapulinaśroṇīṃ haṃsāvalisumekhalām
analyzed: vistīrṇa pulina śroṇīm haṃsa āvali su mekhalām

original: 7.031.021a puṣpareṇvanuliptāṅgīṃ jalaphenāmalāṃśukām
analyzed: puṣpa reṇu anulipta aṅgīm jalaphena amala aṃśukām

original: 7.031.021c jalāvagāhasaṃsparśāṃ phullotpalaśubhekṣaṇām
analyzed: jala avagāha saṃsparśām phulla utpala śubha īkṣaṇām

original: 7.031.022a puṣpakād avaruhyāśu narmadāṃ saritāṃ varām
analyzed: puṣpakāt avaruhya āśu narmadām saritām varām

original: 7.031.022c iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭām iva varām nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ

original: 7.031.023a sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānākusumaśobhite
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānā kusuma śobhite

original: 7.031.023c upopaviṣṭaḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: upopaviṣṭaḥ sacivaiḥ sārdham rākṣasa puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.031.023e narmadā darśajaṃ harṣam āptavān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: narmadā darśa jam harṣam āptavān rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 7.031.024a tataḥ salīlaṃ prahasān rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa līlam prahasān rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.031.024c uvāca sacivāṃs tatra mārīcaśukasāraṇān
analyzed: uvāca sacivān tatra mārīca śuka sāraṇān

original: 7.031.025a eṣa raśmisahasreṇa jagat kṛtveva kāñcanam
analyzed: eṣa raśmi sahasreṇa jagat kṛtvā iva kāñcanam

original: 7.031.025c tīkṣṇatāpakaraḥ sūryo nabhaso madhyam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tīkṣṇa tāpa karaḥ sūryaḥ nabhasaḥ madhyam āsthitaḥ

original: 7.031.025e mām āsīnaṃ viditveha candrāyāti divākaraḥ
analyzed: mām āsīnam viditvā iha candra āyāti divākaraḥ

original: 7.031.026a narmadā jalaśītaś ca sugandhiḥ śramanāaśanaḥ
7.031.026c madbhayād anilo hy eṣa vāty asau susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: mad bhayāt anilaḥ hi eṣa vāti asau su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.031.027a iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī
analyzed: iyam ca api sarit śreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī

original: 7.031.027c līnamīnavihaṃgormiḥ sabhayevāṅganā sthitā
analyzed: līna mīna vihaṃga ūrmiḥ sa bhayā iva aṅganā sthitā

original: 7.031.028a tad bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrair nṛpair indrasamair yudhi
analyzed: tat bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastraiḥ nṛpaiḥ indra samaiḥ yudhi

original: 7.031.028c candanasya raseneva rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ
analyzed: candanasya rasena iva rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ

original: 7.031.029a te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: te yūyam avagāhadhvam narmadām śarma dām nṛṇām

original: 7.031.029c mahāpadmamukhā mattā gaṅgām iva mahāgajāḥ
analyzed: mahā padma mukhāḥ mattāḥ gaṅgām iva mahā gajāḥ

original: 7.031.030a asyāṃ snātvā mahānadyāṃ pāpmānaṃ vipramokṣyatha
analyzed: asyām snātvā mahā nadyām pāpmānam vipramokṣyatha

original: 7.031.031a aham apy atra puline śaradindusamaprabhe
analyzed: aham api atra puline śarad indu sama prabhe

original: 7.031.031c puṣpopaharaṃ śanakaiḥ kariṣyāmi umāpateḥ
analyzed: puṣpa upaharam śanakais kariṣyāmi umāpateḥ

original: 7.031.032a rāvaṇenaivam uktās tu mārīcaśukasāraṇāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇena evam uktāḥ tu mārīca śuka sāraṇāḥ

original: 7.031.032c samahodaradhūmrākṣā narmadām avagāhire
analyzed: sa mahodara dhūmrākṣāḥ narmadām avagāhire

original: 7.031.033a rākṣasendragajais tais tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī
analyzed: rākṣasa indra gajaiḥ taiḥ tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī

original: 7.031.033c vāmanāñjanapadmādyair gaṅgā iva mahāgajaiḥ
analyzed: vāmana añjana padma ādyaiḥ gaṅgāḥ iva mahā gajaiḥ

original: 7.031.034a tatas te rākṣasāaḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi
analyzed: tatas te rākṣasāḥ snātvā narmadāyāḥ vara ambhasi

original: 7.031.034c uttīrya puṣpāṇy ājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu
analyzed: uttīrya puṣpāṇi ājahruḥ bali artham rāvaṇasya tu

original: 7.031.035a narmadā puline ramye śubhrābhrasadṛśaprabhe
analyzed: narmadā puline ramye śubhra abhra sadṛśa prabhe

original: 7.031.035c rākṣasendrair muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpamayo giriḥ
analyzed: rākṣasa indraiḥ muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpa mayaḥ giriḥ

original: 7.031.036a puṣpeṣūpahṛteṣv eva rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: puṣpeṣu upahṛteṣu eva rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 7.031.036c avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgām iva mahāgajaḥ
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ nadīm snātum gaṅgām iva mahā gajaḥ

original: 7.031.037a tatra snātvā ca vidhivaj japtvā japyam anuttamam
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca vidhivat japtvā japyam anuttamam

original: 7.031.037c narmadā salilāt tasmād uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: narmadā salilāt tasmāt uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.031.038a rāvaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ yāntam anvayuḥ saptarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam prāñjalim yāntam anvayuḥ sapta rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.031.038c yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.031.038e jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate
analyzed: jāmbūnada mayam liṅgam tatra tatra sma nīyate

original: 7.031.039a vālukavedimadhye tu tal liṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: vāluka vedi madhye tu tat liṅgam sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.031.039c arcayām āsa gandhaiś ca puṣpaiś cāmṛtagandhibhiḥ
analyzed: arcayām āsa gandhaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ ca amṛta gandhibhiḥ

original: 7.031.040a tataḥ satām ārtiharaṃ haraṃ paraṃ;
analyzed: tatas satām ārti haram haram param

original: varapradaṃ candramayūkhabhūṣaṇam
7.031.040c samarcayitvā sa niśācaro jagau;
analyzed: samarcayitvā sa niśācaraḥ jagau

original: prasārya hastān praṇanarta cāyatān
analyzed: prasārya hastān praṇanarta ca āyatān

original: 7.032.001a narmadā puline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: narmadā puline yatra rākṣasa indraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.032.001c puṣpopahāraṃ kurute tasmād deśād adūrataḥ
analyzed: puṣpa upahāram kurute tasmāt deśāt adūrataḥ

original: 7.032.002a arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ jayatām śreṣṭhaḥ māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.032.002c krīḍite saha nārībhir narmadātoyam āśritaḥ
analyzed: krīḍite saha nārībhiḥ narmadā toyam āśritaḥ

original: 7.032.003a tāsāṃ madhyagato rāja rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: tāsām madhya gataḥ rāja rarāja sa tatas rjunaḥ

original: 7.032.003c kareṇūnāṃ sahasrasya madhyastha iva kuñjaraḥ
analyzed: kareṇūnām sahasrasya madhya sthaḥ iva kuñjaraḥ

original: 7.032.004a jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam
analyzed: jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnām sahasrasya uttamam balam

original: 7.032.004c rurodha narmadā vegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ
analyzed: rurodha narmadā vegam bāhubhiḥ sa tadā arjunaḥ

original: 7.032.005a kārtavīryabhujāsetuṃ taj jalaṃ prāpya nirmalam
analyzed: kārtavīrya bhujā setum tat jalam prāpya nirmalam

original: 7.032.005c kūlāpahāraṃ kurvāṇaṃ pratisrotaḥ pradhāvati
analyzed: kūla apahāram kurvāṇam pratisrotas pradhāvati

original: 7.032.006a samīnanakramakaraḥ sapuṣpakuśasaṃstaraḥ
7.032.006c sa narmadāmbhaso vegaḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābabhau
analyzed: sa narmadā ambhasaḥ vegaḥ prāvṛṣ kāle iva ābabhau

original: 7.032.007a sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa saṃpreṣiṭa ivāmbhasaḥ
analyzed: sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa saṃpreṣiṭaḥ iva ambhasaḥ

original: 7.032.007c puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha
analyzed: puṣpa upahāram tat sarvam rāvaṇasya jahāra ha

original: 7.032.008a rāvaṇo 'rdhasamāptaṃ tu utsṛjya niyamaṃ tadā
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ṛdh samāptam tu utsṛjya niyamam tadā

original: 7.032.008c narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām
analyzed: narmadām paśyate kāntām pratikūlām yathā priyām

original: 7.032.009a paścimena tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarodgārasaṃnibham
analyzed: paścimena tu tam dṛṣṭvā sāgara udgāra saṃnibham

original: 7.032.009c vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu
analyzed: vardhantam ambhasaḥ vegam pūrvām āśām praviśya tu

original: 7.032.010a tato 'nudbhrāntaśakunāṃ svābhāvye parame sthitām
analyzed: tatas nud bhrānta śakunām svābhāvye parame sthitām

original: 7.032.010c nirvikārāṅganābhāsāṃ paśyate rāvaṇo nadīm
analyzed: nirvikāra aṅganā ābhāsām paśyate rāvaṇaḥ nadīm

original: 7.032.011a savyetarakarāṅgulyā saśabdaṃ ca daśānanaḥ
analyzed: savyetara kara aṅgulyā sa śabdam ca daśānanaḥ

original: 7.032.011c vegaprabhavam anveṣṭuṃ so 'diśac chukasāraṇau
analyzed: vega prabhavam anveṣṭum saḥ diśat śuka sāraṇau

original: 7.032.012a tau tu rāvaṇasaṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau
analyzed: tau tu rāvaṇa saṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śuka sāraṇau

original: 7.032.012c vyomāntaracarau vīrau prasthitau paścimonmukhau
analyzed: vyoma antara carau vīrau prasthitau paścima unmukhau

original: 7.032.013a ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau
analyzed: ardha yojana mātram tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau

original: 7.032.013c paśyetāṃ puruṣaṃ toye krīḍantaṃ sahayoṣitam
analyzed: paśyetām puruṣam toye krīḍantam sahayoṣitam

original: 7.032.014a bṛhatsālapratīkaśaṃ toyavyākulamūrdhajam
analyzed: bṛhat sāla pratīkaśam toya vyākula mūrdhajam

original: 7.032.014c madaraktāntanayanaṃ madanākāravarcasaṃ
analyzed: mada rakta anta nayanam madana ākāra varcasam

original: 7.032.015a nadīṃ bāhusahasreṇa rundhantam arimardanam
analyzed: nadīm bāhu sahasreṇa rundhantam ari mardanam

original: 7.032.015c giriṃ pādasahasreṇa rundhantam iva medinīm
analyzed: girim pāda sahasreṇa rundhantam iva medinīm

original: 7.032.016a bālānāṃ varanārīṇāṃ sahasreṇābhisaṃvṛtam
analyzed: bālānām vara nārīṇām sahasreṇa abhisaṃvṛtam

original: 7.032.016c samadānāṃ kareṇūnāṃ sahasreṇeva kuñjaram
analyzed: sa madānām kareṇūnām sahasreṇa iva kuñjaram

original: 7.032.017a tam adbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śukasāraṇau
analyzed: tam adbhutatamam dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śuka sāraṇau

original: 7.032.017c saṃnivṛttāv upāgamya rāvaṇaṃ tam athocatuḥ
analyzed: saṃnivṛttau upāgamya rāvaṇam tam athā ūcatuḥ

original: 7.032.018a bṛhatsālapratīkāśaḥ ko 'py asau rākṣaseśvara
analyzed: bṛhat sāla pratīkāśaḥ kaḥ pi asau rākṣasa īśvara

original: 7.032.018c narmadāṃ rodhavad ruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: narmadām rodha vat ruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ

original: 7.032.019a tena bāhusahasreṇa saṃniruddhajalā nadī
analyzed: tena bāhu sahasreṇa saṃniruddha jalā nadī

original: 7.032.019c sāgarodgārasaṃkāśān udgārān sṛjate muhuḥ
analyzed: sāgara udgāra saṃkāśān udgārān sṛjate muhur

original: 7.032.020a ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau
analyzed: iti evam bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śuka sāraṇau

original: 7.032.020c rāvaṇo 'rjuna ity uktvā uttasthau yuddhalālasaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ rjunaḥ iti uktvā uttasthau yuddha lālasaḥ

original: 7.032.021a arjunābhimukhe tasmin prasthite rākṣaseśvare
analyzed: arjuna abhimukhe tasmin prasthite rākṣaseśvare

original: 7.032.021c sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ
analyzed: sakṛt eva kṛtaḥ rāvaḥ sa raktaḥ preṣitaḥ ghanaiḥ

original: 7.032.022a mahodaramahāpārśvadhūmrākṣaśukasāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: mahodara mahāpārśva dhūmrākṣa śuka sāraṇaiḥ

original: 7.032.022c saṃvṛto rākṣasendras tu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: saṃvṛtaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ tu tatra agāt yatra saḥ rjunaḥ

original: 7.032.023a nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī
analyzed: na ati dīrgheṇa kālena sa tatas rākṣasaḥ balī

original: 7.032.023c taṃ narmadā hradaṃ bhīmam ājagāmāñjanaprabhaḥ
analyzed: tam narmadā hradam bhīmam ājagāma añjana prabhaḥ

original: 7.032.024a sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam
analyzed: sa tatra strī parivṛtam vāśitābhiḥ iva dvipam

original: 7.032.024c narendraṃ paśyate rājā rākṣasānāṃ tadārjunam
analyzed: narendram paśyate rājā rākṣasānām tadā arjunam

original: 7.032.025a sa roṣād raktanayano rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ
analyzed: sa roṣāt rakta nayanaḥ rākṣasa indraḥ bala uddhataḥ

original: 7.032.025c ity evam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā
analyzed: iti evam arjuna amātyān āha gambhīrayā girā

original: 7.032.026a amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai
analyzed: amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai

original: 7.032.026c yuddhārthaṃ samanuprāpto rāvaṇo nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: yuddha artham samanuprāptaḥ rāvaṇaḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: 7.032.027a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇaḥ thā arjunasya te

original: 7.032.027c uttasthuḥ sāyudhās taṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
analyzed: uttasthuḥ sa āyudhāḥ tam ca rāvaṇam vākyam abruvan

original: 7.032.028a yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa
analyzed: yuddhasya kālaḥ vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa

original: 7.032.028c yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam
analyzed: yaḥ kṣībam strī vṛtam ca eva yoddhum icchasi naḥ nṛpam

original: 7.032.028e vāśitāmadhyagaṃ mattaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram
analyzed: vāśitā madhya gam mattam śārdūlaḥ iva kuñjaram

original: 7.032.029a kṣamasvādya daśagrīva uṣyatāṃ rajanī tvayā
analyzed: kṣamasva adya daśagrīvaḥ uṣyatām rajanī tvayā

original: 7.032.029c yuddhaśraddhā tu yady asti śvas tāta samare 'rjunam
analyzed: yuddha śraddhā tu yadī asti śvas tāta samare rjunam

original: 7.032.030a yadi vāpi tvarā tubhyaṃ yuddhatṛṣṇāsamāvṛtā
analyzed: yadi vā api tvarā tubhyam yuddha tṛṣṇā samāvṛtā

original: 7.032.030c nihatyāsmāṃs tato yuddham arjunenopayāsyasi
analyzed: nihatya asmān tatas yuddham arjunena upayāsyasi

original: 7.032.031a tatas te rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu
analyzed: tatas te rāvaṇa amātyaiḥ amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu

original: 7.032.031c sūditāś cāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāś ca bubhukṣitaiḥ
analyzed: sūditāḥ ca api te yuddhe bhakṣitāḥ ca bubhukṣitaiḥ

original: 7.032.032a tato halahalāśabdo narmadā tira ābabhau
analyzed: tatas halahalā śabdaḥ narmadā tiras ābabhau

original: 7.032.032c arjunasyānuyātrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām
analyzed: arjunasya anuyātrāṇām rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām

original: 7.032.033a iṣubhis tomaraiḥ śūlair vajrakalpaiḥ sakarṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: iṣubhiḥ tomaraiḥ śūlaiḥ vajra kalpaiḥ sa karṣaṇaiḥ

original: 7.032.033c sarāvaṇān ardayantaḥ samantāt samabhidrutāḥ
analyzed: sa rāvaṇān ardayantaḥ samantāt samabhidrutāḥ

original: 7.032.034a haihayādhipayodhānāṃ vega āsīt sudāruṇaḥ
analyzed: haihaya adhipa yodhānām vegaḥ āsīt su dāruṇaḥ

original: 7.032.034c sanakramīnamakarasamudrasyeva nisvanaḥ
analyzed: sa nakra mīna makara samudrasya iva nisvanaḥ

original: 7.032.035a rāvaṇasya tu te 'mātyāḥ prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya tu te mātyāḥ prahasta śuka sāraṇāḥ

original: 7.032.035c kārtavīryabalaṃ kruddhā nirdahanty agnitejasaḥ
analyzed: kārtavīrya balam kruddhāḥ nirdahanti agni tejasaḥ

original: 7.032.036a arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ
analyzed: arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya sa mantriṇaḥ

original: 7.032.036c krīḍamānāya kathitaṃ puruṣair dvārarakṣibhiḥ
analyzed: krīḍamānāya kathitam puruṣaiḥ dvārarakṣibhiḥ

original: 7.032.037a uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: uktvā na bhetavyam iti strī janam sa tatas rjunaḥ

original: 7.032.037c uttatāra jalāt tasmād gaṅgātoyād ivāñjanaḥ
analyzed: uttatāra jalāt tasmāt gaṅgā toyāt iva añjanaḥ

original: 7.032.038a krodhadūṣitanetras tu sa tato 'rjuna pāvakaḥ
analyzed: krodha dūṣita netraḥ tu sa tatas rjuna pāvakaḥ

original: 7.032.038c prajajvāla mahāghoro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: prajajvāla mahā ghoraḥ yugānte iva pāvakaḥ

original: 7.032.039a sa tūrṇataram ādāya varahemāṅgado gadām
analyzed: sa tūrṇataram ādāya vara hema aṅgadaḥ gadām

original: 7.032.039c abhidravati rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ
analyzed: abhidravati rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsi iva divākaraḥ

original: 7.032.040a bāhuvikṣepakaraṇāṃ samudyamya mahāgadām
analyzed: bāhu vikṣepa karaṇām samudyamya mahā gadām

original: 7.032.040c gāruḍaṃ vegam āsthāya āpapātaiva so 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: gāruḍam vegam āsthāya āpapāta eva saḥ rjunaḥ

original: 7.032.041a tasya margaṃ samāvṛtya vindhyo 'rkasyeva parvataḥ
analyzed: tasya margam samāvṛtya vindhyaḥ rkasya iva parvataḥ

original: 7.032.041c sthito vindhya ivākampyaḥ prahasto musalāyudhaḥ
analyzed: sthitaḥ vindhyaḥ iva akampyaḥ prahastaḥ musala āyudhaḥ

original: 7.032.042a tato 'sya musalaṃ ghoraṃ lohabaddhaṃ madoddhataḥ
analyzed: tatas sya musalam ghoram loha baddham mada uddhataḥ

original: 7.032.042c prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ
analyzed: prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddhaḥ rarāsa ca yathā ambudaḥ

original: 7.032.043a tasyāgre musalasyāgnir aśokāpīḍasaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: tasya agre musalasya agniḥ aśoka āpīḍa saṃnibhaḥ

original: 7.032.043c prahastakaramuktasya babhūva pradahann iva
analyzed: prahasta kara muktasya babhūva pradahan iva

original: 7.032.044a ādhāvamānaṃ musalaṃ kārtavīryas tadārjunaḥ
analyzed: ādhāvamānam musalam kārtavīryaḥ tadā arjunaḥ

original: 7.032.044c nipuṇaṃ vañcayām āsa sagado gajavikramaḥ
analyzed: nipuṇam vañcayām āsa sa gadaḥ gaja vikramaḥ

original: 7.032.045a tatas tam abhidudrāva prahastaṃ haihayādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas tam abhidudrāva prahastam haihaya adhipaḥ

original: 7.032.045c bhrāmayāṇo gadāṃ gurvīṃ pañcabāhuśatocchrayām
analyzed: bhrāmayāṇaḥ gadām gurvīm pañca bāhu śata ucchrayām

original: 7.032.046a tenāhato 'tivegena prahasto gadayā tadā
analyzed: tena āhataḥ tivegena prahastaḥ gadayā tadā

original: 7.032.046c nipapāta sthitaḥ śailo vajrivajrahato yathā
analyzed: nipapāta sthitaḥ śailaḥ vajri vajra hataḥ yathā

original: 7.032.047a prahastaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mārīcaśukasāaraṇāḥ
analyzed: prahastam patitam dṛṣṭvā mārīca śuka sāaraṇāḥ

original: 7.032.047c samahodaradhūmrākṣā apasṛptā raṇājirāt
analyzed: sa mahodara dhūmrākṣāḥ apasṛptāḥ raṇa ajirāt

original: 7.032.048a apakrānteṣv amātyeṣu prahaste ca nipātite
analyzed: apakrānteṣu amātyeṣu prahaste ca nipātite

original: 7.032.048c rāvaṇo 'bhyadravat tūrṇam arjunaṃ nṛpasattamam
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ bhyadravat tūrṇam arjunam nṛpa sattamam

original: 7.032.049a sahasrabāhos tad yuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhoś ca dāruṇam
analyzed: sahasrabāhoḥ tat yuddham viṃśadbāhoḥ ca dāruṇam

original: 7.032.049c nṛparākṣasayos tatra ārabdhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: nṛpa rākṣasayoḥ tatra ārabdham loma harṣaṇam

original: 7.032.050a sāgarāv iva saṃkṣubdhau calamūlāv ivācalau
analyzed: sāgarau iva saṃkṣubdhau cala mūlau iva acalau

original: 7.032.050c tejoyuktāv ivādityau pradahantāv ivānalau
analyzed: tejaḥ yuktau iva ādityau pradahantau iva analau

original: 7.032.051a baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau
analyzed: bala uddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitā arthe yathā vṛṣau

original: 7.032.051c meghāv iva vinardantau siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau
analyzed: meghau iva vinardantau siṃhau iva bala utkaṭau

original: 7.032.052a rudrakālāv iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasārjunau
analyzed: rudra kālau iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasa arjunau

original: 7.032.052c parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayām āsatur bhṛśam
analyzed: parasparam gadābhyām tau tāḍayām āsatuḥ bhṛśam

original: 7.032.053a vajraprahārān acalā yathā ghorān viṣehire
analyzed: vajra prahārān acalāḥ yathā ghorān viṣehire

original: 7.032.053c gadāprahārāṃs tadvat tau sahete nararākṣasau
analyzed: gadā prahārān tadvat tau sahete nara rākṣasau

original: 7.032.054a yathāśaniravebhyas tu jāyate vai pratiśrutiḥ
analyzed: yathā aśani ravebhyaḥ tu jāyate vai pratiśrutiḥ

original: 7.032.054c tathā tābhyāṃ gadāpātair diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ
analyzed: tathā tābhyām gadā pātaiḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ

original: 7.032.055a arjunasya gadā sā tu pātyamānāhitorasi
analyzed: arjunasya gadā sā tu pātyamānā ahita urasi

original: 7.032.055c kāñcanābhaṃ nabhaś cakre vidyutsaudāmanī yathā
analyzed: kāñcana ābham nabhaḥ cakre vidyut saudāmanī yathā

original: 7.032.056a tathaiva rāvaṇenāpi pātyamānā muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: tathā eva rāvaṇena api pātyamānā muhur muhur

original: 7.032.056c arjunorasi nirbhāti gadolkeva mahāgirau
analyzed: arjuna urasi nirbhāti gadā ulkā iva mahā girau

original: 7.032.057a nārjunaḥ khedam āpnoti na rākṣasagaṇeśvaraḥ
analyzed: na arjunaḥ khedam āpnoti na rākṣasa gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: 7.032.057c samam āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ
analyzed: samam āsīt tayoḥ yuddham yathā pūrvam bali indrayoḥ

original: 7.032.058a śṛṅgair maharṣabhau yadvad dantāgrair iva kuñjarau
analyzed: śṛṅgaiḥ mahā ṛṣabhau yadvat danta agraiḥ iva kuñjarau

original: 7.032.058c parasparaṃ vinighnantau nararākṣasasattamau
analyzed: parasparam vinighnantau nara rākṣasa sattamau

original: 7.032.059a tato 'rjunena kruddhena sarvaprāṇena sā gadā
analyzed: tatas rjunena kruddhena sarva prāṇena sā gadā

original: 7.032.059c stanayor antare muktā rāvaṇasya mahāhave
analyzed: stanayoḥ antare muktā rāvaṇasya mahā āhave

original: 7.032.060a varadānakṛtatrāṇe sā gadā rāvaṇorasi
analyzed: vara dāna kṛta trāṇe sā gadā rāvaṇa urasi

original: 7.032.060c durbaleva yathā senā dvidhābhūtāpatat kṣitau
analyzed: durbalā iva yathā senā dvidhā abhūta apatat kṣitau

original: 7.032.061a sa tv arjunapramuktena gadāpātena rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tu arjuna pramuktena gadā pātena rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.032.061c apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāada ca niṣṭanan
analyzed: apāsarpat dhanuḥ mātram niṣasāada ca niṣṭanan

original: 7.032.062a sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: sa vihvalam tat ālakṣya daśagrīvam tatas rjunaḥ

original: 7.032.062c sahasā pratijagrāha garutmān iva pannagam
analyzed: sahasā pratijagrāha garutmān iva pannagam

original: 7.032.063a sa taṃ bāhusahasreṇa balād gṛhya daśānanam
analyzed: sa tam bāhu sahasreṇa balāt gṛhya daśānanam

original: 7.032.063c babandha balavān rājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā
analyzed: babandha balavān rājā balim nārāyaṇaḥ yathā

original: 7.032.064a badhyamāne daśagrīve siddhacāraṇadevatāḥ
analyzed: badhyamāne daśagrīve siddha cāraṇa devatāḥ

original: 7.032.064c sādhvīti vādinaḥ puṣpaiḥ kiranty arjunamūrdhani
analyzed: sādhvī iti vādinaḥ puṣpaiḥ kiranti arjuna mūrdhani

original: 7.032.065a vyāghro mṛgam ivādāya siṃharāḍ iva dantinam
analyzed: vyāghraḥ mṛgam iva ādāya siṃha rāj iva dantinam

original: 7.032.065c rarāsa haihayo rājā harṣād ambudavan muhuḥ
analyzed: rarāsa haihayaḥ rājā harṣāt ambuda vat muhur

original: 7.032.066a prahastas tu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam
analyzed: prahastaḥ tu samāśvastaḥ dṛṣṭvā baddham daśānanam

original: 7.032.066c saha tai rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam
analyzed: saha taiḥ rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam

original: 7.032.067a naktaṃcarāṇāṃ vegas tu teṣām āpatatāṃ babhau
analyzed: naktaṃcarāṇām vegaḥ tu teṣām āpatatām babhau

original: 7.032.067c uddhṛta ātapāpāye samudrāṇām ivādbhutaḥ
analyzed: uddhṛte ātapa apāye samudrāṇām iva adbhutaḥ

original: 7.032.068a muñca muñceti bhāṣantas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāsakṛt
analyzed: muñca muñca iti bhāṣantaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca asakṛt

original: 7.032.068c musalāni ca śūlāni utsasarjus tadārjune
analyzed: musalāni ca śūlāni utsasarjuḥ tadā arjune

original: 7.032.069a aprāptāny eva tāny āśu asaṃbhrāntas tadārjunaḥ
analyzed: aprāptāni eva tāni āśu asaṃbhrāntaḥ tadā arjunaḥ

original: 7.032.069c āyudhāny amarārīṇāṃ jagrāha ripusūdanaḥ
analyzed: āyudhāni amarārīṇām jagrāha ripu sūdanaḥ

original: 7.032.070a tatas tair eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ
analyzed: tatas taiḥ eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravara āyudhaiḥ

original: 7.032.070c bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyur ambudharān iva
analyzed: bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyuḥ ambudharān iva

original: 7.032.071a rākṣasāṃs trāsayitvā tu kārtavīryārjunas tadā
analyzed: rākṣasān trāsayitvā tu kārtavīrya arjunaḥ tadā

original: 7.032.071c rāvaṇaṃ gṛhya nagaraṃ praviveśa suhṛdvṛtaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam gṛhya nagaram praviveśa suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: 7.032.072a sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusumākṣatotkarair;
analyzed: sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusuma akṣata utkaraiḥ

original: dvijaiḥ sapauraiḥ puruhūtasaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: dvijaiḥ sa pauraiḥ puruhūta saṃnibhaḥ

original: 7.032.072c tadārjunaḥ saṃpraviveśa tāṃ purīṃ;
analyzed: tadā arjunaḥ saṃpraviveśa tām purīm

original: baliṃ nigṛhyaiva sahasralocanaḥ
analyzed: balim nigṛhya eva sahasralocanaḥ

original: 7.033.001a rāvaṇagrahaṇaṃ tat tu vāyugrahaṇasaṃnibham
analyzed: rāvaṇa grahaṇam tat tu vāyu grahaṇa saṃnibham

original: 7.033.001c ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitam divi daivataiḥ

original: 7.033.002a tataḥ putrasutasnehāt kampyamāno mahādhṛtiḥ
analyzed: tatas putra suta snehāt kampyamānaḥ mahādhṛtiḥ

original: 7.033.002c māhiṣmatīpatiṃ draṣṭum ājagāma mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: māhiṣmatī patim draṣṭum ājagāma mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.033.003a sa vāyumārgam āsthāya vāyutulyagatir dvijaḥ
analyzed: sa vāyu mārgam āsthāya vāyu tulya gatiḥ dvijaḥ

original: 7.033.003c purīṃ māhiṣmatīṃ prāpto manaḥsaṃtāpavikramaḥ
analyzed: purīm māhiṣmatīm prāptaḥ manaḥ saṃtāpa vikramaḥ

original: 7.033.004a so 'marāvatisaṃkāśāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtām
analyzed: saḥ marāvati saṃkāśām hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛtām

original: 7.033.004c praviveśa purīṃ brahmā indrasyevāmarāvatīm
analyzed: praviveśa purīm brahmā indrasya iva amarāvatīm

original: 7.033.005a pādacāram ivādityaṃ niṣpatantaṃ sudurdṛśam
analyzed: pāda cāram iva ādityam niṣpatantam su durdṛśam

original: 7.033.005c tatas te pratyabhijñāya arjunāya nyavedayan
analyzed: tatas te pratyabhijñāya arjunāya nyavedayan

original: 7.033.006a pulastya iti taṃ śrutvā vacanaṃ haihayādhipaḥ
analyzed: pulastyaḥ iti tam śrutvā vacanam haihaya adhipaḥ

original: 7.033.006c śirasy añjalim uddhṛtya pratyudgacchad dvijottamam
analyzed: śirasi añjalim uddhṛtya pratyudgacchat dvijottamam

original: 7.033.007a purohito 'sya gṛhyārghyaṃ madhuparkaṃ tathāiva ca
analyzed: purohitaḥ sya gṛhya arghyam madhuparkam tathā iva ca

original: 7.033.007c purastāt prayayau rājña indrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: purastāt prayayau rājñaḥ indrasya iva bṛhaspatiḥ

original: 7.033.008a tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram
analyzed: tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram

original: 7.033.008c arjuno dṛśya saṃprāptaṃ vavandendra iveśvaram
analyzed: arjunaḥ dṛśya saṃprāptam vavanda indraḥ iva īśvaram

original: 7.033.009a sa tasya madhuparkaṃ ca pādyam arghyaṃ ca dāpayan
analyzed: sa tasya madhuparkam ca pādyam arghyam ca dāpayan

original: 7.033.009c pulastyam āha rājendro harṣagadgadayā girā
analyzed: pulastyam āha rāja indraḥ harṣa gadgadayā girā

original: 7.033.010a adyeyam amarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā
analyzed: adyā iyam amarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā

original: 7.033.010c adyāhaṃ tu dvijendrendra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam
analyzed: adyā aham tu dvijendra indra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam

original: 7.033.011a adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam
analyzed: adya me kuśalam deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam

original: 7.033.011c yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāv imau
analyzed: yat te deva gaṇaiḥ vandyau vande haṃ caraṇau imau

original: 7.033.012a idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam
analyzed: idam rājyam ime putrāḥ ime dārāḥ ime vayam

original: 7.033.012c brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān
analyzed: brahman kim kurma kim kāryam ājñāpayatu naḥ bhavān

original: 7.033.013a taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam
analyzed: tam dharme gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivam pṛṣṭvā atha pārthivam

original: 7.033.013c pulastyovāca rājānaṃ haihayānāṃ tadārjunam
analyzed: pulastyaḥ uvāca rājānam haihayānām tadā arjunam

original: 7.033.014a rājendrāmalapadmākṣapūrṇacandranibhānana
analyzed: rāja indra amala padma akṣa pūrṇa candra nibha ānana

original: 7.033.014c atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvas tvayā jitaḥ
analyzed: atulam te balam yena daśagrīvaḥ tvayā jitaḥ

original: 7.033.015a bhayād yasyāvatiṣṭhetāṃ niṣpandau sāgarānilau
analyzed: bhayāt yasya avatiṣṭhetām niṣpandau sāgara anilau

original: 7.033.015c so 'yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me 'tīvadurjayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautraḥ me tīva durjayaḥ

original: 7.033.016a tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā
analyzed: tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītam nāma viśrāvitam tvayā

original: 7.033.016c madvākyād yācyamāno 'dya muñca vatsa daśānanam
analyzed: mad vākyāt yācyamānaḥ dya muñca vatsa daśānanam

original: 7.033.017a pulastyājñāṃ sa gṛhyātha akiṃcanavaco 'rjunaḥ
analyzed: pulastya ājñām sa gṛhya atha akiṃcanavacaḥ rjunaḥ

original: 7.033.017c mumoca pārthivendrendro rākṣasendraṃ prahṛṣṭavat
analyzed: mumoca pārthiva indra indraḥ rākṣasa indram prahṛṣṭa vat

original: 7.033.018a sa taṃ pramuktvā tridaśārim arjunaḥ;
analyzed: sa tam pramuktvā tridaśa arim arjunaḥ

original: prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ
analyzed: prapūjya divya ābharaṇa sraj ambaraiḥ

original: 7.033.018c ahiṃsākaṃ sakhyam upetya sāgnikaṃ;
analyzed: ahiṃsākam sakhyam upetya sa agnikam

original: praṇamya sa brahmasutaṃ gṛhaṃ yayau
analyzed: praṇamya sa brahma sutam gṛham yayau

original: 7.033.019a pulastyenāpi saṃgamya rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: pulastyena api saṃgamya rākṣasa indraḥ pratāpavān

original: 7.033.019c pariṣvaṅgakṛtātithyo lajjamāno visarjitaḥ
analyzed: pariṣvaṅga kṛta ātithyaḥ lajjamānaḥ visarjitaḥ

original: 7.033.020a pitāmahasutaś cāpi pulastyo munisattamaḥ
analyzed: pitāmaha sutaḥ ca api pulastyaḥ muni sattamaḥ

original: 7.033.020c mocayitvā daśagrīvaṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ
analyzed: mocayitvā daśagrīvam brahma lokam jagāma saḥ

original: 7.033.021a evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt
analyzed: evam sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt

original: 7.033.021c pulastyavacanāc cāpi punar mokṣam avāptavān
analyzed: pulastya vacanāt ca api punar mokṣam avāptavān

original: 7.033.022a evaṃ balibhyo balinaḥ santi rāghavanandana
analyzed: evam balibhyaḥ balinaḥ santi rāghava nandana

original: 7.033.022c nāvajñā parataḥ kāryā ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na avajñā paratas kāryā yaḥ icchet śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: 7.033.023a tataḥ sa rājā piśitāśanānāṃ;
analyzed: tatas sa rājā piśitāśanānām

original: sahasrabāhor upalabhya maitrīm
analyzed: sahasrabāhoḥ upalabhya maitrīm

original: 7.033.023c punar narāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra;
analyzed: punar narāṇām kadanam cakāra

original: cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca darpāt
analyzed: cacāra sarvām pṛthivīm ca darpāt

original: 7.034.001a arjunena vimuktas tu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: arjunena vimuktaḥ tu rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.034.001c cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: cacāra pṛthivīm sarvām anirviṇṇaḥ tathā kṛtaḥ

original: 7.034.002a rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute yaṃ balādhikam
analyzed: rākṣasam vā manuṣyam vā śṛṇute yam bala adhikam

original: 7.034.002c rāvaṇas taṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ tam samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ

original: 7.034.003a tataḥ kadā cit kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām
analyzed: tatas kadā cit kiṣkindhām nagarīm vāli pālitām

original: 7.034.003c gatvāhvayati yuddhāya vālinaṃ hemamālinam
analyzed: gatvā āhvayati yuddhāya vālinam hema mālinam

original: 7.034.004a tatas taṃ vānarāmātyas tāras tārāpitā prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas tam vānara amātyaḥ tāraḥ tārā pitā prabhuḥ

original: 7.034.004c uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vākyaṃ yuddhaprepsum upāgatam
analyzed: uvāca rāvaṇam vākyam yuddha prepsum upāgatam

original: 7.034.005a rākṣasendra gato vālī yas te pratibalo bhavet
analyzed: rākṣasa indra gataḥ vālī yaḥ te pratibalaḥ bhavet

original: 7.034.005c nānyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
analyzed: na anyaḥ pramukhatas sthātum tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ

original: 7.034.006a caturbhyo 'pi samudrebhyaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya rāvaṇa
analyzed: caturbhyaḥ pi samudrebhyaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya rāvaṇa

original: 7.034.006c imaṃ muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam
analyzed: imam muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam

original: 7.034.007a etān asthicayān paśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ
analyzed: etān asthi cayān paśya ye ete śaṅkha pāṇḍurāḥ

original: 7.034.007c yuddhārthinām ime rājan vānarādhipatejasā
analyzed: yuddha arthinām ime rājan vānara adhipa tejasā

original: 7.034.008a yad vāmṛtarasaḥ pītas tvayā rāvaṇarākṣasa
analyzed: yat vā amṛta rasaḥ pītaḥ tvayā rāvaṇa rākṣasa

original: 7.034.008c tathā vālinam āsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
analyzed: tathā vālinam āsādya tad antam tava jīvitam

original: 7.034.009a atha vā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram
analyzed: atha vā tvarase martum gaccha dakṣiṇa sāgaram

original: 7.034.009c vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram
analyzed: vālinam drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram

original: 7.034.010a sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa tu tāram vinirbhartsya rāvaṇaḥ rākṣaseśvaraḥ

original: 7.034.010c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya prayayau dakṣiṇārṇavam
analyzed: puṣpakam tat samāruhya prayayau dakṣiṇa arṇavam

original: 7.034.011a tatra hemagiriprakhyaṃ taruṇārkanibhānanam
analyzed: tatra hema giri prakhyam taruṇa arka nibha ānanam

original: 7.034.011c rāvaṇo vālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdhyopāsanatatparam
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ vālinam dṛṣṭvā saṃdhyā upāsana tatparam

original: 7.034.012a puṣpakād avaruhyātha rāvaṇo 'ñjanasaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: puṣpakāt avaruhya atha rāvaṇaḥ ñjana saṃnibhaḥ

original: 7.034.012c grahītuṃ vālinaṃ tūrṇaṃ niḥśabdapadam ādravat
analyzed: grahītum vālinam tūrṇam niḥśabda padam ādravat

original: 7.034.013a yadṛcchayonmīlayatā vālināpi sa rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: yadṛcchayā unmīlayatā vālinā api sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.034.013c pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaś cakāra na ca saṃbhramam
analyzed: pāpa abhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaḥ cakāra na ca saṃbhramam

original: 7.034.014a śaśam ālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
analyzed: śaśam ālakṣya siṃhaḥ vā pannagam garuḍaḥ yathā

original: 7.034.014c na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
analyzed: na cintayati tam vālī rāvaṇam pāpa niścayam

original: 7.034.015a jighṛkṣamāṇam adyainaṃ rāvaṇaṃ pāpabuddhinam
analyzed: jighṛkṣamāṇam adya enam rāvaṇam pāpa buddhinam

original: 7.034.015c kakṣāvalambinaṃ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi mahārṇavān
analyzed: kakṣa avalambinam kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi mahā arṇavān

original: 7.034.016a drakṣyanty ariṃ mamāṅkasthaṃ sraṃsitorukarāmbaram
analyzed: drakṣyanti arim mama aṅka stham sraṃsita ūru kara ambaram

original: 7.034.016c lambamānaṃ daśagrīvaṃ garuḍasyeva pannagam
analyzed: lambamānam daśagrīvam garuḍasya iva pannagam

original: 7.034.017a ity evaṃ matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ
analyzed: iti evam matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ
