original: 7.034.017c japan vai naigamān mantrāṃs tasthau parvatarāḍ iva
analyzed: japan vai naigamān mantrān tasthau parvatarāj iva

original: 7.034.018a tāv anyonyaṃ jighṛkṣantau harirākṣasapārthivau
analyzed: tau anyonyam jighṛkṣantau hari rākṣasa pārthivau

original: 7.034.018c prayatnavantau tat karma īhatur baladarpitau
analyzed: prayatnavantau tat karma īhatuḥ bala darpitau

original: 7.034.019a hastagrāhyaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam
analyzed: hasta grāhyam tu tam matvā pāda śabdena rāvaṇam

original: 7.034.019c parāṅmukho 'pi jagrāha vālī sarpam ivāṇḍajaḥ
analyzed: parāṅmukhaḥ jagrāha vālī sarpam iva aṇḍajaḥ

original: 7.034.020a grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaraṃ hariḥ
analyzed: grahītu kāmam tam gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaram hariḥ

original: 7.034.020c kham utpapāta vegena kṛtvā kakṣāvalambinam
analyzed: kham utpapāta vegena kṛtvā kakṣa avalambinam

original: 7.034.021a sa taṃ pīḍdayamānas tu vitudantaṃ nakhair muhuḥ
analyzed: sa tam pīḍdayamānaḥ tu vitudantam nakhaiḥ muhur

original: 7.034.021c jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanas toyadaṃ yathā
analyzed: jahāra rāvaṇam vālī pavanaḥ toyadam yathā

original: 7.034.022a atha te rākṣasāmātyā hriyamāṇe daśānane
analyzed: atha te rākṣasa amātyāḥ hriyamāṇe daśānane

original: 7.034.022c mumokṣayiṣavo ghorā ravamāṇā hy abhidravan
analyzed: mumokṣayiṣavaḥ ghorāḥ ravamāṇāḥ hi abhidravan

original: 7.034.023a anvīyamānas tair vālī bhrājate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ taiḥ vālī bhrājate mbara madhya gaḥ

original: 7.034.023c anvīyamāno meghaughair ambarastha ivāṃśumān
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ megha oghaiḥ ambara sthaḥ iva aṃśumān

original: 7.034.024a te 'śaknuvantaḥ saṃprāptaṃ vālinaṃ rākṣasottamāḥ
analyzed: te śaknuvantaḥ saṃprāptam vālinam rākṣasa uttamāḥ

original: 7.034.024c tasya bāhūruvegena pariśrāntaḥ patanti ca
analyzed: tasya bāhu ūru vegena pariśrāntaḥ patanti ca

original: 7.034.025a vālimārgād apākrāman parvatendrā hi gacchataḥ
analyzed: vāli mārgāt apākrāman parvata indrāḥ hi gacchataḥ

original: 7.034.026a apakṣigaṇasaṃpāto vānarendro mahājavaḥ
analyzed: a pakṣi gaṇa saṃpātaḥ vānara indraḥ mahā javaḥ

original: 7.034.026c kramaśaḥ sāgarān sarvān saṃdhyākālam avandata
analyzed: kramaśas sāgarān sarvān saṃdhyā kālam avandata

original: 7.034.027a sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ
analyzed: sabhājyamānaḥ bhūtaiḥ tu khecaraiḥ khecaraḥ hariḥ

original: 7.034.027c paścimaṃ sāgaraṃ vālī ājagāma sarāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: paścimam sāgaram vālī ājagāma sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.034.028a tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ

original: 7.034.028c uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ prāyād vahamāno daśānanam
analyzed: uttaram sāgaram prāyāt vahamānaḥ daśānanam

original: 7.034.029a uttare sāgare saṃdhyām upāsitvā daśānanam
analyzed: uttare sāgare saṃdhyām upāsitvā daśānanam

original: 7.034.029c vahamāno 'gamad vālī pūrvam ambumahānidhim
analyzed: vahamānaḥ gamat vālī pūrvam ambu mahā nidhim

original: 7.034.030a tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: tatra api saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa hari īśvaraḥ

original: 7.034.030c kiṣkindhābhimukho gṛhya rāvaṇaṃ punar āgamat
analyzed: kiṣkindhā abhimukhaḥ gṛhya rāvaṇam punar āgamat

original: 7.034.031a caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ
analyzed: caturṣu api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ

original: 7.034.031c rāvaṇodvahanaśrāntaḥ kiṣkindhopavane 'patat
analyzed: rāvaṇa udvahana śrāntaḥ kiṣkindhā upavane patat

original: 7.034.032a rāvaṇaṃ tu mumocātha svakakṣāt kapisattamaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇam tu mumoca atha sva kakṣāt kapi sattamaḥ

original: 7.034.032c kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: kutas tvam iti ca uvāca prahasan rāvaṇam prati

original: 7.034.033a vismayaṃ tu mahad gatvā śramalokanirīkṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vismayam tu mahat gatvā śrama loka nirīkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.034.033c rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: rākṣasa īśaḥ hari īśam tam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.034.034a vānarendra mahendrābha rākṣasendro 'smi rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: vānara indra mahā indra ābha rākṣasa indraḥ smi rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.034.034c yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā
analyzed: yuddha īpsuḥ aham saṃprāptaḥ sa ca adya āsāditaḥ tvayā

original: 7.034.035a aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te
analyzed: aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīra tā ca te

original: 7.034.035c yenāhaṃ paśuvad gṛhya bhrāmitaś caturo 'rṇavān
analyzed: yena aham paśu vat gṛhya bhrāmitaḥ caturaḥ rṇavān

original: 7.034.036a evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara
analyzed: evam aśrānta vat vīra śīghram eva ca vānara

original: 7.034.036c māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati
analyzed: mām ca eva udvahamānaḥ tu kaḥ nyaḥ vīraḥ kramiṣyati

original: 7.034.037a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama
analyzed: trayāṇām eva bhūtānām gatiḥ eṣā plavaṃgama

original: 7.034.037c mano'nilasuparṇānāṃ tava vā nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ nila suparṇānām tava vā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.034.038a so 'haṃ dṛṣṭabalas tubhyam icchāmi haripuṃgava
analyzed: saḥ ham dṛṣṭa balaḥ tubhyam icchāmi hari puṃgava

original: 7.034.038c tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ
analyzed: tvayā saha ciram sakhyam su snigdham pāvaka agratas

original: 7.034.039a dārāḥ putrāḥ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhogācchādanabhojanam
analyzed: dārāḥ putrāḥ puram rāṣṭram bhoga ācchādana bhojanam

original: 7.034.039c sarvam evāvibhaktaṃ nau bhaviṣyati harīśvara
analyzed: sarvam eva avibhaktam nau bhaviṣyati hari īśvara

original: 7.034.040a tataḥ prajvālayitvāgniṃ tāv ubhau harirākṣasau
analyzed: tatas prajvālayitvā agnim tau ubhau hari rākṣasau

original: 7.034.040c bhrātṛtvam upasaṃpannau pariṣvajya parasparam
analyzed: bhrātṛ tvam upasaṃpannau pariṣvajya parasparam

original: 7.034.041a anyonyaṃ lambitakarau tatas tau harirākṣasau
analyzed: anyonyam lambita karau tatas tau hari rākṣasau

original: 7.034.041c kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva
analyzed: kiṣkindhām viśatuḥ hṛṣṭau siṃhau giri guhām iva

original: 7.034.042a sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīvaḥ iva rāvaṇaḥ

original: 7.034.042c amātyair āgatair nīcas trailokyotsādanārthibhiḥ
analyzed: amātyaiḥ āgataiḥ nīcaḥ trailokya utsādana arthibhiḥ

original: 7.034.043a evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho
analyzed: evam etat purāvṛttam vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho

original: 7.034.043c dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau
analyzed: dharṣitaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ca api bhrātā pāvaka saṃnidhau

original: 7.034.044a balam apratimaṃ rāma vālino 'bhavad uttamam
analyzed: balam apratimam rāma vālinaḥ bhavat uttamam

original: 7.034.044c so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā
analyzed: saḥ pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabhaḥ vahninā yathā

original: 7.035.001a apṛcchata tato rāmo dakṣiṇāśālayaṃ munim
analyzed: apṛcchata tatas rāmaḥ dakṣiṇā āśā ālayam munim

original: 7.035.001c prāñjalir vinayopeta idam āha vaco 'rthavat
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ vinaya upetaḥ idam āha vacaḥ rthavat

original: 7.035.002a atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: atulam balam etābhyām vālinaḥ rāvaṇasya ca

original: 7.035.002c na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama
analyzed: na tu etau hanumat vīryaiḥ samau iti matiḥ mama

original: 7.035.003a śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam
analyzed: śauryam dākṣyam balam dhairyam prājña tā naya sādhanam

original: 7.035.003c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ
analyzed: vikramaḥ ca prabhāvaḥ ca hanūmati kṛta ālayāḥ

original: 7.035.004a dṛṣṭvodadhiṃ viṣīdantīṃ tadaiṣa kapivāhinīm
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā udadhim viṣīdantīm tadā eṣa kapi vāhinīm

original: 7.035.004c samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
analyzed: samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyas yojanānām śatam plutaḥ

original: 7.035.005a dharṣayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ tathā
analyzed: dharṣayitvā purīm laṅkām rāvaṇa antaḥpuram tathā

original: 7.035.005c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā ca api sītā viśvāsitā tathā

original: 7.035.006a senāgragā mantrisutāḥ kiṃkarā rāvaṇātmajaḥ
analyzed: senā agragāḥ mantri sutāḥ kiṃkarāḥ rāvaṇa ātmajaḥ

original: 7.035.006c ete hanumatā tatra ekena vinipātitāḥ
analyzed: ete hanumatā tatra ekena vinipātitāḥ

original: 7.035.007a bhūyo bandhād vimuktena saṃbhāṣitvā daśānanam
analyzed: bhūyas bandhāt vimuktena saṃbhāṣitvā daśānanam

original: 7.035.007c laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā tena pāvakeneva medinī
analyzed: laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā tena pāvakena iva medinī

original: 7.035.008a na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca
analyzed: na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇoḥ vittapasya ca

original: 7.035.008c karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ
analyzed: karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ

original: 7.035.009a etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: etasya bāhu vīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.035.009c prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: prāptaḥ mayā jayaḥ ca eva rājyam mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ

original: 7.035.010a hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā
analyzed: hanūmān yadi me na syāt vānara adhipateḥ sakhā

original: 7.035.010c pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet
analyzed: pravṛttam api kaḥ vettum jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet

original: 7.035.011a kimarthaṃ vālī caitena sugrīvapriyakāmyayā
analyzed: kimartham vālī ca etena sugrīva priya kāmyayā

original: 7.035.011c tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā
analyzed: tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdhaḥ vīrudhaḥ yathā

original: 7.035.012a na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam
analyzed: na hi veditavān manye hanumān ātmanaḥ balam

original: 7.035.012c yad dṛṣṭavāñ jīviteṣṭaṃ kliśyantaṃ vānarādhipam
analyzed: yat dṛṣṭavām jīvita iṣṭam kliśyantam vānara adhipam

original: 7.035.013a etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune
analyzed: etat me bhagavan sarvam hanūmati mahā mune

original: 7.035.013c vistareṇa yathātattvaṃ kathayāmarapūjita
analyzed: vistareṇa yathātattvam kathaya amara pūjita

original: 7.035.014a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetu yuktam ṛṣiḥ tatas

original: 7.035.014c hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: hanūmataḥ samakṣam tam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.035.015a satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ
analyzed: satyam etat raghu śreṣṭha yat bravīṣi hanūmataḥ

original: 7.035.015c na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ
analyzed: na bale vidyate tulyaḥ na gatau na matau paraḥ

original: 7.035.016a amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā
analyzed: amogha śāpaiḥ śāpaḥ tu dattaḥ syaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ purā

original: 7.035.016c na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ
analyzed: na veditā balam yena balī san ari mardanaḥ

original: 7.035.017a bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala
analyzed: bālye pi etena yat karma kṛtam rāma mahā bala

original: 7.035.017c tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te
analyzed: tat na varṇayitum śakyam ati bāla tayā asya te

original: 7.035.018a yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava
analyzed: yadi vā asti tu abhiprāyaḥ tat śrotum tava rāghava

original: 7.035.018c samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham
analyzed: samādhāya matim rāma niśāmaya vadāmi aham

original: 7.035.019a sūryadattavarasvarṇaḥ sumerur nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: sūrya datta vara svarṇaḥ sumeruḥ nāma parvataḥ

original: 7.035.019c yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā
analyzed: yatra rājyam praśāsti asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā

original: 7.035.020a tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā
analyzed: tasya bhāryā babhūva iṣṭā hi añjanā iti pariśrutā

original: 7.035.020c janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam
analyzed: janayām āsa tasyām vai vāyuḥ ātmajam uttamam

original: 7.035.021a śāliśūkasamābhāsaṃ prāsūtemaṃ tadāñjanā
analyzed: śāli śūka sama ābhāsam prāsūta imam tadā añjanā

original: 7.035.021c phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā
analyzed: phalāni āhartu kāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā

original: 7.035.022a eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ
analyzed: eṣa mātuḥ viyogāt ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśa arditaḥ

original: 7.035.022c ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva
analyzed: ruroda śiśuḥ atyartham śiśuḥ śarabha rāj iva

original: 7.035.023a tatodyantaṃ vivasvantaṃ japā puṣpotkaropamam
analyzed: tatas udyantam vivasvantam japā puṣpa utkara upamam

original: 7.035.023c dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati
analyzed: dadṛśe phala lobhāt ca utpapāta ravim prati

original: 7.035.024a bālārkābhimukho bālo bālārka iva mūrtimān
analyzed: bāla arka abhimukhaḥ bālaḥ bāla arkaḥ iva mūrtimān

original: 7.035.024c grahītukāmo bālārkaṃ plavate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ
analyzed: grahītu kāmaḥ bāla arkam plavate mbara madhya gaḥ

original: 7.035.025a etasmin plavanāne tu śiśubhāve hanūmati
analyzed: etasmin tu śiśu bhāve hanūmati

original: 7.035.025c devadānavasiddhānāṃ vismayaḥ sumahān abhūt
analyzed: deva dānava siddhānām vismayaḥ su mahān abhūt

original: 7.035.026a nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā
analyzed: nā api evam vegavān vāyuḥ garuḍaḥ na manaḥ tathā

original: 7.035.026c yathāyaṃ vāyuputras tu kramate 'mbaram uttamam
analyzed: yathā ayam vāyuputraḥ tu kramate mbaram uttamam

original: 7.035.027a yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau
analyzed: yadi tāvat śiśoḥ asya īdṛśau gati vikramau

original: 7.035.027c yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yauvanam balam āsādya katham vegaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.035.028a tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantam putram ātmanaḥ

original: 7.035.028c sūryadāhabhayād rakṣaṃs tuṣāracayaśītalaḥ
7.035.029a bahuyojanasāhasraṃ kramaty eṣa tato 'mbaram
analyzed: bahu yojana sāhasram kramati eṣa tatas mbaram

original: 7.035.029c pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ
analyzed: pituḥ balāt ca bālyāt ca bhāskara abhyāśam āgataḥ

original: 7.035.030a śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ
analyzed: śiśuḥ eṣa tu a doṣa jñaḥ iti matvā divākaraḥ

original: 7.035.030c kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ
analyzed: kāryam ca atra samāyattam iti evam na dadāha saḥ

original: 7.035.031a yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ
analyzed: yam eva divasam hi eṣa grahītum bhāskaram plutaḥ

original: 7.035.031c tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram
analyzed: tam eva divasam rāhuḥ jighṛkṣati divākaram

original: 7.035.032a anena ca parāmṛṣṭo rāma sūryarathopati
analyzed: anena ca parāmṛṣṭaḥ rāma sūrya rathopati

original: 7.035.032c apakrāntas tatas trasto rāhuś candrārkamardanaḥ
analyzed: apakrāntaḥ tatas trastaḥ rāhuḥ candra arka mardanaḥ

original: 7.035.033a sa indrabhavanaṃ gatvā saroṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ
analyzed: saḥ indra bhavanam gatvā sa roṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ

original: 7.035.033c abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
analyzed: abravīt bhrukuṭīm kṛtvā devam deva gaṇaiḥ vṛtam

original: 7.035.034a bubhukṣāpanayaṃ dattvā candrārkau mama vāsava
analyzed: bubhukṣā apanayam dattvā candra arkau mama vāsava

original: 7.035.034c kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan
analyzed: kim idam tat tvayā dattam anyasya bala vṛtra han

original: 7.035.035a adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ
analyzed: adya aham parva kāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ

original: 7.035.035c athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim
analyzed: atha anyaḥ rāhuḥ āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim

original: 7.035.036a sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ
analyzed: sa rāhoḥ vacanam śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhrama anvitaḥ

original: 7.035.036c utpapātāsanaṃ hitvā udvahan kāñcanasrajam
analyzed: utpapāta āsanam hitvā udvahan kāñcana srajam

original: 7.035.037a tataḥ kailāsakūṭābhaṃ caturdantaṃ madasravam
analyzed: tatas kailāsa kūṭa ābham catur dantam mada sravam

original: 7.035.037c śṛṅgārakāriṇaṃ prāṃṣuṃ svarṇaghaṇṭāṭṭahāsinam
analyzed: śṛṅgāra kāriṇam prāṃṣum svarṇa ghaṇṭā aṭṭahāsinam

original: 7.035.038a indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
analyzed: indraḥ kari indram āruhya rāhum kṛtvā puraḥsaram

original: 7.035.038c prāyād yatrābhavat sūryaḥ sahānena hanūmatā
analyzed: prāyāt yatra abhavat sūryaḥ saha anena hanūmatā

original: 7.035.039a athātirabhasenāgād rāhur utsṛjya vāsavam
analyzed: atha ati rabhasena agāt rāhuḥ utsṛjya vāsavam

original: 7.035.039c anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat
analyzed: anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭaḥ ādhāvam śaila kūṭa vat

original: 7.035.040a tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca
analyzed: tatas sūryam samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca

original: 7.035.040c utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam
analyzed: utpapāta punar vyoma grahītum siṃhikā sutam

original: 7.035.041a utsṛjyārkam imaṃ rāma ādhāvantaṃ plavaṃgamam
analyzed: utsṛjya arkam imam rāmaḥ ādhāvantam plavaṃgamam

original: 7.035.041c dṛṣṭvā rāhuḥ parāvṛtya mukhaśeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rāhuḥ parāvṛtya mukha śeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ

original: 7.035.042a indram āśaṃsamānas tu trātāraṃ siṃhikāsutaḥ
analyzed: indram āśaṃsamānaḥ tu trātāram siṃhikāsutaḥ

original: 7.035.042c indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata
analyzed: indraḥ indra iti saṃtrāsāt muhur muhur abhāṣata

original: 7.035.043a rāhor vikrośamānasya prāg evālakṣitaḥ svaraḥ
analyzed: rāhoḥ vikrośamānasya prāk eva a lakṣitaḥ svaraḥ

original: 7.035.043c śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
analyzed: śrutvā indra uvāca mām bhaiṣīḥ ayam enam nihanmi aham

original: 7.035.044a airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api
analyzed: airāvatam tatas dṛṣṭvā mahat tat idam iti api

original: 7.035.044c phalaṃ taṃ hastirājānam abhidudrāva mārutiḥ
analyzed: phalam tam hasti rājānam abhidudrāva mārutiḥ

original: 7.035.045a tadāsya dhāvato rūpam airāvatajighṛkṣayā
analyzed: tadā asya dhāvataḥ rūpam airāvata jighṛkṣayā

original: 7.035.045c muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram
analyzed: muhūrtam abhavat ghoram indra agnyoḥ iva bhāsvaram

original: 7.035.046a evam ādhāvamānaṃ tu nātikruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ
analyzed: evam ādhāvamānam tu na ati kruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ

original: 7.035.046c hastāntenātimuktena kuliśenābhyatāḍayat
analyzed: hasta antena atimuktena kuliśena abhyatāḍayat

original: 7.035.047a tato girau papātaiṣa indravajrābhitāḍitaḥ
analyzed: tatas girau papāta eṣaḥ indra vajra abhitāḍitaḥ

original: 7.035.047c patamānasya caitasya vāmo hanur abhajyata
analyzed: patamānasya ca etasya vāmaḥ hanuḥ abhajyata

original: 7.035.048a tasmiṃs tu patite bāle vajratāḍanavihvale
analyzed: tasmin tu patite bāle vajra tāḍana vihvale

original: 7.035.048c cukrodhendrāya pavanaḥ prajānām aśivāya ca
analyzed: cukrodha indrāya pavanaḥ prajānām aśivāya ca

original: 7.035.049a viṇmūtrāśayam āvṛtya prajāsv antargataḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: viṣ mūtra āśayam āvṛtya prajāsu antargataḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.035.049c rurodha sarvabhūtāni yathā varṣāṇi vāsavaḥ
analyzed: rurodha sarva bhūtāni yathā varṣāṇi vāsavaḥ

original: 7.035.050a vāyuprakopād bhūtāni nirucchvāsāni sarvataḥ
analyzed: vāyu prakopāt bhūtāni nirucchvāsāni sarvatas

original: 7.035.050c saṃdhibhir bhajyamānāni kāṣṭhabhūtāni jajñire
analyzed: saṃdhibhiḥ bhajyamānāni kāṣṭha bhūtāni jajñire

original: 7.035.051a niḥsvadhaṃ nirvaṣaṭkāraṃ niṣkriyaṃ dharmavarjitam
analyzed: niḥsvadham nirvaṣaṭkāram niṣkriyam dharma varjitam

original: 7.035.051c vāyuprakopāt trailokyaṃ nirayastham ivābabhau
analyzed: vāyu prakopāt trailokyam niraya stham iva ābabhau

original: 7.035.052a tataḥ prajāḥ sagandharvāḥ sadevāsuramānuṣāḥ
analyzed: tatas prajāḥ sa gandharvāḥ sa deva asura mānuṣāḥ

original: 7.035.052c prajāpatiṃ samādhāvann asukhārtāḥ sukhaiṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatim samādhāvan a sukha ārtāḥ sukha eṣiṇaḥ

original: 7.035.053a ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā darodaranibhodarāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ devāḥ dara udara nibha udarāḥ

original: 7.035.053c tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ
analyzed: tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ

original: 7.035.054a tvayā datto 'yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: tvayā dattaḥ yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ

original: 7.035.054c so 'smān prāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmād eṣo 'dya sattama
analyzed: saḥ smān prāṇa īśvaraḥ bhūtvā kasmāt eṣaḥ sattama

original: 7.035.055a rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayann antaḥpura iva striyaḥ
analyzed: rurodha duḥkham janayan antaḥpure iva striyaḥ

original: 7.035.055c tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunopahatā vibho
analyzed: tasmāt tvām śaraṇam prāptāḥ vāyunā upahatāḥ vibho

original: 7.035.056a vāyusaṃrodhajaṃ duḥkham idaṃ no nuda śatruhan
analyzed: vāyu saṃrodha jam duḥkham idam naḥ nuda śatru han

original: 7.035.057a etat prajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: etat prajānām śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 7.035.057c kāraṇād iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata
analyzed: kāraṇāt iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata

original: 7.035.058a yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuś cukrodha ca rurodha ca
analyzed: yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuḥ cukrodha ca rurodha ca

original: 7.035.058c prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam
analyzed: prajāḥ śṛṇudhvam tat sarvam śrotavyam ca ātmanaḥ kṣamam

original: 7.035.059a putras tasyāmareśena indreṇādya nipātitaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ tasya amara īśena indreṇa adya nipātitaḥ

original: 7.035.059c rāhor vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopito 'nilaḥ
analyzed: rāhoḥ vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopitaḥ nilaḥ

original: 7.035.060a aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu vāyuś carati pālayan
analyzed: aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu vāyuḥ carati pālayan

original: 7.035.060c śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: śarīram hi vinā vāyum sama tām yāti reṇubhiḥ

original: 7.035.061a vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukhaṃ vāyur vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukham vāyuḥ vāyuḥ sarvam idam jagat

original: 7.035.061c vāyunā saṃparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat
analyzed: vāyunā saṃparityaktam na sukham vindate jagat

original: 7.035.062a adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagad āyuṣā
analyzed: adyā eva ca parityaktam vāyunā jagat āyuṣā

original: 7.035.062c adyaiveme nirucchvāsāḥ kāṣṭhakuḍyopamāḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: adyā eva ime nirucchvāsāḥ kāṣṭha kuḍya upamāḥ sthitāḥ

original: 7.035.063a tad yāmas tatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi vaḥ
analyzed: tat yāmaḥ tatra yatra āste mārutaḥ ruc pradaḥ hi vaḥ

original: 7.035.063c mā vināśaṃ gamiṣyāma aprasādyāditeḥ sutam
analyzed: mā vināśam gamiṣyāma a prasādya aditeḥ sutam

original: 7.035.064a tataḥ prajābhiḥ sahitaḥ prajāpatiḥ;
analyzed: tatas prajābhiḥ sahitaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: sadevagandharvabhujaṃgaguhyakaḥ
7.035.064c jagāma tatrāsyati yatra mārutaḥ;
analyzed: jagāma tatra asyati yatra mārutaḥ

original: sutaṃ surendrābhihataṃ pragṛhya saḥ
analyzed: sutam sura indra abhihatam pragṛhya saḥ

original: 7.035.065a tato 'rkavaiśvānarakāñcanaprabhaṃ;
analyzed: tatas rka vaiśvānara kāñcana prabham

original: sutaṃ tadotsaṅgagataṃ sadā gateḥ
analyzed: sutam tadā utsaṅga gatam sadā gateḥ

original: 7.035.065c caturmukho vīkṣya kṛpām athākarot;
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ vīkṣya kṛpām atha akarot

original: sadevasiddharṣibhujaṃgarākṣasaḥ
analyzed: sa deva siddha ṛṣi bhujaṃga rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.036.001a tataḥ pitāmahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ putravadhārditaḥ
analyzed: tatas pitāmaham dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ putra vadha arditaḥ

original: 7.036.001c śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhātur agrataḥ
analyzed: śiśukam tam samādāya uttasthau dhātuḥ agratas

original: 7.036.002a calatkuṇḍalamaulisraktapanīyavibhūṣaṇaḥ
7.036.002c pādayor nyapatad vāyus tisro' vasthāya vedhase
analyzed: pādayoḥ nyapatat vāyuḥ tisraḥ vasthāya vedhase

original: 7.036.003a taṃ tu vedavidādyas tu lambābharaṇaśobhinā
analyzed: tam tu veda vid ādyaḥ tu lamba ābharaṇa śobhinā

original: 7.036.003c vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān
analyzed: vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśum tam parimṛṣṭavān

original: 7.036.004a spṛṣṭamātras tataḥ so 'tha salīlaṃ padmajanmanā
analyzed: spṛṣṭa mātraḥ tatas saḥ tha sa līlam padmajanmanā

original: 7.036.004c jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punar jīvitam āptavān
analyzed: jala siktam yathā sasyam punar jīvitam āptavān

original: 7.036.005a prāṇavantam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā
analyzed: prāṇavantam imam dṛṣṭvā prāṇaḥ gandhavahaḥ mudā

original: 7.036.005c cacāra sarvabhūteṣu saṃniruddhaṃ yathāpurā
analyzed: cacāra sarva bhūteṣu saṃniruddham yathā purā

original: 7.036.006a marudrogavinirmuktāḥ prajā vai muditābhavan
analyzed: marut roga vinirmuktāḥ prajāḥ vai muditāḥ abhavan

original: 7.036.006c śītavātavinirmuktāḥ padminya iva sāmbujāḥ
analyzed: śīta vāta vinirmuktāḥ padminyaḥ iva sa ambujāḥ

original: 7.036.007a tatas triyugmas trikakut tridhāmā tridaśārcitaḥ
7.036.007c uvāca devatā brahmā mārutapriyakāmyayā
analyzed: uvāca devatāḥ brahmā māruta priya kāmyayā

original: 7.036.008a bho mahendrāgnivaruṇadhaneśvaramaheśvarāḥ
analyzed: bho mahendra agni varuṇa dhaneśvara maheśvarāḥ

original: 7.036.008c jānatām api tat sarvaṃ hitaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatām
analyzed: jānatām api tat sarvam hitam vakṣyāmi śrūyatām

original: 7.036.009a anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: anena śiśunā kāryam kartavyam vaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.009c dadatāsya varān sarve mārutasyāsya tuṣṭidān
analyzed: dadata asya varān sarve mārutasya asya tuṣṭi dān

original: 7.036.010a tataḥ sahasranayanaḥ prītiraktaḥ śubhānanaḥ
analyzed: tatas sahasranayanaḥ prīti raktaḥ śubha ānanaḥ

original: 7.036.010c kuśe śayamayīṃ mālāṃ samutkṣipyedam abravīt
analyzed: kuśe śaya mayīm mālām samutkṣipya idam abravīt

original: 7.036.011a matkarotsṛṣṭavajreṇa hanur asya yathā kṣataḥ
analyzed: mad kara utsṛṣṭa vajreṇa hanuḥ asya yathā kṣataḥ

original: 7.036.011c nāmnaiṣa kapiśārdūlo bhavitā hanumān iti
analyzed: nāmnā eṣa kapi śārdūlaḥ bhavitā hanumān iti

original: 7.036.012a aham evāsya dāsyāmi paramaṃ varam uttamam
analyzed: aham eva asya dāsyāmi paramam varam uttamam

original: 7.036.012c ataḥ prabhṛti vajrasya mamāvadhyo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: atas prabhṛti vajrasya mama avadhyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.013a mārtāṇḍas tv abravīt tatra bhagavāṃs timirāpahaḥ
analyzed: mārtāṇḍaḥ tu abravīt tatra bhagavān timira apahaḥ

original: 7.036.013c tejaso 'sya madīyasya dadāmi śatikāṃ kalām
analyzed: tejasaḥ sya madīyasya dadāmi śatikām kalām

original: 7.036.014a yadā tu śāstrāṇy adhyetuṃ śaktir asya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yadā tu śāstrāṇi adhyetum śaktiḥ asya bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.014c tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tadā asya śāstram dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.015a varuṇaś ca varaṃ prādān nāsya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
analyzed: varuṇaḥ ca varam prādāt na asya mṛtyuḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.015c varṣāyutaśatenāpi matpāśād udakād api
analyzed: varṣa ayuta śatena api mad pāśāt udakāt api

original: 7.036.016a yamo 'pi daṇḍāvadhyatvam arogatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ
analyzed: daṇḍa avadhya tvam aroga tvam ca nityaśas

original: 7.036.016c diśate 'sya varaṃ tuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge
analyzed: diśate sya varam tuṣṭa aviṣādam ca saṃyuge

original: 7.036.017a gadeyaṃ māmikā nainaṃ saṃyugeṣu vadhiṣyati
analyzed: gadeyam māmikā na enam saṃyugeṣu vadhiṣyati

original: 7.036.017c ity evaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hy ekākṣipiṅgalaḥ
analyzed: iti evam vara daḥ prāha tadā hi eka akṣi piṅgalaḥ

original: 7.036.018a matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: mattaḥ mad āyudhānām ca na vadhyaḥ yam bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.018c ity evaṃ śaṃkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ
analyzed: iti evam śaṃkareṇa api dattaḥ sya paramaḥ varaḥ

original: 7.036.019a sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: sarveṣām brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyaḥ yam bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.019c dīrghāayuś ca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: dīrghāayuḥ ca mahātmā ca iti brahmā abravīt vacaḥ

original: 7.036.020a viśvakarmā tu dṛṣṭvainaṃ bālasūryopamaṃ śiśum
analyzed: viśvakarmā tu dṛṣṭvā enam bāla sūrya upamam śiśum

original: 7.036.020c śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.036.021a vinirmitāni devānām āyudhānīha yāni tu
analyzed: vinirmitāni devānām āyudhāni iha yāni tu

original: 7.036.021c teṣāṃ saṃgrāmakāle tu avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: teṣām saṃgrāma kāle tu avadhyaḥ yam bhaviṣyati

original: 7.036.022a tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varair dṛṣṭvā hy enam akaṃkṛtam
analyzed: tatas surāṇām tu varaiḥ dṛṣṭvā hi enam akaṃkṛtam

original: 7.036.022c caturmukhas tuṣṭamukho vāyum āha jagadguruḥ
analyzed: caturmukhaḥ tuṣṭa mukhaḥ vāyum āha jagadguruḥ

original: 7.036.023a amitrāṇāṃ bhayakaro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: amitrāṇām bhaya karaḥ mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ

original: 7.036.023c ajeyo bhavitā te 'tra putro mārutamārutiḥ
analyzed: ajeyaḥ bhavitā te tra putraḥ mārutamārutiḥ

original: 7.036.024a rāvaṇotsādanārthāni rāmaprītikarāṇi ca
analyzed: rāvaṇa utsādana arthāni rāma prīti karāṇi ca

original: 7.036.024c romaharṣakarāṇy eṣa kartā karmāṇi saṃyuge
analyzed: roma harṣa karāṇi eṣa kartā karmāṇi saṃyuge

original: 7.036.025a evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutaṃ te 'maraiḥ saha
analyzed: evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutam te maraiḥ saha

original: 7.036.025c yathāgataṃ yayuḥ sarve pitāmahapurogamāḥ
analyzed: yathāgatam yayuḥ sarve pitāmaha purogamāḥ

original: 7.036.026a so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛham ānayat
analyzed: saḥ pi gandhavahaḥ putram pragṛhya gṛham ānayat

original: 7.036.026c añjanāyāstam ākhyāya varaṃ dattaṃ viniḥsṛtaḥ
analyzed: añjanāyāḥ tam ākhyāya varam dattam viniḥsṛtaḥ

original: 7.036.027a prāpya rāma varān eṣa varadānabalānvitaḥ
analyzed: prāpya rāma varān eṣa vara dāna bala anvitaḥ

original: 7.036.027c balenātmani saṃsthena so 'pūryata yathārṇavaḥ
analyzed: balena ātmani saṃsthena saḥ pūryata yathā arṇavaḥ

original: 7.036.028a balenāpūryamāṇo hi eṣa vānarapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: balena āpūryamāṇaḥ hi eṣa vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.036.028c āśrameṣu maharṣīṇām aparādhyati nirbhayaḥ
analyzed: āśrameṣu mahā ṛṣīṇām aparādhyati nirbhayaḥ

original: 7.036.029a srugbhāṇḍān agnihotraṃ ca valkalānāṃ ca saṃcayān
analyzed: sruc bhāṇḍān agnihotram ca valkalānām ca saṃcayān

original: 7.036.029c bhagnavicchinnavidhvastān suśāntānāṃ karoty ayam
analyzed: bhagna vicchinna vidhvastān su śāntānām karoti ayam

original: 7.036.030a sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam
analyzed: sarveṣām brahma daṇḍānām avadhyam brahmaṇā kṛtam

original: 7.036.030c jānanta ṛṣayas taṃ vai kṣamante tasya nityaśaḥ
analyzed: jānantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ tam vai kṣamante tasya nityaśas

original: 7.036.031a yadā keṣariṇā tv eṣa vāyunā sāñjanena ca
analyzed: yadā keṣariṇā tu eṣa vāyunā sa añjanena ca

original: 7.036.031c pratiṣiddho 'pi maryādāṃ laṅghayaty eva vānaraḥ
analyzed: pratiṣiddhaḥ u pi maryādām laṅghayati eva vānaraḥ

original: 7.036.032a tato maharṣayaḥ kruddhā bhṛgvaṅgirasavaṃśajāḥ
analyzed: tatas mahā ṛṣayaḥ kruddhāḥ bhṛgu aṅgirasa vaṃśa jāḥ

original: 7.036.032c śepur enaṃ raghuśreṣṭha nātikruddhātimanyavaḥ
analyzed: śepuḥ enam raghu śreṣṭha na ati kruddha ati manyavaḥ

original: 7.036.033a bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama
analyzed: bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama

original: 7.036.033c tad dīrghakālaṃ vettāsi nāsmākaṃ śāpamohitaḥ
analyzed: tat dīrgha kālam vettāsi na asmākam śāpa mohitaḥ

original: 7.036.034a tatas tu hṛtatejaujā maharṣivacanaujasā
analyzed: tatas tu hṛta teja ojāḥ mahā ṛṣi vacana ojasā

original: 7.036.034c eṣo śramāṇi nānyeti mṛdubhāvagataś caran
analyzed: eṣa u śramāṇi na anyeti mṛdu bhāva gataḥ caran

original: 7.036.035a atha ṛkṣarajā nāma vālisugrīvayoḥ pitā
analyzed: atha ṛkṣarajāḥ nāma vāli sugrīvayoḥ pitā

original: 7.036.035c sarvavānararājāsīt tejasā iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: sarva vānara rājā āsīt tejasā iva bhāskaraḥ

original: 7.036.036a sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa tu rājyam ciram kṛtvā vānarāṇām hari īśvaraḥ

original: 7.036.036c tatas tvarkṣarajā nāma kāladharmeṇa saṃgataḥ
analyzed: tatas tvā ṛkṣarajāḥ nāma kāladharmeṇa saṃgataḥ

original: 7.036.037a tasminn astamite vālī mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ
analyzed: tasmin astamite vālī mantribhiḥ mantra kovidaiḥ

original: 7.036.037c pitrye pade kṛto rājā sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade
analyzed: pitrye pade kṛtaḥ rājā sugrīvaḥ vālinaḥ pade

original: 7.036.038a sugrīveṇa samaṃ tv asya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam
analyzed: sugrīveṇa samam tu asya advaidham chidra varjitam

original: 7.036.038c ahāryaṃ sakhyam abhavad anilasya yathāgninā
analyzed: ahāryam sakhyam abhavat anilasya yathā agninā

original: 7.036.039a eṣa śāpavaśād eva na vedabalam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa śāpa vaśāt eva na veda balam ātmanaḥ

original: 7.036.039c vālisugrīvayor vairaṃ yadā rāmasamutthitam
analyzed: vāli sugrīvayoḥ vairam yadā rāma samutthitam

original: 7.036.040a na hy eṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā
analyzed: na hi eṣa rāma sugrīvaḥ bhrāmyamāṇaḥ vālinā

original: 7.036.040c vedayāno na ca hy eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ
analyzed: vedayānaḥ na ca hi eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ

original: 7.036.041a parākramotsāha matipratāpaiḥ;
analyzed: parākrama utsāha mati pratāpaiḥ

original: sauśīlyamādhuryanayānayaiś ca
analyzed: sauśīlya mādhurya naya anayaiḥ ca

original: 7.036.041c gāmbhīryacāturyasuvīryadhairyair;
analyzed: gāmbhīrya cāturya su vīrya dhairyaiḥ

original: hanūmataḥ ko 'py adhiko 'sti loke
analyzed: hanūmataḥ kaḥ pi adhikaḥ sti loke

original: 7.036.042a asau purā vyākaraṇaṃ grahīṣyan;
analyzed: asau purā vyākaraṇam grahīṣyan

original: sūryonmukhaḥ pṛṣṭhagamaḥ kapīndraḥ
analyzed: sūrya unmukhaḥ pṛṣṭha gamaḥ kapi indraḥ

original: 7.036.042c udyadgirer astagiriṃ jagāma;
analyzed: udyat gireḥ asta girim jagāma

original: granthaṃ mahad dhārayad aprameyaḥ
analyzed: grantham mahat dhārayat aprameyaḥ

original: 7.036.043a pravīvivikṣor iva sāgarasya;
analyzed: pravīvivikṣoḥ iva sāgarasya

original: lokān didhakṣor iva pāvakasya
analyzed: lokān didhakṣoḥ iva pāvakasya

original: 7.036.043c lokakṣayeṣv eva yathāntakasya;
analyzed: loka kṣayeṣu eva yathā antakasya

original: hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt
analyzed: hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt

original: 7.036.044a eṣo 'pi cānye ca mahākapīndrāḥ;
analyzed: ca anye ca mahā kapi indrāḥ

original: sugrīvamaindadvividāḥ sanīlāḥ
analyzed: sugrīva mainda dvividāḥ sa nīlāḥ

original: 7.036.044c satāratāreyanalāḥ sarambhās;
analyzed: sa tāra tāreya nalāḥ sa rambhāḥ

original: tvatkāraṇād rāma surair hi sṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: tvad kāraṇāt rāma suraiḥ hi sṛṣṭāḥ

original: 7.036.045a tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
analyzed: tat etat kathitam sarvam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi

original: 7.036.045c hanūmato bālabhāve karmaitat kathitaṃ mayā
analyzed: hanūmataḥ bāla bhāve karma etat kathitam mayā

original: 7.036.046a dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaś cāsi rāma gacchamahe vayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaḥ ca asi rāma gacchamahe vayam

original: 7.036.046c evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayas te yathāgatam
analyzed: evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ te yathāgatam

original: 7.037.001a vimṛśya ca tato rāmo vayasyam akutobhayam
analyzed: vimṛśya ca tatas rāmaḥ vayasyam akutobhayam

original: 7.037.001c pratardanaṃ kāśipatiṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
analyzed: pratardanam kāśi patim pariṣvajya idam abravīt

original: 7.037.002a darśitā bhavatā prītir darśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param
analyzed: darśitā bhavatā prītiḥ darśitam sauhṛdam param

original: 7.037.002c udyogaś ca kṛto rājan bharatena tvayā saha
analyzed: udyogaḥ ca kṛtaḥ rājan bharatena tvayā saha

original: 7.037.003a tad bhavān adya kāśeyīṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja
analyzed: tat bhavān adya kāśeyīm purīm vārāṇasīm vraja

original: 7.037.003c ramaṇīyāṃ tvayā guptāṃ suprākārāṃ sutoraṇām
analyzed: ramaṇīyām tvayā guptām su prākārām su toraṇām

original: 7.037.004a etāvad uktvā utthāya kākutsthaḥ paramāsanāt
analyzed: etāvat uktvā utthāya kākutsthaḥ parama āsanāt

original: 7.037.004c paryaṣvajata dharmātmā nirantaram urogatam
analyzed: paryaṣvajata dharma ātmā nirantaram uraḥ gatam

original: 7.037.005a visṛjya taṃ vayasyaṃ sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn
analyzed: visṛjya tam vayasyam sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn

original: 7.037.005c prahasan rāghavo vākyam uvāca madhurākṣaram
analyzed: prahasan rāghavaḥ vākyam uvāca madhura akṣaram

original: 7.037.006a bhavatāṃ prītir avyagrā tejasā parirakṣitā
analyzed: bhavatām prītiḥ avyagrā tejasā parirakṣitā

original: 7.037.006c dharmaś ca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca niyataḥ nityam satyam ca bhavatām sadā

original: 7.037.007a yuṣmākaṃ ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām
analyzed: yuṣmākam ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām

original: 7.037.007c hato durātmā durbuddhī rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
analyzed: hataḥ durātmā durbuddhiḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ

original: 7.037.008a hetumātram ahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasāṃ hataḥ
analyzed: hetu mātram aham tatra bhavatām tejasām hataḥ

original: 7.037.008c rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yuddhe saputraḥ sahabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ sa gaṇaḥ yuddhe sa putraḥ saha bāndhavaḥ

original: 7.037.009a bhavantaś ca samānītā bharatena mahātmanā
analyzed: bhavantaḥ ca samānītāḥ bharatena mahātmanā

original: 7.037.009c śrutvā janakarājasya kānane tanayāṃ hṛtām
analyzed: śrutvā janaka rājasya kānane tanayām hṛtām

original: 7.037.010a udyuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: udyuktānām ca sarveṣām pārthivānām mahātmanām

original: 7.037.010c kālo hy atītaḥ sumahān gamane rocatāṃ matiḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ hi atītaḥ su mahān gamane rocatām matiḥ

original: 7.037.011a pratyūcus taṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
analyzed: pratyūcuḥ tam ca rājānaḥ harṣeṇa mahatā anvitāḥ

original: 7.037.011c diṣṭyā tvaṃ vijayī rāma rājyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvam vijayī rāma rājyam ca api pratiṣṭhitam

original: 7.037.012a diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ

original: 7.037.012c eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ kīrtir uttamā
analyzed: eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāmaḥ eṣā naḥ kīrtiḥ uttamā

original: 7.037.013a yat tvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam
analyzed: yat tvām vijayinam rāma paśyāmaḥ hata śātravam

original: 7.037.013c upapannaṃ ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi
analyzed: upapannam ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi

original: 7.037.014a praśaṃsārhā hi jānanti praśaṃsāṃ vaktum īdṛśīm
analyzed: praśaṃsā arhāḥ hi jānanti praśaṃsām vaktum īdṛśīm

original: 7.037.014c āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān
analyzed: āpṛcchāmaḥ gamiṣyāmaḥ hṛdisthaḥ naḥ sadā bhavān

original: 7.037.015a bhavec ca te mahārāja prītir asmāsu nityadā
analyzed: bhavet ca te mahā rāja prītiḥ asmāsu nityadā

original: 7.038.001a te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: te prayātāḥ mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvatas diśam

original: 7.038.001c kampayanto mahīṃ vīrāḥ svapurāṇi prahṛṣṭavat
analyzed: kampayantaḥ mahīm vīrāḥ sva purāṇi prahṛṣṭa vat

original: 7.038.002a akṣauhiṇī sahasrais te samavetās tv anekaśaḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī sahasraiḥ te samavetāḥ tu anekaśas

original: 7.038.002c hṛṣṭāḥ pratigatāḥ sarve rāghavārthe samāgatāḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ pratigatāḥ sarve rāghava arthe samāgatāḥ

original: 7.038.003a ūcuś caiva mahīpālā baladarpasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca eva mahīpālāḥ bala darpa samanvitāḥ

original: 7.038.003c na nāma rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam
analyzed: na nāma rāvaṇam yuddhe paśyāmaḥ puratas sthitam

original: 7.038.004a bharatena vayaṃ paścāt samānītā nirarthakam
analyzed: bharatena vayam paścāt samānītāḥ nirarthakam

original: 7.038.004c hatā hi rākṣasās tatra pārthivaiḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: hatāḥ hi rākṣasāḥ tatra pārthivaiḥ syuḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.038.005a rāmasya bāhuvīryeṇa pālitā lakṣmaṇasya ca
analyzed: rāmasya bāhu vīryeṇa pālitāḥ lakṣmaṇasya ca

original: 7.038.005c sukhaṃ pāre samudrasya yudhyema vigatajvarāḥ
analyzed: sukham pāre samudrasya yudhyema vigata jvarāḥ

original: 7.038.006a etāś cānyāś ca rājānaḥ kathās tatra sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: etāḥ ca anyāḥ ca rājānaḥ kathāḥ tatra sahasraśas

original: 7.038.006c kathayantaḥ svarāṣṭrāṇi viviśus te mahārathāḥ
analyzed: kathayantaḥ sva rāṣṭrāṇi viviśuḥ te mahā rathāḥ

original: 7.038.007a yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: yathā purāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: 7.038.007c rāmāya priyakāmārtham upahārān nṛpā daduḥ
analyzed: rāmāya priya kāma artham upahārān nṛpāḥ daduḥ

original: 7.038.008a aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaś ca madotkaṭān
analyzed: aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaḥ ca mada utkaṭān

original: 7.038.008c candanāni ca divyāni divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: candanāni ca divyāni divyāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 7.038.009a bharato lakṣmaṇaś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: bharataḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva śatrughnaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 7.038.009c ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punaḥ
analyzed: ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punar

original: 7.038.010a āgatāś ca purīṃ ramyām ayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: āgatāḥ ca purīm ramyām ayodhyām puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 7.038.010c daduḥ sarvāṇi ratnāni rāghavāya mahātmane
analyzed: daduḥ sarvāṇi ratnāni rāghavāya mahātmane

original: 7.038.011a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ prītiyuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam prīti yuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ

original: 7.038.011c sarvāṇi tāni pradadau sugrīvāya mahātmane
analyzed: sarvāṇi tāni pradadau sugrīvāya mahātmane

original: 7.038.012a vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye cānye ṛkṣavānarāḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye ca anye ṛkṣa vānarāḥ

original: 7.038.012c hanūmatpramukhā vīrā rākṣasāś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: hanumat pramukhāḥ vīrāḥ rākṣasāḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: 7.038.013a te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso rāmadattāni tāny atha
analyzed: te sarve hṛṣṭa manasaḥ rāma dattāni tāni atha

original: 7.038.013c śirobhir dhārayām āsur bāhubhiś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: śirobhiḥ dhārayām āsuḥ bāhubhiḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: 7.038.014a papuś caiva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca
analyzed: papuḥ ca eva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca

original: 7.038.014c māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni phalāny āsvādayanti ca
analyzed: māṃsāni ca su mṛṣṭāni phalāni āsvādayanti ca

original: 7.038.015a evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro gatas tadā
analyzed: evam teṣām nivasatām māsaḥ sāgraḥ gataḥ tadā

original: 7.038.015c muhūrtam iva tat sarvaṃ rāmabhaktyā samarthayan
analyzed: muhūrtam iva tat sarvam rāma bhaktyā samarthayan

original: 7.038.016a reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
analyzed: reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdham vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ

original: 7.038.016c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryai rākṣasaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
analyzed: rājabhiḥ ca mahā vīryaiḥ rākṣasaiḥ ca mahā balaiḥ

original: 7.038.017a evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham
analyzed: evam teṣām yayau māsaḥ dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham

original: 7.038.017c vānarāṇāṃ prahṛṣṭānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: vānarāṇām prahṛṣṭānām rākṣasānām ca sarvaśas

original: 7.039.001a tathā sma teṣāṃ vasatām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām
analyzed: tathā sma teṣām vasatām ṛkṣa vānara rakṣasām

original: 7.039.001c rāghavas tu mahātejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
analyzed: rāghavaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt

original: 7.039.002a gamyatāṃ saumya kiṣkindhāṃ durādharṣaṃ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: gamyatām saumya kiṣkindhām durādharṣam sura asuraiḥ

original: 7.039.002c pālayasva sahāmātyai rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
analyzed: pālayasva saha amātyaiḥ rājyam nihata kaṇṭakam

original: 7.039.003a aṅgadaṃ ca mahābāho prītyā paramayānvitaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadam ca mahā bāho prītyā paramayā anvitaḥ

original: 7.039.003c paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam
analyzed: paśya tvam hanumantam ca nalam ca su mahā balam

original: 7.039.004a suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ śūraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam
analyzed: suṣeṇam śvaśuram śūram tāram ca balinām varam

original: 7.039.004c kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ ca sumahābalam
analyzed: kumudam ca eva durdharṣam nīlam ca su mahā balam

original: 7.039.005a vīraṃ śatabaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividam eva ca
analyzed: vīram śatabalim ca eva maindam dvividam eva ca

original: 7.039.005c gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: gajam gavākṣam gavayam śarabham ca mahā balam

original: 7.039.006a ṛkṣarājaṃ ca durdharṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam
analyzed: ṛkṣa rājam ca durdharṣam jāmbavantam mahā balam

original: 7.039.006c paśya prītisamāyukto gandhamādanam eva ca
analyzed: paśya prīti samāyuktaḥ gandhamādanam eva ca

original: 7.039.007a ye cānye sumahātmāno madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
analyzed: ye ca anye su mahātmānaḥ mad arthe tyakta jīvitāḥ

original: 7.039.007c paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: paśya tvam prīti saṃyuktaḥ mā ca eṣām vipriyam kṛthāḥ

original: 7.039.008a evam uktvā ca sugrīvaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā ca sugrīvam praśasya ca punar punar

original: 7.039.008c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca rāmo madhurayā girā
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇam athā uvāca rāmaḥ madhurayā girā

original: 7.039.009a taṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmato hy asi pārthiva
analyzed: taṅkām praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmataḥ hi asi pārthiva

original: 7.039.009c purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca bhrātur vaiśvaraṇasya ca
analyzed: purasya rākṣasānām ca bhrātuḥ vaiśvaraṇasya ca

original: 7.039.010a mā ca buddhim adharme tvaṃ kuryā rājan kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mā ca buddhim adharme tvam kuryāḥ rājan katham cana

original: 7.039.010c buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvam aśnanti medinīm
analyzed: buddhimantaḥ hi rājānaḥ dhruvam aśnanti medinīm

original: 7.039.011a ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājan sugrīvasahitas tvayā
analyzed: aham ca nityaśas rājan sugrīva sahitaḥ tvayā

original: 7.039.011c smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvam vigata jvaraḥ

original: 7.039.012a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararākṣasāḥ
analyzed: rāmasya bhāṣitam śrutvā ṛṣka vānara rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.039.012c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti kākutstham praśaśaṃsuḥ punar punar

original: 7.039.013a tava buddhir mahābāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca
analyzed: tava buddhiḥ mahā bāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca

original: 7.039.013c mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhor iva nityadā
analyzed: mādhuryam paramam rāma svayambhoḥ iva nityadā

original: 7.039.014a teṣām evaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām
analyzed: teṣām evam bruvāṇānām vānarāṇām ca rakṣasām

original: 7.039.014c hanūmatpraṇato bhūtvā rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: hanumat praṇataḥ bhūtvā rāghavam vākyam abravīt

original: 7.039.015a sneho me paramo rājaṃs tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: snehaḥ me paramaḥ rājan tvayi nityam pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.039.015c bhaktiś ca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchati
analyzed: bhaktiḥ ca niyatā vīra bhāvaḥ na anyatra gacchati

original: 7.039.016a yāvad rāmakathāṃ vīra śroṣye 'haṃ pṛthivītale
analyzed: yāvat rāma kathām vīra śroṣye ham pṛthivī tale

original: 7.039.016c tāvac charīre vatsyantu mama prāṇā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tāvat śarīre vatsyantu mama prāṇāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.039.017a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rājendro hanūmantam athāsanāt
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam rāja indraḥ hanūmantam atha āsanāt

original: 7.039.017c utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.039.018a evam etat kapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: evam etat kapi śreṣṭha bhavitā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.039.018c lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā
analyzed: lokāḥ hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā

original: 7.039.019a cariṣyati kathā yāval lokān eṣā hi māmikā
analyzed: cariṣyati kathā yāvat lokān eṣā hi māmikā

original: 7.039.019c tāvac charīre vatsyanti prāṇās tava na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tāvat śarīre vatsyanti prāṇāḥ tava na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.039.020a tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: hāram candra ābham mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ

original: 7.039.020c vaidūryataralaṃ snehād ābabandhe hanūmati
analyzed: vaidūrya taralam snehāt ābabandhe hanūmati

original: 7.039.021a tenorasi nibaddhena hāreṇa sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: tena urasi nibaddhena hāreṇa sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 7.039.021c rarāja hemaśailendraś candreṇākrāntamastakaḥ
analyzed: rarāja hema śaila indraḥ candreṇa ākrānta mastakaḥ

original: 7.039.022a śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad utthāyotthāya vānarāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu rāghavasya etat utthāya utthāya vānarāḥ

original: 7.039.022c praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmus te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmuḥ te mahā balāḥ

original: 7.039.023a sugrīvaś caiva rāmeṇa pariṣvakto mahābhujaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ ca eva rāmeṇa pariṣvaktaḥ mahā bhujaḥ

original: 7.039.023c vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā nirantaram urogataḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca dharma ātmā nirantaram uraḥ gataḥ

original: 7.039.024a sarve ca te bāṣpagalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ
analyzed: sarve ca te bāṣpa galāḥ sa aśru netrāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: 7.039.024c saṃmūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavaṃ tadā
analyzed: saṃmūḍhāḥ iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavam tadā

original: 7.040.001a visṛjya ca mahābāhur ṛkṣavānararākṣasān
analyzed: visṛjya ca mahā bāhuḥ ṛkṣa vānara rākṣasān

original: 7.040.001c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham

original: 7.040.002a athāparāhṇasamaye bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rāghavaḥ
analyzed: atha aparāhṇa samaye bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rāghavaḥ

original: 7.040.002c śuśrāva madhurāṃ vāṇīm antarikṣāt prabhāṣitām
analyzed: śuśrāva madhurām vāṇīm antarikṣāt prabhāṣitām

original: 7.040.003a saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām
analyzed: saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām

original: 7.040.003c kailāsaśikharāt prāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣkaraṃ prabho
analyzed: kailāsa śikharāt prāptam viddhi mām puṣkaram prabho

original: 7.040.004a tava śāsanam ājñāya gato 'smi dhanadaṃ prati
analyzed: tava śāsanam ājñāya gataḥ smi dhanadam prati

original: 7.040.004c upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: upasthātum nara śreṣṭha sa ca mām pratyabhāṣata

original: 7.040.005a nirjitas tvaṃ narendreṇa rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: nirjitaḥ tvam narendreṇa rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 7.040.005c nihatya yudhi durdharṣaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam
analyzed: nihatya yudhi durdharṣam rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 7.040.006a mamāpi paramā prītir hate tasmin durātmani
analyzed: mama api paramā prītiḥ hate tasmin durātmani

original: 7.040.006c rāvaṇe sagaṇe saumya saputrāmātyabāndhave
analyzed: rāvaṇe sa gaṇe saumya sa putra amātya bāndhave

original: 7.040.007a sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā

original: 7.040.007c vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te
analyzed: vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te

original: 7.040.008a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam
analyzed: eṣa me paramaḥ kāmaḥ yat tvam rāghava nandanam

original: 7.040.008c vaher lokasya saṃyānaṃ gacchasva vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: vaheḥ lokasya saṃyānam gacchasva vigata jvaraḥ

original: 7.040.009a tacchāsanam ahaṃ jñātvā dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tad śāsanam aham jñātvā dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.040.009c tvatsakāśaṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ sa evaṃ pratigṛhṇa mām

original: 7.040.010a bāḍham ity eva kākutsthaḥ puṣpakaṃ samapūjayat

original: 7.040.010c lājākṣataiś ca puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
analyzed: lāja akṣataiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ ca gandhaiḥ ca su sugandhibhiḥ

original: 7.040.011a gamyatāṃ ca yathākāmam āgacches tvaṃ yadā smare
analyzed: gamyatām ca yathākāmam āgaccheḥ tvam yadā smare

original: 7.040.011c evam astv iti rāmeṇa visṛṣṭaḥ puṣpakaḥ punaḥ

original: 7.040.011e abhipretāṃ diśaṃ prāyāt puṣpakaḥ puṣpabhūṣitaḥ
analyzed: abhipretām diśam prāyāt puṣpakaḥ puṣpa bhūṣitaḥ

original: 7.040.012a evam antarhite tasmin puṣpake vividhātmani

original: 7.040.012c bharataḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca raghunandanam

original: 7.040.013a atyadbhutāni dṛśyante tvayi rājyaṃ praśāsati

original: 7.040.013c amānuṣāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vyāhṛtāni muhur muhuḥ

original: 7.040.014a anāmayāc ca martyānāṃ sāgro māso gato hy ayam

original: 7.040.015a putrān nāryaḥ prasūyante vapuṣmantaś ca mānavāḥ

original: 7.040.015c harṣaś cābhyadhiko rājañ janasya puravāsinaḥ

original: 7.040.016a kāle ca vāsavo varṣaṃ pātayaty amṛtopamam

original: 7.040.016c vāyavaś cāpi vāyante sparśavantaḥ sukhapradāḥ

original: 7.040.017a īdṛśo naś ciraṃ rājā bhavatv iti nareśvara

original: 7.040.017c kathayanti pure paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
analyzed: kathayanti pure paurāḥ janāḥ janapadeṣu ca

original: 7.040.018a etā vācaḥ sumadhurā bharatena samīritāḥ

original: 7.040.018c śrutvā rāmo mudā yuktaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham

original: 7.041.001a sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam

original: 7.041.001c praviveśa mahābāhur aśokavanikāṃ tadā

original: 7.041.003a priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiś ca tathā kurabakair api

original: 7.041.006a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ

original: 7.041.007a dīrghikā vividhākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā

original: 7.041.007c mahārhamaṇisopānasphaṭikāntarakuṭṭimāḥ
7.041.008a phullapadmotpalavanāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ

original: 7.041.008c prākārair vividhākāraiḥ śobhitāś ca śilātalaiḥ
analyzed: prākāraiḥ vividha ākāraiḥ śobhitāḥ ca śilā talaiḥ

original: 7.041.010a nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā

original: 7.041.014a māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca

original: 7.041.015a upanṛtyanti rājānaṃ nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ

original: 7.041.015c bālāś ca rūpavatyaś ca striyaḥ pānavaśaṃ gatāḥ

original: 7.041.021a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām

original: 7.041.026a tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā

original: 7.041.027a evam uktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām

original: 7.041.027c madhyakakṣāntaraṃ rāmo nirjagāma suhṛdvṛtaḥ

original: 7.042.001a tatropaviṣṭaṃ rājānam upāsante vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: 7.042.004c kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca

original: 7.042.008a ayaṃ tu vijayaḥ saumya daśagrīvavadhāśritaḥ

original: 7.042.009a evam uktas tu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyam abravīt

original: 7.042.009c kathayasva yathā tathyaṃ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ

original: 7.042.010a śubhāśubhāni vākyāni yāny āhuḥ puravāsinaḥ

original: 7.042.010c śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ na kuryām aśubhāni ca

original: 7.042.013c catvarāpaṇarathyāsu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca

original: 7.042.015c vānarāś ca vaśaṃ nītā ṛṣkāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 7.042.017c aṅkam āropya hi purā rāvaṇena balād dhṛtām

original: 7.042.019c yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tam anuvartate

original: 7.042.021a tasyaitad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ paramārtavat
analyzed: tasya etat bhāṣitam śrutvā rāghavaḥ parama ārta vat

original: 7.042.021c uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etan nivedyatām
analyzed: uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etat nivedyatām

original: 7.042.022a sarve tu śirasā bhūmāv abhivādya praṇamya ca
analyzed: sarve tu śirasā bhūmau abhivādya praṇamya ca

original: 7.042.022c pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnam evam etan na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: pratyūcuḥ rāghavam dīnam evam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.042.023a śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam
analyzed: śrutvā tu vākyam kākutsthaḥ sarveṣām samudīritam

original: 7.042.023c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrutāpanaḥ
analyzed: visarjayām āsa tadā sarvān tām śatru tāpanaḥ

original: 7.043.001a visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: visṛjya tu suhṛd vargam buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ

original: 7.043.001c samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.043.002a śīghram ānaya saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
analyzed: śīghram ānaya saumitrim lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣaṇam

original: 7.043.002c bharataṃ ca mahābāhuṃ śatrughnaṃ cāparājitam
analyzed: bharatam ca mahā bāhum śatrughnam ca aparājitam

original: 7.043.003a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: rāmasya bhāṣitam śrutvā dvāḥsthaḥ mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.043.003c lakṣmaṇasya gṛhaṃ gatva praviveśānivāritaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya gṛham gatvā praviveśa anivāritaḥ

original: 7.043.004a uvāca ca tadā vākyaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: uvāca ca tadā vākyam vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.043.004c draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
analyzed: draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvām gamyatām tatra māciram

original: 7.043.005a bāḍham ity eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam

original: 7.043.005c prādravad ratham āruhya rāghavasya niveśanam
analyzed: prādravat ratham āruhya rāghavasya niveśanam

original: 7.043.006a prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatam antikāt
analyzed: prayāntam lakṣmaṇam dṛṣṭvā dvāḥsthaḥ bharatam antikāt

original: 7.043.006c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
analyzed: uvāca prāñjaliḥ vākyam rājā tvām draṣṭum icchati

original: 7.043.007a bharatas tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam
analyzed: bharataḥ tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthāt rāma samīritam

original: 7.043.007c utpapātāsanāt tūrṇaṃ padbhyām eva tato 'gamat
analyzed: utpapāta āsanāt tūrṇam padbhyām eva tatas gamat

original: 7.043.008a dṛṣṭvā prayāntaṃ bharataṃ tvaramāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā prayāntam bharatam tvaramāṇaḥ kṛta añjaliḥ

original: 7.043.008c śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
analyzed: śatrughna bhavanam gatvā tatas vākyam jagāda ha

original: 7.043.009a ehy āgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
analyzed: ehi āgaccha raghu śreṣṭha rājā tvām draṣṭum icchati

original: 7.043.009c gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: gataḥ hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvam bharataḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.043.010a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasya śatrughnaḥ rāma śāsanam

original: 7.043.010c śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: śirasā vandya dharaṇīm prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ

original: 7.043.011a kumārān āgatāñ śrutvā cintāvyākulitendriyaḥ
analyzed: kumārān āgatām śrutvā cintā vyākulita indriyaḥ

original: 7.043.011c avākśirā dīnamanā dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: avākśirāḥ dīna manāḥ dvāḥstham vacanam abravīt

original: 7.043.012a praveśaya kumārāṃs tvaṃ matsamīpaṃ tvarānvitaḥ
analyzed: praveśaya kumārān tvam mad samīpam tvarā anvitaḥ

original: 7.043.012c eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ
analyzed: eteṣu jīvitam mahyam ete prāṇāḥ bahis carāḥ

original: 7.043.013a ājñaptās tu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śuklavāsasaḥ
analyzed: ājñaptāḥ tu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śukla vāsasaḥ

original: 7.043.013c prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśus te samāhitāḥ
analyzed: prahvāḥ prāñjalayaḥ bhūtvā viviśuḥ te samāhitāḥ

original: 7.043.014a te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā
analyzed: te tu dṛṣṭvā mukham tasya sa graham śaśinam yathā

original: 7.043.014c saṃdhyāgatam ivādityaṃ prabhayā parivarjitam
analyzed: saṃdhyā gatam iva ādityam prabhayā parivarjitam

original: 7.043.015a bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭva rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: bāṣpa pūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 7.043.015c hataśobhāṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te
analyzed: hata śobhām yathā padmam mukham vīkṣya ca tasya te

original: 7.043.016a tato 'bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ
analyzed: tatas bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ

original: 7.043.016c tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaś cāśrūṇy avartayat
analyzed: tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaḥ ca aśrūṇi avartayat

original: 7.043.017a tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ
analyzed: tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahā bhujaḥ

original: 7.043.017c āsaneṣv ādhvam ity uktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
analyzed: āsaneṣu ādhvam iti uktvā tatas vākyam jagāda ha

original: 7.043.018a bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto mama jīvitam
analyzed: bhavantaḥ mama sarva svam bhavantaḥ mama jīvitam

original: 7.043.018c bhavadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ ca kṛtam rājyam pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ

original: 7.043.019a bhavantaḥ kṛtaśāstrārthā buddhau ca pariniṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: bhavantaḥ kṛta śāstra arthāḥ buddhau ca pariniṣṭhitāḥ

original: 7.043.019c saṃbhūya ca madartho 'yam anveṣṭavyo nareśvarāḥ
analyzed: saṃbhūya ca mad arthaḥ yam anveṣṭavyaḥ nareśvarāḥ

original: 7.044.001a teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīnacetasām
analyzed: teṣām samupaviṣṭānām sarveṣām dīna cetasām

original: 7.044.001c uvāca vākyaṃ kākutstho mukhena pariśuṣyatā
analyzed: uvāca vākyam kākutsthaḥ mukhena pariśuṣyatā

original: 7.044.002a sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā
analyzed: sarve śṛṇuta bhadram vaḥ mā kurudhvam manaḥ nyathā

original: 7.044.002c paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā
analyzed: paurāṇām mama sītāyām yādṛśī vartate kathā

original: 7.044.003a paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca
analyzed: paura apavādaḥ su mahān tathā janapadasya ca

original: 7.044.003c vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
analyzed: vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati

original: 7.044.004a ahaṃ kila kule jata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: aham kila kule jataḥ ikṣvākūṇām mahātmanām

original: 7.044.004c sītāṃ pāpasamācārām ānayeyaṃ kathaṃ pure
analyzed: sītām pāpa samācārām ānayeyam katham pure

original: 7.044.005a jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane
analyzed: jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane

original: 7.044.005c rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā
analyzed: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsitaḥ mayā

original: 7.044.006a pratyakṣaṃ tava saumitre devanāṃ havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣam tava saumitre devanām havyavāhanaḥ

original: 7.044.006c apāpāṃ maithilīm āha vāyuś cākāśagocaraḥ
analyzed: apāpām maithilīm āha vāyuḥ ca ākāśa gocaraḥ

original: 7.044.007a candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ saṃnidhau purā
analyzed: candra ādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇām saṃnidhau purā

original: 7.044.007c ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣām apāpāṃ janakātmajām
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca eva sarveṣām apāpām janakātmajām

original: 7.044.008a evaṃ śuddha samācārā devagandharvasaṃnidhau
analyzed: evam śuddha samācārā deva gandharva saṃnidhau

original: 7.044.008c laṅkādvīpe mahendreṇa mama haste niveśitā
analyzed: laṅkā dvīpe mahā indreṇa mama haste niveśitā

original: 7.044.009a antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm
analyzed: antarātmā ca me vetti sītām śuddhām yaśasvinīm

original: 7.044.009c tato gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ
analyzed: tatas gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ

original: 7.044.010a ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaś ca hṛdi vartate
analyzed: ayam tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaḥ ca hṛdi vartate

original: 7.044.010c paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca
analyzed: paura apavādaḥ su mahān tathā janapadasya ca

original: 7.044.011a akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit
analyzed: akīrtiḥ yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit

original: 7.044.011c pataty evādhamāṃl lokān yāvac chabdaḥ sa kīrtyate
analyzed: patati eva adhamān lokān yāvat śabdaḥ sa kīrtyate

original: 7.044.012a akīrtir nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtir deveṣu pūjyate
analyzed: akīrtiḥ nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtiḥ deveṣu pūjyate

original: 7.044.012c kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām
analyzed: kīrti artham ca samārambhaḥ sarvaḥ eva mahātmanām

original: 7.044.013a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: api aham jīvitam jahyām yuṣmān vā puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 7.044.013c apavādabhayād bhītāḥ kiṃ punar janakātmajām
analyzed: apavāda bhayāt bhītāḥ kim punar janakātmajām

original: 7.044.014a tasmād bhavantaḥ paśyantu patitaṃ śokasāgare
analyzed: tasmāt bhavantaḥ paśyantu patitam śoka sāgare

original: 7.044.014c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ cid duḥkham ato 'dhikam
analyzed: na hi paśyāmi aham bhūyas kim cit duḥkham atas dhikam

original: 7.044.015a śvas tvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham
analyzed: śvas tvam prabhāte saumitre sumantra adhiṣṭhitam ratham

original: 7.044.015c āruhya sītām āropya viṣayānte samutsṛja
analyzed: āruhya sītām āropya viṣaya ante samutsṛja

original: 7.044.016a gaṅgāyās tu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ sumahātmanaḥ
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ tu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ su mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.044.016c āśramo divyasaṃkāśas tamasātīram āśritaḥ
analyzed: āśramaḥ divya saṃkāśaḥ tamasā tīram āśritaḥ

original: 7.044.017a tatraināṃ vijane kakṣe visṛjya raghunandana
analyzed: tatra enām vijane kakṣe visṛjya raghunandana

original: 7.044.017c śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanam mama

original: 7.044.018a na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na ca asmi prativaktavyaḥ sītām prati katham cana

original: 7.044.018c aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite
analyzed: aprītiḥ paramā mahyam bhavet tu prativārite

original: 7.044.019a śāpitāś ca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca
analyzed: śāpitāḥ ca mayā yūyam bhujābhyām jīvitena ca

original: 7.044.019c ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyur anunetuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: ye mām vākya antare brūyuḥ anunetum katham cana

original: 7.044.020a mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ
analyzed: mānayantu bhavantaḥ mām yadi mad śāsane sthitāḥ

original: 7.044.020c ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: itas dya nīyatām sītā kuruṣva vacanam mama

original: 7.044.021a pūrvam ukto 'ham anayā gaṅgātīre mahāśramān
analyzed: pūrvam uktaḥ ham anayā gaṅgā tīre mahā āśramān

original: 7.044.021c paśyeyam iti tasyāś ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam
analyzed: paśyeyam iti tasyāḥ ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam

original: 7.044.022a evam uktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaḥ bāṣpeṇa pihita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.044.022c praviveśa sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: praviveśa sa dharma ātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: 7.045.001a tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ
analyzed: tatas rajanyām vyuṣṭāyām lakṣmaṇaḥ dīna cetanaḥ

original: 7.045.001c sumantram abravīd vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
analyzed: sumantram abravīt vākyam mukhena pariśuṣyatā

original: 7.045.002a sārathe turagāñ śīghraṃ yojayasva rathottame
analyzed: sārathe turagām śīghram yojayasva ratha uttame

original: 7.045.002c svāstīrṇaṃ rājabhavanāt sītāyāś cāsanaṃ śubham
analyzed: su āstīrṇam rāja bhavanāt sītāyāḥ ca āsanam śubham

original: 7.045.003a sītā hi rājabhavanād āśramaṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
analyzed: sītā hi rāja bhavanāt āśramam puṇya karmaṇām

original: 7.045.003c mayā netā maharṣīṇāṃ śīghram ānīyatāṃ rathaḥ
analyzed: mayā netā mahā ṛṣīṇām śīghram ānīyatām rathaḥ

original: 7.045.004a sumantras tu tathety uktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
analyzed: sumantraḥ tu tathā iti uktvā yuktam parama vājibhiḥ

original: 7.045.004c rathaṃ suruciraprakhyaṃ svāstīrṇaṃ sukhaśayyayā
analyzed: ratham su rucira prakhyam su āstīrṇam sukha śayyayā

original: 7.045.005a ādāyovāca saumitriṃ mitrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam
analyzed: ādāya uvāca saumitrim mitrāṇām harṣa vardhanam

original: 7.045.005c ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yat kāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho
analyzed: rathaḥ yam samanuprāptaḥ yat kāryam kriyatām prabho

original: 7.045.006a evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rāja veśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.045.006c praviśya sītām āsādya vyājahāra nararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: praviśya sītām āsādya vyājahāra nara ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 7.045.007a gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe
analyzed: gaṅgā tīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe

original: 7.045.007c śīghraṃ gatvopaneyāsi śāsanāt pārthivasya naḥ
analyzed: śīghram gatvā upaneyā asi śāsanāt pārthivasya naḥ

original: 7.045.008a evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: 7.045.008c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe gamanaṃ cābhyarocayat
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe gamanam ca abhyarocayat

original: 7.045.009a vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: 7.045.009c gṛhītvā tāni vaidehī gamanāyopacakrame
analyzed: gṛhītvā tāni vaidehī gamanāya upacakrame

original: 7.045.010a imāni munipatnīnāṃ dāsyāmy ābharaṇāny aham
analyzed: imāni muni patnīnām dāsyāmi ābharaṇāni aham

original: 7.045.010c saumitris tu tathety uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm
analyzed: saumitriḥ tu tathā iti uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm

original: 7.045.010e prayayau śīghraturago rāmasyājñām anusmaran
analyzed: prayayau śīghra turagaḥ rāmasya ājñām anusmaran

original: 7.045.011a abravīc ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam
analyzed: abravīt ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇam lakṣmi vardhanam

original: 7.045.011c aśubhāni bahūny adya paśyāmi raghunandana
analyzed: aśubhāni bahūni adya paśyāmi raghunandana

original: 7.045.012a nayanaṃ me sphuraty adya gātrotkampaś ca jāyate
analyzed: nayanam me sphurati adya gātra utkampaḥ ca jāyate

original: 7.045.012c hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye
analyzed: hṛdayam ca eva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye

original: 7.045.013a autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiś ca parā mama
analyzed: autsukyam paramam ca api adhṛtiḥ ca parā mama

original: 7.045.013c śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana
analyzed: śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīm pṛthu locana

original: 7.045.014a api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātus te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
analyzed: api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātuḥ te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha

original: 7.045.014c śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
analyzed: śvaśrūṇām ca eva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣatas

original: 7.045.015a pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api
analyzed: pure janapade ca eva kuśalam prāṇinām api

original: 7.045.015c ity añjalikṛtā sītā devatā abhyayācata
analyzed: iti añjali kṛtā sītā devatāḥ abhyayācata

original: 7.045.016a lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ ṛtham tu tam śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm

original: 7.045.016c śivam ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā
analyzed: śivam iti abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ hṛdayena viśuṣyatā

original: 7.045.017a tato vāsam upāgamya gomatītīra āśrame
analyzed: tatas vāsam upāgamya gomatī tīre āśrame

original: 7.045.017c prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt
analyzed: prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt

original: 7.045.018a yojayasva rathaṃ śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam
analyzed: yojayasva ratham śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam

original: 7.045.018c śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi tryambakaḥ parvate yathā
analyzed: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi tryambakaḥ parvate yathā

original: 7.045.019a so 'śvān vicārayitvāśu rathe yuktvā manojavān
analyzed: saḥ śvān vicārayitvā āśu rathe yuktvā manojavān

original: 7.045.019c ārohasveti vaidehīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
analyzed: ārohasva iti vaidehīm sūtaḥ prāñjaliḥ abravīt

original: 7.045.020a sā tu sūtasya vacanād āruroha rathottamam
analyzed: sā tu sūtasya vacanāt āruroha ratha uttamam

original: 7.045.020c sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā
analyzed: sītā saumitriṇā sārdham sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā

original: 7.045.021a athārdhadivasaṃ gatvā bhāgīrathyā jalāśayam
analyzed: atha ardha divasam gatvā bhāgīrathyāḥ jalāśayam

original: 7.045.021c nirīkṣya lakṣmaṇo dīnaḥ praruroda mahāsvanam
analyzed: nirīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ dīnaḥ praruroda mahā svanam

original: 7.045.022a sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam
analyzed: sītā tu parama āyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam

original: 7.045.022c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajña kim idaṃ rudyate tvayā
analyzed: uvāca vākyam dharma jña kim idam rudyate tvayā

original: 7.045.023a jāhvanī tīram āsādya cirābhilaṣitaṃ mama
analyzed: jāhvanī tīram āsādya cira abhilaṣitam mama

original: 7.045.023c harṣakāle kim arthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: harṣa kāle kim artham mām viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.045.024a nityaṃ tvaṃ rāmapādeṣu vartase puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: nityam tvam rāma pādeṣu vartase puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.045.024c kaccid vinā kṛtas tena dvirātre śokam āgataḥ
analyzed: kaccit vinā kṛtaḥ tena dvi rātre śokam āgataḥ

original: 7.045.025a mamāpi dayito rāmo jīvitenāpi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: mama api dayitaḥ rāmaḥ jīvitena api lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.045.025c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava
analyzed: na ca aham evam śocāmi mā evam tvam bāliśaḥ bhava

original: 7.045.026a tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān
analyzed: tārayasva ca mām gaṅgām darśayasva ca tāpasān

original: 7.045.026c tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmy ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: tatas dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmi ābharaṇāni ca

original: 7.045.027a tataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīṇāṃ yathārham abhivādanam
analyzed: tatas kṛtvā mahā ṛṣīṇām yathārham abhivādanam

original: 7.045.027c tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmas tāṃ purīṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tatra ca ekām niśām uṣya yāsyāmaḥ tām purīm punar

original: 7.045.028a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe

original: 7.045.028c titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat
analyzed: titīrṣuḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ gaṅgām śubhām nāvam upāharat

original: 7.046.001a atha nāvaṃ suvistīrṇāṃ naiṣādīṃ rāghavānujaḥ
analyzed: atha nāvam su vistīrṇām naiṣādīm rāghava anujaḥ

original: 7.046.001c āruroha samāyuktāṃ pūrvam āropya maithilīm
analyzed: āruroha samāyuktām pūrvam āropya maithilīm

original: 7.046.002a sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: sumantram ca eva sa ratham sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.046.002c uvāca śokasaṃtaptaḥ prayāhīti ca nāvikam
analyzed: uvāca śoka saṃtaptaḥ prayāhi iti ca nāvikam

original: 7.046.003a tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.046.003c uvāca maithilīṃ vākyaṃ prāñjalir bāṣpagadgadaḥ
analyzed: uvāca maithilīm vākyam prāñjaliḥ bāṣpa gadgadaḥ

original: 7.046.004a hṛdgataṃ me mahac chalyaṃ yad asmy āryeṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: hṛdgatam me mahat śalyam yat asmi āryeṇa dhīmatā

original: 7.046.004c asmin nimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: asmin nimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ

original: 7.046.005a śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet
analyzed: śreyaḥ hi maraṇam me dya mṛtyoḥ vā yat param bhavet

original: 7.046.005c na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite
analyzed: na ca asmin īdṛśe kārye niyojyaḥ loka nindite

original: 7.046.006a prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate
analyzed: prasīda na ca me roṣam kartum arhasi suvrate

original: 7.046.006c ity añjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: iti añjali kṛtaḥ bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.046.007a rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: rudantam prāñjalim dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantam mṛtyum ātmanaḥ

original: 7.046.007c maithilī bhṛśasaṃvignā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: maithilī bhṛśa saṃvignā lakṣmaṇam vākyam abravīt

original: 7.046.008a kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: kim idam na avagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.046.008c paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svatham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ
analyzed: paśyāmi tvām ca na svatham api kṣemam mahīpateḥ

original: 7.046.009a śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: śāpitaḥ si narendreṇa yat tvam saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ

original: 7.046.009c tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
analyzed: tat brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te

original: 7.046.010a vaidehyā codyamānas tu lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ
analyzed: vaidehyā codyamānaḥ tu lakṣmaṇaḥ dīna cetanaḥ

original: 7.046.010c avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: avāk mukhaḥ bāṣpa galaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.046.011a śrutvā pariṣado madhye apavādaṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: śrutvā pariṣadaḥ madhye apavādam su dāruṇam

original: 7.046.011c pure janapade caiva tvatkṛte janakātmaje
analyzed: pure janapade ca eva tvad kṛte janakātmaje

original: 7.046.012a na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ
analyzed: na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tava agratas

original: 7.046.012c yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāny amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāni amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhatas kṛtaḥ

original: 7.046.013a sā tvāṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau
analyzed: sā tvām tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau

original: 7.046.013c paurāpavāda bhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā
analyzed: paura apavāda bhītena grāhyam devi na te nyathā

original: 7.046.014a āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: āśrama anteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvam bhaviṣyasi

original: 7.046.014c rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam
analyzed: rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tava evam kila daurhṛdam

original: 7.046.015a tad etaj jāhnavītīre brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapovanam
analyzed: tat etat jāhnavī tīre brahmarṣīṇām tapaḥ vanam

original: 7.046.015c puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe
analyzed: puṇyam ca ramaṇīyam ca mā viṣādam kṛthāḥ śubhe

original: 7.046.016a rājño daśarathasyaiṣa pitur me munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ daśarathasya eṣa pituḥ me muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.046.016c sakhā paramako vipro vālmīkiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: sakhā paramakaḥ vipraḥ vālmīkiḥ su mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.046.017a pādacchāyām upāgamya sukham asya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pāda chāyām upāgamya sukham asya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.046.017c upavāsaparaikāgrā vasa tvaṃ janakātmaje
analyzed: upavāsa para ekāgrā vasa tvam janakātmaje

original: 7.046.018a pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi
analyzed: pativratā tvam āsthāya rāmam kṛtvā sadā hṛdi

original: 7.046.018c śreyas te paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śreyaḥ te paramam devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati

original: 7.047.001a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇaṃ janakātmajā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇam janakātmajā

original: 7.047.001c paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha
analyzed: param viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha

original: 7.047.002a sā muhūrtam ivāsaṃjñā bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇā
analyzed: sā muhūrtam iva asaṃjñā bāṣpa vyākulita īkṣaṇā

original: 7.047.002c lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā

original: 7.047.003a māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: māmikā iyam tanuḥ nūnam sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.047.003c dhātrā yasyās tathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate
analyzed: dhātrā yasyāḥ tathā me duḥkha mūrtiḥ pradṛśyate

original: 7.047.004a kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ
analyzed: kim nu pāpam kṛtam pūrvam kaḥ vā dāraiḥ viyojitaḥ

original: 7.047.004c yāhaṃ śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī
analyzed: yā aham śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī

original: 7.047.005a purāham āśrame vāsaṃ rāmapādānuvartinī
analyzed: purā aham āśrame vāsam rāma pāda anuvartinī

original: 7.047.005c anurudhyāpi saumitre duḥkhe viparivartinī
analyzed: anurudhya api saumitre duḥkhe viparivartinī

original: 7.047.006a sā kathaṃ hy āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā
analyzed: sā katham hi āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā

original: 7.047.006c ākhyāsyāmi ca kasyāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā
analyzed: ākhyāsyāmi ca kasya aham duḥkham duḥkha parāyaṇā

original: 7.047.007a kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe
analyzed: kim ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kim mayā apakṛtam nṛpe

original: 7.047.007c kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 7.047.008a na khalv adyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavī jale
analyzed: na khalu adya eva saumitre jīvitam jāhnavī jale

original: 7.047.008c tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśas tu bhartur me parihāsyate
analyzed: tyajeyam rāja vaṃśaḥ tu bhartuḥ me parihāsyate

original: 7.047.009a yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
analyzed: yathā ājñām kuru saumitre tyaja mām duḥkha bhāginīm

original: 7.047.009c nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
analyzed: nideśe sthīyatām rājñaḥ śṛṇu ca idam vacaḥ mama

original: 7.047.010a śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa prāñjaliḥ pragraheṇa ca
analyzed: śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa prāñjaliḥ pragraheṇa ca

original: 7.047.010c śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam
analyzed: śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalam brūhi pārthivam

original: 7.047.011a yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethās tathā paureṣu nityadā
analyzed: yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethāḥ tathā paureṣu nityadā

original: 7.047.011c paramo hy eṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā
analyzed: paramaḥ hi eṣa dharmaḥ syāt eṣā kīrtiḥ anuttamā

original: 7.047.012a yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ
analyzed: yat tvam paura janam rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ

original: 7.047.012c ahaṃ tu nānuśocāmi svaśarīraṃ nararṣabha
analyzed: aham tu na anuśocāmi sva śarīram nara ṛṣabha

original: 7.047.012e yathāpavādaṃ paurāṇāṃ tathaiva raghunandana
analyzed: yathā apavādam paurāṇām tathā eva raghunandana

original: 7.047.013a evaṃ bruvantyāṃ sītāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvantyām sītāyām lakṣmaṇaḥ dīna cetanaḥ

original: 7.047.013c śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
analyzed: śirasā dharaṇīm gatvā vyāhartum na śaśāka ha

original: 7.047.014a pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam ca kṛtvā sa rudan eva mahā svanam

original: 7.047.014c āruroha punar nāvaṃ nāvikaṃ cābhyacodayat
analyzed: āruroha punar nāvam nāvikam ca abhyacodayat

original: 7.047.015a sa gatvā cottaraṃ kūlaṃ śokabhārasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā ca uttaram kūlam śoka bhāra samanvitaḥ

original: 7.047.015c saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam
analyzed: saṃmūḍhaḥ iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhat drutam
