original: 7.047.016a muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat
analyzed: muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anātha vat

original: 7.047.016c veṣṭantīṃ paratīrasthāṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayāv atha
analyzed: veṣṭantīm para tīra sthām lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau atha

original: 7.047.017a dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: dūra stham ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇam ca muhur muhur

original: 7.047.017c nirīkṣamāṇām udvignāṃ sītāṃ śokaḥ samāviśat
analyzed: nirīkṣamāṇām udvignām sītām śokaḥ samāviśat

original: 7.047.018a sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā tapasvinī;
analyzed: sā duḥkha bhāra avanatā tapasvinī

original: yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī
analyzed: yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī

original: 7.047.018c ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane;
analyzed: ruroda sā barhiṇa nādite vane

original: mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī
analyzed: mahā svanam duḥkha parāyaṇā satī

original: 7.048.001a sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ
analyzed: sītām tu rudatīm dṛṣṭvā ye tatra muni dārakāḥ

original: 7.048.001c prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ
analyzed: prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkiḥ agrya dhīḥ

original: 7.048.002a abhivādya muneḥ pādau muniputrā maharṣaye
analyzed: abhivādya muneḥ pādau muni putrāḥ mahā ṛṣaye

original: 7.048.002c sarve nivedayām āsus tasyās tu ruditasvanam
analyzed: sarve nivedayām āsuḥ tasyāḥ tu rudita svanam

original: 7.048.003a adṛṣṭapūrvā bhagavan kasyāpy eṣā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvā bhagavan kasya api eṣā mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.048.003c patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā
analyzed: patnī śrīḥ iva saṃmohāt virauti vikṛta svarā

original: 7.048.004a bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāc cyutām
analyzed: bhagavan sādhu paśya imām devatām iva khāt cyutām

original: 7.048.004c na hy enāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām
analyzed: na hi enām mānuṣīm vidmaḥ satkriyā asyāḥ prayujyatām

original: 7.048.005a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharma vid

original: 7.048.005c tapasā labdhacakṣuṣmān prādravad yatra maithilī
analyzed: tapasā labdha cakṣuṣmān prādravat yatra maithilī

original: 7.048.006a taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃ cit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: tam tu deśam abhipretya kim cit padbhyām mahā muniḥ

original: 7.048.006c arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ
analyzed: arghyam ādāya ruciram jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ

original: 7.048.006e dadarśa rāghavasyeṣṭāṃ patnīṃ sītām anāthavat
analyzed: dadarśa rāghavasya iṣṭām patnīm sītām anātha vat

original: 7.048.007a tāṃ sitāṃ śokabhārārtāṃ vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tām sitām śoka bhāra ārtām vālmīkiḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.048.007c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā
analyzed: uvāca madhurām vāṇīm hlādayan iva tejasā

original: 7.048.008a snuṣā daśarāthasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī
analyzed: snuṣā daśarāthasya tvam rāmasya mahiṣī satī

original: 7.048.008c janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate
analyzed: janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgatam te pativrate

original: 7.048.009a āyānty evāsi vijñātā mayā dharmasamādhinā
analyzed: āyānt eva asi vijñātā mayā dharma samādhinā

original: 7.048.009c kāraṇaṃ caiva sarvaṃ me hṛdayenopalakṣitam
analyzed: kāraṇam ca eva sarvam me hṛdayena upalakṣitam

original: 7.048.010a apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapo labdhena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: apāpām vedmi sīte tvām tapaḥ labdhena cakṣuṣā

original: 7.048.010c viśuddhabhāvā vaidehi sāmprataṃ mayi vartase
analyzed: viśuddha bhāvā vaidehi sāmpratam mayi vartase

original: 7.048.011a āśramasyāvidūre me tāpasyas tapasi sthitāḥ
analyzed: āśramasya avidūre me tāpasyaḥ tapasi sthitāḥ

original: 7.048.011c tās tvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tvām vatse yathā vatsam pālayiṣyanti nityaśas

original: 7.048.012a idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā
analyzed: idam arghyam pratīccha tvam visrabdhā vigata jvarā

original: 7.048.012c yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ
analyzed: yathā sva gṛham abhyetya viṣādam ca eva mā kṛthāḥ

original: 7.048.013a śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam
analyzed: śrutvā tu bhāṣitam sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam

original: 7.048.013c śirasā vandya caraṇau tathety āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: śirasā vandya caraṇau tathā iti āha kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.048.014a taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
analyzed: tam prayāntam munim sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhatas nvagāt

original: 7.048.014c anvayād yatra tāpasyo dharmanityāḥ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: anvayāt yatra tāpasyaḥ dharma nityāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: 7.048.015a taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntam vaidehyā anugatam tadā

original: 7.048.015c upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ caidam abruvan
analyzed: upājagmuḥ mudā yuktāḥ vacanam ca edam abruvan

original: 7.048.016a svāgataṃ te muniśreṣṭha cirasyāgamanaṃ prabho
analyzed: svāgatam te muni śreṣṭha cirasya āgamanam prabho

original: 7.048.016c abhivādayāmaḥ sarvās tvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe
analyzed: abhivādayāmaḥ sarvāḥ tvām ucyatām kim ca kurmahe

original: 7.048.017a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt
analyzed: tāsām tat vacanam śrutvā vālmīkiḥ idam abravīt

original: 7.048.017c sīteyaṃ samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: sītā iyam samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 7.048.018a snuṣā daśaradhasyaiṣā janakasya sutā satī
analyzed: snuṣā daśaradhasya eṣā janakasya sutā satī

original: 7.048.018c apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā
analyzed: apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā

original: 7.048.019a imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha
analyzed: imām bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha

original: 7.048.019c gauravān mama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: gauravāt mama vākyasya pūjyā vaḥ stu viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.048.020a muhur muhuś ca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: muhur muhur ca vaidehīm parisāntvya mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.048.020c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyān mahātapāḥ
analyzed: svam āśramam śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyāt mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.049.001a dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃraveśitām
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīm sītām āśramam saṃraveśitām

original: 7.049.001c saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ
analyzed: saṃtāpam akarot ghoram lakṣmaṇaḥ dīna cetanaḥ

original: 7.049.002a abravīc ca mahātejāḥ sumantraṃ mantrasārathim
analyzed: abravīt ca mahā tejāḥ sumantram mantra sārathim

original: 7.049.002c sītāsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: sītā saṃtāpa jam duḥkham paśya rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 7.049.003a ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: atas duḥkhataram kim nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati

original: 7.049.003c patnīṃ śuddhasamācārāṃ visṛjya janakātmajām
analyzed: patnīm śuddha samācārām visṛjya janakātmajām

original: 7.049.004a vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam
analyzed: vyaktam daivāt aham manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam

original: 7.049.004c vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam
analyzed: vaidehyā sārathe sārdham daivam hi duratikramam

original: 7.049.005a yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi devān sa gandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 7.049.005c nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
analyzed: nihanyāt rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate

original: 7.049.006a purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane
analyzed: purā mama pituḥ vākyaiḥ daṇḍake vijane vane

original: 7.049.006c uṣito navavarṣāṇi pañca caiva sudāruṇe
analyzed: uṣitaḥ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca eva su dāruṇe

original: 7.049.007a tato duḥkhataraṃ bhūyaḥ sītāyā vipravāsanam
analyzed: tatas duḥkhataram bhūyaḥ sītāyāḥ vipravāsanam

original: 7.049.007c paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me
analyzed: paurāṇām vacanam śrutvā nṛśaṃsam pratibhāti me

original: 7.049.008a ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇy asmin yaśohare
analyzed: kaḥ nu dharma āśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇi asmin yaśaḥ hare

original: 7.049.008c maithilīṃ prati saṃprāptaḥ paurair hīnārthavādibhiḥ
analyzed: maithilīm prati saṃprāptaḥ pauraiḥ hīna artha vādibhiḥ

original: 7.049.009a etā bahuvidhā vācaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇabhāṣitāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ bahuvidhāḥ vācaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇa bhāṣitāḥ

original: 7.049.009c sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: sumantraḥ prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.049.010a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati
analyzed: na saṃtāpaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīm prati

original: 7.049.010c dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pitus te lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pituḥ te lakṣmaṇa agratas

original: 7.049.011a bhaviṣyati dṛḍhaṃ rāmo duḥkhaprāyo 'lpasukhyavān
analyzed: bhaviṣyati dṛḍham rāmaḥ duḥkha prāyaḥ lpa sukhyavān

original: 7.049.011c tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā
analyzed: tvām ca eva maithilīm ca eva śatrughna bharatau tathā

original: 7.049.011e saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā mahān
analyzed: saṃtyajiṣyati dharma ātmā kālena mahatā mahān

original: 7.049.012a na tv idaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā
analyzed: na tu idam tvayi vaktavyam saumitre bharate vā

original: 7.049.012c rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha
analyzed: rājñā vaḥ vyāhṛtam vākyam durvāsāḥ yat uvāca ha

original: 7.049.013a mahārājasamīpe ca mama caiva nararṣabha
analyzed: mahā rāja samīpe ca mama ca eva nara ṛṣabha

original: 7.049.013c ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau
analyzed: ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtam vākyam vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau

original: 7.049.014a ṛṣes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ tu vacanam śrutvā mām āha puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 7.049.014c sūta na kva cid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau
analyzed: sūta na kva cit evam te vaktavyam jana saṃnidhau

original: 7.049.015a tasyāhaṃ lokapālasya vākyaṃ tat susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham lokapālasya vākyam tat su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.049.015c naiva jātv anṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam
analyzed: na eva jātu anṛtam kuryām iti me saumya darśanam

original: 7.049.016a sarvathā nāsty avaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ
analyzed: sarvathā nā asti avaktavyam mayā saumya tava agratas

original: 7.049.016c yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana
analyzed: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatām raghunandana

original: 7.049.017a yady apy ahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā
analyzed: yadi api aham narendreṇa rahasyam śrāvitaḥ purā

original: 7.049.017c tac cāpy udāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam
analyzed: tat ca api udāhariṣyāmi daivam hi duratikramam

original: 7.049.018a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhāṣitam tasya gambhīra artha padam mahat

original: 7.049.018c tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: tathyam brūhi iti saumitriḥ sūtam vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.050.001a tathā saṃcoditaḥ sūto lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: tathā saṃcoditaḥ sūtaḥ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: 7.050.001c tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame
analyzed: tat vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktam vyāhartum upacakrame

original: 7.050.002a purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: purā nāmnā hi durvāsāḥ atreḥ putraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 7.050.002c vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya āśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha

original: 7.050.003a tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tam āśramam mahā tejāḥ pitā te su mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.050.003c purodhasaṃ mahātmānaṃ didṛkṣur agamat svayam
analyzed: purodhasam mahātmānam didṛkṣuḥ agamat svayam

original: 7.050.004a sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā sūrya saṃkāśam jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 7.050.004c upaviṣṭaṃ vasiṣṭhasya savye pārśve mahāmunim
analyzed: upaviṣṭam vasiṣṭhasya savye pārśve mahā munim

original: 7.050.004e tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītas tv abhyavādayat
analyzed: tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītaḥ tu abhyavādayat

original: 7.050.005a sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca
analyzed: sa tābhyām pūjitaḥ rājā svāgatena āsanena ca

original: 7.050.005c pādyena phalamūlaiś ca so 'py āste munibhiḥ saha
analyzed: pādyena phala mūlaiḥ ca saḥ pi āste munibhiḥ saha

original: 7.050.006a teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tās tāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: teṣām tatra upaviṣṭānām tāḥ tāḥ su madhurāḥ kathāḥ

original: 7.050.006c babhūvuḥ paramarṣīṇāṃ madhyādityagate 'hani
analyzed: babhūvuḥ parama ṛṣīṇām madhya āditya gate hani

original: 7.050.007a tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tatas kathāyām kasyām cit prāñjaliḥ pragrahaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.050.007c uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam
analyzed: uvāca tam mahātmānam atreḥ putram tapodhanam

original: 7.050.008a bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhagavan kim pramāṇena mama vaṃśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.050.008c kimāyuś ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāś cānye kimāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: kimāyuḥ ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāḥ ca anye kimāyuṣaḥ

original: 7.050.009a rāmasya ca sutā ye syus teṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet
analyzed: rāmasya ca sutāḥ ye syuḥ teṣām āyuḥ kiyat bhavet

original: 7.050.009c kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama
analyzed: kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasya asya gatim mama

original: 7.050.010a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu
analyzed: tat śrutvā vyāhṛtam vākyam rājñaḥ daśarathasya tu

original: 7.050.010c durvāsāḥ sumahātejā vyāhartum upacakrame
analyzed: durvāsāḥ su mahā tejāḥ vyāhartum upacakrame

original: 7.050.011a ayodhyāyāḥ patī rāmo dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ayodhyāyāḥ patiḥ rāmaḥ dīrgha kālam bhaviṣyati

original: 7.050.011c sukhinaś ca samṛddhāś ca bhaviṣyanty asya cānujāḥ
analyzed: sukhinaḥ ca samṛddhāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti asya ca anujāḥ

original: 7.050.012a kasmiṃś cit karaṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: kasmin cit karaṇe tvām ca maithilīm ca yaśasvinīm

original: 7.050.012c saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā kila
analyzed: saṃtyajiṣyati dharma ātmā kālena mahatā kila

original: 7.050.013a daśavarṣasahasraṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasraṇi daśa varṣa śatāni ca

original: 7.050.013c rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: rāmaḥ rājyam upāsitvā brahma lokam gamiṣyati

original: 7.050.014a samṛddhair hayamedhaiś ca iṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: samṛddhaiḥ hayamedhaiḥ ca iṣṭvā para puraṃjayaḥ

original: 7.050.014c rājavaṃśāṃś ca kākutstho bahūn saṃsthāpayiṣyati
analyzed: rāja vaṃśān ca kākutsthaḥ bahūn saṃsthāpayiṣyati

original: 7.050.015a sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam
analyzed: sa sarvam akhilam rājñaḥ vaṃśasya asya gatāgatam

original: 7.050.015c ākhyāya sumahātejās tūṣṇīm āsīn mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: ākhyāya su mahā tejāḥ tūṣṇīm āsīt mahā dyutiḥ

original: 7.050.016a tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathas tadā
analyzed: tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathaḥ tadā

original: 7.050.016c abhivādya mahātmānau punar āyāt purottamam
analyzed: abhivādya mahātmānau punar āyāt pura uttamam

original: 7.050.017a etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā
analyzed: etat vacaḥ mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtam purā

original: 7.050.017c śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
analyzed: śrutam hṛdi ca nikṣiptam na anyathā tat bhaviṣyati

original: 7.050.018a evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava
analyzed: evaṃgate na saṃtāpam gantum arhasi rāghava

original: 7.050.018c sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama
analyzed: sītā arthe rāghava arthe vā dṛḍhaḥ bhava nara uttama

original: 7.050.019a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam
analyzed: tat śrutvā vyāhṛtam vākyam sūtasya parama adbhutam

original: 7.050.019c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe sādhu sādhu iti ca abravīt

original: 7.050.020a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ sūtalakṣmaṇayoḥ pathi
analyzed: tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ evam sūta lakṣmaṇayoḥ pathi

original: 7.050.020c astam arko gato vāsaṃ gomatyāṃ tāv athoṣatuḥ
analyzed: astam arkaḥ gataḥ vāsam gomatyām tau atha ūṣatuḥ

original: 7.051.001a tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: tatra tām rajanīm uṣya gomatyām raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.051.001c prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā
analyzed: prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā

original: 7.051.002a tato 'rdhadivase prāpte praviveśa mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tatas ṛdhadivase prāpte praviveśa mahā rathaḥ

original: 7.051.002c ayodhyāṃ ratnasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtām
analyzed: ayodhyām ratna saṃpūrṇām hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛtām

original: 7.051.003a saumitris tu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ
analyzed: saumitriḥ tu param dainyam jagāma su mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.051.003c rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: rāma pādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim aham gataḥ

original: 7.051.004a tasyaivaṃ cintayānasya bhavanaṃ śaśisaṃnibham
analyzed: tasya evam cintayānasya bhavanam śaśi saṃnibham

original: 7.051.004c rājasya paramodāraṃ purastāt samadṛśyata
analyzed: rājasya parama udāram purastāt samadṛśyata

original: 7.051.005a rājñas tu bhavanadvāri so 'vatīrya narottamaḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu bhavana dvāri saḥ vatīrya nara uttamaḥ

original: 7.051.005c avānmukho dīnamanāḥ prāviveśānivāritaḥ
analyzed: avān mukhaḥ dīna manāḥ prāviveśa anivāritaḥ

original: 7.051.006a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavam dīnam āsīnam parama āsane

original: 7.051.006c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ dadarśāgrajam agrataḥ
analyzed: netrābhyām aśru pūrṇābhyām dadarśa agrajam agratas

original: 7.051.007a jagrāha caraṇau tasya lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ
analyzed: jagrāha caraṇau tasya lakṣmaṇaḥ dīna cetanaḥ

original: 7.051.007c uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.051.008a āryasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām
analyzed: āryasya ājñām puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām

original: 7.051.008c gaṅgātīre yathoddiṣṭe vālmīker āśrame śubhe
analyzed: gaṅgā tīre yathā uddiṣṭe vālmīkeḥ āśrame śubhe

original: 7.051.008e punar asmy āgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum
analyzed: punar asmi āgataḥ vīra pāda mūlam upāsitum

original: 7.051.009a mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī
analyzed: mā śucaḥ puruṣa vyāghra kālasya gatiḥ īdṛśī

original: 7.051.009c tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ
analyzed: tvadvidhāḥ na hi śocanti sattvavantaḥ manasvinaḥ

original: 7.051.010a sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ
analyzed: sarve kṣaya antāḥ nicayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ

original: 7.051.010c saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam
analyzed: saṃyogāḥ viprayoga antāḥ maraṇa antam ca jīvitam

original: 7.051.011a śaktas tvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi
analyzed: śaktaḥ tvam ātmanā ātmānam vijetum manasā eva hi

original: 7.051.011c lokān sarvāṃś ca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam
analyzed: lokān sarvān ca kākutstha kim punar duḥkham īdṛśam

original: 7.051.012a nedṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: na īdṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 7.051.012c yadarthaṃ maithilī tyaktā apavādabhayān nṛpa
analyzed: yad artham maithilī tyaktā apavāda bhayāt nṛpa

original: 7.051.013a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla dhairyeṇa su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.051.013c tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha
analyzed: tyaja imām durbalām buddhim saṃtāpam mā kuruṣva ha

original: 7.051.014a evam uktas tu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu kākutsthaḥ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: 7.051.014c uvāca parayā prītyā saumitriṃ mitravatsalam
analyzed: uvāca parayā prītyā saumitrim mitra vatsalam

original: 7.051.015a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: evam etat nara śreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.051.015c paritoṣaś ca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane
analyzed: paritoṣaḥ ca me vīra mama kārya anuśāsane

original: 7.051.016a nirvṛtiś ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaś ca nirākṛtaḥ
analyzed: nirvṛtiḥ ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaḥ ca nirākṛtaḥ

original: 7.051.016c bhavadvākyaiḥ sumadhurair anunīto 'smi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: bhavat vākyaiḥ su madhuraiḥ anunītaḥ smi lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.052.001a tataḥ sumantras tv āgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas sumantraḥ tu āgamya rāghavam vākyam abravīt

original: 7.052.001c ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ
analyzed: ete nivāritāḥ rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ

original: 7.052.002a bhārgavaṃ cyavanaṃ nāma puraskṛtya maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: bhārgavam cyavanam nāma puraskṛtya mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.052.002c darśanaṃ te mahārāja codayanti kṛtatvarāḥ
analyzed: darśanam te mahā rāja codayanti kṛta tvarāḥ

original: 7.052.002e prīyamāṇā naravyāghra yamunātīravāsinaḥ
analyzed: prīyamāṇāḥ nara vyāghra yamunā tīra vāsinaḥ

original: 7.052.003a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharma vid

original: 7.052.003c praveśyantāṃ mahātmāno bhārgavapramukhā dvijāḥ
analyzed: praveśyantām mahātmānaḥ bhārgava pramukhāḥ dvijāḥ

original: 7.052.004a rājñas tv ājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu ājñām puraskṛtya dvāḥsthaḥ mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.052.004c praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn
analyzed: praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn

original: 7.052.005a śataṃ samadhikaṃ tatra dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
analyzed: śatam samadhikam tatra dīpyamānam sva tejasā

original: 7.052.005c praviṣṭaṃ rājabhavanaṃ tāpasānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: praviṣṭam rāja bhavanam tāpasānām mahātmanām

original: 7.052.006a te dvijāḥ pūrṇakalaśaiḥ sarvatīrthāmbusatkṛtam
analyzed: te dvijāḥ pūrṇa kalaśaiḥ sarva tīrtha ambu satkṛtam

original: 7.052.006c gṛhītvā phalamūlaṃ ca rāmasyābhyāharan bahu
analyzed: gṛhītvā phala mūlam ca rāmasya abhyāharan bahu

original: 7.052.007a pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvam rāmaḥ prīti puraskṛtaḥ

original: 7.052.007c tīrthodakāni sarvāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: tīrtha udakāni sarvāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca

original: 7.052.008a uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvān eva mahāmunīn
analyzed: uvāca ca mahā bāhuḥ sarvān eva mahā munīn

original: 7.052.008c imāny āsanamukhyāni yathārham upaviśyatām
analyzed: imāni āsana mukhyāni yathārham upaviśyatām

original: 7.052.009a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya bhāṣitam śrutvā sarve eva mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.052.009c bṛsīṣu rucirākhyāsu niṣeduḥ kāñcanīṣu te
analyzed: bṛsīṣu rucira ākhyāsu niṣeduḥ kāñcanīṣu te

original: 7.052.010a upaviṣṭān ṛṣīṃs tatra dṛṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: upaviṣṭān ṛṣīn tatra dṛṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: 7.052.010c prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā rāghavo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: prayataḥ prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā rāghavaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.052.011a kim āgamanakaryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: kim āgamana karyam vaḥ kim karomi tapodhanāḥ

original: 7.052.011c ājñāpyo 'haṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sarvakāmakaraḥ sukham
analyzed: ājñāpyaḥ ham mahā ṛṣīṇām sarva kāma karaḥ sukham

original: 7.052.012a idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam
analyzed: idam rājyam ca sakalam jīvitam ca hṛdi sthitam

original: 7.052.012c sarvam etad dvijārthaṃ me satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat dvija artham me satyam etat bravīmi vaḥ

original: 7.052.013a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā sādhuvādaḥ mahān abhūt

original: 7.052.013c ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ yamunātīravāsinām
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ugra tapasām yamunā tīra vāsinām

original: 7.052.014a ūcuś ca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca te mahātmānaḥ harṣeṇa mahatā anvitāḥ

original: 7.052.014c upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tavaiva bhuvi nānyataḥ
analyzed: upapannam nara śreṣṭha tava eva bhuvi na anyatas

original: 7.052.015a bahavaḥ pārthivā rājann atikrāntā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ pārthivāḥ rājan atikrāntāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 7.052.015c kāryagauravam aśrutvā pratijñāṃ nābhyarocayan
analyzed: kārya gauravam a śrutvā pratijñām na abhyarocayan

original: 7.052.016a tvayā punar brāhmaṇa gauravād iyaṃ;
analyzed: tvayā punar brāhmaṇa gauravāt iyam

original: kṛtvā pratijñā hy anavekṣya kāraṇam
analyzed: kṛtvā pratijñāḥ hi an avekṣya kāraṇam

original: 7.052.016c kuruṣva kartā hy asi nātra saṃśayo;
analyzed: kuruṣva kartā hi asi na atra saṃśayo

original: mahābhayāt trātum ṛṣīṃs tvam arhasi
analyzed: mahā bhayāt trātum ṛṣīn tvam arhasi

original: 7.053.001a bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt
analyzed: bruvadbhiḥ evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutsthaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.053.001c kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ
analyzed: kim kāryam brūta bhavatām bhayam nāśayitāsmi vaḥ

original: 7.053.002a tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.053.002c bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yan mūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara
analyzed: bhayam naḥ śṛṇu yat mūlam deśasya ca nareśvara

original: 7.053.003a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma daiteyaḥ sumahābalaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam kṛta yuge rāma daiteyaḥ su mahā balaḥ

original: 7.053.003c lolāputro 'bhavaj jyeṣṭho madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: lolā putraḥ bhavat jyeṣṭhaḥ madhuḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ

original: 7.053.004a brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ ca śaraṇyaḥ ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.053.004c suraiś ca paramodāraiḥ prītis tasyātulābhavat
analyzed: suraiḥ ca parama udāraiḥ prītiḥ tasya atulā abhavat

original: 7.053.005a sa madhur vīryasaṃpanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: sa madhuḥ vīrya saṃpannaḥ dharme ca su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.053.005c bahumānāc ca rudreṇa dattas tasyādbhuto varaḥ
analyzed: bahu mānāt ca rudreṇa dattaḥ tasya adbhutaḥ varaḥ

original: 7.053.006a śūlaṃ śūlād viniṣkṛṣya mahāvīryaṃ mahāprabham
analyzed: śūlam śūlāt viniṣkṛṣya mahā vīryam mahā prabham

original: 7.053.006c dadau mahātmā suprīto vākayṃ caitad uvāca ha
analyzed: dadau mahātmā su prītaḥ ca etat uvāca ha

original: 7.053.007a tvayāyam atulo dharmo matprasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
analyzed: tvayā ayam atulaḥ dharmaḥ mad prasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ

original: 7.053.007c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy āyudham uttamam
analyzed: prītyā paramayā yuktaḥ dadāmi āyudham uttamam

original: 7.053.008a yāvat suraiś ca vipraiś ca na virudhyer mahāsura
analyzed: yāvat suraiḥ ca vipraiḥ ca na virudhyeḥ mahā asura

original: 7.053.008c tāvac chūlaṃ tavedaṃ syād anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt
analyzed: tāvat śūlam tava idam syāt anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt

original: 7.053.009a yaś ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigata jvaraḥ

original: 7.053.009c taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam
analyzed: tam śūlam bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam

original: 7.053.010a evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: evam rudrāt varam labdhvā bhūyas eva mahā asuraḥ

original: 7.053.010c praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: praṇipatya mahādevam vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.053.011a bhagavan mama vaṃśasya śūlam etad anuttamam
analyzed: bhagavat mama vaṃśasya śūlam etat anuttamam

original: 7.053.011c bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hy asi
analyzed: bhavet tu satatam deva surāṇām īśvaraḥ hi asi

original: 7.053.012a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ
analyzed: tam bruvāṇam madhum devaḥ sarva bhūta patiḥ śivaḥ

original: 7.053.012c pratyuvāca mahādevo naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: pratyuvāca mahādevaḥ na etat evam bhaviṣyati

original: 7.053.013a mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā
analyzed: mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī mad prāsāda kṛtā śubhā

original: 7.053.013c bhavataḥ putram ekaṃ tu śūlam etad gamiṣyati
analyzed: bhavataḥ putram ekam tu śūlam etat gamiṣyati

original: 7.053.014a yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te
analyzed: yāvat kara sthaḥ śūlaḥ yam bhaviṣyati sutasya te

original: 7.053.014c avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ śūlahasto bhaviṣyati
analyzed: avadhyaḥ sarva bhūtānām śūla hastaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.053.015a evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam
analyzed: evam madhu varam labdhvā devāt su mahat adbhutam

original: 7.053.015c bhavanaṃ cāsuraśreṣṭhaḥ kārayām āsa suprabham
analyzed: bhavanam ca asura śreṣṭhaḥ kārayām āsa su prabham

original: 7.053.016a tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā
analyzed: tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā

original: 7.053.016c viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hy analāyāṃ mahāprabhā
analyzed: viśvāsayoḥ apatyam sā hi analāyām mahā prabhā

original: 7.053.017a tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ putraḥ mahā vīryaḥ lavaṇaḥ nāma dāruṇaḥ

original: 7.053.017c bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpāny eva samācarat
analyzed: bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭa ātmā pāpāni eva samācarat

original: 7.053.018a taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: tam putram durvinītam tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkha samanvitaḥ

original: 7.053.018c madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
analyzed: madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na ca enam kim cit abravīt

original: 7.053.019a sa vihāya imaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam
analyzed: sa vihāya imam lokam praviṣṭaḥ varuṇālayam

original: 7.053.019c śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat
analyzed: śūlam niveśya lavaṇe varam tasmai nyavedayat

original: 7.053.020a sa prabhāvena śūlasya daurātmyenātmanas tathā
analyzed: sa prabhāvena śūlasya daurātmyena ātmanaḥ tathā

original: 7.053.020c saṃtāpayati lokāṃs trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān
analyzed: saṃtāpayati lokān trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān

original: 7.053.021a evaṃprabhāvo lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ caiva tathāvidham
analyzed: evaṃprabhāvaḥ lavaṇaḥ śūlam ca eva tathāvidham

original: 7.053.021c śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: śrutvā pramāṇam kākutstham tvam hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: 7.053.022a bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā
analyzed: bahavaḥ pārthivāḥ rāma bhaya ārtaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ purā

original: 7.053.022c abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe
analyzed: abhayam yācitāḥ vīra trātāram na ca vidmahe

original: 7.053.023a te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam
analyzed: te vayam rāvaṇam śrutvā hatam sa bala vāhanam

original: 7.053.023c trātāraṃ vidmahe rāma nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam
analyzed: trātāram vidmahe rāma na anyam bhuvi narādhipam

original: 7.053.023e tat paritrātum icchāmo lavaṇād bhayapīḍitāḥ
analyzed: tat paritrātum icchāmaḥ lavaṇāt bhaya pīḍitāḥ

original: 7.054.001a tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tathā ukte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.054.001c kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate
analyzed: kimāhāraḥ kimācāraḥ lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate

original: 7.054.002a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te
analyzed: rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarve eva te

original: 7.054.002c tato nivedayām āsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā
analyzed: tatas nivedayām āsuḥ lavaṇaḥ vavṛdhe yathā

original: 7.054.003a āhāraḥ sarvasattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ
analyzed: āhāraḥ sarva sattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ

original: 7.054.003c ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā
analyzed: ācāraḥ raudra tā nityam vāsaḥ madhuvane sadā

original: 7.054.004a hatvā daśasahasrāṇi siṃhavyāghramṛgadvipān
analyzed: hatvā daśa sahasrāṇi siṃha vyāghra mṛga dvipān

original: 7.054.004c mānuṣāṃś caiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam
analyzed: mānuṣān ca eva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam

original: 7.054.005a tato 'parāṇi sattvāni khādate sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: parāṇi sattvāni khādate sa mahā balaḥ

original: 7.054.005c saṃhāre samanuprāpte vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ
analyzed: saṃhāre samanuprāpte vyādita āsyaḥ iva antakaḥ

original: 7.054.006a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn
analyzed: tat śrutvā rāghavaḥ vākyam uvāca sa mahā munīn

original: 7.054.006c ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam
analyzed: ghātayiṣyāmi tat rakṣaḥ vyapagacchatu vaḥ bhayam

original: 7.054.007a tathā teṣāṃ pratijñāya munīnām ugratejasām
analyzed: tathā teṣām pratijñāya munīnām ugra tejasām

original: 7.054.007c sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.054.008a ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
analyzed: kaḥ hantā lavaṇam vīrāḥ kasya aṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām

original: 7.054.008c bharatasya mahābāhoḥ śatrughnasyāthavā punaḥ
analyzed: bharatasya mahā bāhoḥ śatrughnasya athavā punar

original: 7.054.009a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bharato vākyam abravīt
analyzed: rāghaveṇa evam uktaḥ tu bharataḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.054.009c aham enaṃ badhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
analyzed: aham enam badhiṣyāmi mama aṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām

original: 7.054.010a bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śauryavīryasamanvitam
analyzed: bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śaurya vīrya samanvitam

original: 7.054.010c lakṣmaṇāvarajas tasthau hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇa avarajaḥ tasthau hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam

original: 7.054.011a śatrughnas tv abravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ tu abravīt vākyam praṇipatya narādhipam

original: 7.054.011c kṛtakarmā mahābāhur madhyamo raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: kṛta karmā mahā bāhuḥ madhyamaḥ raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.054.012a āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī
analyzed: āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī

original: 7.054.012c saṃtāpaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasyāgamanaṃ prati
analyzed: saṃtāpam hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasya āgamanam prati

original: 7.054.013a duḥkhāni ca bahūnīha anubhūtāni pārthiva
analyzed: duḥkhāni ca bahūni iha anubhūtāni pārthiva

original: 7.054.013c śayāno duḥkhaśayyāsu nandigrāme mahātmanā
analyzed: śayānaḥ duḥkha śayyāsu nandigrāme mahātmanā

original: 7.054.014a phalamūlāśano bhūtvā jaṭācīradharas tathā
analyzed: phala mūla aśanaḥ bhūtvā jaṭā cīra dharaḥ tathā

original: 7.054.014c anubhūyedṛśaṃ duḥkham eṣa rāghavanandanaḥ
analyzed: anubhūya īdṛśam duḥkham eṣa rāghava nandanaḥ

original: 7.054.014e preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt
analyzed: preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyas kleśam āpnuyāt

original: 7.054.015a tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt

original: 7.054.015c evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam
analyzed: evam bhavatu kākutstha kriyatām mama śāsanam

original: 7.054.016a rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghos tu nagare śubhe
analyzed: rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghoḥ tu nagare śubhe

original: 7.054.016c niveśaya mahābāho bharataṃ yady avekṣase
analyzed: niveśaya mahā bāho bharatam yadi avekṣase

original: 7.054.017a śūras tvaṃ kṛtavidyaś ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane
analyzed: śūraḥ tvam kṛta vidyaḥ ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane

original: 7.054.017c nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñ śubhān
analyzed: nagaram madhunā juṣṭam tathā janapadām śubhān

original: 7.054.018a yo hi vaṃśaṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye
analyzed: yaḥ hi vaṃśam samutpāṭya pārthivasya punar kṣaye

original: 7.054.018c na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa nigacchati
analyzed: na vidhatte nṛpam tatra narakam sa nigacchati

original: 7.054.019a sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
analyzed: sa tvam hatvā madhu sutam lavaṇam pāpa niścayam

original: 7.054.019c rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yady avekṣase
analyzed: rājyam praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyam me yadi avekṣase

original: 7.054.020a uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama
analyzed: uttaram ca na vaktavyam śūra vākya antare mama

original: 7.054.020c bālena pūrvajasyājñā kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: bālena pūrvajasya ājñā kartavyā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.054.021a abhiṣekaṃ ca kākutstha pratīcchasva mayodyatam
analyzed: abhiṣekam ca kākutstha pratīcchasva mayā udyatam

original: 7.054.021c vasiṣṭhapramukhair viprair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam
analyzed: vasiṣṭha pramukhaiḥ vipraiḥ vidhi mantra puraskṛtam

original: 7.055.001a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa parām vrīḍām upāgataḥ

original: 7.055.001c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ vīrya saṃpannaḥ mandam mandam uvāca ha

original: 7.055.002a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca śāsanaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: avaśyam karaṇīyam ca śāsanam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.055.002c tava caiva mahābhāga śāsanaṃ duratikramam
analyzed: tava ca eva mahābhāga śāsanam duratikramam

original: 7.055.002e ayaṃ kāmakaro rājaṃs tavāsmi puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: ayam kāma karaḥ rājan tava asmi puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.055.003a evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā

original: 7.055.003c uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā
analyzed: uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaḥ lakṣmaṇam bharatam tathā

original: 7.055.004a saṃbhārān abhiṣekasya ānayadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: saṃbhārān abhiṣekasya ānayadhvam samāhitāḥ

original: 7.055.004c adyaiva puruṣavyāghram abhiṣekṣyāmi durjayam
analyzed: adyā eva puruṣa vyāghram abhiṣekṣyāmi durjayam

original: 7.055.005a purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijas tathā
analyzed: purodhasam ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijaḥ tathā

original: 7.055.005c mantriṇaś caiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ ca eva me sarvān ānayadhvam mama ājñayā

original: 7.055.006a rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tathākurvan mahārathaḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tathā kurvan mahā rathaḥ

original: 7.055.006c abhiṣekasamārambhaṃ puraskṛtya purodhasaṃ
analyzed: abhiṣeka samārambham puraskṛtya purodhasam

original: 7.055.006e praviṣṭā rājabhavanaṃ puraṃdara gṛhopamam
analyzed: praviṣṭāḥ rāja bhavanam puraṃdara gṛha upamam

original: 7.055.007a tato 'bhiṣeko vavṛdhe śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhiṣekaḥ vavṛdhe śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.055.007c saṃpraharṣakaraḥ śrīmān rāghavasya purasya ca
analyzed: saṃpraharṣa karaḥ śrīmān rāghavasya purasya ca

original: 7.055.008a tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ śatrughnam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhiṣiktam śatrughnam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ

original: 7.055.008c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tejas tasyābhipūrayan
analyzed: uvāca madhurām vāṇīm tejaḥ tasya abhipūrayan

original: 7.055.009a ayaṃ śaras tv amoghas te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: ayam śaraḥ tu amoghaḥ te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: 7.055.009c anena lavaṇaṃ saumya hantāsi raghunandana
analyzed: anena lavaṇam saumya hantāsi raghunandana

original: 7.055.010a sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ śaraḥ yam kākutstha yadā śete mahā arṇave

original: 7.055.010c svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ
analyzed: svayambhūḥ ajitaḥ devaḥ yam na apaśyan sura asurāḥ

original: 7.055.011a adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tenāyaṃ hi śarottamaḥ
analyzed: adṛśyaḥ sarva bhūtānām tena ayam hi śara uttamaḥ

original: 7.055.011c sṛṣṭaḥ krodhābhibhūtena vināśārthaṃ durātmanoḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ krodha abhibhūtena vināśa artham durātmanoḥ

original: 7.055.011e madhukauṭabhayor vīra vighāte vartamānayoḥ
analyzed: madhu kauṭabhayoḥ vīra vighāte vartamānayoḥ

original: 7.055.012a sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃs trīṃs tau cānena hatau yudhi
analyzed: sraṣṭu kāmena lokān trīn tau ca anena hatau yudhi

original: 7.055.012c anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃś cakāra saḥ
analyzed: anena śara mukhyena tatas lokān cakāra saḥ

original: 7.055.013a nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā
analyzed: na ayam mayā śaraḥ pūrvam rāvaṇasya vadha arthinā

original: 7.055.013c mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃs trāso bhaved iti
analyzed: mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānām mahān trāsaḥ bhavet iti

original: 7.055.014a yac ca tasya mahac chūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: yat ca tasya mahat śūlam tryambakeṇa mahātmanā

original: 7.055.014c dattaṃ śatruvināśāya madhor āyudham uttamam
analyzed: dattam śatru vināśāya madhoḥ āyudham uttamam

original: 7.055.015a tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānam punar punar

original: 7.055.015c diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoty āhāram ātmanaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoti āhāram ātmanaḥ

original: 7.055.016a yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaś cid enaṃ samāhvayet
analyzed: yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaḥ cit enam samāhvayet

original: 7.055.016c tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam
analyzed: tadā śūlam gṛhītvā tat bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam

original: 7.055.017a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam āyudhavivarjitam
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla tam āyudha vivarjitam

original: 7.055.017c apraviṣṭapuraṃ pūrvaṃ dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛtāyudhaḥ
analyzed: apraviṣṭa puram pūrvam dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛta āyudhaḥ

original: 7.055.018a apraviṣṭaṃ ca bhavanaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: apraviṣṭam ca bhavanam yuddhāya puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.055.018c āhvayethā mahābāho tato hantāsi rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: āhvayethāḥ mahā bāho tatas hantāsi rākṣasam

original: 7.055.019a anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati
analyzed: anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati

original: 7.055.019c yadi tv evaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati
analyzed: yadi tu evam kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati

original: 7.055.020a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayam
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam śūlasya ca viparyayam

original: 7.055.020c śrīmataḥ śitikaṇṭhasya kṛtyaṃ hi duratikramam
analyzed: śrīmataḥ śitikaṇṭhasya kṛtyam hi duratikramam

original: 7.056.001a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu kākutstham praśasya ca punar punar

original: 7.056.001c punar evāparaṃ vākyam uvāca raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: punar eva aparam vākyam uvāca raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.056.002a imāny aśvasahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: imāni aśva sahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.056.002c rathānāṃ ca sahasre dve gajānāṃ śatam eva ca
analyzed: rathānām ca sahasre dve gajānām śatam eva ca

original: 7.056.003a antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca nānāpaṇyopaśobhitāḥ
analyzed: antarāpaṇa vīthyaḥ ca nānā paṇya upaśobhitāḥ

original: 7.056.003c anugacchantu śatrughna tathaiva naṭanartakāḥ
analyzed: anugacchantu śatrughna tathā eva naṭa nartakāḥ

original: 7.056.004a hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya ayutaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya ayutam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.056.004c gṛhītvā gaccha śatrughna paryāptadhanavāhanaḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā gaccha śatrughna paryāpta dhana vāhanaḥ

original: 7.056.005a balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭam anuttamam
analyzed: balam ca subhṛtam vīra hṛṣṭa puṣṭam anuttamam

original: 7.056.005c saṃbhāṣya saṃpradānena rañjayasva narottama
analyzed: saṃbhāṣya saṃpradānena rañjayasva nara uttama

original: 7.056.006a na hy arthās tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: na hi arthāḥ tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārāḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ

original: 7.056.006c suprīto bhṛtyavargas tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava
analyzed: su prītaḥ bhṛtya vargaḥ tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava

original: 7.056.007a ato hṛṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ prasthāpya mahatīṃ camūm
analyzed: atas hṛṣṭa jana ākīrṇām prasthāpya mahatīm camūm

original: 7.056.007c eka eva dhanuṣpānis tad gaccha tvaṃ madhor vanam
analyzed: ekaḥ eva dhanuṣpāniḥ tat gaccha tvam madhoḥ vanam

original: 7.056.008a yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam
analyzed: yathā tvām na prajānāti gacchantam yuddha kāṅkṣiṇam

original: 7.056.008c lavaṇas tu madhoḥ putras tathā gaccher aśaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: lavaṇaḥ tu madhoḥ putraḥ tathā gaccheḥ aśaṅkitaḥ

original: 7.056.009a na tasya mṛtyur anyo 'sti kaścid dhi puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: na tasya mṛtyuḥ anyaḥ sti kaścid hi puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.056.009c darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi
analyzed: darśanam yaḥ abhigaccheta sa vadhyaḥ lavaṇena hi

original: 7.056.010a sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣarātra upasthite
analyzed: sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣa rātre upasthite

original: 7.056.010c hanyās tvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sa hi kālo 'sya durmateḥ
analyzed: hanyāḥ tvam lavaṇam saumya sa hi durmateḥ

original: 7.056.011a maharṣīṃs tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣīn tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ

original: 7.056.011c yathā grīṣmāvaśeṣeṇa tareyur jāhnavījalam
analyzed: yathā grīṣma avaśeṣeṇa tareyuḥ jāhnavī jalam

original: 7.056.012a tataḥ sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ
analyzed: tatas sthāpya balam sarvam nadī tīre samāhitaḥ

original: 7.056.012c agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikrama
analyzed: agratas dhanuṣā sārdham gaccha tvam laghu vikrama

original: 7.056.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa śatrughnas tān mahābalān
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa śatrughnaḥ tān mahā balān

original: 7.056.013c senāmukhyān samānīya tato vākyam uvāca ha
analyzed: senā mukhyān samānīya tatas vākyam uvāca ha

original: 7.056.014a ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra yatra nivatsyatha
analyzed: ete vaḥ gaṇitāḥ vāsāḥ yatra yatra nivatsyatha

original: 7.056.014c sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cit
analyzed: sthātavyam ca avirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cid

original: 7.056.015a tathā tāṃs tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahad balam
analyzed: tathā tān tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahat balam

original: 7.056.015c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaukeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
analyzed: kausalyām ca sumitrām ca kaukeyīm ca abhyavādayat

original: 7.056.016a rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca
analyzed: rāmam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā śirasā abhipraṇamya ca

original: 7.056.016c rāṇeṇa cābhyanujñātaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
analyzed: rāṇeṇa ca abhyanujñātaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatru tāpanaḥ

original: 7.056.017a lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam bharatam ca eva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.056.017c purodhasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān
analyzed: purodhasam vasiṣṭham ca śatrughnaḥ prayata ātmavān

original: 7.056.017e pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā nirjagāma mahābalaḥ
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā nirjagāma mahā balaḥ

original: 7.057.001a prasthāpya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi
analyzed: prasthāpya tat balam sarvam māsa mātra uṣitaḥ pathi

original: 7.057.001c eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritas tadā
analyzed: ekaḥ evā āśu śatrughnaḥ jagāma tvaritaḥ tadā

original: 7.057.002a dvirātram antare śūra uṣya rāghavanandanaḥ
analyzed: dvi rātram antare śūraḥ uṣya rāghava nandanaḥ

original: 7.057.002c vālmīker āśramaṃ puṇyam agacchad vāsam uttamam
analyzed: vālmīkeḥ āśramam puṇyam agacchat vāsam uttamam

original: 7.057.003a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ vālmīkiṃ munisattamam
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya mahātmānam vālmīkim muni sattamam

original: 7.057.003c kṛtāñjalir atho bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ atho bhūtvā vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.057.004a bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyād ihāgataḥ
analyzed: bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyāt iha āgataḥ

original: 7.057.004c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam
analyzed: śvas prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīm vāruṇīm diśam

original: 7.057.005a śatrughnasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: śatrughnasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasya muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.057.005c pratyuvaca mahātmānaṃ svāgataṃ te mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: pratyuvaca mahātmānam svāgatam te mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.057.006a svam āśramam idaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya ha
analyzed: svam āśramam idam saumya rāghavāṇām kulasya ha

original: 7.057.006c āsanaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me
analyzed: āsanam pādyam arghyam ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me

original: 7.057.007a pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam
analyzed: pratigṛhya tatas pūjām phala mūlam ca bhojanam

original: 7.057.007c bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthas tṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthaḥ tṛptim ca paramām gataḥ

original: 7.057.008a sa tu bhuktvā mahābāhur maharṣiṃ tam uvāca ha
analyzed: sa tu bhuktvā mahā bāhuḥ mahā ṛṣim tam uvāca ha

original: 7.057.008c pūrvaṃ yajñavibhūtīyaṃ kasyāśramasamīpataḥ
analyzed: pūrvam yajñavibhūtī iyam kasya āśrama samīpataḥ

original: 7.057.009a tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tasya tat bhāṣitam śrutvā vālmīkiḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.057.009c śatrughna śṛṇu yasyedaṃ babhūvāyatanaṃ purā
analyzed: śatrughna śṛṇu yasya idam babhūva āyatanam purā

original: 7.057.010a yuṣmākaṃ pūrvako rājā sudāsasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākam pūrvakaḥ rājā sudāsasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.057.010c putro mitrasaho nāma vīryavān atidhārmikaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ mitrasahaḥ nāma vīryavān ati dhārmikaḥ

original: 7.057.011a sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayām upacakrame
analyzed: sa bālaḥ eva saudāsaḥ mṛgayām upacakrame

original: 7.057.011c cañcūryamāṇaṃ dadṛśe sa śūro rākṣasadvayam
analyzed: cañcūryamāṇam dadṛśe sa śūraḥ rākṣasa dvayam

original: 7.057.012a śārdūlarūpiṇau ghorau mṛgān bahusahasraśaḥ
analyzed: śārdūla rūpiṇau ghorau mṛgān bahu sahasraśas

original: 7.057.012c bhakṣayāṇāv asaṃtuṣṭau paryāptiṃ ca na jagmatuḥ
analyzed: bhakṣayāṇau a saṃtuṣṭau paryāptim ca na jagmatuḥ

original: 7.057.013a sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgam ca vanam kṛtam

original: 7.057.013c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo jaghānaikaṃ maheṣuṇā
analyzed: krodhena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ jaghāna ekam mahā iṣuṇā

original: 7.057.014a vinipātya tam ekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: vinipātya tam ekam tu saudāsaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 7.057.014c vijvaro vigatāmarṣo hataṃ rakṣo 'bhyavaikṣata
analyzed: vijvaraḥ vigata amarṣaḥ hatam rakṣaḥ bhyavaikṣata

original: 7.057.015a nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyas tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣamāṇam tam dṛṣṭvā sahāyaḥ tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 7.057.015c saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: saṃtāpam akarot ghoram saudāsam ca idam abravīt

original: 7.057.016a yasmād anaparāddhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān
analyzed: yasmāt anaparāddham tvam sahāyam mama jaghnivān

original: 7.057.016c tasmāt tavāpu pāpiṣṭha pradāsyāmi pratikriyām
analyzed: tasmāt tava āpu pāpiṣṭha pradāsyāmi pratikriyām

original: 7.057.017a evam uktvā tu taṃ rakṣas tatraivāntaradhīyata
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tam rakṣaḥ tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: 7.057.017c kālaparyāya yogena rājā mitrasaho 'bhavat
analyzed: kāla paryāya yogena rājā mitrasahaḥ bhavat

original: 7.057.018a rājāpi yajate yajñaṃ tasyāśramasamīpataḥ
analyzed: rājā api yajate yajñam tasya āśrama samīpataḥ

original: 7.057.018c aśvamedhaṃ mahāyajñaṃ taṃ vasiṣṭho 'bhyapālayat
analyzed: aśvamedham mahā yajñam tam vasiṣṭhaḥ bhyapālayat

original: 7.057.019a tatra yajño mahān āsīd bahuvarṣa gaṇāyutān
analyzed: tatra yajñaḥ mahān āsīt bahu varṣa gaṇa ayutān

original: 7.057.019c samṛddhaḥ parayā lakṣmyā devayajñasamo 'bhavat
analyzed: samṛddhaḥ parayā lakṣmyā deva yajña samaḥ bhavat

original: 7.057.020a athāvasāne yajñasya pūrvavairam anusmaran
analyzed: atha avasāne yajñasya pūrva vairam anusmaran

original: 7.057.020c vasiṣṭharūpī rājānam iti hovāca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭha rūpī rājānam iti ha uvāca rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.057.021a adya yajñāvasānānte sāmiṣaṃ bhojanaṃ mama
analyzed: adya yajña avasāna ante sa āmiṣam bhojanam mama

original: 7.057.021c dīyatām iti śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
analyzed: dīyatām iti śīghram vai na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: 7.057.022a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
analyzed: tat śrutvā vyāhṛtam vākyam rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā

original: 7.057.022c bhakṣasaṃskārakuśalam uvāca pṛthivīpatiḥ
analyzed: bhakṣa saṃskāra kuśalam uvāca pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 7.057.023a haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam
analyzed: haviṣyam sa āmiṣam svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam

original: 7.057.023c tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ
analyzed: tathā kuruṣva śīghram vai parituṣyet yathā guruḥ

original: 7.057.024a śāsanāt pārthivendrasya sūdaḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ
analyzed: śāsanāt pārthiva indrasya sūdaḥ saṃbhrānta mānasaḥ

original: 7.057.024c sa ca rakṣaḥ punas tatra sūdaveṣam athākarot
analyzed: sa ca rakṣaḥ punar tatra sūda veṣam atha akarot

original: 7.057.025a sa mānuṣam atho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat
analyzed: sa mānuṣam atha u māṃsam pārthivāya nyavedayat

original: 7.057.025c idaṃ svāduhaviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnam āhṛtam
analyzed: idam svādu haviṣyam ca sa āmiṣam ca annam āhṛtam

original: 7.057.026a sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat
analyzed: sa bhojanam vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat

original: 7.057.026c madayantyā naravyāghra sāmiṣaṃ rakṣasā hṛtam
analyzed: madayantyā nara vyāghra sa āmiṣam rakṣasā hṛtam

original: 7.057.027a jñātvā tadāmiṣaṃ vipro mānuṣaṃ bhojanāhṛtam
analyzed: jñātvā tat āmiṣam vipraḥ mānuṣam bhojana āhṛtam

original: 7.057.027c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vyāhartum upacakrame
analyzed: krodhena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ vyāhartum upacakrame

original: 7.057.028a yasmāt tvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājan mamaitad dātum icchasi
analyzed: yasmāt tvam bhojanam rājan mama etat dātum icchasi

original: 7.057.028c tasmād bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.057.029a sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhur

original: 7.057.029c punar vasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yad uktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā
analyzed: punar vasiṣṭham provāca yat uktam brahma rūpiṇā

original: 7.057.030a tac chrutā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat
analyzed: tat śrutā pārthiva indrasya rakṣasā vikṛtam ca tat

original: 7.057.030c punaḥ provāca rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ puruṣarṣabham
analyzed: punar provāca rājānam vasiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: 7.057.031a mayā roṣaparītena yad idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: mayā roṣa parītena yat idam vyāhṛtam vacaḥ

original: 7.057.031c naitac chakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam
analyzed: na etat śakyam vṛthā kartum pradāsyāmi ca te varam

original: 7.057.032a kālo dvādaśa varṣāṇi śāpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kālaḥ dvādaśa varṣāṇi śāpasya asya bhaviṣyati

original: 7.057.032c matprasādāc ca rājendra atītaṃ na smariṣyasi
analyzed: mad prasādāt ca rāja indra atītam na smariṣyasi

original: 7.057.033a evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpam upabhujyārimardanaḥ
analyzed: evam sa rājā tam śāpam upabhujya ari mardanaḥ

original: 7.057.033c pratilebhe punā rājyaṃ prajāś caivānvapālayat
analyzed: pratilebhe punar rājyam prajāḥ ca eva anvapālayat

original: 7.057.034a tasya kalmāṣapādasya yajñasyāyatanaṃ śubham
analyzed: tasya kalmāṣapādasya yajñasya āyatanam śubham

original: 7.057.034c āśramasya samīpe 'smin yasmin pṛcchasi rāghava
analyzed: āśramasya samīpe smin yasmin pṛcchasi rāghava

original: 7.057.035a tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇam
analyzed: tasya tām pārthiva indrasya kathām śrutvā su dāruṇam

original: 7.057.035c viveśa parṇaśālāyāṃ maharṣim abhivādya ca
analyzed: viveśa parṇa śālāyām mahā ṛṣim abhivādya ca

original: 7.058.001a yām eva rātriṃ śatrughna parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat
analyzed: yām eva rātrim śatrughna parṇa śālām samāviśat

original: 7.058.001c tām eva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam
analyzed: tām eva rātrim sītā api prasūtā dāraka dvayam

original: 7.058.002a tato 'rdharātrasamaye bālakā munidārakāḥ
analyzed: tatas ṛdharātra samaye bālakāḥ muni dārakāḥ

original: 7.058.002c vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham
analyzed: vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavam śubham

original: 7.058.002e tasya rakṣāṃ mahātejaḥ kuru bhūtavināśinīm
analyzed: tasya rakṣām mahā tejaḥ kuru bhūta vināśinīm

original: 7.058.003a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā munir harṣam upāgamat
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā muniḥ harṣam upāgamat

original: 7.058.003c bhūtaghnīṃ cākarot tābhyā rakṣāṃ rakṣovināśinīm
analyzed: bhūta ghnīm ca akarot tābhyāḥ rakṣām rakṣaḥ vināśinīm

original: 7.058.004a kuśamuṣṭim upādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ
analyzed: kuśa muṣṭim upādāya lavam ca eva tu sa dvijaḥ

original: 7.058.004c vālmīkiḥ pradadau tābhyāṃ rakṣāṃ bhūtavināśinīm
analyzed: vālmīkiḥ pradadau tābhyām rakṣām bhūta vināśinīm

original: 7.058.005a yas tayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśair mantrasaṃskṛtaiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tayoḥ pūrvajaḥ jātaḥ sa kuśaiḥ mantra saṃskṛtaiḥ

original: 7.058.005c nirmārjanīyas tu bhavet kuśa ity asya nāmataḥ
analyzed: nirmārjanīyaḥ tu bhavet kuśaḥ iti asya nāmataḥ

original: 7.058.006a yaś cāparo bhavet tābhyāṃ lavena susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca aparaḥ bhavet tābhyām lavena su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.058.006c nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhir lavaś ceti sa nāmataḥ
analyzed: nirmārjanīyaḥ vṛddhābhiḥ lavaḥ ca iti sa nāmataḥ

original: 7.058.007a evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāv ubhau yamajātakau
analyzed: evam kuśa lavau nāmnā tau ubhau yama jātakau

original: 7.058.007c matkṛtabhyāṃ ca namābhyāṃ khyātiyuktau bhaviṣyataḥ
analyzed: mad kṛtabhyām ca namābhyām khyāti yuktau bhaviṣyataḥ

original: 7.058.008a te rakṣāṃ jagṛhus tāṃ ca munihastāt samāhitāḥ
analyzed: te rakṣām jagṛhuḥ tām ca muni hastāt samāhitāḥ

original: 7.058.008c akurvaṃś ca tato rakṣāṃ tayor vigatakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: akurvan ca tatas rakṣām tayoḥ vigata kalmaṣāḥ

original: 7.058.009a tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ tu rakṣāṃ gotraṃ ca nāma ca
analyzed: tathā tām kriyamāṇām tu rakṣām gotram ca nāma ca

original: 7.058.009c saṃkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau
analyzed: saṃkīrtanam ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau

original: 7.058.010a ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahat priyam
analyzed: ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva su mahat priyam

original: 7.058.010c parṇaśālāṃ gato rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cābravīt
analyzed: parṇa śālām gataḥ rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyā iti ca abravīt

original: 7.058.011a tatha tasya prahṛṣṭasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatha tasya prahṛṣṭasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.058.011c vyatītā vārṣikī rātriḥ śrāvaṇī laghuvikramā
analyzed: vyatītā vārṣikī rātriḥ śrāvaṇī laghu vikramā

original: 7.058.012a prabhāte tu mahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam
analyzed: prabhāte tu mahā vīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikam kramam

original: 7.058.012c muniṃ prāñjalir āmantrya prāyāt paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: munim prāñjaliḥ āmantrya prāyāt paścāt mukhaḥ punar

original: 7.058.013a sa gatvā yamunātīraṃ saptarātroṣitaḥ pathi
analyzed: sa gatvā yamunā tīram sapta rātra uṣitaḥ pathi

original: 7.058.013c ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakīrtīnām āśrame vāsam abhyayāt
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām puṇya kīrtīnām āśrame vāsam abhyayāt

original: 7.058.014a sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhair nṛpaḥ
analyzed: sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdham bhārgava pramukhaiḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.058.014c kathābhir bahurūpābhir vāsaṃ cakre mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: kathābhiḥ bahu rūpābhiḥ vāsam cakre mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.059.001a atha rātryāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śatrughno bhṛgunandanam
analyzed: atha rātryām pravṛttāyām śatrughnaḥ bhṛgu nandanam

original: 7.059.001c papraccha cyavanaṃ vipraṃ lavaṇasya balābalam
analyzed: papraccha cyavanam vipram lavaṇasya bala abalam

original: 7.059.002a śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ
analyzed: śūlasya ca balam brahman ke ca pūrvam nipātitāḥ

original: 7.059.002c anena śūlamukhena dvandvayuddham upāgatāḥ
analyzed: anena śūla mukhena dvandva yuddham upāgatāḥ

original: 7.059.003a tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat bhāṣitam śrutvā śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.059.003c pratyuvāca mahātejāś cyavano raghunandanam
analyzed: pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ cyavanaḥ raghunandanam

original: 7.059.004a asaṃkhyeyāni karmāṇi yāny asya puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: asaṃkhyeyāni karmāṇi yāni asya puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.059.004c ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva me
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśa prabhave yat vṛttam tat śṛṇuṣva me

original: 7.059.005a ayodhyāyāṃ purā rājā yuvanāśvasuto balī
analyzed: ayodhyāyām purā rājā yuvanāśva sutaḥ balī

original: 7.059.005c māndhatā iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
analyzed: māndhataḥ iti vikhyātaḥ triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān

original: 7.059.006a sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā pṛthivīm kṛtsnām śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 7.059.006c suralokam atho jetum udyogam akaron nṛpaḥ
analyzed: sura lokam atho jetum udyogam akarot nṛpaḥ

original: 7.059.007a indrasya tu bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
analyzed: indrasya tu bhayam tīvram surāṇām ca mahātmanām

original: 7.059.007c māndhātari kṛtodyoge devalokajigīṣayā
analyzed: māndhātari kṛta udyoge deva loka jigīṣayā

original: 7.059.008a ardhāsanena śakrasya rājyārdhena ca pārthivaḥ
analyzed: ardhāsanena śakrasya rājya ardhena ca pārthivaḥ

original: 7.059.008c vandyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ pratijñām adhyarohata
analyzed: vandyamānaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ pratijñām adhyarohata

original: 7.059.009a tasya pāpam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pākaśāsanaḥ
analyzed: tasya pāpam abhiprāyam viditvā pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 7.059.009c sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca yuvanāśvajam
analyzed: sāntva pūrvam idam vākyam uvāca yuvanāśvajam

original: 7.059.010a rājā tvaṃ mānuṣaṃ loke na tāvat puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: rājā tvam mānuṣam loke na tāvat puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.059.010c akṛtvā pṛthivīṃ vaśyāṃ devarājyam ihecchasi
analyzed: a kṛtvā pṛthivīm vaśyām deva rājyam iha icchasi

original: 7.059.011a yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe
analyzed: yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe

original: 7.059.011c devarājyaṃ kuruṣveha sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: deva rājyam kuruṣva iha sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.059.012a indram evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt
analyzed: indram evam bruvāṇam tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt

original: 7.059.012c kva me śakrapratihataṃ śāsanaṃ pṛthivītale
analyzed: kva me śakra pratihatam śāsanam pṛthivī tale

original: 7.059.013a tam uvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tam uvāca sahasrākṣaḥ lavaṇaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.059.013c madhuputro madhuvane nājñāṃ te kurute 'nagha
analyzed: madhu putraḥ madhuvane na ājñām te kurute nagha

original: 7.059.014a tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam
analyzed: tat śrutvā vipriyam ghoram sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam

original: 7.059.014c vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
analyzed: vrīḍitaḥ vāc mukhaḥ rājā vyāhartum na śaśāka ha

original: 7.059.015a āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: āmantrya tu sahasrākṣam hriyā kim cit avāṅmukhaḥ

original: 7.059.015c punar evāgamac chrīmān imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ
analyzed: punar eva agamat śrīmān imam lokam nareśvaraḥ

original: 7.059.016a sa kṛtvā hṛdaye 'marṣaṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā hṛdaye marṣam sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.059.016c ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ
analyzed: ājagāma madhoḥ putram vaśe kartum aninditaḥ

original: 7.059.017a sa kāṅkṣamāṇo lavaṇaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ lavaṇam yuddhāya puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 7.059.017c dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya saḥ
analyzed: dūtam saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśam lavaṇasya saḥ

original: 7.059.018a sa gatvā vipriyāṇy āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam
analyzed: sa gatvā vipriyāṇi āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam

original: 7.059.018c vadantam evaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: vadantam evam tam dūtam bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.059.019a cirāyamāṇe dūte tu rājā krodhasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: cirāyamāṇe dūte tu rājā krodha samanvitaḥ

original: 7.059.019c ardayām āsa tad rakṣaḥ śaravṛṣṭyā samantataḥ
analyzed: ardayām āsa tat rakṣaḥ śara vṛṣṭyā samantataḥ

original: 7.059.020a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
analyzed: tatas prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlam jagrāha pāṇinā

original: 7.059.020c vadhāya sānubandhasya mumocāyudham uttamam
analyzed: vadhāya sa anubandhasya mumoca āyudham uttamam

original: 7.059.021a tac chūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tu sabhṛtyabalavāhanam
analyzed: tat śūlam dīpyamānam tu sa bhṛtya bala vāhanam

original: 7.059.021c bhasmīkṛtya nṛpaṃ bhūyo lavaṇasyāgamat karam
analyzed: bhasmīkṛtya nṛpam bhūyas lavaṇasya agamat karam

original: 7.059.022a evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: evam sa rājā su mahān hataḥ sa bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.059.022c śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam
analyzed: śūlasya ca balam vīra aprameyam anuttamam

original: 7.059.023a śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: śvas prabhāte tu lavaṇam vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.059.023c agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayas tava
analyzed: agṛhīta āyudham kṣipram dhruvaḥ hi vijayaḥ tava

original: 7.060.001a kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham
analyzed: kathām kathayatām teṣām jayam ca ākāṅkṣatām śubham

original: 7.060.001c vyatītā rajanī śīghraṃ śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: vyatītā rajanī śīghram śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.060.002a tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tatas prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.060.002c nirgatas tu purād vīro bhakṣāhārapracoditaḥ
analyzed: nirgataḥ tu purāt vīraḥ bhakṣa āhāra pracoditaḥ

original: 7.060.003a etasminn antare śūraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm
analyzed: etasmin antare śūraḥ śatrughnaḥ yamunām nadīm

original: 7.060.003c tīrtvā madhupuradvāri dhanuṣpāṇir atiṣṭhata
analyzed: tīrtvā madhu pura dvāri dhanuṣpāṇiḥ atiṣṭhata

original: 7.060.004a tato 'rdhadivase prāpte krūrakarmā sa rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tatas ṛdhadivase prāpte krūra karmā sa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.060.004c āgacchad bahusahasraṃ prāṇinām udvahan bharam
analyzed: āgacchat bahu sahasram prāṇinām udvahan bharam

original: 7.060.005a tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham
analyzed: tatas dadarśa śatrughnam sthitam dvāri dhṛta āyudham

original: 7.060.005c tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi

original: 7.060.006a īdṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi sāyudhānāṃ narādhama
analyzed: īdṛśānām sahasrāṇi sa āyudhānām nara adhama

original: 7.060.006c bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim
analyzed: bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim

original: 7.060.007a āhāraś cāpy asaṃpūrṇo mamāyaṃ puruṣādhama
analyzed: āhāraḥ ca api asaṃpūrṇaḥ mama ayam puruṣa adhama

original: 7.060.007c svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate
analyzed: svayam praviṣṭaḥ nu mukham katham āsādya durmate

original: 7.060.008a tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataś ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: tasya evam bhāṣamāṇasya hasataḥ ca muhur muhur

original: 7.060.008c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno roṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ vīrya saṃpannaḥ roṣāt aśrūṇi avartayat

original: 7.060.009a tasya roṣābhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya roṣa abhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.060.009c tejomayā marīcyas tu sarvagātrair viniṣpatan
analyzed: tejaḥ mayāḥ marīcyaḥ tu sarva gātraiḥ viniṣpatan

original: 7.060.010a uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnas taṃ niśācaram
analyzed: uvāca ca su saṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnaḥ tam niśācaram

original: 7.060.010c yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha
analyzed: yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandva yuddham tvayā saha

original: 7.060.011a putro daśarathasyāhaṃ bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: putraḥ daśarathasya aham bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 7.060.011c śatrughno nāma śatrughno vadhākāṅkṣī tavāgataḥ
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ nāma śatru ghnaḥ vadha ākāṅkṣī tava āgataḥ

original: 7.060.012a tasya me yuddhakāmasya dvandvayuddhaṃ pradīyatām
analyzed: tasya me yuddha kāmasya dvandva yuddham pradīyatām

original: 7.060.012c śatrus tvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
analyzed: śatruḥ tvam sarva jīvānām na me jīvan gamiṣyasi

original: 7.060.013a tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva
analyzed: tasmin tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasan iva

original: 7.060.013c pratyuvāca naraśreṣṭhaṃ diṣṭyā prāpto 'si durmate
analyzed: pratyuvāca nara śreṣṭham diṣṭyā prāptaḥ si durmate

original: 7.060.014a mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: mama mātṛṣvasuḥ bhrātā rāvaṇaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.060.014c hato rāmeṇa durbuddhe strīhetoḥ puruṣādhama
analyzed: hataḥ rāmeṇa durbuddhe strī hetoḥ puruṣa adhama

original: 7.060.015a tac ca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasyā kulakṣayam
analyzed: tat ca sarvam mayā kṣāntam rāvaṇasya ā kula kṣayam

original: 7.060.015c avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: avajñām puratas kṛtvā mayā yūyam viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.060.016a na hatāś ca hi me sarve paribhūtās tṛṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: na hatāḥ ca hi me sarve paribhūtāḥ tṛṇam yathā

original: 7.060.016c bhūtaś caiva bhaviṣyāś ca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ
analyzed: bhūtaḥ ca eva bhaviṣyāḥ ca yūyam ca puruṣa adhamāḥ

original: 7.060.017a tasya te yuddhakāmasyā yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate
analyzed: tasya te yuddha kāmasyāḥ yuddham dāsyāmi durmate

original: 7.060.017c īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham
analyzed: īpsitam yādṛśam tubhyam sajjaye yāvat āyudham

original: 7.060.018a tam uvācātha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi
analyzed: tam uvāca atha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi

original: 7.060.018c durbalo 'py āgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā
analyzed: durbalaḥ api āgataḥ śatruḥ na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā

original: 7.060.019a yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau
analyzed: yaḥ hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaram śatrave dadau

original: 7.060.019c sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣas tathā
analyzed: sa hataḥ manda buddhi tvāt yathā kāpuruṣaḥ tathā

original: 7.061.001a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhāṣitam tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.061.001c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: krodham āhārayat tīvram tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: 7.061.002a pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
analyzed: pāṇau pāṇim viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca

original: 7.061.002c lavaṇo raghuśārdūlam āhvayām āsa cāsakṛt
analyzed: lavaṇaḥ raghu śārdūlam āhvayām āsa ca asakṛt

original: 7.061.003a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam
analyzed: tam bruvāṇam tathā vākyam lavaṇam ghora vikramam

original: 7.061.003c śatrughno deva śatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ deva śatrughnaḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 7.061.004a śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitās tvayā
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ na tadā jātaḥ yadā anye nirjitāḥ tvayā

original: 7.061.004c tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja taṃ yamasādanam
analyzed: tat adya bāṇa abhihataḥ vraja tam yama sādanam

original: 7.061.005a ṛṣayo 'py adya pāpātman mayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ pi adya pāpa ātman mayā tvām nihatam raṇe

original: 7.061.005c paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsas tridaśā iva rāvaṇam
analyzed: paśyantu viprāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ tridaśāḥ iva rāvaṇam

original: 7.061.006a tvayi madbāṇanirdagdhe patite 'dya niśācara
analyzed: tvayi mad bāṇa nirdagdhe patite dya niśācara

original: 7.061.006c puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati
analyzed: puram janapadam ca api kṣemam etat bhaviṣyati

original: 7.061.007a adya madbāhuniṣkrāntaḥ śaro vajranibhānanaḥ
analyzed: adya mad bāhu niṣkrāntaḥ śaraḥ vajra nibha ānanaḥ

original: 7.061.007c pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ
analyzed: pravekṣyate te hṛdayam padmam aṃśuḥ iva arka jaḥ

original: 7.061.008a evam ukto mahāvṛkṣaṃ lavaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ mahā vṛkṣam lavaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 7.061.008c śatrughnorasi cikṣepa taṃ śūraḥ śatadhācchinat
analyzed: śatrughna urasi cikṣepa tam śūraḥ śatadhā ācchinat

original: 7.061.009a tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā viphalam karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu

original: 7.061.009c pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī
analyzed: pādapān su bahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjat balī

original: 7.061.010a śatrughnaś cāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ ca api tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatataḥ bahūn

original: 7.061.010c tribhiś caturbhir ekaikaṃ ciccheda nataparvabhiḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ caturbhiḥ ekaikam ciccheda nata parvabhiḥ

original: 7.061.011a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasor asi
analyzed: tatas bāṇa mayam varṣam vyasṛjat rākṣasoḥ asi

original: 7.061.011c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ vīrya saṃpannaḥ vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.061.012a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā
analyzed: tatas prahasya lavaṇaḥ vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā

original: 7.061.012c śirasy abhyahanac chūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai
analyzed: śirasi abhyahanat śūram srasta aṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai

original: 7.061.013a tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt
analyzed: tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāraḥ mahān abhūt

original: 7.061.013c ṛṣīṇāṃ deva saṃghānāṃ gandharvāpsarasām api
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām deva saṃghānām gandharva apsarasām api

original: 7.061.014a tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam
analyzed: tam avajñāya tu hatam śatrughnam bhuvi pātitam

original: 7.061.014c rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam
analyzed: rakṣaḥ labdha antaram api na viveśa svam ālayam

original: 7.061.015a nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam
analyzed: na api śūlam prajagrāha tam dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam

original: 7.061.015c tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat
analyzed: tatas hataḥ iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat

original: 7.061.016a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu punas tasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ
analyzed: muhūrtāt labdha saṃjñaḥ tu punar tasthau dhṛta āyudhaḥ

original: 7.061.016c śatrughno rākṣasadvāri ṛṣibhiḥ saṃprapūjitaḥ
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ rākṣasa dvāri ṛṣibhiḥ saṃprapūjitaḥ

original: 7.061.017a tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam
analyzed: tatas divyam amogham tam jagrāha śaram uttamam

original: 7.061.017c jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa
analyzed: jvalantam tejasā ghoram pūrayantam diśaḥ daśa

original: 7.061.018a vajrānanaṃ vajravegaṃ merumandara gauravam
analyzed: vajra ānanam vajra vegam meru mandara gauravam

original: 7.061.018c nataṃ parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣv aparājitam
analyzed: natam parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣu aparājitam

original: 7.061.019a asṛkcandanadigdhāṅgaṃ cārupatraṃ patatriṇam
analyzed: asṛj candana digdha aṅgam cāru patram patatriṇam

original: 7.061.019c dānavendrācalendrāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca dāruṇam
analyzed: dānava indra acala indrāṇām asurāṇām ca dāruṇam

original: 7.061.020a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite
analyzed: tam dīptam iva kālāgnim yuga ante samupasthite

original: 7.061.020c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsam upāgaman
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsam upāgaman

original: 7.061.021a sadevāsuragandharvaṃ samuniṃ sāpsarogaṇam
analyzed: sa deva asura gandharvam sa munim sa apsaraḥ gaṇam

original: 7.061.021c jagad dhi sarvam asvasthaṃ pitāmaham upasthitam
analyzed: jagat hi sarvam asvastham pitāmaham upasthitam

original: 7.061.022a ūcuś ca devadeveśaṃ varadaṃ prapitāmaham
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca devadeveśam vara dam prapitāmaham

original: 7.061.022c kaccil lokakṣayo deva prāpto vā yugasaṃkayaḥ
analyzed: kaccit loka kṣayaḥ deva prāptaḥ vā yuga saṃkayaḥ

original: 7.061.023a nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na śrutaṃ vā prapitāmaha
analyzed: na īdṛśam dṛṣṭa pūrvam na śrutam vā prapitāmaha

original: 7.061.023c devānāṃ bhayasaṃmoho lokānāṃ saṃkṣayaḥ prabho
analyzed: devānām bhaya saṃmohaḥ lokānām saṃkṣayaḥ prabho

original: 7.061.024a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmanaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmanaḥ

original: 7.061.024c bhayakāraṇam ācaṣṭe devānām abhayaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: bhaya kāraṇam ācaṣṭe devānām abhayaṃkaraḥ

original: 7.061.025a vadhāya lavaṇasyājau śaraḥ śatrughnadhāritaḥ
analyzed: vadhāya lavaṇasya ājau śaraḥ śatrughna dhāritaḥ

original: 7.061.025c tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ surasattamāḥ
analyzed: tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ sura sattamāḥ

original: 7.061.026a eṣo hi pūrvaṃ devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ hi pūrvam devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 7.061.026c śaras tejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayam āgatam
analyzed: śaraḥ tejaḥ mayaḥ vatsāḥ yena vai bhayam āgatam

original: 7.061.027a eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaś ca mahāśaraḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai kaiṭabhasya arthe madhunaḥ ca mahā śaraḥ

original: 7.061.027c sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthaṃ daityayos tayoḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ mahātmanā tena vadha artham daityayoḥ tayoḥ

original: 7.061.028a evam etaṃ prajānīdhvaṃ viṣṇos tejomayaṃ śaram
analyzed: evam etam prajānīdhvam viṣṇoḥ tejaḥ mayam śaram

original: 7.061.028c eṣā caiva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇos tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: eṣā ca eva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇoḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.061.029a ito gacchatā paśyadhvaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā
analyzed: itas gacchata paśyadhvam vadhyamānam mahātmanā

original: 7.061.029c rāmānujena vīreṇa lavaṇaṃ rākṣasottamam
analyzed: rāma anujena vīreṇa lavaṇam rākṣasa uttamam

original: 7.061.030a tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurāṃ giram
analyzed: tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurām giram

original: 7.061.030c ājagmur yatra yudhyete śatrughnalavaṇāv ubhau
analyzed: ājagmuḥ yatra yudhyete śatrughna lavaṇau ubhau

original: 7.061.031a taṃ śaraṃ divyasaṃkāśaṃ śatrughnakaradhāritam
analyzed: tam śaram divya saṃkāśam śatrughna kara dhāritam

original: 7.061.031c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni yugāntāgnim ivotthitam
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ sarva bhūtāni yugānta agnim iva utthitam

original: 7.061.032a ākāśam āvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devair hi raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: ākāśam āvṛtam dṛṣṭvā devaiḥ hi raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.061.032c siṃhanādaṃ muhuḥ kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: siṃhanādam muhur kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇam punar

original: 7.061.033a āhūtaś ca tatas tena śatrughnena mahātmanā
analyzed: āhūtaḥ ca tatas tena śatrughnena mahātmanā

original: 7.061.033c lavaṇaḥ krodhasaṃyukto yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ
analyzed: lavaṇaḥ krodha saṃyuktaḥ yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ

original: 7.061.034a ākarṇāt sa vikṛṣyātha tad dhanur dhanvināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: ākarṇāt sa vikṛṣya atha tat dhanuḥ dhanvinām varaḥ

original: 7.061.034c sa mumoca mahābāṇaṃ lavaṇasya mahorasi
analyzed: sa mumoca mahā bāṇam lavaṇasya mahā urasi

original: 7.061.034e uras tasya vidāryāśu praviveśa rasātalam
analyzed: uraḥ tasya vidārī āśu praviveśa rasātalam

original: 7.061.035a gatvā rasātalaṃ divyaṃ śaro vibudhapūjitaḥ
analyzed: gatvā rasātalam divyam śaraḥ vibudha pūjitaḥ

original: 7.061.035c punar evāgamat tūrṇam ikṣvākukulanandanam
analyzed: punar eva āgamat tūrṇam ikṣvāku kula nandanam

original: 7.061.036a śatrughnaśaranirbhinno lavaṇaḥ sa niśācaraḥ
analyzed: śatrughna śara nirbhinnaḥ lavaṇaḥ sa niśācaraḥ

original: 7.061.036c papāta sahasā bhūmau vajrāhata ivācalaḥ
analyzed: papāta sahasā bhūmau vajra āhataḥ iva acalaḥ

original: 7.061.037a tac ca divyaṃ mahac chūlaṃ hate lavaṇarākṣase
analyzed: tat ca divyam mahat śūlam hate lavaṇa rākṣase

original: 7.061.037c paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudrasya vaśam anvagāt
analyzed: paśyatām sarva bhūtānām rudrasya vaśam anvagāt

original: 7.061.038a ekeṣupātena bhayaṃ nihatya;
analyzed: eka iṣu pātena bhayam nihatya

original: lokatrayasyāsya raghupravīraḥ
analyzed: loka trayasya asya raghu pravīraḥ

original: 7.061.038c vinirbabhāv udyatacāpabāṇas;
analyzed: vinirbabhau udyata cāpa bāṇaḥ

original: tamaḥ praṇudyeva sahasraraśmiḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ praṇudya iva sahasraraśmiḥ

original: 7.062.001a hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
analyzed: hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sa indrāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ

original: 7.062.001c ūcuḥ sumadhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śatrughnāṃ śatrutāpanam
analyzed: ūcuḥ su madhurām vāṇīm śatru ghnām śatru tāpanam

original: 7.062.002a diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭya lavaṇarākṣasaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā te vijayaḥ vatsa diṣṭya lavaṇa rākṣasaḥ

original: 7.062.002c hataḥ puruṣaśārdūlavaraṃ varaya rāghava
analyzed: hataḥ puruṣa śārdūla varam varaya rāghava

original: 7.062.003a varadāḥ sma mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: vara dāḥ sma mahā bāho sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.062.003c vijayākāṅkṣiṇas tubhyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: vijaya ākāṅkṣiṇaḥ tubhyam amogham darśanam hi naḥ

original: 7.062.004a devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: devānām bhāṣitam śrutvā śūraḥ mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.062.004c pratyuvāca mahābāhuḥ śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān
analyzed: pratyuvāca mahā bāhuḥ śatrughnaḥ prayata ātmavān

original: 7.062.005a imāṃ madhupurīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ deva nirmitām
analyzed: imām madhupurīm ramyām madhurām deva nirmitām

original: 7.062.005c niveśaṃ prapnuyāṃ śīghram eṣa me 'stu varo mataḥ
analyzed: niveśam prapnuyām śīghram eṣa me stu varaḥ mataḥ

original: 7.062.006a taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
analyzed: tam devāḥ prīta manasaḥ bāḍham iti eva rāghavam

original: 7.062.006c bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.062.007a te tathoktvā mahātmāno divam āruruhus tadā
analyzed: te tathā uktvā mahātmānaḥ divam āruruhuḥ tadā

original: 7.062.007c śatrughno 'pi mahātejās tāṃ senāṃ samupānayat
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ pi mahā tejāḥ tām senām samupānayat

original: 7.062.008a sā sena śīghram āgacchac chrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam
analyzed: sā sena śīghram āgacchat śrutvā śatrughna śāsanam

original: 7.062.008c niveśanaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ śāsanena samārabhat
analyzed: niveśanam ca śatrughnaḥ śāsanena samārabhat

original: 7.062.009a sā purī divyasaṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā
analyzed: sā purī divya saṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā

original: 7.062.009c niviṣṭā śūrasenānāṃ viṣayaś cākutobhayaḥ
analyzed: niviṣṭā śūrasenānām viṣayaḥ ca akutobhayaḥ

original: 7.062.010a kṣetrāṇi sasya yuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ
analyzed: kṣetrāṇi sasya yuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ

original: 7.062.010c arogā vīrapuruṣā śatrughnabhujapālitā
analyzed: arogā vīra puruṣā śatrughna bhuja pālitā
