original: 7.062.011a ardhacandrapratīkāśā yamunātīraśobhitā
analyzed: ardhacandra pratīkāśā yamunā tīra śobhitā

original: 7.062.011c śobhitā gṛhamukhyaiś ca śobhitā catvarāpaṇaiḥ
analyzed: śobhitā gṛha mukhyaiḥ ca śobhitā catvara āpaṇaiḥ

original: 7.062.012a yac ca tena mahac chūnyaṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ purā
analyzed: yat ca tena mahat śūnyam lavaṇena kṛtam purā

original: 7.062.012c śobhayām āsa tad vīro nānāpaṇyasamṛddhibhiḥ
analyzed: śobhayām āsa tat vīraḥ nānā paṇya samṛddhibhiḥ

original: 7.062.013a tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārthaḥ śatrughno bharatānujaḥ
analyzed: tām samṛddhām samṛddha arthaḥ śatrughnaḥ bharata anujaḥ

original: 7.062.013c nirīkṣya paramaprītaḥ paraṃ harṣam upāgamat
analyzed: nirīkṣya parama prītaḥ param harṣam upāgamat

original: 7.062.014a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurām purīm

original: 7.062.014c rāmapādau nirīkṣeyaṃ varṣe dvādaśame śubhe
analyzed: rāma pādau nirīkṣeyam varṣe dvādaśame śubhe

original: 7.063.001a tato dvādaśame varṣe śatrughno rāmapālitām
analyzed: tatas dvādaśame varṣe śatrughnaḥ rāma pālitām

original: 7.063.001c ayodhyāṃ cakame gantum alpabhṛtyabalānugaḥ
analyzed: ayodhyām cakame gantum alpa bhṛtya bala anugaḥ

original: 7.063.002a mantriṇo balamukhyāṃś ca nivartya ca purodhasaṃ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ bala mukhyān ca nivartya ca purodhasam

original: 7.063.002c jagāma rathamukhyena hayayuktena bhāsvatā
analyzed: jagāma ratha mukhyena haya yuktena bhāsvatā

original: 7.063.003a sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān saptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān sapta aṣṭau raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.063.003c ayodhyām agamat tūrṇaṃ rāghavotsukadarśanaḥ
analyzed: ayodhyām agamat tūrṇam rāghava utsuka darśanaḥ

original: 7.063.004a sa praviśya purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmān ikṣvākunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa praviśya purīm ramyām śrīmān ikṣvāku nandanaḥ

original: 7.063.004c praviveśa mahābāhur yatra rāmo mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: praviveśa mahā bāhuḥ yatra rāmaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 7.063.005a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya mahātmānam jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 7.063.005c uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
analyzed: uvāca prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā rāmam satya parākramam

original: 7.063.006a yad ājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān aham
analyzed: yat ājñaptam mahā rāja sarvam tat kṛtavān aham

original: 7.063.006c hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā
analyzed: hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā

original: 7.063.007a dvādaśaṃ ca gataṃ varṣaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
analyzed: dvādaśam ca gatam varṣam tvām vinā raghunandana

original: 7.063.007c notsaheyam ahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa
analyzed: na utsaheyam aham vastum tvayā virahitaḥ nṛpa

original: 7.063.008a sa me prasādaṃ kākutstha kuruṣvāmitavikrama
analyzed: sa me prasādam kākutstha kuruṣva amita vikrama

original: 7.063.008c mātṛhīno yathā vatsas tvāṃ vinā pravasāmy aham
analyzed: mātṛ hīnaḥ yathā vatsaḥ tvām vinā pravasāmi aham

original: 7.063.009a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śatrughnaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam śatrughnam pariṣvajya idam abravīt

original: 7.063.009c mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vīra naitat kṣatriya ceṣṭitam
analyzed: mā viṣādam kṛthāḥ vīra na etat kṣatriya ceṣṭitam

original: 7.063.010a nāvasīdanti rājāno vipravāseṣu rāghava
analyzed: na avasīdanti rājānaḥ vipravāseṣu rāghava

original: 7.063.010c prajāś ca paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava
analyzed: prajāḥ ca paripālyāḥ hi kṣatra dharmeṇa rāghava

original: 7.063.011a kāle kāle ca māṃ vīra ayodhyām avalokitum
analyzed: kāle kāle ca mām vīra ayodhyām avalokitum

original: 7.063.011c āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava
analyzed: āgaccha tvam nara śreṣṭha gantāsi ca puram tava

original: 7.063.012a mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇair api na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mama api tvam su dayitaḥ prāṇaiḥ api na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.063.012c avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca rājyasya paripālanam
analyzed: avaśyam karaṇīyam ca rājyasya paripālanam

original: 7.063.013a tasmāt tvaṃ vasa kākutstha pañcarātraṃ mayā saha
analyzed: tasmāt tvam vasa kākutstha pañca rātram mayā saha

original: 7.063.013c ūrdhvaṃ gantāsi madhurāṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: ūrdhvam gantāsi madhurām sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.063.014a rāmasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā dharmayuktaṃ mano'nugam
analyzed: rāmasya etat vacaḥ śrutvā dharma yuktam manonugam

original: 7.063.014c śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍham ity eva cābravīt
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ dīnayā vācā bāḍham iti eva ca abravīt

original: 7.063.015a sa pañcarātraṃ kākutstho rāghavasya yathājñayā
analyzed: sa pañca rātram kākutsthaḥ rāghavasya yathā ājñayā

original: 7.063.015c uṣya tatra maheṣvāso gamanāyopacakrame
analyzed: uṣya tatra mahā iṣvāsaḥ gamanāya upacakrame

original: 7.063.016a āmantrya tu mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
analyzed: āmantrya tu mahātmānam rāmam satya parākramam

original: 7.063.016c bharataṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva mahāratham upāruhat
analyzed: bharatam lakṣmaṇam ca eva mahā ratham upāruhat

original: 7.063.017a dūraṃ tābhyām anugato lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: dūram tābhyām anugataḥ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: 7.063.017c bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu purīṃ tadā
analyzed: bharatena ca śatrughnaḥ jagāma āśu purīm tadā

original: 7.064.001a prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ
analyzed: prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnam bhrātṛbhyām saha rāghavaḥ

original: 7.064.001c pramumoda sukhī rājyaṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan
analyzed: pramumoda sukhī rājyam dharmeṇa paripālayan

original: 7.064.002a tataḥ katipayāhaḥsu vṛddho jānapado dvijaḥ
analyzed: tatas katipaya ahaḥsu vṛddhaḥ jānapadaḥ dvijaḥ

original: 7.064.002c śavaṃ bālam upādāya rājadvāram upāgamat
analyzed: śavam bālam upādāya rāja dvāram upāgamat

original: 7.064.003a rudan bahuvidhā vācaḥ snehākṣarasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: rudan bahuvidhāḥ vācaḥ sneha akṣara samanvitāḥ

original: 7.064.003c asakṛt putraputreti vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: asakṛt putra putra iti vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.064.004a kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma pūrvaṃ dehāntare kṛtam
analyzed: kim nu me duṣkṛtam karma pūrvam deha antare kṛtam

original: 7.064.004c yad ahaṃ putram ekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam
analyzed: yat aham putram ekam tvām paśyāmi nidhanam gatam

original: 7.064.005a aprāptayauvanaṃ bālaṃ pañcavarṣasamanvitam
analyzed: aprāpta yauvanam bālam pañca varṣa samanvitam

original: 7.064.005c akāle kālam āpannaṃ duḥkhāya mama putraka
analyzed: akāle kālam āpannam duḥkhāya mama putraka

original: 7.064.006a alpair ahobhir nidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: alpaiḥ ahobhiḥ nidhanam gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.064.006c ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka
analyzed: aham ca jananī ca eva tava śokena putraka

original: 7.064.007a na smarāmy anṛtaṃ hy uktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmy aham
analyzed: na smarāmi anṛtam hi uktam na ca hiṃsām smarāmi aham

original: 7.064.007c kena me duṣkṛtenādya bāla eva mamātmajaḥ
analyzed: kena me duṣkṛtena adya bālaḥ eva mama ātmajaḥ

original: 7.064.007e akṛtvā pitṛkāryāṇi nīto vaivasvatakṣayam
analyzed: a kṛtvā pitṛkāryāṇi nītaḥ vaivasvata kṣayam

original: 7.064.008a nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam
analyzed: na īdṛśam dṛṣṭa pūrvam me śrutam vā ghora darśanam

original: 7.064.008c mṛtyur aprāptakālānāṃ rāmasya viṣaye yathā
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ aprāpta kālānām rāmasya viṣaye yathā

original: 7.064.009a rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya duṣkṛtam kim cit mahat asti na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.064.009c tvaṃ rājañ jīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam
analyzed: tvam rājam jīvayasva enam bālam mṛtyu vaśam gatam

original: 7.064.010a bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ rājan dīrgham āyuḥ avāpnuhi

original: 7.064.010c uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsmin sumahābala
analyzed: uṣitāḥ sma sukham rājye tava asmin su mahā bala

original: 7.064.011a saṃpraty anātho viṣaya ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: saṃprati anāthaḥ viṣayaḥ ikṣvākūṇām mahātmanām

original: 7.064.011c rāmaṃ nātham ihāsādya bālāntakaraṇaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: rāmam nātham iha āsādya bāla anta karaṇam nṛpam

original: 7.064.012a rājadoṣair vipadyante prajā hy avidhipālitāḥ
analyzed: rāja doṣaiḥ vipadyante prajāḥ hi avidhi pālitāḥ

original: 7.064.012c asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāv akāle mriyate janaḥ
analyzed: asat vṛtte tu nṛpatau akāle mriyate janaḥ

original: 7.064.013a yadā pureṣv ayuktāni janā janapadeśu ca
analyzed: yadā pureṣu a yuktāni janāḥ ca

original: 7.064.013c kurvate na ca rakṣāsti tadākālakṛtaṃ bhayam
analyzed: kurvate na ca rakṣā asti tadā akāla kṛtam bhayam

original: 7.064.014a savyaktaṃ rājadoṣo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sa vyaktam rāja doṣaḥ yam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.064.014c pure janapade vāpi tadā bālavadho hy ayam
analyzed: pure janapade vā api tadā bāla vadhaḥ hi ayam

original: 7.064.015a evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair nindayāno muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: evam bahuvidhaiḥ vākyaiḥ nindayānaḥ muhur muhur

original: 7.064.015c rājānaṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sutaṃ tam upagūhati
analyzed: rājānam duḥkha saṃtaptaḥ sutam tam upagūhati

original: 7.065.001a tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevitam
analyzed: tathā tu karuṇam tasya dvijasya paridevitam

original: 7.065.001c śuśrāva rāghavaḥ sarvaṃ duḥkhaśokasamanvitam
analyzed: śuśrāva rāghavaḥ sarvam duḥkha śoka samanvitam

original: 7.065.002a sa duḥkhena susaṃtapto mantriṇaḥ samupāhvayat
analyzed: sa duḥkhena su saṃtaptaḥ mantriṇaḥ samupāhvayat

original: 7.065.002c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātṝṃś ca sahanaigamān
analyzed: vasiṣṭham vāmadevam ca bhrātṝn ca saha naigamān

original: 7.065.003a tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ
analyzed: tatas dvijāḥ vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ

original: 7.065.003c rājānaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ vardhasveti tato 'bruvan
analyzed: rājānam deva saṃkāśam vardhasva iti tatas bruvan

original: 7.065.004a mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha maudgalyo vāmadevaś ca kāśyapaḥ
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ tha maudgalyaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca kāśyapaḥ

original: 7.065.004c kātyāyano 'tha jābālir gautamo nāradas tathā
analyzed: kātyāyanaḥ tha jābāliḥ gautamaḥ nāradaḥ tathā

original: 7.065.005a ete dvijarṣabhāḥ sarve āganeṣūpaveśitāḥ
analyzed: ete dvijarṣabhāḥ sarve āganeṣu upaveśitāḥ

original: 7.065.005c mantriṇo naigamāś caiva yathārham anukūlataḥ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ naigamāḥ ca eva yathārham anukūlataḥ

original: 7.065.006a teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīptatejasām
analyzed: teṣām samupaviṣṭānām sarveṣām dīpta tejasām

original: 7.065.006c raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijo yasmāt praroditi
analyzed: raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijaḥ yasmāt praroditi

original: 7.065.007a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rājñaḥ dīnasya nāradaḥ

original: 7.065.007c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau nṛpam
analyzed: pratyuvāca śubham vākyam ṛṣīṇām saṃnidhau nṛpam

original: 7.065.008a śṛṇu rājan yathākāle prāpto 'yaṃ bālasaṃkṣayaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇu rājan yathā kāle prāptaḥ yam bāla saṃkṣayaḥ

original: 7.065.008c śrutvā kartavyatāṃ vīra kuruṣva raghunandana
analyzed: śrutvā kartavyatām vīra kuruṣva raghunandana

original: 7.065.009a purā kṛtayuge rāma brāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: purā kṛta yuge rāma brāhmaṇāḥ vai tapasvinaḥ

original: 7.065.009c abrāhmaṇas tadā rājan na tapasvī kathaṃ cana
analyzed: a brāhmaṇaḥ tadā rājan na tapasvī katham cana

original: 7.065.010a tasmin yuge prajvalite brahmabhūte anāvṛte
analyzed: tasmin yuge prajvalite brahma bhūte anāvṛte

original: 7.065.010c amṛtyavas tadā sarve jajñire dīrghadarśinaḥ
analyzed: amṛtyavaḥ tadā sarve jajñire dīrgha darśinaḥ

original: 7.065.011a tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma mānavānāṃ vapuṣmatām
analyzed: tatas tretā yugam nāma mānavānām vapuṣmatām

original: 7.065.011c kṣatriyā yatra jāyante pūrveṇa tapasānvitāḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyāḥ yatra jāyante pūrveṇa tapasā anvitāḥ

original: 7.065.012a vīryeṇa tapasā caiva te 'dhikāḥ pūrvajanmani
analyzed: vīryeṇa tapasā ca eva te dhikāḥ pūrva janmani

original: 7.065.012c mānavā ye mahātmānas tasmiṃs tretāyuge yuge
analyzed: mānavāḥ ye mahātmānaḥ tasmin tretā yuge yuge

original: 7.065.013a brahmakṣatraṃ tu tat sarvaṃ yat pūrvam aparaṃ ca yat
analyzed: brahma kṣatram tu tat sarvam yat pūrvam aparam ca yat

original: 7.065.013c yugayor ubhayor āsīt samavīryasamanvitam
analyzed: yugayoḥ ubhayoḥ āsīt sama vīrya samanvitam

original: 7.065.014a apaśyantas tu te sarve viśeṣam adhikaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: a paśyantaḥ tu te sarve viśeṣam adhikam tatas

original: 7.065.014c sthāpanaṃ cakrire tatra cāturvarṇyasya sarvataḥ
analyzed: sthāpanam cakrire tatra cāturvarṇyasya sarvatas

original: 7.065.015a adharmaḥ pādam ekaṃ tu pātayat pṛthivītale
analyzed: adharmaḥ pādam ekam tu pātayat pṛthivī tale

original: 7.065.015c adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktās tena mandābhavan dvijāḥ
analyzed: adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktāḥ tena mandāḥ abhavan dvijāḥ

original: 7.065.016a tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ pūrvam āyuṣaḥ pariniṣṭhitam
analyzed: tatas prāduṣkṛtam pūrvam āyuṣaḥ pariniṣṭhitam

original: 7.065.016c śubhāny evācaraṃl lokāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: śubhāni eva acaran lokāḥ satya dharma parāyaṇāḥ

original: 7.065.017a tretāyuge tv avartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaś ca ye
analyzed: tretā yuge tu avartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaḥ ca ye

original: 7.065.017c tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ u tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ

original: 7.065.018a sa dharmaḥ paramas teṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdram athāgamat
analyzed: sa dharmaḥ paramaḥ teṣām vaiśya śūdram atha agamat

original: 7.065.018c pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāś cakrur viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: pūjām ca sarva varṇānām śūdrāḥ cakruḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.065.019a tataḥ pādam adharmasya dvitīyam avatārayat
analyzed: tatas pādam adharmasya dvitīyam avatārayat

original: 7.065.019c tato dvāparasaṃkhyā sā yugasya samajāyata
analyzed: tatas dvāpara saṃkhyā sā yugasya samajāyata

original: 7.065.020a tasmin dvāparasaṃkhye tu vartamāne yugakṣaye
analyzed: tasmin dvāpara saṃkhye tu vartamāne yuga kṣaye

original: 7.065.020c adharmaś cānṛtaṃ caiva vavṛdhe puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: adharmaḥ ca anṛtam ca eva vavṛdhe puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.065.021a tasmin dvāparasaṃkhyāte tapo vaiśyān samāviśat
analyzed: tasmin dvāpara saṃkhyāte tapaḥ vaiśyān samāviśat

original: 7.065.021c na śūdro labhate dharmam ugraṃ taptaṃ nararṣabha
analyzed: na śūdraḥ labhate dharmam ugram taptam nara ṛṣabha

original: 7.065.022a hīnavarṇo naraśreṣṭha tapyate sumahat tapaḥ
analyzed: hīna varṇaḥ nara śreṣṭha tapyate su mahat tapaḥ

original: 7.065.022c bhaviṣyā śūdrayonyāṃ hi tapaścaryā kalau yuge
analyzed: bhaviṣyā śūdra yonyām hi tapaḥ caryā kalau yuge

original: 7.065.023a adharmaḥ paramo rāma dvāpare śūdradhāritaḥ
analyzed: adharmaḥ paramaḥ rāma dvāpare śūdra dhāritaḥ

original: 7.065.023c sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājan mahātapāḥ
analyzed: sa vai viṣaya paryante tava rājan mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.065.023e śūdras tapyati durbuddhis tena bālavadho hy ayam
analyzed: śūdraḥ tapyati durbuddhiḥ tena bāla vadhaḥ hi ayam

original: 7.065.024a yo hy adharmam akāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi
analyzed: yaḥ hi adharmam akāryam vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi

original: 7.065.024c karoti rājaśārdūla pure vā durmatir naraḥ
analyzed: karoti rāja śārdūla pure vā durmatiḥ naraḥ

original: 7.065.024e kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kṣipram hi narakam yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.065.025a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla mārgasva viṣayam svakam

original: 7.065.025c duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethās tatra yatnaṃ samācara
analyzed: duṣkṛtam yatra paśyethāḥ tatra yatnam samācara

original: 7.065.026a evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam
analyzed: evam te dharma vṛddhiḥ ca nṛṇām ca āyuḥ vivardhanam

original: 7.065.026c bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha bālasyāsya ca jīvitam
analyzed: bhaviṣyati nara śreṣṭha bālasya asya ca jīvitam

original: 7.066.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
analyzed: nāradasya tu tat vākyam śrutvā amṛta mayam yathā

original: 7.066.001c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe lakṣmaṇam ca idam abravīt

original: 7.066.002a gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ samāśvāsaya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭham samāśvāsaya lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.066.002c bālasya ca śarīraṃ tat tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya
analyzed: bālasya ca śarīram tat taila droṇyām nidhāpaya

original: 7.066.003a gandhaiś ca paramodārais tailaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
analyzed: gandhaiḥ ca parama udāraiḥ tailaiḥ ca su sugandhibhiḥ

original: 7.066.003c yathā na kṣīyate bālas tathā saumya vidhīyatām
analyzed: yathā na kṣīyate bālaḥ tathā saumya vidhīyatām

original: 7.066.004a yathā śarīre bālasya guptasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: yathā śarīre bālasya guptasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.066.004c vipattiḥ paribhedo vā bhaven na ca tathā kuru
analyzed: vipattiḥ paribhedaḥ vā bhavet na ca tathā kuru

original: 7.066.005a tathā saṃdiśya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tathā saṃdiśya kākutsthaḥ lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣaṇam

original: 7.066.005c manasā puṣpakaṃ dadhyāv āgaccheti mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: manasā puṣpakam dadhyau āgaccha iti mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.066.006a iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ
analyzed: iṅgitam sa tu vijñāya puṣpakaḥ hema bhūṣitaḥ

original: 7.066.006c ājagāma muhūrtena saṃpīpaṃ rāghavasya vai
analyzed: ājagāma muhūrtena rāghavasya vai

original: 7.066.007a so 'bravīt praṇato bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa
analyzed: saḥ bravīt praṇataḥ bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa

original: 7.066.007c vaśyas tava mahābāho kiṃkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ
analyzed: vaśyaḥ tava mahā bāho kiṃkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ

original: 7.066.008a bhāṣitaṃ ruciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ
analyzed: bhāṣitam ruciram śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ

original: 7.066.008c abhivādya maharṣīs tān vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata
analyzed: abhivādya mahā ṛṣīḥ tān vimānam saḥ dhyarohata

original: 7.066.009a dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khagdaṃ ca ruciraprabham
analyzed: dhanuḥ gṛhītvā tūṇīm ca khagdam ca rucira prabham

original: 7.066.009c nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitribharatāv ubhau
analyzed: nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitri bharatau ubhau

original: 7.066.010a prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃś ca samantataḥ
analyzed: prāyāt pratīcīm sa marūn vicinvan ca samantataḥ

original: 7.066.010c uttarām agamac chrīmān diśaṃ himavadāvṛtam
analyzed: uttarām agamat śrīmān diśam himavat āvṛtam

original: 7.066.011a apaśyamānas tatrāpi svalpam apy atha duṣkṛtam
analyzed: a paśyamānaḥ tatra api su alpam api atha duṣkṛtam

original: 7.066.011c pūrvām api diśaṃ sarvām athāpaśyan narādhipaḥ
analyzed: pūrvām api diśam sarvām atha apaśyat narādhipaḥ

original: 7.066.012a dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ākrāmat tato rājarṣinandanaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇām diśam ākrāmat tatas rājarṣi nandanaḥ

original: 7.066.012c śaivalasyottare pārśve dadarśa sumahat saraḥ
analyzed: śaivalasya uttare pārśve dadarśa su mahat saraḥ

original: 7.066.013a tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ
analyzed: tasmin sarasi tapyantam tāpasam su mahat tapaḥ

original: 7.066.013c dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃl lambamānam adho mukham
analyzed: dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmān lambamānam adhas mukham

original: 7.066.014a athainaṃ samupāgamya tapyantaṃ tapa uttamam
analyzed: athā enam samupāgamya tapyantam tapaḥ uttamam

original: 7.066.014c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyas tvam asi suvrata
analyzed: uvāca rāghavaḥ vākyam dhanyaḥ tvam asi suvrata

original: 7.066.015a kasyāṃ yonyāṃ tapovṛddhavartase dṛḍhavikrama
analyzed: kasyām yonyām tapaḥ vṛddha vartase dṛḍha vikrama

original: 7.066.015c kautūhalāt tvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathir hy aham
analyzed: kautūhalāt tvām pṛcchāmi rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ hi aham

original: 7.066.016a manīṣitas te ko nv arthaḥ svargalābho varāśrayaḥ
analyzed: manīṣitaḥ te kaḥ nu arthaḥ svarga lābhaḥ vara āśrayaḥ

original: 7.066.016c yam aśritya tapas taptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa
analyzed: yam aśritya tapaḥ taptam śrotum icchāmi tāpasa

original: 7.066.017a brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ vā asi bhadram te kṣatriyaḥ vā asi durjayaḥ

original: 7.066.017c vaiśyo vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etad bravīhi me
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etat bravīhi me

original: 7.067.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.067.001c avākśirās tathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: avākśirāḥ tathā bhūtaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.067.002a śūdrayonyāṃ prasūto 'smi tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥ
analyzed: śūdra yonyām prasūtaḥ smi tapaḥ ugram samāsthitaḥ

original: 7.067.002c devatvaṃ prārthaye rāma saśarīro mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: deva tvam prārthaye rāma sa śarīraḥ mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.067.003a na mithyāhaṃ vade rājan devalokajigīṣayā
analyzed: na mithyā aham vade rājan deva loka jigīṣayā

original: 7.067.003c śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śambūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: śūdram mām viddhi kākutstha śambūkam nāma nāmataḥ

original: 7.067.004a bhāṣatas tasya śūdrasya khaḍgaṃ suruciraprabham
analyzed: bhāṣataḥ tasya śūdrasya khaḍgam su rucira prabham

original: 7.067.004c niṣkṛṣya kośād vimalaṃ śiraś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
analyzed: niṣkṛṣya kośāt vimalam śiraḥ ciccheda rāghavaḥ

original: 7.067.005a tasmin muhūrte bālo 'sau jīvena samayujyata
analyzed: tasmin muhūrte bālaḥ sau jīvena samayujyata

original: 7.067.006a tato 'gastyāśramapadaṃ rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
analyzed: tatas gastya āśrama padam rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: 7.067.006c sa gatvā vinayenaiva taṃ natvā mumude sukhī
analyzed: sa gatvā vinayena eva tam natvā mumude sukhī

original: 7.067.007a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya mahātmānam jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 7.067.007c ātithyaṃ paramaṃ prāpya niṣasāda narādhipaḥ
analyzed: ātithyam paramam prāpya niṣasāda narādhipaḥ

original: 7.067.008a tam uvāca mahātejāḥ kumbhayonir mahātapāḥ
analyzed: tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ kumbhayoniḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.067.008c svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
analyzed: svāgatam te nara śreṣṭha diṣṭyā rāghava

original: 7.067.009a tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇair bahubhir uttamaiḥ
analyzed: tvam me bahu mataḥ rāma guṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ uttamaiḥ

original: 7.067.009c atithiḥ pūjanīyaś ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ
analyzed: atithiḥ pūjanīyaḥ ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: 7.067.010a surā hi kathayanti tvām āgataṃ śūdraghātinam
analyzed: surāḥ hi kathayanti tvām āgatam śūdra ghātinam

original: 7.067.010c brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ

original: 7.067.011a uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanīṃ sakāśe mama rāghava
analyzed: uṣyatām ca iha rajanīm sakāśe mama rāghava

original: 7.067.011c prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā svapuram eva hi
analyzed: prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvam gantā sva puram eva hi

original: 7.067.012a idaṃ cābharaṇaṃ saumya nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: idam ca ābharaṇam saumya nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā

original: 7.067.012c divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
analyzed: divyam divyena vapuṣā dīpyamānam sva tejasā

original: 7.067.012e pratigṛhṇīṣva kākutstha matpriyaṃ kuru rāghava
analyzed: pratigṛhṇīṣva kākutstha mad priyam kuru rāghava

original: 7.067.013a dattasya hi punar dānaṃ sumahat phalam ucyate
analyzed: dattasya hi punar dānam su mahat phalam ucyate

original: 7.067.013c tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nararṣabha
analyzed: tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nara ṛṣabha

original: 7.067.014a tad rāmaḥ pratijagrāha munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat rāmaḥ pratijagrāha muneḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.067.014c divyam ābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptam iva bhāskaram
analyzed: divyam ābharaṇam citram pradīptam iva bhāskaram

original: 7.067.015a pratigṛhya tato rāmas tad ābharaṇam uttamam
analyzed: pratigṛhya tatas rāmaḥ tat ābharaṇam uttamam

original: 7.067.015c āgamaṃ tasya divyasya praṣṭum evopacakrame
analyzed: āgamam tasya divyasya praṣṭum eva upacakrame

original: 7.067.016a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam
analyzed: ati adbhutam idam brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam

original: 7.067.016c kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vāhṛtam
analyzed: katham bhagavatā prāptam kutas vā kena vā āhṛtam

original: 7.067.017a kutūhalatayā brahman pṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: kutūhala tayā brahman pṛcchāmi tvām mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.067.017c āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān
analyzed: āścaryāṇām bahūnām hi nidhiḥ paramakaḥ bhavān

original: 7.067.018a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: evam bruvati kākutsthe muniḥ vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.067.018c śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge gate
analyzed: śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttam purā tretā yuge gate

original: 7.068.001a purā tretāyuge hy āsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram
analyzed: purā tretā yuge hi āsīt araṇyam bahu vistaram

original: 7.068.001c samantād yojanaśataṃ nirmṛgaṃ pakṣivarjitam
analyzed: samantāt yojana śatam nirmṛgam pakṣi varjitam

original: 7.068.002a tasmin nirmānuṣe 'raṇye kurvāṇas tapa uttamam
analyzed: tasmin nirmānuṣe raṇye kurvāṇaḥ tapaḥ uttamam

original: 7.068.002c aham ākramituṃ śaumya tad araṇyam upāgamam
analyzed: aham ākramitum śaumya tat araṇyam upāgamam

original: 7.068.003a tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha
analyzed: tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭum na śaśāka ha

original: 7.068.003c phalamūlaiḥ sukhāsvādair bahurūpaiś ca pādapaiḥ
analyzed: phala mūlaiḥ sukha āsvādaiḥ bahu rūpaiḥ ca pādapaiḥ

original: 7.068.004a tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanam āyatam
analyzed: tasya araṇyasya madhye tu saraḥ yojanam āyatam

original: 7.068.004c padmotpalasamākīrṇaṃ samatikrāntaśaivalam
analyzed: padma utpala samākīrṇam samatikrānta śaivalam

original: 7.068.005a tad āścaryam ivātyarthaṃ sukhāsvādam anuttamam
analyzed: tat āścaryam iva atyartham sukha āsvādam anuttamam

original: 7.068.005c arajaskaṃ tathākṣobhyaṃ śrīmatpakṣigaṇāyutam
analyzed: arajaskam tathā akṣobhyam śrīmat pakṣi gaṇa āyutam

original: 7.068.006a tasmin saraḥsamīpe tu mahad adbhutam āśramam
analyzed: tasmin saraḥ samīpe tu mahat adbhutam āśramam

original: 7.068.006c purāṇaṃ puṇyam atyarthaṃ tapasvijanavarjitam
analyzed: purāṇam puṇyam atyartham tapasvi jana varjitam

original: 7.068.007a tatrāham avasaṃ rātriṃ naidāghīṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: tatra aham avasam rātrim naidāghīm puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.068.007c prabhāte kālyam utthāya saras tad upacakrame
analyzed: prabhāte kālyam utthāya saraḥ tat upacakrame

original: 7.068.008a athāpaśyaṃḥ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭam ajaraṃ kva cit
analyzed: athā apaśyan śavam tatra su puṣṭam ajaram kva cit

original: 7.068.008c tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃs toyāśaye nṛpa
analyzed: tiṣṭhantam parayā lakṣmyā tasmin toya āśaye nṛpa

original: 7.068.009a tam arthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava
analyzed: tam artham cintayānaḥ ham muhūrtam tatra rāghava

original: 7.068.009c viṣṭhito 'smi sarastīre kiṃ nv idaṃ syād iti prabho
analyzed: viṣṭhitaḥ smi saraḥ tīre kim nu idam syāt iti prabho

original: 7.068.010a athāpaśyaṃ muhūrtāt tu divyam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: athā apaśyam muhūrtāt tu divyam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.068.010c vimānaṃ paramodāraṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manojavam
analyzed: vimānam parama udāram haṃsa yuktam manojavam

original: 7.068.011a atyarthaṃ svargiṇaṃ tatra vimāne raghunandana
analyzed: atyartham svargiṇam tatra vimāne raghunandana

original: 7.068.011c upāste 'psarasāṃ vīra sahasraṃ divyabhūṣaṇam
analyzed: upāste psarasām vīra sahasram divya bhūṣaṇam

original: 7.068.011e gānti geyāni ramyāṇi vādayanti tathāparāḥ
analyzed: gānti geyāni ramyāṇi vādayanti tathā aparāḥ

original: 7.068.012a paśyato me tadā rāma vimānād avaruhya ca
analyzed: paśyataḥ me tadā rāma vimānāt avaruhya ca

original: 7.068.012c taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana
analyzed: tam śavam bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana

original: 7.068.013a tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu ca suṣṭhu ca
analyzed: tatas bhuktvā yathākāmam māṃsam bahu ca suṣṭhu ca

original: 7.068.013c avatīrya saraḥ svargī saṃspraṣṭum upacakrame
analyzed: avatīrya saraḥ svargī saṃspraṣṭum upacakrame

original: 7.068.014a upaspṛśya yathānyāyaṃ sa svargī puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: upaspṛśya yathānyāyam sa svargī puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.068.014c āroḍhum upacakrāma vimānavaram uttamam
analyzed: āroḍhum upacakrāma vimāna varam uttamam

original: 7.068.015a tam ahaṃ devasaṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai
analyzed: tam aham deva saṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai

original: 7.068.015c athāham abruvaṃ vākyaṃ tam eva puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: atha aham abruvam vākyam tam eva puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.068.016a ko bhavān devasaṃkāśa āhāraś ca vigarhitaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān deva saṃkāśaḥ āhāraḥ ca vigarhitaḥ

original: 7.068.016c tvayāyaṃ bhujyate saumya kiṃ karthaṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: tvayā ayam bhujyate saumya kim kartham vaktum arhasi

original: 7.068.017a āścaryam īdṛśo bhāvo bhāsvaro devasaṃmataḥ
analyzed: āścaryam īdṛśaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāsvaraḥ deva saṃmataḥ

original: 7.068.017c āhāro garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
analyzed: āhāraḥ garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: 7.069.001a bhuktvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram
analyzed: bhuktvā tu bhāṣitam vākyam mama rāma śubha akṣaram

original: 7.069.001c prāñjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunandana
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ pratyuvāca idam sa svargī raghunandana

original: 7.069.002a śṛṇu brahman yathāvṛttaṃ mamaitat sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: śṛṇu brahman yathāvṛttam mama etat sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: 7.069.002c duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija
analyzed: duratikramaṇīyam hi yathā pṛcchasi mām dvija

original: 7.069.003a purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: purā vaidarbhakaḥ rājā pitā mama mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.069.003c sudeva iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
analyzed: sudevaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān

original: 7.069.004a tasya putradvayaṃ brahman dvābhyāṃ strībhyām ajāyata
analyzed: tasya putra dvayam brahman dvābhyām strībhyām ajāyata

original: 7.069.004c ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyān suratho 'bhavat
analyzed: aham śvetaḥ iti khyātaḥ yavīyān su rathaḥ bhavat

original: 7.069.005a tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā mām abhyaṣecayan
analyzed: tatas pitari svaryāte paurāḥ mām abhyaṣecayan

original: 7.069.005c tatrāhaṃ kṛtavān rājyaṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: tatra aham kṛtavān rājyam dharmeṇa su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.069.006a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata

original: 7.069.006c rājyaṃ kārayato brahman prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
analyzed: rājyam kārayataḥ brahman prajāḥ dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ

original: 7.069.007a so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid vijñātāyur dvijottama
analyzed: saḥ ham nimitte kasmin cit vijñāta āyuḥ dvijottama

original: 7.069.007c kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanam upāgamam
analyzed: kāladharmam hṛdi nyasya tatas vanam upāgamam

original: 7.069.008a so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ mṛgapakṣivivarjitam
analyzed: saḥ u ham vanam idam durgam mṛga pakṣi vivarjitam

original: 7.069.008c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe
analyzed: tapaḥ cartum praviṣṭaḥ smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe

original: 7.069.009a bhrātaraṃ surathaṃ rājye abhiṣicya narādhipam
analyzed: bhrātaram suratham rājye abhiṣicya narādhipam

original: 7.069.009c idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapas taptaṃ mayā ciram
analyzed: idam saraḥ samāsādya tapaḥ taptam mayā ciram

original: 7.069.010a so 'haṃ varṣasahasrāṇi tapas trīṇi mahāmune
analyzed: saḥ ham varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ trīṇi mahā mune

original: 7.069.010c taptvā suduṣkaraṃ prāpto brahmalokam anuttamam
analyzed: taptvā su duṣkaram prāptaḥ brahma lokam anuttamam

original: 7.069.011a tato māṃ svargasaṃsthaṃ vai kṣutpipāse dvijottama
analyzed: tatas mām svarga saṃstham vai kṣudh pipāse dvijottama

original: 7.069.011c bādhete paramodāra tato 'haṃ vyathitendriyaḥ
analyzed: bādhete parama udāra tatas ham vyathita indriyaḥ

original: 7.069.012a gatvā tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ pitāmaham uvāca ha
analyzed: gatvā tribhuvaṇa śreṣṭham pitāmaham uvāca ha

original: 7.069.012c bhagavan brahmaloko 'yaṃ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan brahma lokaḥ yam kṣudh pipāsā vivarjitaḥ

original: 7.069.013a kasyeyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāptiḥ kṣutpipāsāvaśo 'smi yat
analyzed: kasya iyam karmaṇaḥ prāptiḥ kṣudh pipāsā vaśaḥ smi yat

original: 7.069.013c āhāraḥ kaś ca me deva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
analyzed: āhāraḥ kaḥ ca me deva tat me brūhi pitāmaha

original: 7.069.014a pitāmahas tu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ tu mām āha tava āhāraḥ sudeva ja

original: 7.069.014c svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ
analyzed: svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśas

original: 7.069.015a svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam
analyzed: sva śarīram tvayā puṣṭam kurvatā tapaḥ uttamam

original: 7.069.015c anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadā cin mahāmate
analyzed: an uptam rohate śveta na kadā cit mahāmate

original: 7.069.016a dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi vane sattvaniṣevite
analyzed: dattam na te sti vane sattva niṣevite

original: 7.069.016c tena svargagato vatsa bādhyase kṣutpipāsayā
analyzed: tena svarga gataḥ vatsa bādhyase kṣudh pipāsayā

original: 7.069.017a sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam
analyzed: sa tvam su puṣṭam āhāraiḥ sva śarīram anuttamam

original: 7.069.017c bhakṣayasvāmṛtarasaṃ sā te tṛptir bhaviṣyati
analyzed: bhakṣayasva amṛta rasam sā te tṛptiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 7.069.018a yadā tu tad vanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: yadā tu tat vanam śveta agastyaḥ su mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.069.018c ākramiṣyati durdharṣas tadā kṛcchād vimokṣyase
analyzed: ākramiṣyati durdharṣaḥ tadā kṛcchāt vimokṣyase

original: 7.069.019a sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api
analyzed: sa hi tārayitum saumya śaktaḥ sura gaṇān api

original: 7.069.019c kiṃ punas tvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam
analyzed: kim punar tvām mahā bāho kṣudh pipāsā vaśam gatam

original: 7.069.020a so 'haṃ bhagavataḥ śrutvā devadevasya niścayam
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavataḥ śrutvā devadevasya niścayam

original: 7.069.020c āhāraṃ garhitaṃ kurmi svaśarīraṃ dvijottama
analyzed: āhāram garhitam kurmi sva śarīram dvijottama

original: 7.069.021a bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: bahūn varṣa gaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idam mayā

original: 7.069.021c kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiś cāpi mamottamā
analyzed: kṣayam na abhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiḥ ca api mama uttamā

original: 7.069.022a tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya
analyzed: tasya me kṛcchra bhūtasya kṛcchrāt asmāt vimokṣaya

original: 7.069.022c anyeṣām agatir hy atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam
analyzed: anyeṣām agatiḥ hi atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam

original: 7.069.023a idam ābharaṇaṃ saumya tāraṇārthaṃ dvijottama
analyzed: idam ābharaṇam saumya tāraṇa artham dvijottama

original: 7.069.023c pratigṛhṇīṣva brahmarṣe prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: pratigṛhṇīṣva brahmarṣe prasādam kartum arhasi

original: 7.069.024a tasyāhaṃ svargiṇo vākyaṃ śrutvā duḥkhasamanvitam
analyzed: tasya aham svargiṇaḥ vākyam śrutvā duḥkha samanvitam

original: 7.069.024c tāraṇāyopajagrāha tad ābharaṇam uttamam
analyzed: tāraṇāya upajagrāha tat ābharaṇam uttamam

original: 7.069.025a mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminn ābharaṇe śubhe
analyzed: mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasmin ābharaṇe śubhe

original: 7.069.025c mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha
analyzed: mānuṣaḥ pūrvakaḥ dehaḥ rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha

original: 7.069.026a pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā
analyzed: pranaṣṭe tu śarīre sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā

original: 7.069.026c tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tṛptaḥ pramuditaḥ rājā jagāma tridivam punar

original: 7.069.027a tenedaṃ śakratulyena divyam ābharaṇaṃ mama
analyzed: tena idam śakra tulyena divyam ābharaṇam mama

original: 7.069.027c tasmin nimitte kākutstha dattam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: tasmin nimitte kākutstha dattam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.070.001a tad adbhutatamaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvāgastyasya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tat adbhutatamam vākyam śrutvā agastyasya rāghavaḥ

original: 7.070.001c gauravād vismayāc caiva bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
analyzed: gauravāt vismayāt ca eva bhūyas praṣṭum pracakrame

original: 7.070.002a bhagavaṃs tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ tapas tapyati yatra saḥ
analyzed: bhagavan tat vanam ghoram tapaḥ tapyati yatra saḥ

original: 7.070.002c śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ tad amṛgadvijam
analyzed: śvetaḥ vaidarbhakaḥ rājā katham tat a mṛga dvijam

original: 7.070.003a niḥsattvaṃ ca vanaṃ jātaṃ śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam
analyzed: niḥsattvam ca vanam jātam śūnyam manuja varjitam

original: 7.070.003c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ cartum praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: 7.070.004a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam
analyzed: rāmasya bhāṣitam śrutvā kautūhala samanvitam

original: 7.070.004c vākyaṃ paramatejasvī vaktum evopacakrame
analyzed: vākyam parama tejasvī vaktum evā upacakrame

original: 7.070.005a purā kṛtayuge rāma manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: purā kṛta yuge rāma manuḥ daṇḍa dharaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.070.005c tasya putro mahān āsīd ikṣvākuḥ kulavardhanaḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mahān āsīt ikṣvākuḥ kula vardhanaḥ

original: 7.070.006a taṃ putraṃ pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam
analyzed: tam putram pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam

original: 7.070.006c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartety uvāca ha
analyzed: pṛthivyām rāja vaṃśānām bhava kartā iti uvāca ha

original: 7.070.007a tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava
analyzed: tathā iti ca pratijñātam pituḥ putreṇa rāghava

original: 7.070.007c tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo manuḥ punar uvāca ha
analyzed: tatas parama saṃhṛṣṭaḥ manuḥ punar uvāca ha

original: 7.070.008a prīto 'smi paramodārakartā cāsi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ smi parama udāra kartā ca asi na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.070.008c daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe
analyzed: daṇḍena ca prajāḥ rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe

original: 7.070.009a aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai
analyzed: aparādhiṣu yaḥ daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai

original: 7.070.009c sa daṇḍo vidhivan muktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam
analyzed: sa daṇḍaḥ vidhivat muktaḥ svargam nayati pārthivam

original: 7.070.010a tasmād daṇḍe mahābāho yatnavān bhava putraka
analyzed: tasmāt daṇḍe mahā bāho yatnavān bhava putraka

original: 7.070.010c dharmo hi paramo loke kurvatas te bhaviṣyati
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi paramaḥ loke kurvataḥ te bhaviṣyati

original: 7.070.011a iti taṃ bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā
analyzed: iti tam bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putram samādhinā

original: 7.070.011c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo brahmalokam anuttamam
analyzed: jagāma tridivam hṛṣṭaḥ brahma lokam anuttamam

original: 7.070.012a prayāte tridive tasminn ikṣvākur amitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: prayāte tridive tasmin ikṣvākuḥ amita prabhaḥ

original: 7.070.012c janayiṣye kathaṃ putrān iti cintāparo 'bhavat
analyzed: janayiṣye katham putrān iti cintā paraḥ bhavat

original: 7.070.013a karmabhir bahurūpaiś ca tais tair manusutaḥ sutān
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bahu rūpaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ manu sutaḥ sutān

original: 7.070.013c janayām āsa dharmātmā śataṃ devasutopamān
analyzed: janayām āsa dharma ātmā śatam deva suta upamān

original: 7.070.014a teṣām avarajas tāta sarveṣāṃ raghunandana
analyzed: teṣām avarajaḥ tāta sarveṣām raghunandana

original: 7.070.014c mūḍhaś cākṛtividyaś ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ ca ākṛti vidyaḥ ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān

original: 7.070.015a nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ
analyzed: nāma tasya ca daṇḍa iti pitā cakre lpa tejasaḥ

original: 7.070.015c avaśyaṃ daṇḍapatanaṃ śarīre 'sya bhaviṣyati
analyzed: avaśyam daṇḍa patanam śarīre sya bhaviṣyati

original: 7.070.016a sa paśyamānas taṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava
analyzed: sa paśyamānaḥ tam doṣam ghoram putrasya rāghava

original: 7.070.016c vindhyaśaivalayor madhye rājyaṃ prādād ariṃdama
analyzed: vindhya śaivalayoḥ madhye rājyam prādāt ariṃdama

original: 7.070.017a sa daṇḍas tatra rājābhūd ramye parvatarodhasi
analyzed: sa daṇḍaḥ tatra rājā abhūt ramye parvata rodhasi

original: 7.070.017c puraṃ cāpratimaṃ rāma nyaveśayad anuttamam
analyzed: puram ca apratimam rāma nyaveśayat anuttamam

original: 7.070.018a purasya cākaron nāma madhumantam iti prabho
analyzed: purasya ca akarot nāma madhumantam iti prabho

original: 7.070.018c purohitaṃ cośanasaṃ varayām āsa suvratam
analyzed: purohitam ca uśanasam varayām āsa su vratam

original: 7.070.019a evaṃ sa rājā tad rājyaṃ kārayat sapurohitaḥ
analyzed: evam sa rājā tat rājyam kārayat sa purohitaḥ

original: 7.070.019c prahṛṣṭamanujākīrṇaṃ devarājyaṃ yathā divi
analyzed: prahṛṣṭa manuja ākīrṇam deva rājyam yathā divi

original: 7.071.001a etad ākhyāya rāmāya maharṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyāya rāmāya mahā ṛṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 7.071.001c asyām evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kathāyām upacakrame
analyzed: asyām eva aparam vākyam kathāyām upacakrame

original: 7.071.002a tataḥ sa daṇḍaḥ kākutstha bahuvarṣagaṇāyutam
analyzed: tatas sa daṇḍaḥ kākutstha bahu varṣa gaṇa ayutam

original: 7.071.002c akarot tatra mandātmā rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
analyzed: akarot tatra manda ātmā rājyam nihata kaṇṭakam

original: 7.071.003a atha kāle tu kasmiṃś cid rājā bhārgavam āśramam
analyzed: atha kāle tu kasmin cit rājā bhārgavam āśramam

original: 7.071.003c ramaṇīyam upākrāmac caitre māsi manorame
analyzed: ramaṇīyam upākrāmat caitre māsi manorame

original: 7.071.004a tatra bhārgavakanyāṃ sa rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: tatra bhārgava kanyām sa rūpeṇa apratimām bhuvi

original: 7.071.004c vicarantīṃ vanoddeśe daṇḍo 'paśyad anuttamām
analyzed: vicarantīm vana uddeśe paśyat anuttamām

original: 7.071.005a sa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sudurmedhā anaṅgaśarapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā tām su durmedhāḥ anaṅga śara pīḍitaḥ

original: 7.071.005c abhigamya susaṃvignaḥ kanyāṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: abhigamya su saṃvignaḥ kanyām vacanam abravīt

original: 7.071.006a kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vāsi sutā śubhe
analyzed: kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vā asi sutā śubhe

original: 7.071.006c pīḍito 'ham anaṅgena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ sumadhyame
analyzed: pīḍitaḥ ham anaṅgena pṛcchāmi tvām sumadhyame

original: 7.071.007a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ
analyzed: tasya tu evam bruvāṇasya moha unmattasya kāminaḥ

original: 7.071.007c bhārgavī pratyuvācedaṃ vacaḥ sānunayaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: bhārgavī pratyuvāca idam vacaḥ sa anunayam nṛpam

original: 7.071.008a bhārgavasya sutāṃ viddhi devasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: bhārgavasya sutām viddhi devasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.071.008c arajāṃ nāma rājendra jyeṣṭhām āśramavāsinīm
analyzed: arajām nāma rāja indra jyeṣṭhām āśrama vāsinīm

original: 7.071.009a guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: guruḥ pitā me rāja indra tvam ca śiṣyaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.071.009c vyasanaṃ sumahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyān mahātapāḥ
analyzed: vyasanam su mahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyāt mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.071.010a yadi vātra mayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā
analyzed: yadi vā atra mayā kāryam dharma dṛṣṭena sat pathā

original: 7.071.010c varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim
analyzed: varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaram me mahā dyutim

original: 7.071.011a anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaved ghorābhisaṃhitam
analyzed: anyathā tu phalam tubhyam bhavet ghora abhisaṃhitam

original: 7.071.011c krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyam api nirdahet
analyzed: krodhena hi pitā me sau trailokyam api nirdahet

original: 7.071.012a evaṃ bruvāṇām arajāṃ daṇḍaḥ kāmaśarārditaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇām arajām daṇḍaḥ kāma śara arditaḥ

original: 7.071.012c pratyuvāca madonmattaḥ śirasy ādhāya so 'ñjalim
analyzed: pratyuvāca mada unmattaḥ śirasi ādhāya saḥ ñjalim

original: 7.071.013a prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
analyzed: prasādam kuru suśroṇi na kālam kṣeptum arhasi

original: 7.071.013c tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante śubhānane
analyzed: tvad kṛte hi mama prāṇāḥ vidīryante śubha ānane

original: 7.071.014a tvāṃ prāpya hi vadho vāpi pāpaṃ vāpi sudāruṇam
analyzed: tvām prāpya hi vadhaḥ vā api pāpam vā api su dāruṇam

original: 7.071.014c bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam
analyzed: bhaktam bhajasva mām bhīru bhajamānam su vihvalam

original: 7.071.015a evam uktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balād balī
analyzed: evam uktvā tu tām kanyām dorbhyām gṛhya balāt balī

original: 7.071.015c visphurantīṃ yathākāmaṃ maithunāyopacakrame
analyzed: visphurantīm yathākāmam maithunāya upacakrame

original: 7.071.016a tam anarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam
analyzed: tam anartham mahā ghoram daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā su dāruṇam

original: 7.071.016c nagaraṃ prayayau cāśu madhumantam anuttamam
analyzed: nagaram prayayau ca āśu madhumantam anuttamam

original: 7.071.017a arajāpi rudantī sā āśramasyāvidūrataḥ
analyzed: arajā api rudantī sā āśramasya avidūrataḥ

original: 7.071.017c pratīkṣate susaṃtrastā pitaraṃ devasaṃnibham
analyzed: pratīkṣate su saṃtrastā pitaram deva saṃnibham

original: 7.072.001a sa muhūrtād upaśrutya devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: sa muhūrtāt upaśrutya devarṣiḥ amita prabhaḥ

original: 7.072.001c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ saṃnyavartata
analyzed: svam āśramam śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhā ārtaḥ saṃnyavartata

original: 7.072.002a so 'paśyad arajāṃ dīnāṃ rajasā samabhiplutām
analyzed: saḥ paśyat arajām dīnām rajasā samabhiplutām

original: 7.072.002c jyotsnām ivāruṇagrastāṃ pratyūṣe na virājatīm
analyzed: jyotsnām iva aruṇa grastām pratyūṣe na virājatīm

original: 7.072.003a tasya roṣaḥ samabhavat kṣudhārtasya viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tasya roṣaḥ samabhavat kṣudhā ārtasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.072.003c nirdahann iva lokāṃs trīñ śiṣyāṃś cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: nirdahan iva lokān trīn śiṣyān ca idam uvāca ha

original: 7.072.004a paśyadhvaṃ viparītasya daṇḍasyāviditātmanaḥ
analyzed: paśyadhvam viparītasya daṇḍasya a vidita ātmanaḥ

original: 7.072.004c vipattiṃ ghorasaṃkāśāṃ kruddhām agniśikhām iva
analyzed: vipattim ghora saṃkāśām kruddhām agni śikhām iva

original: 7.072.005a kṣayo 'sya durmateḥ prāptaḥ sānugasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: kṣayaḥ sya durmateḥ prāptaḥ sa anugasya durātmanaḥ

original: 7.072.005c yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭum icchati
analyzed: yaḥ pradīptām hutāśasya śikhām vai spraṣṭum icchati

original: 7.072.006a yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśaṃ ghoradarśanam
analyzed: yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśam ghora darśanam

original: 7.072.006c tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalam pāpasya karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.072.007a saptarātreṇa rājāsau sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: sapta rātreṇa rājā asau sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.072.007c pāpakarmasamācāro vadhaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ
analyzed: pāpa karma samācāraḥ vadham prāpsyati durmatiḥ

original: 7.072.008a samantād yojanaśataṃ viṣayaṃ cāsya durmateḥ
analyzed: samantāt yojana śatam viṣayam ca asya durmateḥ

original: 7.072.008c dhakṣyate pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ
analyzed: dhakṣyate pāṃsu varṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 7.072.009a sarvasattvāni yānīha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
analyzed: sarva sattvāni yāni iha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca

original: 7.072.009c mahatā pāṃsuvarṣeṇa nāśaṃ yāsyanti sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: mahatā pāṃsu varṣeṇa nāśam yāsyanti sarvaśas

original: 7.072.010a daṇḍasya viṣayo yāvat tāvat sarvasamucchrayaḥ
analyzed: daṇḍasya viṣayaḥ yāvat tāvat sarva samucchrayaḥ

original: 7.072.010c pāṃsubhuta ivālakṣyaḥ saptarātrād bhaviṣyati
analyzed: pāṃsu bhutaḥ iva alakṣyaḥ sapta rātrāt bhaviṣyati

original: 7.072.011a ity uktvā krodhasaṃtapas tam āśramanivāsinam
analyzed: iti uktvā krodha saṃtapaḥ tam āśrama nivāsinam

original: 7.072.011c janaṃ janapadānteṣu sthīyatām iti cābravīt
analyzed: janam janapada anteṣu sthīyatām iti ca abravīt

original: 7.072.012a śrutvā tūśasano vākyaṃ sa āśramāvasatho janaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu ūśasanaḥ vākyam saḥ āśrama āvasathaḥ janaḥ

original: 7.072.012c niṣkrānto viṣayāt tasya sthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ
analyzed: niṣkrāntaḥ viṣayāt tasya sthānam cakre bāhyatas

original: 7.072.013a sa tathoktvā munijanam arajām idam abravīt
analyzed: sa tathā uktvā muni janam arajām idam abravīt

original: 7.072.013c ihaiva vasa durmedhe āśrame susamāhitā
analyzed: iha eva vasa durmedhe āśrame su samāhitā

original: 7.072.014a idaṃ yojanaparyantaṃ saraḥ suruciraprabham
analyzed: idam yojana paryantam saraḥ su rucira prabham

original: 7.072.014c araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaś cātra pratīkṣyatām
analyzed: araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaḥ ca atra pratīkṣyatām

original: 7.072.015a tvatsamīpe tu ye sattvā vāsam eṣyanti tāṃ niśām
analyzed: tvad samīpe tu ye sattvāḥ vāsam eṣyanti tām niśām

original: 7.072.015c avadhyāḥ pāṃsuvarṣeṇa te bhaviṣyanti nityadā
analyzed: avadhyāḥ pāṃsu varṣeṇa te bhaviṣyanti nityadā

original: 7.072.016a ity uktvā bhārgavo vāsam anyatra samupākramat
analyzed: iti uktvā bhārgavaḥ vāsam anyatra samupākramat

original: 7.072.016c saptāhād bhasmasādbhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmavādinā
analyzed: sapta ahāt bhasmasāt bhūtam yathā uktam brahma vādinā

original: 7.072.017a tasyāsau daṇḍaviṣayo vindhyaśaivalasānuṣu
analyzed: tasya asau daṇḍa viṣayaḥ vindhya śaivala sānuṣu

original: 7.072.017c śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte
analyzed: śaptaḥ brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte

original: 7.072.018a tataḥ prabhṛti kākutstha daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti kākutstha daṇḍaka araṇyam ucyate

original: 7.072.018c tapasvinaḥ sthitā yatra janasthānam atho 'bhavat
analyzed: tapasvinaḥ sthitāḥ yatra janasthānam atho bhavat

original: 7.072.019a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi rāghava
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām pṛcchasi rāghava

original: 7.072.019c saṃdhyām upāsituṃ vīra samayo hy ativartate
analyzed: saṃdhyām upāsitum vīra samayaḥ hi ativartate

original: 7.072.020a ete maharṣayaḥ sarve pūrṇakumbhāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: ete mahā ṛṣayaḥ sarve pūrṇa kumbhāḥ samantataḥ

original: 7.072.020c kṛtodako naravyāghra ādityaṃ paryupāsate
analyzed: kṛta udakaḥ nara vyāghraḥ ādityam paryupāsate

original: 7.072.021a sa tair ṛṣibhir abhyastaḥ sahitair brahmasattamaiḥ
analyzed: sa taiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ abhyastaḥ sahitaiḥ brahma sattamaiḥ

original: 7.072.021c ravir astaṃ gato rāma gacchodakam upaspṛśa
analyzed: raviḥ astam gataḥ rāma gaccha udakam upaspṛśa

original: 7.073.001a ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum

original: 7.073.001c upākrāmat saraḥ puṇyam apsarobhir niṣevitam
analyzed: upākrāmat saraḥ puṇyam apsarobhiḥ niṣevitam

original: 7.073.002a tatrodakam upaspṛṣśya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām
analyzed: tatra udakam upaspṛṣśya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām

original: 7.073.002c āśramaṃ prāviśad rāmaḥ kumbhayoner mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: āśramam prāviśat rāmaḥ kumbhayoneḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.073.003a asyāgastyo bahuguṇaṃ phalamūlaṃ tathauṣadhīḥ
analyzed: asya agastyaḥ bahuguṇam phala mūlam tathā oṣadhīḥ

original: 7.073.003c śākāni ca pavitrāṇi bhojanārtham akalpayat
analyzed: śākāni ca pavitrāṇi bhojana artham akalpayat

original: 7.073.004a sa bhuktavān naraśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
analyzed: sa bhuktavān nara śreṣṭhaḥ tat annam amṛta upamam

original: 7.073.004c prītaś ca parituṣṭaś ca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat
analyzed: prītaḥ ca parituṣṭaḥ ca tām rātrim samupāvasat

original: 7.073.005a prabhāte kālyam utthāya kṛtvāhnikam ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: prabhāte kālyam utthāya kṛtvā āhnikam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 7.073.005c ṛṣiṃ samabhicakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣim samabhicakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ

original: 7.073.006a abhivādyābravīd rāmo maharṣiṃ kumbhasaṃbhavam
analyzed: abhivādya abravīt rāmaḥ mahā ṛṣim kumbhasaṃbhavam

original: 7.073.006c āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi
analyzed: āpṛcche tvām gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi

original: 7.073.007a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi darśanena mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: dhanyaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi darśanena mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.073.007c draṣṭuṃ caivāgamiṣyāmi pāvanārtham ihātmanaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭum ca eva āgamiṣyāmi pāvana artham iha ātmanaḥ

original: 7.073.008a tathā vadati kākutsthe vākyam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: tathā vadati kākutsthe vākyam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.073.008c uvāca paramaprīto dharmanetras tapodhanaḥ
analyzed: uvāca parama prītaḥ dharmanetraḥ tapodhanaḥ

original: 7.073.009a atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram
analyzed: ati adbhutam idam vākyam tava rāma śubha akṣaram

original: 7.073.009c pāvanaḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvam eva raghunandana
analyzed: pāvanaḥ sarva lokānām tvam eva raghunandana

original: 7.073.010a muhūrtam api rāma tvāṃ ye nu paśyanti ke cana
analyzed: muhūrtam api rāma tvām ye nu paśyanti ke cana

original: 7.073.010c pāvitāḥ svargabhūtās te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ
analyzed: pāvitāḥ svarga bhūtāḥ te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ

original: 7.073.011a ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhir īkṣante prāṇino bhuvi
analyzed: ye ca tvām ghora cakṣurbhiḥ īkṣante prāṇinaḥ bhuvi

original: 7.073.011c hatās te yamadaṇḍena sadyo nirayagāminaḥ
analyzed: hatāḥ te yama daṇḍena sadyas niraya gāminaḥ

original: 7.073.012a gaccha cāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam
analyzed: gaccha ca ariṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam

original: 7.073.012c praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatir hi jagato bhavān
analyzed: praśādhi rājyam dharmeṇa gatiḥ hi jagataḥ bhavān

original: 7.073.013a evam uktas tu muninā prāñjaliḥ prpagraho nṛpaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu muninā prāñjaliḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.073.013c abhyavādayata prājñas tam ṛṣiṃ puṇyaśīlinam
analyzed: abhyavādayata prājñaḥ tam ṛṣim puṇya śīlinam

original: 7.073.014a abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃś ca sarvāṃs tapodhanān
analyzed: abhivādya muni śreṣṭham tān ca sarvān tapodhanān

original: 7.073.014c adhyārohat tad avyagraḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam
analyzed: adhyārohat tat avyagraḥ puṣpakam hema bhūṣitam

original: 7.073.015a taṃ prayāntaṃ munigaṇā āśīrvādaiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: tam prayāntam muni gaṇāḥ āśīrvādaiḥ samantataḥ

original: 7.073.015c apūjayan mahendrābhaṃ sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
analyzed: apūjayat mahā indra ābham sahasrākṣam iva amarāḥ

original: 7.073.016a svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite
analyzed: svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hema bhūṣite

original: 7.073.016c śaśī meghasamīpastho yathā jaladharāgame
analyzed: śaśī megha samīpa sthaḥ yathā jaladhara āgame

original: 7.073.017a tato 'rdhadivase prāpte pūjyamānas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: tatas ṛdhadivase prāpte pūjyamānaḥ tatas tatas

original: 7.073.017c ayodhyāṃ prāpya kākutstho vimānād avarohata
analyzed: ayodhyām prāpya kākutsthaḥ vimānāt avarohata

original: 7.073.018a tato visṛjya ruciraṃ puṣpakaṃ kāmagāminam
analyzed: tatas visṛjya ruciram puṣpakam kāma gāminam

original: 7.073.018c kakṣyāntaravinikṣiptaṃ dvāḥsthaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: kakṣyā antara vinikṣiptam dvāḥstham rāmaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: 7.073.019a lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam bharatam ca eva gatvā tau laghu vikramau

original: 7.073.019c mamāgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca māṃ ciram
analyzed: mama āgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca mām ciram

original: 7.074.001a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhāṣitam tasya rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.074.001c dvāḥsthaḥ kumārāv āhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat
analyzed: dvāḥsthaḥ kumārau āhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat

original: 7.074.002a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharata lakṣmaṇau

original: 7.074.002c pariṣvajya tato rāmo vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: pariṣvajya tatas rāmaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.074.003a kṛtaṃ mayā yathātathyaṃ dvijakāryam anuttamam
analyzed: kṛtam mayā yathātathyam dvija kāryam anuttamam

original: 7.074.003c dharmasetumato bhūyaḥ kartum icchāmi rāghavau
analyzed: dharmasetumataḥ bhūyas kartum icchāmi rāghavau

original: 7.074.004a yuvābhyām ātmabhūtābhyāṃ rājasūyam anuttamam
analyzed: yuvābhyām ātma bhūtābhyām rājasūyam anuttamam

original: 7.074.004c sahito yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ
analyzed: sahitaḥ yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmaḥ hi śāśvataḥ

original: 7.074.005a iṣṭvā tu rājasūyena mitraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭvā tu rājasūyena mitraḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 7.074.005c suhutena suyajñena varuṇatvam upāgamat
analyzed: su hutena su yajñena varuṇa tvam upāgamat

original: 7.074.006a somaś ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit
analyzed: somaḥ ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharma vid

original: 7.074.006c prāptaś ca sarvalokānāṃ kīrtiṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: prāptaḥ ca sarva lokānām kīrtim sthānam ca śāśvatam

original: 7.074.007a asminn ahani yac chreyaś cintyatāṃ tan mayā saha
analyzed: asmin ahani yat śreyaḥ cintyatām tat mayā saha

original: 7.074.007c hitaṃ cāyati yuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhatha
analyzed: hitam ca āyati yuktam ca prayatau vaktum arhatha

original: 7.074.008a śrutā tu rāghavasyaitad vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: śrutā tu rāghavasya etat vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 7.074.008c bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: bharataḥ prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.074.009a tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā
analyzed: tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā

original: 7.074.009c pratiṣṭhitā mahābāho yaśaś cāmitavikrama
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitāḥ mahā bāho yaśaḥ ca amita vikrama

original: 7.074.010a mahīpālāś ca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatim ivāmarāḥ
analyzed: mahīpālāḥ ca sarve tvām prajāpatim iva amarāḥ

original: 7.074.010c nirīkṣante mahātmāno lokanāthaṃ yathā vayam
analyzed: nirīkṣante mahātmānaḥ loka nātham yathā vayam

original: 7.074.011a prajāś ca pitṛvad rājan paśyanti tvāṃ mahābala
analyzed: prajāḥ ca pitṛ vat rājan paśyanti tvām mahā bala

original: 7.074.011c pṛthivyāṃ gatibhūto 'si prāṇinām api rāghava
analyzed: pṛthivyām gati bhūtaḥ si prāṇinām api rāghava

original: 7.074.012a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ yajñam āhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: sa tvam evaṃvidham yajñam āhartāsi katham nṛpa

original: 7.074.012c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ vināśo yatra dṛśyate
analyzed: pṛthivyām rāja vaṃśānām vināśaḥ yatra dṛśyate

original: 7.074.013a pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ
analyzed: pṛthivyām ye ca puruṣāḥ rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ

original: 7.074.013c sarveṣāṃ bhavitā tatra kṣayaḥ sarvāntakopamaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām bhavitā tatra kṣayaḥ sarva antaka upamaḥ

original: 7.074.014a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla guṇair atulavikrama
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla guṇaiḥ atula vikrama

original: 7.074.014c pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate
analyzed: pṛthivīm nā arhase hantum vaśe hi tava vartate

original: 7.074.015a bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
analyzed: bharatasya tu tat vākyam śrutvā amṛta mayam yathā

original: 7.074.015c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ

original: 7.074.016a uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam
analyzed: uvāca ca śubhām vāṇīm kaikeyyāḥ nandivardhanam

original: 7.074.016c prīto 'smi parituṣṭo 'smi tavādya vacanena hi
analyzed: prītaḥ smi parituṣṭaḥ smi tava adya vacanena hi

original: 7.074.017a idaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ tvayā dharmasamāhitam
analyzed: idam vacanam aklībam tvayā dharma samāhitam

original: 7.074.017c vyāhṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam
analyzed: vyāhṛtam puruṣa vyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam

original: 7.074.018a eṣa tasmād abhiprāyād rājasūyāt kratūttamān
analyzed: eṣa tasmāt abhiprāyāt rājasūyāt kratu uttamān

original: 7.074.018c nivartayāmi dharmajña tava suvyāhṛtena vai
analyzed: nivartayāmi dharma jña tava su vyāhṛtena vai

original: 7.074.019a prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ yajñena saṃmitaḥ
analyzed: prajānām pālanam dharmaḥ rājñām yajñena saṃmitaḥ

original: 7.074.019c tasmāc chṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhūktaṃ susamāhitam
analyzed: tasmāt śṛṇomi te vākyam sādhu uktam su samāhitam

original: 7.075.001a tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani
analyzed: tathā uktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani

original: 7.075.001c lakṣmaṇo 'pi śubhaṃ vākyam uvāca raghunandanam
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ śubham vākyam uvāca raghunandanam

original: 7.075.002a aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ pāvanaḥ sarvapāpmanām
analyzed: aśvamedhaḥ mahā yajñaḥ pāvanaḥ sarva pāpmanām

original: 7.075.002c pāvanas tava durdharṣo rocatāṃ kratupuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: pāvanaḥ tava durdharṣaḥ rocatām kratu puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.075.003a śrūyate hi purāvṛttaṃ vāsave sumahātmani
analyzed: śrūyate hi purāvṛttam vāsave su mahātmani

original: 7.075.003c brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakro hayamedhena pāvitaḥ
analyzed: brahmahatyā vṛtaḥ śakraḥ hayamedhena pāvitaḥ

original: 7.075.004a purā kila mahābāho devāsurasamāgame
analyzed: purā kila mahā bāho deva asura samāgame

original: 7.075.004c vṛtro nāma mahān āsīd daiteyo lokasaṃmataḥ
analyzed: vṛtraḥ nāma mahān āsīt daiteyaḥ loka saṃmataḥ

original: 7.075.005a vistīrṇā yojanaśatam ucchritas triguṇaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: vistīrṇāḥ yojana śatam ucchritaḥ triguṇam tatas

original: 7.075.005c anurāgeṇa lokāṃs trīn snehāt paśyati sarvataḥ
analyzed: anurāgeṇa lokān trīn snehāt paśyati sarvatas

original: 7.075.006a dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ ca kṛtajñaḥ ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.075.006c śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: śaśāsa pṛthivīm sarvām dharmeṇa su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.075.007a tasmin praśāsati tadā sarvakāmadughā mahī
analyzed: tasmin praśāsati tadā sarva kāmadughā mahī

original: 7.075.007c rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 7.075.008a akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī susaṃpannā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: a kṛṣṭa pacyā pṛthivī su saṃpannā mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.075.008c sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: sa rājyam tādṛśam bhuṅkte sphītam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.075.009a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam

original: 7.075.009c tapo hi paramaṃ śreyas tapo hi paramaṃ sukham
analyzed: tapaḥ hi paramam śreyaḥ tapaḥ hi paramam sukham

original: 7.075.010a sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu parameśvaram
analyzed: sa nikṣipya sutam jyeṣṭham paureṣu parama īśvaram

original: 7.075.010c tapa ugram upātiṣṭhat tāpayan sarvadevatāḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ ugram upātiṣṭhat tāpayan sarva devatāḥ

original: 7.075.011a tapas tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat
analyzed: tapaḥ tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ parama ārta vat

original: 7.075.011c viṣṇuṃ samupasaṃkramya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: viṣṇum samupasaṃkramya vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.075.012a tapasyatā mahābāho lokā vṛtreṇa nirjitāḥ
analyzed: tapasyatā mahā bāho lokāḥ vṛtreṇa nirjitāḥ

original: 7.075.012c balavān sa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi bādhitum
analyzed: balavān sa hi dharma ātmā na enam śakṣyāmi bādhitum

original: 7.075.013a yady asau tapa ātiṣṭhed bhūya eva sureśvara
analyzed: yadi asau tapaḥ ātiṣṭhet bhūyas eva sureśvara

original: 7.075.013c yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tāvad asya vaśānugāḥ
analyzed: yāvat lokāḥ dhariṣyanti tāvat asya vaśa anugāḥ

original: 7.075.014a tvaṃ cainaṃ paramodāram upekṣasi mahābala
analyzed: tvam ca enam parama udāram upekṣasi mahā bala

original: 7.075.014c kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhaved vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara
analyzed: kṣaṇam hi na bhavet vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara

original: 7.075.015a yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ
analyzed: yadā hi prīti saṃyogam tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ

original: 7.075.015c tadā prabhṛti lokānāṃ nāthatvam upalabdhavān
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti lokānām nātha tvam upalabdhavān

original: 7.075.016a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva sumahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam prasādam lokānām kuruṣva su mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.075.016c tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāt praśāntam ajaraṃ jagat
analyzed: tvad kṛtena hi sarvam syāt praśāntam ajaram jagat

original: 7.075.017a ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ
analyzed: ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvām nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ

original: 7.075.017c vṛtraghatena mahatā eṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha
analyzed: vṛtra ghatena mahatā eṣām sāhyam kuruṣva ha

original: 7.075.018a tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtam eṣāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: tvayā hi nityaśas sāhyam kṛtam eṣām mahātmanām

original: 7.075.018c asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān
analyzed: asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnām gatiḥ bhavān

original: 7.076.001a lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya tu tat vākyam śrutvā śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 7.076.001c vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa kathayety āha lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: vṛtra ghātam aśeṣeṇa kathaya iti āha lakṣmaṇam

original: 7.076.002a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu sumitrānandavardhanaḥ
analyzed: rāghaveṇa evam uktaḥ tu sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 7.076.002c bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas eva kathām divyām kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.076.003a sahasrākṣavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām
analyzed: sahasrākṣa vacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣām ca divaukasām

original: 7.076.003c viṣṇur devān uvācedaṃ sarvān indrapurogamān
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ devān uvāca idam sarvān indra purogamān

original: 7.076.004a pūrvaṃ sauhṛdabaddho 'smi vṛtrasya sumahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam sauhṛda baddhaḥ smi vṛtrasya su mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.076.004c tena yuṣmat priyārthaṃ vai nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram
analyzed: tena yuṣmat priya artham vai na aham hanmi mahā asuram

original: 7.076.005a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukham uttamam
analyzed: avaśyam karaṇīyam ca bhavatām sukham uttamam

original: 7.076.005c tasmād upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtraṃ haniṣyatha
analyzed: tasmāt upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtram haniṣyatha

original: 7.076.006a tridhā bhūtaṃ kariṣye 'ham ātmānaṃ surasattamāḥ
analyzed: tridhā bhūtam kariṣye ham ātmānam sura sattamāḥ

original: 7.076.006c tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tena vṛtram sahasrākṣaḥ haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.076.007a eko 'ṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajram eva tu
analyzed: ekaḥ ṃśaḥ vāsavam yātu dvitīyaḥ vajram eva tu

original: 7.076.007c tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakras tato vṛtraṃ haniṣyati
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ bhū talam śakraḥ tatas vṛtram haniṣyati

original: 7.076.008a tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyam athābruvan
analyzed: tathā bruvati deveśe devāḥ vākyam atha abruvan

original: 7.076.008c evam etan na saṃdeho yathā vadasi daityahan
analyzed: evam etat na saṃdehaḥ yathā vadasi daityahan

original: 7.076.009a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmo vṛtrāsuravadhaiṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: bhadram te stu gamiṣyāmaḥ vṛtra asura vadha eṣiṇaḥ

original: 7.076.009c bhajasva paramodāravāsavaṃ svena tejasā
analyzed: bhajasva parama udāra vāsavam svena tejasā

original: 7.076.010a tataḥ sarve mahātmānaḥ sahasrākṣapurogamāḥ
analyzed: tatas sarve mahātmānaḥ sahasrākṣa purogamāḥ

original: 7.076.010c tad araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: tat araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtraḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: 7.076.011a te 'paśyaṃs tejasā bhūtaṃ tapantam asurottamam
analyzed: te paśyan tejasā bhūtam tapantam asura uttamam

original: 7.076.011c pibantam iva lokāṃs trīn nirdahantam ivāmbaram
analyzed: pibantam iva lokān trīn nirdahantam iva ambaram

original: 7.076.012a dṛṣṭvaiva cāsuraśreṣṭhaṃ devās trāsam upāgaman
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva ca asura śreṣṭham devāḥ trāsam upāgaman

original: 7.076.012c katham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syāt parājayaḥ
analyzed: katham enam vadhiṣyāmaḥ katham na syāt parājayaḥ

original: 7.076.013a teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ tatra sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: teṣām cintayatām tatra sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ

original: 7.076.013c vajraṃ pragṛhya bāhubhyāṃ prahiṇod vṛtramūrdhani
analyzed: vajram pragṛhya bāhubhyām prahiṇot vṛtra mūrdhani

original: 7.076.014a kālāgnineva ghoreṇa dīpteneva mahārciṣā
analyzed: kālāgninā iva ghoreṇa dīptena iva mahā arciṣā

original: 7.076.014c prataptaṃ vṛtraśirasi jagat trāsam upāgamat
analyzed: prataptam vṛtra śirasi jagat trāsam upāgamat

original: 7.076.015a asaṃbhāvyaṃ vadhaṃ tasya vṛtrasya vibudhādhipaḥ
analyzed: asaṃbhāvyam vadham tasya vṛtrasya vibudha adhipaḥ

original: 7.076.015c cintayāno jagāmāśu lokasyāntaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: cintayānaḥ jagāma āśu lokasya antam mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.076.016a tam indraṃ brahmahatyāśu gacchantam anugacchati
analyzed: tam indram brahmahatyā āśu gacchantam anugacchati

original: 7.076.016c apatac cāsya gātreṣu tam indraṃ duḥkham āviśat
analyzed: apatat ca asya gātreṣu tam indram duḥkham āviśat

original: 7.076.017a hatārayaḥ pranaṣṭendrā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
analyzed: hata arayaḥ pranaṣṭa indrāḥ devāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ

original: 7.076.017c viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ muhur muhur apūjayan
analyzed: viṣṇum tribhuvaṇa śreṣṭham muhur muhur apūjayan

original: 7.076.018a tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tvam gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajaḥ jagataḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.076.018c rathārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvam upajagmivān
analyzed: ratha artham sarva bhūtānām viṣṇu tvam upajagmivān

original: 7.076.019a hataś cāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam
analyzed: hataḥ ca ayam tvayā vṛtraḥ brahmahatyā ca vāsavam

original: 7.076.019c bādhate suraśārdūla mokṣaṃ tasya vinirdiśa
analyzed: bādhate sura śārdūla mokṣam tasya vinirdiśa

original: 7.076.020a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā devānām viṣṇuḥ abravīt

original: 7.076.020c mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam
analyzed: mām eva yajatām śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam

original: 7.076.021a puṇyena hayamedhena mām iṣṭvā pākaśāsanaḥ
analyzed: puṇyena hayamedhena mām iṣṭvā pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 7.076.021c punar eṣyati devānām indratvam akutobhayaḥ
analyzed: punar eṣyati devānām indra tvam akutobhayaḥ

original: 7.076.022a evaṃ saṃdiśya devānāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamā
analyzed: evam saṃdiśya devānām tām vāṇīm amṛta upamā

original: 7.076.022c jagāma viṣṇur deveśaḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapam
analyzed: jagāma viṣṇuḥ deveśaḥ stūyamānaḥ triviṣṭapam

original: 7.077.001a tathā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tathā vṛtra vadham sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 7.077.001c kathayitvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ kathāśeṣam upākramat
analyzed: kathayitvā nara śreṣṭhaḥ kathā śeṣam upākramat

original: 7.077.002a tato hate mahāvīrye vṛtre devabhayaṃkare
analyzed: tatas hate mahā vīrye vṛtre deva bhayaṃkare

original: 7.077.002c brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā
analyzed: brahmahatyā vṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñām lebhe na vṛtrahā

original: 7.077.003a so 'ntam āśritya lokānāṃ naṣṭasaṃjño vicetanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ntam āśritya lokānām naṣṭa saṃjñaḥ vicetanaḥ

original: 7.077.003c kālaṃ tatrāvasat kaṃ cid veṣṭamāno yathoragaḥ
analyzed: kālam tatra avasat kam cit veṣṭamānaḥ yathā uragaḥ

original: 7.077.004a atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavaj jagat
analyzed: atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavat jagat

original: 7.077.004c bhūmiś ca dhvastasaṃkāśā niḥsnehā śuṣkakānanā
analyzed: bhūmiḥ ca dhvasta saṃkāśā niḥsnehā śuṣka kānanā

original: 7.077.005a niḥsrotasaś cāmbuvāhā hradāś ca saritas tathā
analyzed: niḥsrotasaḥ ca ambu vāhāḥ hradāḥ ca saritaḥ tathā

original: 7.077.005c saṃkṣobhaś caiva sattvānām anāvṛṣṭikṛto 'bhavat
analyzed: saṃkṣobhaḥ ca eva sattvānām anāvṛṣṭi kṛtaḥ bhavat

original: 7.077.006a kṣīyamāṇe tu loke 'smin saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: kṣīyamāṇe tu loke smin saṃbhrānta manasaḥ surāḥ

original: 7.077.006c yad uktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan
analyzed: yat uktam viṣṇunā pūrvam tam yajñam samupānayan

original: 7.077.007a tataḥ sarve suragaṇāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: tatas sarve sura gaṇāḥ sa upādhyāyāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 7.077.007c taṃ deśaṃ sahitā jagmur yatrendro bhayamohitaḥ
analyzed: tam deśam sahitāḥ jagmuḥ yatra indraḥ bhaya mohitaḥ

original: 7.077.008a te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ mohitaṃ brahmahatyayā
analyzed: te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣam mohitam brahmahatyayā

original: 7.077.008c taṃ puraskṛtya deveśam aśvamedhaṃ pracakrire
analyzed: tam puraskṛtya deveśam aśvamedham pracakrire

original: 7.077.009a tato 'śvamedhaḥ sumahān mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas śvamedhaḥ su mahān mahā indrasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.077.009c vavṛdhe brahmahatyāyāḥ pāvanārthaṃ nareśvara
analyzed: vavṛdhe brahmahatyāyāḥ pāvana artham nareśvara

original: 7.077.010a tato yajñasamāptau tu brahmahatyā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas yajña samāptau tu brahmahatyā mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.077.010c abhigamyābravīd vākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha
analyzed: abhigamya abravīt vākyam kva me sthānam vidhāsyatha

original: 7.077.011a te tām ūcus tato devās tuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ
analyzed: te tām ūcuḥ tatas devāḥ tuṣṭāḥ prīti samanvitāḥ

original: 7.077.011c caturdhā vibhajātmānam ātmanaiva durāsade
analyzed: caturdhā vibhaja ātmānam ātmanā eva durāsade

original: 7.077.012a devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmahatyā mahātmanām
analyzed: devānām bhāṣitam śrutvā brahmahatyā mahātmanām

original: 7.077.012c saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā
analyzed: saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā

original: 7.077.013a ekenāṃśena vatsyāmi pūrṇodāsu nadīṣu vai
analyzed: ekena aṃśena vatsyāmi pūrṇa udāsu nadīṣu vai

original: 7.077.013c dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
analyzed: dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etat bravīmi vaḥ

original: 7.077.014a yo 'yam aṃśas tṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu
analyzed: yaḥ yam aṃśaḥ tṛtīyaḥ me strīṣu yauvana śāliṣu

original: 7.077.014c trirātraṃ darpaparṇāsu vasiṣye darpaghātinī
analyzed: tri rātram darpa parṇāsu vasiṣye darpa ghātinī

original: 7.077.015a hantāro brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣāpūrvam adūṣakān
analyzed: hantāraḥ brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣā pūrvam adūṣakān

original: 7.077.015c tāṃś caturthena bhāgena saṃśrayiṣye surarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tān caturthena bhāgena saṃśrayiṣye sura ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 7.077.016a pratyūcus tāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase
analyzed: pratyūcuḥ tām tatas devāḥ yathā vadasi durvase

original: 7.077.016c tathā bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sādhayasva yathepsitam
analyzed: tathā bhavatu tat sarvam sādhayasva yathā īpsitam

original: 7.077.017a tataḥ prītyānvitā devāḥ sahasrākṣaṃ vavandire
analyzed: tatas prītyā anvitāḥ devāḥ sahasrākṣam vavandire

original: 7.077.017c vijvaraḥ pūtapāpmā ca vāsavaḥ samapadyata
analyzed: vijvaraḥ pūta pāpmā ca vāsavaḥ samapadyata

original: 7.077.018a praśāntaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate
analyzed: praśāntam ca jagat sarvam sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate

original: 7.077.018c yajñaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ tadā śakro 'bhyapūjayat
analyzed: yajñam ca adbhuta saṃkāśam tadā śakraḥ bhyapūjayat

original: 7.077.019a īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvo raghunandana
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ hi aśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ raghunandana

original: 7.077.019c yajasva sumahābhāga hayamedhena pārthiva
analyzed: yajasva su mahābhāga hayamedhena pārthiva

original: 7.078.001a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā lakṣmaṇena uktam vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 7.078.001c pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ prahasan rāghavo vacaḥ
analyzed: pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ prahasan rāghavaḥ vacaḥ

original: 7.078.002a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: evam etat nara śreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.078.002c vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa vājimedhaphalaṃ ca yat
analyzed: vṛtra ghātam aśeṣeṇa vājimedha phalam ca yat

original: 7.078.003a śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ
analyzed: śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ

original: 7.078.003c putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilo nāma sudhārmikaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilaḥ nāma su dhārmikaḥ

original: 7.078.004a sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: sa rājā pṛthivīm sarvām vaśe kṛtvā mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.078.004c rājyaṃ caiva naravyāghra putravat paryapālayat
analyzed: rājyam ca eva nara vyāghra putra vat paryapālayat

original: 7.078.005a suraiś ca paramodārair daiteyaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
analyzed: suraiḥ ca parama udāraiḥ daiteyaiḥ ca mahā asuraiḥ

original: 7.078.005c nāgarākṣasagandharvair yakṣaiś ca sumahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: nāga rākṣasa gandharvaiḥ yakṣaiḥ ca su mahātmabhiḥ

original: 7.078.006a pūjyate nityaśaḥ saumya bhayārtai raghunandana
analyzed: pūjyate nityaśas saumya bhaya ārtaiḥ raghunandana

original: 7.078.006c abibhyaṃś ca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: abibhyan ca trayaḥ lokāḥ sa roṣasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.078.007a sa rājā tādṛśo hy āsīd dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: sa rājā tādṛśaḥ hi āsīt dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ

original: 7.078.007c buddhyā ca paramodāro bāhlīkānāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: buddhyā ca parama udāraḥ vāhlīkānām mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.078.008a sa pracakre mahābāhur mṛgayāṃ rucire vane
analyzed: sa pracakre mahā bāhuḥ mṛgayām rucire vane

original: 7.078.008c caitre manorame māsi sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: caitre manorame māsi sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.078.009a prajaghne sa nṛpo 'raṇye mṛgāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
analyzed: prajaghne sa nṛpaḥ raṇye mṛgām śata sahasraśas

original: 7.078.009c hatvaiva tṛptir nābhūc ca rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: hatvā eva tṛptiḥ nā abhūt ca rājñaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.078.010a nānāmṛgāṇām ayutaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā
analyzed: nānā mṛgāṇām ayutam vadhyamānam mahātmanā

original: 7.078.010c yatra jāto mahāsenas taṃ deśam upacakrame
analyzed: yatra jātaḥ mahāsenaḥ tam deśam upacakrame

original: 7.078.011a tasmiṃs tu devadeveśaḥ śailarājasutāṃ haraḥ
analyzed: tasmin tu devadeveśaḥ śailarāja sutām haraḥ

original: 7.078.011c ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
analyzed: ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ anucaraiḥ saha

original: 7.078.012a kṛtvā strībhūtam ātmānam umeśo gopatidhvajaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā strī bhūtam ātmānam umeśaḥ gopatidhvajaḥ

original: 7.078.012c devyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ sa tasmin parvatanirjhare
analyzed: devyāḥ priya cikīrṣuḥ sa tasmin parvata nirjhare

original: 7.078.013a ye ca tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ
analyzed: ye ca tatra vana uddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣa vādinaḥ

original: 7.078.013c yac ca kiṃ cana tat sarvaṃ nārīsaṃjñaṃ babhūva ha
analyzed: yat ca kim cana tat sarvam nārī saṃjñam babhūva ha

original: 7.078.014a etasminn antare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ
analyzed: etasmin antare rājā saḥ ilaḥ kardama ātmajaḥ

original: 7.078.014c nighnan mṛgasahasrāṇi taṃ deśam upacakrame
analyzed: nighnan mṛga sahasrāṇi tam deśam upacakrame

original: 7.078.015a sa dṛṣṭvā strīkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ savyālamṛgapakṣiṇam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā strī kṛtam sarvam sa vyāla mṛga pakṣiṇam

original: 7.078.015c ātmānaṃ sānugaṃ caiva strībhūtaṃ raghunandana
analyzed: ātmānam sa anugam ca eva strī bhūtam raghunandana

original: 7.078.016a tasya duḥkhaṃ mahat tv āsīd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā gatam
analyzed: tasya duḥkham mahat tu āsīt dṛṣṭvā ātmānam tathā gatam

original: 7.078.016c umāpateś ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat
analyzed: umāpateḥ ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat

original: 7.078.017a tato devaṃ mahātmānaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ kapardinam
analyzed: tatas devam mahātmānam śitikaṇṭham kapardinam

original: 7.078.017c jagāma śaraṇaṃ rājā sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
analyzed: jagāma śaraṇam rājā sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 7.078.018a tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tatas prahasya vara daḥ saha devyā mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.078.018c prajāpatisutaṃ vākyam uvāca varadaḥ svayam
analyzed: prajāpati sutam vākyam uvāca vara daḥ svayam

original: 7.078.019a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājarṣe kārdameya mahābala
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha rāja ṛṣe kārdameya mahā bala

original: 7.078.019c puruṣatvam ṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata
analyzed: puruṣa tvam ṛte saumya varam varaya suvrata

original: 7.078.020a tataḥ sa rājā śokārtāḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā
analyzed: tatas sa rājā śoka ārtāḥ pratyākhyātaḥ mahātmanā

original: 7.078.020c na sa jagrāha strībhūto varam anyaṃ surottamāt
analyzed: na sa jagrāha strī bhūtaḥ varam anyam surottamāt

original: 7.078.021a tataḥ śokena mahatā śailarājasutāṃ nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tatas śokena mahatā śailarājasutām nṛpaḥ

original: 7.078.021c praṇipatya mahādevīṃ sarveṇaivāntarātmanā
analyzed: praṇipatya mahādevīm sarveṇa eva antarātmanā

original: 7.078.022a īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānām asi bhāmini
analyzed: īśe varāṇām vara de lokānām asi bhāmini

original: 7.078.022c amoghadarśane devi bhaje saumye namo 'stu te
analyzed: amogha darśane devi bhaje saumye namaḥ stu te

original: 7.078.023a hṛdgataṃ tasya rājarṣer vijñāya harasaṃnidhau
analyzed: hṛdgatam tasya rājarṣeḥ vijñāya hara saṃnidhau

original: 7.078.023c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā
analyzed: pratyuvāca śubham vākyam devī rudrasya saṃmatā

original: 7.078.024a ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tathā hy aham
analyzed: ardhasya devaḥ vara daḥ vara ardhasya tathā hi aham

original: 7.078.024c tasmād ardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsor yāvad icchasi
analyzed: tasmāt ardham gṛhāṇa tvam strī puṃsoḥ yāvat icchasi

original: 7.078.025a tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā devyā varam anuttamam
