analyzed: tat adbhutatamam śrutvā devyāḥ varam anuttamam

original: 7.078.025c saṃprahṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā rājā vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: saṃprahṛṣṭa manāḥ bhūtvā rājā vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.078.026a yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
analyzed: yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇa apratimā bhuvi

original: 7.078.026c māsaṃ strītvam upāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: māsam strī tvam upāsitvā māsam syām puruṣaḥ punar

original: 7.078.027a īpsitaṃ tasya vijñāya devī surucirānanā
analyzed: īpsitam tasya vijñāya devī su rucira ānanā

original: 7.078.027c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam evam etad bhaviṣyati
analyzed: pratyuvāca śubham vākyam evam etat bhaviṣyati

original: 7.078.028a rājan puruṣabhūtas tvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi
analyzed: rājan puruṣa bhūtaḥ tvam strī bhāvam na smariṣyasi

original: 7.078.028c strībhūtaś cāparaṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam
analyzed: strī bhūtaḥ ca aparam māsam na smariṣyasi pauruṣam

original: 7.078.029a evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māmaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ
analyzed: evam sa rājā puruṣaḥ māmam bhūtvā atha kārdamiḥ

original: 7.078.029c trailokyasundarī nārī māsam ekam ilābhavat
analyzed: trailokya sundarī nārī māsam ekam ilā abhavat

original: 7.079.001a tāṃ kathām ilasaṃbaddhāṃ rāmeṇa samudīritām
analyzed: tām kathām ila saṃbaddhām rāmeṇa samudīritām

original: 7.079.001c lakṣmaṇo bharataś caiva śrutvā paramavismitau
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ bharataḥ ca eva śrutvā parama vismitau

original: 7.079.002a tau rāmaṃ prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tau rāmam prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājñaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.079.002c vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vistaram tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punar

original: 7.079.003a kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayām āsa durgatim
analyzed: katham sa rājā strī bhūtaḥ vartayām āsa durgatim

original: 7.079.003c puruṣo vā yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayaty asau
analyzed: puruṣaḥ vā yadā bhūtaḥ kām vṛttim vartayati asau

original: 7.079.004a tayos tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam
analyzed: tayoḥ tat bhāṣitam śrutvā kautūhala samanvitam

original: 7.079.004c kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhas tasya rājño yathā gatam
analyzed: kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhaḥ tasya rājñaḥ yathā gatam

original: 7.079.005a tam eva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtvā lokasundarī
analyzed: tam eva prathamam māsam strī bhūtvā loka sundarī

original: 7.079.005c tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhir ye 'sya pūrvaṃ padānugāḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhiḥ ye sya pūrvam padānugāḥ

original: 7.079.006a tat kānanaṃ vigāhyāśu vijahre lokasundarī
analyzed: tat kānanam vigāhya āśu vijahre loka sundarī

original: 7.079.006c drumagulmalatākīrṇaṃ padbhyāṃ padmadalekṣaṇā
analyzed: druma gulma latā ākīrṇam padbhyām padma dala īkṣaṇā

original: 7.079.007a vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ
analyzed: vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ

original: 7.079.007c parvatābhogavivare tasmin reme ilā tadā
analyzed: parvata ābhoga vivare tasmin reme ilā tadā

original: 7.079.008a atha tasmin vanoddeśe parvatasyāvidūrataḥ
analyzed: atha tasmin vana uddeśe parvatasya avidūrataḥ

original: 7.079.008c saraḥ suruciraprakhyaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇāyutam
analyzed: saraḥ su rucira prakhyam nānā pakṣi gaṇa āyutam

original: 7.079.009a dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā
analyzed: dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budham soma sutam tadā

original: 7.079.009c jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇaṃ somam ivoditam
analyzed: jvalantam svena vapuṣā pūrṇam somam iva uditam

original: 7.079.010a tapantaṃ ca tapas tīvram ambhomadhye durāsadam
analyzed: tapantam ca tapaḥ tīvram ambhaḥ madhye durāsadam

original: 7.079.010c yaśak saraṃ kāmagamaṃ tāruṇye paryavasthitam
analyzed: yaśak saram kāma gamam tāruṇye paryavasthitam

original: 7.079.011a sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayām āsa vismitā
analyzed: sā tam jalāśayam sarvam kṣobhayām āsa vismitā

original: 7.079.011c saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana
analyzed: saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strī bhūtaiḥ raghunandana

original: 7.079.012a budhas tu tāṃ nirīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇābhipīḍitaḥ
analyzed: budhaḥ tu tām nirīkṣya eva kāma bāṇa abhipīḍitaḥ

original: 7.079.012c nopalebhe tadātmānaṃ cacāla ca tadāmbhasi
analyzed: na upalebhe tadā ātmānam cacāla ca tadā ambhasi

original: 7.079.013a ilāṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sa trailokyābhyadhikāṃ śubhām
analyzed: ilām nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sa trailokya abhyadhikām śubhām

original: 7.079.013c cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nv iyaṃ devatādhikā
analyzed: cintām samabhyatikrāmat kā nu iyam devatā adhikā

original: 7.079.014a na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣv apsaraḥsu ca
analyzed: na devīṣu na nāgīṣu na asurīṣu apsaraḥsu ca

original: 7.079.014c dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kā cid rūpeṇaitena śobhitā
analyzed: dṛṣṭa pūrvā mayā kā cit rūpeṇa etena śobhitā

original: 7.079.015a sadṛśīyaṃ mama bhaved yadi nānyaparigrahā
analyzed: sadṛśī iyam mama bhavet yadi na anya parigrahā

original: 7.079.015c iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat
analyzed: iti buddhim samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat

original: 7.079.016a sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadās tataḥ
analyzed: saḥ āśramam samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadāḥ tatas

original: 7.079.016c śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāś cainaṃ ca vavandire
analyzed: śabdāpayata dharma ātmā tāḥ ca enam ca vavandire

original: 7.079.017a sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātma kasyaiṣā lokasundarī
analyzed: sa tāḥ papraccha dharma ātma kasya eṣā loka sundarī

original: 7.079.017c kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram
analyzed: kimartham āgatā ca iha satyam ākhyāta māciram

original: 7.079.018a śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram
analyzed: śubham tu tasya tat vākyam madhuram madhura akṣaram

original: 7.079.018c śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā
analyzed: śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ ūcuḥ madhurayā girā

original: 7.079.019a asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā
analyzed: asmākam eṣā su śroṇī prabhu tve vartate sadā

original: 7.079.019c apatiḥ kānanānteṣu sahāsmābhir aṭaty asau
analyzed: apatiḥ kānana anteṣu saha asmābhiḥ aṭati asau

original: 7.079.020a tad vākyam avyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya tu
analyzed: tat vākyam avyakta padam tāsām strīṇām niśamya tu

original: 7.079.020c vidyām āvartanīṃ puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ
analyzed: vidyām āvartanīm puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ

original: 7.079.021a so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam
analyzed: saḥ ṛtham viditvā nikhilam tasya rājñaḥ yathāgatam

original: 7.079.021c sarvā eva striyas tāś ca babhāṣe munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva striyaḥ tāḥ ca babhāṣe muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.079.022a atra kiṃ puruṣā bhadrā avasañ śailarodhasi
analyzed: atra kim puruṣāḥ bhadrāḥ avasam śaila rodhasi

original: 7.079.022c vatsyathāsmin girau yūyam avakāśo vidhīyatām
analyzed: vatsyatha asmin girau yūyam avakāśaḥ vidhīyatām

original: 7.079.023a mūlaputraphalaiḥ sarvā vartayiṣyatha nityadā
analyzed: mūlaputra phalaiḥ sarvāḥ vartayiṣyatha nityadā

original: 7.079.023c striyaḥ kimpuruṣān nāma bhartṝn samupalapsyatha
analyzed: striyaḥ kimpuruṣān nāma bhartṝn samupalapsyatha

original: 7.079.024a tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācaṃ kiṃpuruṣīkṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācam kiṃpuruṣīkṛtāḥ

original: 7.079.024c upāsāṃ cakrire śailaṃ bahvyas tā bahudhā tadā
analyzed: upāsām cakrire śailam bahvyaḥ tāḥ bahudhā tadā

original: 7.080.001a śrutvā kimpuruṣotpattiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatas tadā
analyzed: śrutvā kimpuruṣa utpattim lakṣmaṇaḥ bharataḥ tadā

original: 7.080.001c āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram
analyzed: āścaryam iti ca abrūtām ubhau rāmam janeśvaram

original: 7.080.002a atha rāmaḥ kathām etāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: atha rāmaḥ kathām etām bhūyas eva mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.080.002c kathayām āsa dharmātmā prajāpatisutasya vai
analyzed: kathayām āsa dharma ātmā prajāpati sutasya vai

original: 7.080.003a sarvās tā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīr ṛṣisattamaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ vidrutāḥ dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīḥ ṛṣi sattamaḥ

original: 7.080.003c uvāca rūpasaṃpannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasann iva
analyzed: uvāca rūpa saṃpannām tām striyam prahasan iva

original: 7.080.004a somasyāhaṃ sudayitaḥ sutaḥ surucirānane
analyzed: somasya aham su dayitaḥ sutaḥ su rucira ānane

original: 7.080.004c bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: bhajasva mām varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā

original: 7.080.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śūnye svajanavarjitā
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā śūnye sva jana varjitā

original: 7.080.005c ilā suruciraprakhyaṃ pratyuvāca mahāgraham
analyzed: ilā su rucira prakhyam pratyuvāca mahāgraham

original: 7.080.006a ahaṃ kāmakarī saumya tavāsmi vaśavartinī
analyzed: aham kāma karī saumya tava asmi vaśa vartinī

original: 7.080.006c praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru
analyzed: praśādhi mām somasuta yathā icchasi tathā kuru

original: 7.080.007a tasyās tad adbhutaprakhyaṃ śrutvā harṣasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat adbhuta prakhyam śrutvā harṣa samanvitaḥ

original: 7.080.007c sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ

original: 7.080.008a budhasya mādhavo māsas tām ilāṃ rucirānanām
analyzed: budhasya mādhavaḥ māsaḥ tām ilām rucira ānanām

original: 7.080.008c gato ramayato 'tyarthaṃ kṣaṇavat tasya kāminaḥ
analyzed: gataḥ tyartham kṣaṇa vat tasya kāminaḥ

original: 7.080.009a atha māse tu saṃpūrṇe pūrṇendusadṛśānanaḥ
analyzed: atha māse tu saṃpūrṇe pūrṇa indu sadṛśa ānanaḥ

original: 7.080.009c prajāpatisutaḥ śrīmāñ śayane pratyabudhyata
analyzed: prajāpati sutaḥ śrīmām śayane pratyabudhyata

original: 7.080.010a so 'paśyat somajaṃ tatra tapyantaṃ salilāśaye
analyzed: saḥ paśyat somajam tatra tapyantam salilāśaye

original: 7.080.010c ūrdhvabāhuṃ nirālambaṃ taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: ūrdhva bāhum nirālambam tam rājā pratyabhāṣata

original: 7.080.011a bhagavan parvataṃ durgaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi sahānugaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan parvatam durgam praviṣṭaḥ smi saha anugaḥ

original: 7.080.011c na ca paśyāmi tat sainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ
analyzed: na ca paśyāmi tat sainyam kva nu te māmakāḥ gatāḥ

original: 7.080.012a tac chrutvā tasya rājarṣer naṣṭasaṃjñasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: tat śrutvā tasya rājarṣeḥ naṣṭa saṃjñasya bhāṣitam

original: 7.080.012c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayan parayā girā
analyzed: pratyuvāca śubham vākyam sāntvayan parayā girā

original: 7.080.013a aśmavarṣeṇa mahatā bhṛtyās te vinipātitāḥ
analyzed: aśma varṣeṇa mahatā bhṛtyāḥ te vinipātitāḥ

original: 7.080.013c tvaṃ cāśramapade supto vātavarṣabhayārditaḥ
analyzed: tvam ca āśrama pade suptaḥ vāta varṣa bhaya arditaḥ

original: 7.080.014a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: samāśvasihi bhadram te nirbhayaḥ vigata jvaraḥ

original: 7.080.014c phalamūlāśano vīra vasa ceha yathāsukham
analyzed: phala mūla aśanaḥ vīra vasa ca iha yathāsukham

original: 7.080.015a sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvastaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.080.015c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ dīno bhṛtyajanakṣayāt
analyzed: pratyuvāca śubham vākyam dīnaḥ bhṛtya jana kṣayāt

original: 7.080.016a tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyair vinā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: tyakṣyāmi aham svakam rājyam na aham bhṛtyaiḥ vinā kṛtaḥ

original: 7.080.016c vartayeyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ brahman samanujñātum arhasi
analyzed: vartayeyam kṣaṇam brahman samanujñātum arhasi

original: 7.080.017a suto dharmaparo brahmañ jyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: sutaḥ dharma paraḥ brahmam jyeṣṭhaḥ mama mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.080.017c śaśabindur iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate
analyzed: śaśabinduḥ iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyam prapatsyate

original: 7.080.018a na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ gatvā bhṛtyadārān sukhānvitān
analyzed: na hi śakṣyāmi aham gatvā bhṛtya dārān sukha anvitān

original: 7.080.018c prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiṃ cid apy aśubhaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: prativaktum mahā tejaḥ kim cit api aśubham vacaḥ

original: 7.080.019a tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam
analyzed: tathā bruvati rāja indre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam

original: 7.080.019c sāntvapūrvam athovāca vāsas ta iha rocatām
analyzed: sāntva pūrvam atha uvāca vāsaḥ te iha rocatām

original: 7.080.020a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala
analyzed: na saṃtāpaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahā bala

original: 7.080.020c saṃvatsaroṣitasyeha kārayiṣyāmi te hitam
analyzed: saṃvatsara uṣitasya iha kārayiṣyāmi te hitam

original: 7.080.021a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā budhasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā budhasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 7.080.021c vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
analyzed: vāsāya vidadhe buddhim yat uktam brahma vādinā

original: 7.080.022a māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayaty aniśaṃ śubhā
analyzed: māsam sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayati aniśam śubhā

original: 7.080.022c māsaṃ puruṣabhāvena dharmabuddhiṃ cakāra saḥ
analyzed: māsam puruṣa bhāvena dharma buddhim cakāra saḥ

original: 7.080.023a tataḥ sa navame māsi ilā somasutātmajam
analyzed: tatas sa navame māsi ilā somasuta ātmajam

original: 7.080.023c janayām āsa suśroṇī purūravasam ātmajam
analyzed: janayām āsa su śroṇī purūravasam ātmajam

original: 7.080.024a jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī pitur haste nyaveśayat
analyzed: jāta mātram tu suśroṇī pituḥ haste nyaveśayat

original: 7.080.024c budhasya samavarṇābham ilāputraṃ mahābalam
analyzed: budhasya sama varṇa ābham ilā putram mahā balam

original: 7.080.025a budho 'pi puruṣībhūtaṃ samāśvāsya narādhipam
analyzed: budhaḥ pi puruṣībhūtam samāśvāsya narādhipam

original: 7.080.025c kathābhī ramayām āsa dharmayuktābhir ātmavān
analyzed: kathābhiḥ ramayām āsa dharma yuktābhiḥ ātmavān

original: 7.081.001a tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tad adbhutam
analyzed: tathā uktavati rāme tu tasya janma tat adbhutam

original: 7.081.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: uvāca lakṣmaṇaḥ bhūyas bharataḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.081.002a sā priyā somaputrasya saṃvatsaram athoṣitā
analyzed: sā priyā somaputrasya saṃvatsaram atha uṣitā

original: 7.081.002c akarot kiṃ naraśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
analyzed: akarot kim nara śreṣṭha tat tvam śaṃsitum arhasi

original: 7.081.003a tayos tad vākyamādhuryaṃ niśamya paripṛcchatoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat vākya mādhuryam niśamya paripṛcchatoḥ

original: 7.081.003c rāmaḥ punar uvācemāṃ prajāpatisute kathām
analyzed: rāmaḥ punar uvāca imām prajāpati sute kathām

original: 7.081.004a puruṣatvaṃ gate śūre budhaḥ paramabuddhimān
analyzed: puruṣa tvam gate śūre budhaḥ parama buddhimān

original: 7.081.004c saṃvartaṃ paramodāram ājuhāva mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: saṃvartam parama udāram ājuhāva mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.081.005a cyavanaṃ bhṛguputraṃ ca muniṃ cāriṣṭaneminam
analyzed: cyavanam bhṛguputram ca munim ca ariṣṭaneminam

original: 7.081.005c pramodanaṃ modakaraṃ tato durvāsasaṃ munim
analyzed: pramodanam moda karam tatas durvāsasam munim

original: 7.081.006a etān sarvān samānīya vākyajñas tattvadarśinaḥ
analyzed: etān sarvān samānīya vākya jñaḥ tattva darśinaḥ

original: 7.081.006c uvāca sarvān suhṛdo dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ dhairyeṇa su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.081.007a ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: ayam rājā mahā bāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ

original: 7.081.007c jānītainaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ śreyo hy asya vidhīyatām
analyzed: jānīta enam yathā bhūtam śreyaḥ hi asya vidhīyatām

original: 7.081.008a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat
analyzed: teṣām saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat

original: 7.081.008c kardamaḥ sumahātejā dvijaiḥ saha mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: kardamaḥ su mahā tejāḥ dvijaiḥ saha mahātmabhiḥ

original: 7.081.009a pulastyaś ca kratuś caiva vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca
analyzed: pulastyaḥ ca kratuḥ ca eva vaṣaṭkāraḥ tathā eva ca

original: 7.081.009c oṃkāraś ca mahātejās tam āśramam upāgaman
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ ca mahā tejāḥ tam āśramam upāgaman

original: 7.081.010a te sarve hṛṣṭamanasaḥ parasparasamāgame
analyzed: te sarve hṛṣṭa manasaḥ paraspara samāgame

original: 7.081.010c hitaiṣiṇo bāhli pateḥ pṛthag vākyam athābruvan
analyzed: hita eṣiṇaḥ bāhli pateḥ pṛthak vākyam atha abruvan

original: 7.081.011a kardamas tv abravīd vākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam
analyzed: kardamaḥ tu abravīt vākyam suta artham paramam hitam

original: 7.081.011c dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yac chreyaḥ pārthivasya hi
analyzed: dvijāḥ śṛṇuta mad vākyam yat śreyaḥ pārthivasya hi

original: 7.081.012a nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhaiṣajyam antareṇa vṛṣadhvajam
analyzed: na anyam paśyāmi bhaiṣajyam antareṇa vṛṣadhvajam

original: 7.081.012c nāśvamedhāt paro yajñaḥ priyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: na aśvamedhāt paraḥ yajñaḥ priyaḥ ca eva mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.081.013a tasmād yajāmahe sarve pārthivārthe durāsadam
analyzed: tasmāt yajāmahe sarve pārthiva arthe durāsadam

original: 7.081.013c kardamenaivam uktās tu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: kardamena evam uktāḥ tu sarve eva dvijarṣabhāḥ

original: 7.081.013e rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati
analyzed: rocayanti sma tam yajñam rudrasya ārādhanam prati

original: 7.081.014a saṃvartasya tu rājarṣiḥ śiṣyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: saṃvartasya tu rājarṣiḥ śiṣyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: 7.081.014c marutta iti vikhyatas taṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat
analyzed: maruttaḥ iti vikhyataḥ tam yajñam samupāharat

original: 7.081.015a tato yajño mahān āsīd budhāśramasamīpataḥ
analyzed: tatas yajñaḥ mahān āsīt budha āśrama samīpataḥ

original: 7.081.015c rudraś ca paramaṃ toṣam ājagāma mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: rudraḥ ca paramam toṣam ājagāma mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.081.016a atha yajñasamāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā
analyzed: atha yajña samāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā

original: 7.081.016c umāpatir dvijān sarvān uvācedam ilāṃ prati
analyzed: umāpatiḥ dvijān sarvān uvāca idam ilām prati

original: 7.081.017a prīto 'smi hayamedhena bhaktyā ca dvijasattamāḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ smi hayamedhena bhaktyā ca dvijasattamāḥ

original: 7.081.017c asya bāhlipateś caiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham
analyzed: asya bāhli pateḥ ca eva kim karomi priyam śubham

original: 7.081.018a tathā vadati deveśe dvijās te susamāhitāḥ
analyzed: tathā vadati deveśe dvijāḥ te su samāhitāḥ

original: 7.081.018c prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syāt puruṣas tv ilā
analyzed: prasādayanti deveśam yathā syāt puruṣaḥ tu ilā

original: 7.081.019a tataḥ prītamanā rudraḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ
analyzed: tatas prīta manāḥ rudraḥ puruṣa tvam dadau punar

original: 7.081.019c ilāyai sumahātejā dattvā cāntaradhīyata
analyzed: ilāyai su mahā tejāḥ dattvā ca antaradhīyata

original: 7.081.020a nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate cādarśanaṃ hare
analyzed: nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate ca adarśanam hare

original: 7.081.020c yathāgataṃ dvijāḥ sarve agacchan dīrghadarśinaḥ
analyzed: yathāgatam dvijāḥ sarve agacchan dīrgha darśinaḥ

original: 7.081.021a rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hy anuttamam
analyzed: rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hi anuttamam

original: 7.081.021c niveśayām āsa puraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ yaśaskaram
analyzed: niveśayām āsa puram pratiṣṭhānam yaśaskaram

original: 7.081.022a śaśabindus tu rājāsīd bāhlyāṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: śaśabinduḥ tu rājā āsīt bāhlyām parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: 7.081.022c pratiṣṭhāna ilo rājā prajāpatisuto balī
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāne ilaḥ rājā prajāpati sutaḥ balī

original: 7.081.023a sa kāle prāptavāṃl lokam ilo brāhmam anuttamam
analyzed: sa kāle prāptavān lokam ilaḥ brāhmam anuttamam

original: 7.081.023c ailaḥ purūravā rājā pratiṣṭhānam avāptavān
analyzed: ailaḥ purūravāḥ rājā pratiṣṭhānam avāptavān

original: 7.081.024a īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhau
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ hi aśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhau

original: 7.081.024c strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yac cānyad api durlabham
analyzed: strī bhūtaḥ pauruṣam lebhe yat ca anyat api durlabham

original: 7.082.001a etad ākhyāya kākutstho bhrātṛhyām amitaprabhaḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyāya kākutsthaḥ bhrātṛhyām amita prabhaḥ

original: 7.082.001c lakṣmaṇaṃ punār evāha dharmayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam eva āha dharma yuktam idam vacaḥ

original: 7.082.002a vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kaśyapam
analyzed: vasiṣṭham vāmadevam ca jābālim atha kaśyapam

original: 7.082.002c dvijāṃś ca sarvapravarān aśvamedhapuraskṛtān
analyzed: dvijān ca sarva pravarān aśvamedha puraskṛtān

original: 7.082.003a etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.082.003c hayaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃpannaṃ vimokṣyāmi samādhinā
analyzed: hayam lakṣmaṇa saṃpannam vimokṣyāmi samādhinā

original: 7.082.004a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā tvaritavikramaḥ
analyzed: tat vākyam rāghaveṇa uktam śrutvā tvarita vikramaḥ

original: 7.082.004c dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam
analyzed: dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam

original: 7.082.005a te dṛṣṭvā devasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtapādābhivandanam
analyzed: te dṛṣṭvā deva saṃkāśam kṛta pāda abhivandanam

original: 7.082.005c rāghavaṃ sudurādharṣam āśīrbhiḥ samapūjayan
analyzed: rāghavam su durādharṣam āśīrbhiḥ samapūjayan

original: 7.082.006a prāñjalis tu tato bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasāttamān
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ tu tatas bhūtvā rāghavaḥ dvijasāttamān

original: 7.082.006c uvāca dharmasaṃyuktam aśvamedhāśritaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca dharma saṃyuktam aśvamedha āśritam vacaḥ

original: 7.082.007a sa teṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ vākyam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: sa teṣām dvijamukhyānām vākyam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.082.007c aśvamedhāśritaṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ prīto 'bhavat tadā
analyzed: aśvamedha āśritam śrutvā bhṛśam prītaḥ bhavat tadā

original: 7.082.008a vijñāya tu mataṃ teṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: vijñāya tu matam teṣām rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 7.082.008c preṣayasva mahābāho sugrīvāya mahātmane
analyzed: preṣayasva mahā bāho sugrīvāya mahātmane

original: 7.082.009a śīghraṃ mahadbhir haribhir bahibhiś ca tadāśrayaiḥ
analyzed: śīghram mahadbhiḥ haribhiḥ bahibhiḥ ca tad āśrayaiḥ

original: 7.082.009c sārdham āgaccha bhadraṃ te anubhoktuṃ makhottamam
analyzed: sārdham āgaccha bhadram te anubhoktum makha uttamam

original: 7.082.010a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 7.082.010c aśvamedhaṃ mahābāhuḥ prāpnotu laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: aśvamedham mahā bāhuḥ prāpnotu laghu vikramaḥ

original: 7.082.011a rājānaś ca naravyāghra ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca nara vyāghra ye me priya cikīrṣavaḥ

original: 7.082.011c sānugāḥ kṣipram āyāntu yajñabhūmim anuttamām
analyzed: sa anugāḥ kṣipram āyāntu yajña bhūmim anuttamām

original: 7.082.012a deśāntaragatā ye ca dvijā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: deśa antara gatāḥ ye ca dvijāḥ dharma parāyaṇāḥ

original: 7.082.012c nimantrayasva tān sarvān aśvamedhāya lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: nimantrayasva tān sarvān aśvamedhāya lakṣmaṇa

original: 7.082.013a ṛṣayaś cā mahābāho āhūyantāṃ tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca mahā bāho āhūyantām tapodhanāḥ

original: 7.082.013c deśāntaragatā ye ca sadārāś ca maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: deśa antara gatāḥ ye ca sa dārāḥ ca mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.082.014a yajñavāṭaś ca sumahān gomatyā naimiṣe vane
analyzed: yajña vāṭaḥ ca su mahān gomatyāḥ naimiṣe vane

original: 7.082.014c ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho tad dhi puṇyam anuttamam
analyzed: ājñāpyatām mahā bāho tat hi puṇyam anuttamam

original: 7.082.015a śataṃ vāhasahasrāṇāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ vapuṣmatām
analyzed: śatam vāha sahasrāṇām taṇḍulānām vapuṣmatām

original: 7.082.015c ayutaṃ tilamudgasya prayātv agre mahābala
analyzed: ayutam tila mudgasya prayātu agre mahā bala

original: 7.082.016a suvarṇakoṭyo bahulā hiraṇyasya śatottarāḥ
analyzed: suvarṇa koṭyaḥ bahulāḥ hiraṇyasya śata uttarāḥ

original: 7.082.016c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: agratas bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatu agre mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.082.017a antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca sarvāṃś ca naṭanartakān
analyzed: antarāpaṇa vīthyaḥ ca sarvān ca naṭa nartakān

original: 7.082.017c naigamān bālavṛddhāṃś ca dvijāṃś ca susamāhitān
analyzed: naigamān bāla vṛddhān ca dvijān ca su samāhitān

original: 7.082.018a karmāntikāṃś ca kuśalāñ śilpinaś ca supaṇḍitān
analyzed: karmāntikān ca kuśalām śilpinaḥ ca su paṇḍitān

original: 7.082.018c mātaraś caiva me sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca
analyzed: mātaraḥ ca eva me sarvāḥ kumāra antaḥpurāṇi ca

original: 7.082.019a kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣārhāṃ yajñakarmaṇi
analyzed: kāñcanīm mama patnīm ca dīkṣā arhām yajña karmaṇi

original: 7.082.019c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: agratas bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatu agre mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.083.001a tat sarvam akhilenāśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ
analyzed: tat sarvam akhilena āśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ

original: 7.083.001c hayaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃpannaṃ kṛṣṇasāraṃ mumoca ha
analyzed: hayam lakṣmaṇa saṃpannam kṛṣṇa sāram mumoca ha

original: 7.083.002a ṛtvigbhir lakṣmaṇaṃ sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ lakṣmaṇam sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ

original: 7.083.002c tato 'bhyagacchat kākutsthaḥ saha sainyena naimiṣam
analyzed: tatas bhyagacchat kākutsthaḥ saha sainyena naimiṣam

original: 7.083.003a yajñavāṭaṃ mahābāhur dṛṣṭvā paramam adbhutam
analyzed: yajña vāṭam mahā bāhuḥ dṛṣṭvā paramam adbhutam

original: 7.083.003c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe śrīmān iti ca so 'bravīt
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe śrīmān iti ca saḥ bravīt

original: 7.083.004a naimiṣe vasatas tasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ
analyzed: naimiṣe vasataḥ tasya sarve eva narādhipāḥ

original: 7.083.004c ājagmuḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyas tān rāmaḥ pratyapūjayat
analyzed: ājagmuḥ sarva rāṣṭrebhyaḥ tān rāmaḥ pratyapūjayat

original: 7.083.005a upakāryān mahārhāṃś ca pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: upakāryān mahārhān ca pārthivānām mahātmanām

original: 7.083.005c sānugānāṃ naraśreṣṭho vyādideśa mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: sa anugānām nara śreṣṭhaḥ vyādideśa mahā dyutiḥ

original: 7.083.006a annapānāni vastrāṇi sānugānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: anna pānāni vastrāṇi sa anugānām mahātmanām

original: 7.083.006c bharataḥ saṃdadāv āśu śatrughnasahitas tadā
analyzed: bharataḥ saṃdadau āśu śatrughna sahitaḥ tadā

original: 7.083.007a vānarāś ca mahātmānaḥ sugrīvasahitās tadā
analyzed: vānarāḥ ca mahātmānaḥ sugrīva sahitāḥ tadā

original: 7.083.007c viprāṇāṃ praṇatāḥ sarve cakrire pariveṣaṇam
analyzed: viprāṇām praṇatāḥ sarve cakrire pariveṣaṇam

original: 7.083.008a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 7.083.008c ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ kiṃkaraḥ paryupasthitaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ugra tapasām kiṃkaraḥ paryupasthitaḥ

original: 7.083.009a evaṃ suvihito yajño hayamedho 'bhyavartata
analyzed: evam su vihitaḥ yajñaḥ hayamedhaḥ bhyavartata

original: 7.083.009c lakṣmaṇenābhiguptā ca hayacaryā pravartitā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena abhiguptā ca haya caryā pravartitā

original: 7.083.010a nānyaḥ śabdo 'bhavat tatra hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: na anyaḥ śabdaḥ bhavat tatra hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.083.010c chandato dehi visrabdho yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ
analyzed: chandataḥ dehi visrabdhaḥ yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ

original: 7.083.010e tāvad vānararakṣobhir dattam evābhyadṛśyata
analyzed: tāvat vānara rakṣobhiḥ dattam eva abhyadṛśyata

original: 7.083.011a na kaś cin malinas tatra dīno vāpy atha vā kṛśaḥ
analyzed: na kaḥ cit malinaḥ tatra dīnaḥ vā api atha vā kṛśaḥ

original: 7.083.011c tasmin yajñavare rājño hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛte
analyzed: tasmin yajña vare rājñaḥ hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛte

original: 7.083.012a ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaś cirajīvinaḥ
analyzed: ye ca tatra mahātmānaḥ munayaḥ cira jīvinaḥ

original: 7.083.012c nāsmaraṃs tādṛśaṃ yajñaṃ dānaughasamalaṃkṛtam
analyzed: na asmaran tādṛśam yajñam dāna ogha samalaṃkṛtam

original: 7.083.013a rajatānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ ratnānām atha vāsasām
analyzed: rajatānām suvarṇānām ratnānām atha vāsasām

original: 7.083.013c aniśaṃ dīyamānānāṃ nāntaḥ samupadṛśyate
analyzed: aniśam dīyamānānām na antaḥ samupadṛśyate

original: 7.083.014a na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
analyzed: na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā

original: 7.083.014c īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evam ūcus tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ naḥ evam ūcuḥ tapodhanāḥ

original: 7.083.015a sarvatra vānarās tasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: sarvatra vānarāḥ tasthuḥ sarvatra eva ca rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.083.015c vāso dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadur bhṛśam
analyzed: vāsaḥ dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇa hastāḥ daduḥ bhṛśam

original: 7.083.016a īdṛśo rājasiṃhasya yajñaḥ sarvaguṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ rāja siṃhasya yajñaḥ sarva guṇa anvitaḥ

original: 7.083.016c saṃvatsaram atho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate
analyzed: saṃvatsaram atho sāgram vartate na ca hīyate

original: 7.084.001a vartamāne tathābhūte yajñe paramake 'dbhute
analyzed: vartamāne tathābhūte yajñe paramake dbhute

original: 7.084.001c saśiṣya ājagāmāśu vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: sa śiṣyaḥ ājagāma āśu vālmīkiḥ muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.084.002a sa dṛṣṭvā divyasaṃkāśaṃ yajñam adbhutadarśanam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā divya saṃkāśam yajñam adbhuta darśanam

original: 7.084.002c ekānte ṛṣivāṭānāṃ cakāra uṭajāñ śubhān
analyzed: ekānte ṛṣi vāṭānām cakāra uṭajām śubhān

original: 7.084.003a sa śiṣyāv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau
analyzed: sa śiṣyau abravīt dhṛṣṭaḥ yuvām gatvā samāhitau

original: 7.084.003c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyatāṃ parayā mudā
analyzed: kṛtsnam rāmāyaṇam kāvyam gāyatām parayā mudā

original: 7.084.004a ṛṣivāṭeṣu puṇyeṣu brāhmaṇāvasatheṣu ca
analyzed: ṛṣi vāṭeṣu puṇyeṣu brāhmaṇa āvasatheṣu ca

original: 7.084.004c rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu pārthivānāṃ gṛheṣu ca
analyzed: rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu pārthivānām gṛheṣu ca

original: 7.084.005a rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca vartate
analyzed: rāmasya bhavana dvāri yatra karma ca vartate

original: 7.084.005c ṛtvijām agrataś caiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: ṛtvijām agratas ca eva tatra geyam viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.084.006a imāni ca phalāny atra svādūni vividhāni ca
analyzed: imāni ca phalāni atra svādūni vividhāni ca

original: 7.084.006c jātāni parvatāgreṣu āsvādyāsvādya gīyatām
analyzed: jātāni parvata agreṣu āsvādya āsvādya gīyatām

original: 7.084.007a na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai
analyzed: na yāsyathaḥ śramam vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai

original: 7.084.007c mūlāni ca sumṛṣṭāni nagarāt parihāsyatha
analyzed: mūlāni ca su mṛṣṭāni nagarāt parihāsyatha

original: 7.084.008a yadi śabdāpayed rāmaḥ śravaṇāya mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: yadi śabdāpayet rāmaḥ śravaṇāya mahīpatiḥ

original: 7.084.008c ṛṣīṇām upaviṣṭānāṃ tato geyaṃ pravartatām
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām upaviṣṭānām tatas geyam pravartatām

original: 7.084.009a divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā vai parayā mudā
analyzed: divase viṃśatiḥ sargāḥ geyāḥ vai parayā mudā

original: 7.084.009c pramāṇair bahubhis tatra yathoddiṣṭaṃ mayā purā
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ tatra yathā uddiṣṭam mayā purā

original: 7.084.010a lobhaś cāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā
analyzed: lobhaḥ ca api na kartavyaḥ dhana kāṅkṣayā

original: 7.084.010c kiṃ dhanenāśramasthānāṃ phalamūlopabhoginām
analyzed: kim dhanena āśrama sthānām phala mūla upabhoginām

original: 7.084.011a yadi pṛcchet sa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau
analyzed: yadi pṛcchet sa kākutsthaḥ yuvām kasya iti dārakau

original: 7.084.011c vālmīker atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evaṃ narādhipam
analyzed: vālmīkeḥ atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evam narādhipam

original: 7.084.012a imās tantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā pūrvadarśitam
analyzed: imāḥ tantrīḥ su madhurāḥ sthānam vā pūrva darśitam

original: 7.084.012c mūrchayitvā sumadhuraṃ gāyetāṃ vigatajvarau
analyzed: mūrchayitvā su madhuram gāyetām vigata jvarau

original: 7.084.013a ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syān na cāvajñāya pārthivam
analyzed: ādi prabhṛti geyam syāt na ca avajñāya pārthivam

original: 7.084.013c pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhavati dharmataḥ
analyzed: pitā hi sarva bhūtānām rājā bhavati dharmataḥ

original: 7.084.014a tad yuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samādhinā
analyzed: tat yuvām hṛṣṭa manasau śvas prabhāte samādhinā

original: 7.084.014c gāyetāṃ madhuraṃ geyaṃ tantrīlayasamanvitam
analyzed: gāyetām madhuram geyam tantrī laya samanvitam

original: 7.084.015a iti saṃdiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasas tadā
analyzed: iti saṃdiśya bahuśas muniḥ prācetasaḥ tadā

original: 7.084.015c vālmīkiḥ paramodāras tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: vālmīkiḥ parama udāraḥ tūṣṇīm āsīt mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.084.016a tām adbhutāṃ tau hṛdaye kumārau;
analyzed: tām adbhutām tau hṛdaye kumārau

original: niveśya vāṇīm ṛṣibhāṣitāṃ śubhām
analyzed: niveśya vāṇīm ṛṣi bhāṣitām śubhām

original: 7.084.016c samutsukau tau sukham ūṣatur niśāṃ;
analyzed: samutsukau tau sukham ūṣatuḥ niśām

original: yathāśvinau bhārgavanītisaṃskṛtau
analyzed: yathā aśvinau bhārgava nīti saṃskṛtau

original: 7.085.001a tau rajanyāṃ prabhātāyāṃ snātau hutahutāśanau
analyzed: tau rajanyām prabhātāyām snātau huta hutāśanau

original: 7.085.001c yathoktam ṛṣiṇā pūrvaṃ tatra tatrābhyagāyatām
analyzed: yathoktam ṛṣiṇā pūrvam tatra tatra abhyagāyatām

original: 7.085.002a tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvacaryāṃ tatas tataḥ
analyzed: tām sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrva caryām tatas tatas

original: 7.085.002c apūrvāṃ pāṭhya jātiṃ ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām
analyzed: apūrvām pāṭhya jātim ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām

original: 7.085.003a pramāṇair bahubhir baddhāṃ tantrīlayasamanvitām
analyzed: pramāṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ baddhām tantrī laya samanvitām

original: 7.085.003c bālābhyāṃ rāghavaḥ śrutvā kautūhalaparo 'bhavat
analyzed: bālābhyām rāghavaḥ śrutvā kautūhala paraḥ bhavat

original: 7.085.004a atha karmāntare rājā samānīya mahāmunīn
analyzed: atha karma antare rājā samānīya mahā munīn

original: 7.085.004c pārthivāṃś ca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamāṃs tathā
analyzed: pārthivān ca nara vyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamān tathā

original: 7.085.005a paurāṇikāñ śabdavito ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: paurāṇikām ye ca vṛddhāḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: 7.085.005c etān sarvān samānīya gātārau samaveśayat
analyzed: etān sarvān samānīya gātārau samaveśayat

original: 7.085.006a hṛṣṭā ṛṣigaṇās tatra pārthivāś ca mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ ṛṣi gaṇāḥ tatra pārthivāḥ ca mahā ojasaḥ

original: 7.085.006c pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau
analyzed: pibante iva cakṣurbhyām rājānam gāyakau ca tau

original: 7.085.007a parasparam athocus te sarva eva samaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: parasparam athā ūcuḥ te sarve eva samam tatas

original: 7.085.007c ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtau
analyzed: ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbāt bimbam iva uddhṛtau

original: 7.085.008a jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi
analyzed: jaṭilau yadi na syātām na valkala dharau yadi

original: 7.085.008c viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchāmo gāyato rāghavasya ca
analyzed: viśeṣam na adhigacchāmaḥ gāyataḥ rāghavasya ca

original: 7.085.009a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām evaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanam
analyzed: teṣām saṃvadatām evam śrotṝṇām harṣa vardhanam

original: 7.085.009c geyaṃ pracakratus tatra tāv ubhau munidārakau
analyzed: geyam pracakratuḥ tatra tau ubhau muni dārakau

original: 7.085.010a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ madhuraṃ gāndharvam atimānuṣam
analyzed: tatas pravṛttam madhuram gāndharvam ati mānuṣam

original: 7.085.010c na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro geya saṃpadā
analyzed: na ca tṛptim yayuḥ sarve śrotāraḥ geya saṃpadā

original: 7.085.011a pravṛttam āditaḥ pūrvaṃ sargān nāradadarśanāt
analyzed: pravṛttam āditas pūrvam sargān nārada darśanāt

original: 7.085.011c tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃś ca yāvadviṃśaty agāyatām
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti sargān ca yāvat viṃśatī agāyatām

original: 7.085.012a tato 'parāhṇasamaye rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata
analyzed: parāhṇa samaye rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata

original: 7.085.012c śrutvā viṃśatisargāṃs tān bharataṃ bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā viṃśati sargān tān bharatam bhrātṛ vatsalaḥ

original: 7.085.013a aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi suvarṇasya mahātmanoḥ
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi suvarṇasya mahātmanoḥ

original: 7.085.013c dadasva śīghraṃ kākutstha bālayor mā vṛthā śramaḥ
analyzed: dadasva śīghram kākutstha bālayoḥ mā vṛthā śramaḥ

original: 7.085.014a dīyamānaṃ suvarṇaṃ tan nāgṛhṇītāṃ kuśīlavau
analyzed: dīyamānam suvarṇam tat na agṛhṇītām kuśīlavau

original: 7.085.014c ūcatuś ca mahātmānau kim aneneti vismitau
analyzed: ūcatuḥ ca mahātmānau kim anena iti vismitau

original: 7.085.015a vanyena phalamūlena niratu svo vanaukasau
analyzed: vanyena phala mūlena svar vanaukasau

original: 7.085.015c suvarṇena hiraṇyena kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vane
analyzed: suvarṇena hiraṇyena kim kariṣyāvahe vane

original: 7.085.016a tathā tayoḥ prabruvatoḥ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: tathā tayoḥ prabruvatoḥ kautūhala samanvitāḥ

original: 7.085.016c śrotāraś caiva rāmaś ca sarva eva suvismitāḥ
analyzed: śrotāraḥ ca eva rāmaḥ ca sarvaḥ eva su vismitāḥ

original: 7.085.017a tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ
analyzed: tasya ca eva āgamam rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ

original: 7.085.017c papraccha tau mahātejās tāv ubhau munidārakau
analyzed: papraccha tau mahā tejāḥ tau ubhau muni dārakau

original: 7.085.018a kiṃpramāṇam idaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kiṃpramāṇam idam kāvyam kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.085.018c kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ ko vāsau munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ kaḥ vā asau muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.085.019a pṛcchantaṃ rāghavaṃ vākyam ūcatur munidārakau
analyzed: pṛcchantam rāghavam vākyam ūcatuḥ muni dārakau

original: 7.085.019c vālmīkir bhagavān kartā saṃprāpto yajñasaṃnidhim
analyzed: vālmīkiḥ bhagavān kartā saṃprāptaḥ yajña saṃnidhim

original: 7.085.019e yenedaṃ caritaṃ tubhyam aśeṣaṃ saṃpradarśitam
analyzed: yena idam caritam tubhyam aśeṣam saṃpradarśitam

original: 7.085.020a ādiprabhṛti rājendra pañcasarga śatāni ca
analyzed: ādi prabhṛti rāja indra pañca sarga śatāni ca

original: 7.085.020c pratiṣṭhā jīvitaṃ yāvat tāvad rājañ śubhāśubham
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā jīvitam yāvat tāvat rājam śubha aśubham

original: 7.085.021a yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañ śravaṇāya mahāratha
analyzed: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājam śravaṇāya mahā ratha

original: 7.085.021c karmāntare kṣaṇī hūtas tac chṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ
analyzed: karma antare kṣaṇī hūtaḥ tat śṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ

original: 7.085.022a bāḍham ity abravīd rāmas tau cānujñāpya rāghavam
analyzed: bāḍham iti abravīt rāmaḥ tau ca anujñāpya rāghavam

original: 7.085.022c prahṛṣṭau jagmatur vāsaṃ yatrāsau munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: prahṛṣṭau jagmatuḥ vāsam yatra asau muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.085.023a rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ u pi munibhiḥ sārdham pārthivaiḥ ca mahātmabhiḥ

original: 7.085.023c śrutvā tad gītamādhuryaṃ karmaśālām upāgamat
analyzed: śrutvā tat gīta mādhuryam karmaśālām upāgamat

original: 7.086.001a rāmo bahūny ahāny eva tad gītaṃ paramādbhutam
analyzed: rāmaḥ bahūni ahāni eva tat gītam parama adbhutam

original: 7.086.001c śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdham rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ

original: 7.086.002a tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau
analyzed: tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītā putrau kuśīlavau

original: 7.086.002c tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: tasyāḥ pariṣadaḥ madhye rāmaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: 7.086.003a madvaco brūta gacchadhvam iti bhagavato 'ntikam
analyzed: mad vacaḥ brūta gacchadhvam iti bhagavataḥ ntikam

original: 7.086.004a yadi śuddhasamācārā yadi vā vītakalmaṣā
analyzed: yadi śuddha samācārā yadi vā vīta kalmaṣā

original: 7.086.004c karotv ihātmanaḥ śuddhim anumānya mahāmunim
analyzed: karotu iha ātmanaḥ śuddhim anumānya mahā munim

original: 7.086.005a chandaṃ munes tu vijñāya sītāyāś ca manogatam
analyzed: chandam muneḥ tu vijñāya sītāyāḥ ca manogatam

original: 7.086.005c pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyās tataḥ śaṃsata me laghu
analyzed: pratyayam dātu kāmāyāḥ tatas śaṃsata me laghu

original: 7.086.006a śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā
analyzed: śvas prabhāte tu śapatham maithilī janakātmajā

original: 7.086.006c karotu pariṣanmadhye śodhanārthaṃ mameha ca
analyzed: karotu pariṣad madhye śodhana artham mama iha ca

original: 7.086.007a śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vacaḥ paramam adbhutam
analyzed: śrutvā tu rāghavasya etat vacaḥ paramam adbhutam

original: 7.086.007c dūtāḥ saṃprayayur vāṭaṃ yatrāste munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: dūtāḥ saṃprayayuḥ vāṭam yatra āste muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.086.008a te praṇamya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam amitaprabham
analyzed: te praṇamya mahātmānam jvalantam amita prabham

original: 7.086.008c ūcus te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca
analyzed: ūcuḥ te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca

original: 7.086.009a teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam
analyzed: teṣām tat bhāṣitam śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam

original: 7.086.009c vijñāya sumahātejā munir vākyam athābravīt
analyzed: vijñāya su mahā tejāḥ muniḥ vākyam atha abravīt

original: 7.086.010a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam bhavatu bhadram vaḥ yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ

original: 7.086.010c tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ
analyzed: tathā kariṣyate sītā daivatam hi patiḥ striyāḥ

original: 7.086.011a tathoktā muninā sarve rāmadūtā mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: tathā uktāḥ muninā sarve rāma dūtāḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: 7.086.011c pratyetya rāghavaṃ sarve munivākyaṃ babhāṣire
analyzed: pratyetya rāghavam sarve muni vākyam babhāṣire

original: 7.086.012a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyam mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.086.012c ṛṣīṃs tatra sametāṃś ca rājñaś caivābhyabhāṣata
analyzed: ṛṣīn tatra sametān ca rājñaḥ ca eva abhyabhāṣata

original: 7.086.013a bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugaś ca narādhipāḥ
analyzed: bhagavantaḥ sa śiṣyāḥ vai sa anugaḥ ca narādhipāḥ

original: 7.086.013c paśyantu sītāśapathaṃ yaś caivānyo 'bhikāṅkṣate
analyzed: paśyantu sītā śapatham yaḥ ca eva anyaḥ bhikāṅkṣate

original: 7.086.014a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.086.014c sarveṣam ṛṣimukhyānāṃ sādhuvādo mahān abhūt
analyzed: sarveṣam ṛṣi mukhyānām sādhuvādaḥ mahān abhūt

original: 7.086.015a rājānaś ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam

original: 7.086.015c upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayy eva bhuvi nānyataḥ
analyzed: upapannam nara śreṣṭha tvayi eva bhuvi na anyatas

original: 7.086.016a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam viniścayam kṛtvā śvobhūte iti rāghavaḥ

original: 7.086.016c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrusūdanaḥ
analyzed: visarjayām āsa tadā sarvān tām śatru sūdanaḥ

original: 7.087.001a tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ yajñavāṭagato nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tasyām rajanyām vyuṣṭāyām yajña vāṭa gataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.087.001c ṛṣīn sarvān mahātejāḥ śabdāpayati rāghavaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīn sarvān mahā tejāḥ śabdāpayati rāghavaḥ

original: 7.087.002a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca jābāliḥ atha kāśyapaḥ

original: 7.087.002c viśvāmitro dīrghatapā durvāsāś ca mahātapāḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ dīrghatapāḥ durvāsāḥ ca mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.087.003a agastyo 'tha tathāśaktir bhārgavaś caiva vāmanaḥ
analyzed: tathā aśaktiḥ bhārgavaḥ ca eva vāmanaḥ

original: 7.087.003c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur maudgalyaś ca mahātapāḥ
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ ca dīrgha āyuḥ maudgalyaḥ ca mahā tapāḥ

original: 7.087.004a bhārgavaś cyavanaś caiva śatānandaś ca dharmavit
analyzed: bhārgavaḥ cyavanaḥ ca eva śatānandaḥ ca dharma vid

original: 7.087.004c bharadvājaś ca tejasvī agniputraś ca suprabhaḥ
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ ca tejasvī agni putraḥ ca su prabhaḥ

original: 7.087.005a ete cānye ca munayo bahavaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca munayaḥ bahavaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: 7.087.005c rājānaś ca naravyāghrāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca nara vyāghrāḥ sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.087.006a rākṣasāś ca mahāvīryā vānarāś ca mahābalāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ca mahā vīryāḥ vānarāḥ ca mahā balāḥ

original: 7.087.006c samājagmur mahātmānaḥ sarva eva kutūhalāt
analyzed: samājagmuḥ mahātmānaḥ sarve eva kutūhalāt

original: 7.087.007a kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyāḥ ca eva vaiśyāḥ ca śūdrāḥ ca eva sahasraśas

original: 7.087.007c sītāśapathavīkṣārthaṃ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: sītā śapatha vīkṣā artham sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.087.008a tathā samāgataṃ sarvam aśvabhūtam ivācalam
analyzed: tathā samāgatam sarvam aśva bhūtam iva acalam

original: 7.087.008c śrutvā munivaras tūrṇaṃ sasītaḥ samupāgamat
analyzed: śrutvā muni varaḥ tūrṇam sa sītaḥ samupāgamat

original: 7.087.009a tam ṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā sānvagacchad avāṅmukhī
analyzed: tam ṛṣim pṛṣṭhatas sītā sā anvagacchat avāk mukhī

original: 7.087.009c kṛtāñjalir bāṣpagalā kṛtvā rāmaṃ manogatam
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ bāṣpa galā kṛtvā rāmam manogatam

original: 7.087.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīm ivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇam anugāminīm
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā śrīm iva āyāntīm brahmāṇam anugāminīm

original: 7.087.010c vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhukāro mahān abhūt
analyzed: vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhatas sītām sādhu kāraḥ mahān abhūt

original: 7.087.011a tato halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau
analyzed: tatas halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau

original: 7.087.011c duḥkhajena viśālena śokenākulitātmanām
analyzed: duḥkha jena viśālena śokena ākulita ātmanām

original: 7.087.012a sādhu sīteti ke cit tu sādhu rāmeti cāpare
analyzed: sādhu sītā iti ke cid tu sādhu rāma iti ca apare

original: 7.087.012c ubhāv eva tu tatrānye sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
analyzed: ubhau eva tu tatra anye sādhu sādhu iti ca abruvan

original: 7.087.013a tato madhyaṃ janaughānāṃ praviśya munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tatas madhyam jana oghānām praviśya muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 7.087.013c sītāsahāyo vālmīkir iti hovāca rāghavam
analyzed: sītā sahāyaḥ vālmīkiḥ iti ha uvāca rāghavam

original: 7.087.014a iyaṃ dāśarathe sītā suvratā dharmacāriṇī
analyzed: iyam dāśarathe sītā su vratā dharma cāriṇī

original: 7.087.014c apāpā te parityaktā mamāśramasamīpataḥ
analyzed: apāpā te parityaktā mama āśrama samīpataḥ

original: 7.087.015a lokāpavādabhītasya tava rāma mahāvrata
analyzed: loka apavāda bhītasya tava rāma mahā vrata

original: 7.087.015c pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi
analyzed: pratyayam dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi

original: 7.087.016a imau ca jānakī putrāv ubhau ca yamajātakau
analyzed: imau ca jānakī putrau ubhau ca yama jātakau

original: 7.087.016c sutau tavaiva durdharṣo satyam etad bravīmi te
analyzed: sutau tava eva durdharṣo satyam etat bravīmi te

original: 7.087.017a pracetaso 'haṃ daśamaḥ putro rāghavanandana
analyzed: pracetasaḥ ham daśamaḥ putraḥ rāghava nandana

original: 7.087.017c na smarāmy anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ tathemau tava putrakau
analyzed: na smarāmi anṛtam vākyam tathā imau tava putrakau

original: 7.087.018a bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi tapaścaryā mayā kṛtā
analyzed: bahu varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ caryā mayā kṛtā

original: 7.087.018c tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā
analyzed: tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā

original: 7.087.019a ahaṃ pañcasu bhūteṣu manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu rāghava
analyzed: aham pañcasu bhūteṣu manaḥ ṣaṣṭheṣu rāghava

original: 7.087.019c vicintya sītāṃ śuddheti nyagṛhṇāṃ vananirjhare
analyzed: vicintya sītām śuddhā iti nyagṛhṇām vana nirjhare

original: 7.087.020a iyaṃ śuddhasamācārā apāpā patidevatā
analyzed: iyam śuddha samācārā apāpā pati devatā

original: 7.087.020c lokāpavādabhītasya dāsyati pratyayaṃ tava
analyzed: loka apavāda bhītasya dāsyati pratyayam tava

original: 7.088.001a vālmīkinaivam uktas tu rāghavaḥ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: vālmīkinā evam uktaḥ tu rāghavaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 7.088.001c prāñjalir jagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ devavarṇinīm
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ jagataḥ madhye dṛṣṭvā tām devavarṇinīm

original: 7.088.002a evam etan mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit
analyzed: evam etat mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharma vid

original: 7.088.002c pratyayo hi mama brahmaṃs tava vākyair akalmaṣaiḥ
analyzed: pratyayaḥ hi mama brahman tava vākyaiḥ akalmaṣaiḥ

original: 7.088.003a pratyayo hi purā datto vaidehyā surasaṃnidhau
analyzed: pratyayaḥ hi purā dattaḥ vaidehyā sura saṃnidhau

original: 7.088.003c seyaṃ lokabhayād brahmann apāpety abhijānatā
analyzed: sā iyam loka bhayāt brahman apāpā iti abhijānatā

original: 7.088.003e parityaktā mayā sītā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
analyzed: parityaktā mayā sītā tat bhavān kṣantum arhati

original: 7.088.004a jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau
analyzed: jānāmi ca imau putrau me yama jātau kuśīlavau

original: 7.088.004c śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītir astu me
analyzed: śuddhāyām jagataḥ madhye maithilyām prītiḥ astu me

original: 7.088.005a abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya rāmasya surasattamāḥ
analyzed: abhiprāyam tu vijñāya rāmasya sura sattamāḥ

original: 7.088.005c pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: pitāmaham puraskṛtya sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.088.006a ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve deśā marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ viśve deśāḥ marut gaṇāḥ

original: 7.088.006c aśvināv ṛṣigandharvā apsarāṇāṃ gaṇās tathā
analyzed: aśvinau ṛṣi gandharvāḥ apsarāṇām gaṇāḥ tathā

original: 7.088.006e sādhyāś ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: sādhyāḥ ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: 7.088.007a tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ
analyzed: tatas vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyaḥ divya gandhaḥ manoramaḥ

original: 7.088.007c taṃ janaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayām āsa sarvataḥ
analyzed: tam jana ogham suraśreṣṭhaḥ hlādayām āsa sarvatas

original: 7.088.008a tad adbhutam ivācintyaṃ nirīkṣante samāhitāḥ
analyzed: tat adbhutam iva acintyam nirīkṣante samāhitāḥ

original: 7.088.008c mānavāḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge yathā
analyzed: mānavāḥ sarva rāṣṭrebhyaḥ pūrvam kṛta yuge yathā

original: 7.088.009a sarvān samāgatān dṛṣṭvā sītā kāṣāyavāsinī
analyzed: sarvān samāgatān dṛṣṭvā sītā kāṣāya vāsinī

original: 7.088.009c abravīt prāñjalir vākyam adhodṛṣṭir avānmukhī
analyzed: abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam adhas dṛṣṭiḥ avān mukhī

original: 7.088.010a yathāhaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye
analyzed: yathā aham rāghavāt anyam manasā api na cintaye

original: 7.088.010c tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātum arhati
analyzed: tathā me mādhavī devī vivaram dātum arhati

original: 7.088.011a tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīt tad adbhutam
analyzed: tathā śapantyām vaidehyām prādurāsīt tat adbhutam

original: 7.088.011c bhūtalād utthitaṃ divyaṃ siṃhāsanam anuttamam
analyzed: bhū talāt utthitam divyam siṃhāsanam anuttamam

original: 7.088.012a dhriyamāṇaṃ śirobhis tan nāgair amitavikramaiḥ
analyzed: dhriyamāṇam śirobhiḥ tat nāgaiḥ amita vikramaiḥ

original: 7.088.012c divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
analyzed: divyam divyena vapuṣā sarva ratna vibhūṣitam

original: 7.088.013a tasmiṃs tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm
analyzed: tasmin tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyām gṛhya maithilīm

original: 7.088.013c svāgatenābhinandyainām āsane copaveṣayat
analyzed: svāgatena abhinandya enām āsane ca upaveṣayat

original: 7.088.014a tām āsanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā praviśantīṃ rasātalam
analyzed: tām āsana gatām dṛṣṭvā praviśantīm rasātalam

original: 7.088.014c puṇyavṛṣṭir avicchinnā divyā sītām avākirat
analyzed: puṇya vṛṣṭiḥ avicchinnā divyā sītām avākirat

original: 7.088.015a sādhukāraś ca sumahān devānāṃ sahasotthitaḥ
analyzed: sādhukāraḥ ca su mahān devānām sahasā utthitaḥ

original: 7.088.015c sādhu sādhv iti vai sīte yasyās te śīlam īdṛśam
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti vai sīte yasyāḥ te śīlam īdṛśam

original: 7.088.016a evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hy antarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ
analyzed: evam bahuvidhāḥ vācaḥ hi antarikṣa gatāḥ surāḥ

original: 7.088.016c vyājahrur hṛṣṭamanaso dṛṣṭvā sītāpraveśanam
analyzed: vyājahruḥ hṛṣṭa manasaḥ dṛṣṭvā sītā praveśanam

original: 7.088.017a yajñavāṭagatāś cāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te
analyzed: yajña vāṭa gatāḥ ca api munayaḥ sarve eva te

original: 7.088.017c rājānaś ca naravyāghrā vismayān noparemire
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca nara vyāghrāḥ vismayāt na uparemire

original: 7.088.018a antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
analyzed: antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvara jaṅgamāḥ

original: 7.088.018c dānavāś ca mahākāyāḥ pātāle pannagādhipāḥ
analyzed: dānavāḥ ca mahā kāyāḥ pātāle pannaga adhipāḥ

original: 7.088.019a ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyāna parāyaṇāḥ

original: 7.088.019c ke cid rāmaṃ nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ
analyzed: ke cit rāmam nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ

original: 7.088.020a sītāpraveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
analyzed: sītā praveśanam dṛṣṭvā teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ

original: 7.088.020c taṃ muhūrtam ivātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmohitaṃ jagat
analyzed: tam muhūrtam iva atyartham sarvam saṃmohitam jagat

original: 7.089.001a tadāvasāne yajñasya rāmaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
analyzed: tadā avasāne yajñasya rāmaḥ parama durmanāḥ

original: 7.089.001c apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: a paśyamānaḥ vaidehīm mene śūnyam idam jagat

original: 7.089.001e śokena paramāyatto na śāntiṃ manasāgamat
analyzed: śokena parama āyattaḥ na śāntim manasā agamat

original: 7.089.002a visṛjya pārthivān sarvān ṛkṣavānararākṣasān
analyzed: visṛjya pārthivān sarvān ṛkṣa vānara rākṣasān

original: 7.089.002c janaughaṃ brahmamukhyānāṃ vittapūrṇaṃ vyasarjayat
analyzed: jana ogham brahma mukhyānām vitta pūrṇam vyasarjayat

original: 7.089.003a tato visṛjya tān sarvān rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
analyzed: tatas visṛjya tān sarvān rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ

original: 7.089.003c hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyām praviveśa saḥ

original: 7.089.004a na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: na sītāyāḥ parām bhāryām vavre sa raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.089.004c yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat
analyzed: yajñe yajñe ca patnī artham jānakī kāñcanī bhavat

original: 7.089.005a daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vājimedham upākarot
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi vājimedham upākarot

original: 7.089.005c vājapeyān daśaguṇāṃs tathā bahusuvarṇakān
analyzed: vājapeyān daśaguṇān tathā bahu suvarṇakān

original: 7.089.006a agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ gosavaiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
analyzed: agniṣṭoma atirātrābhyām gosavaiḥ ca mahādhanaiḥ

original: 7.089.006c īje kratubhir anyaiś ca sa śrīmān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
analyzed: īje kratubhiḥ anyaiḥ ca sa śrīmān āpta dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: 7.089.007a evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahān rājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam sa kālaḥ su mahān rājya sthasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.089.007c dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyād rāghavasya tu
analyzed: dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyāt rāghavasya tu

original: 7.089.008a ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi sthitā rāmasya śāsane
analyzed: ṛkṣa vānara rakṣāṃsi sthitāḥ rāmasya śāsane

original: 7.089.008c anurajyanti rājāno ahany ahani rāghavam
analyzed: anurajyanti rājānaḥ ahani ahani rāghavam

original: 7.089.009a kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ
analyzed: kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣam vimalāḥ diśaḥ

original: 7.089.009c hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ puraṃ janapadas tathā
analyzed: hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇam puram janapadaḥ tathā

original: 7.089.010a nākāle mriyate kaś cin na vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā
analyzed: na akāle mriyate kaḥ cit na vyādhiḥ prāṇinām tadā

original: 7.089.010c nādharmaś cābhavat kaś cid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
analyzed: na adharmaḥ ca abhavat kaḥ cit rāme rājyam praśāsati

original: 7.089.011a atha dīrghasya kālasya rāmamātā yaśasvinī
analyzed: atha dīrghasya kālasya rāma mātā yaśasvinī

original: 7.089.011c putrapautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmam upāgamat
analyzed: putra pautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmam upāgamat

original: 7.089.012a anviyāya sumitrāpi kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī
analyzed: anviyāya sumitrā api kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī

original: 7.089.012c dharmaṃ kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tridive paryavasthitā
analyzed: dharmam kṛtvā bahuvidham tridive paryavasthitā

original: 7.089.013a sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca
analyzed: sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca

original: 7.089.013c samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire
analyzed: samāgatāḥ mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmam ca lebhire

original: 7.089.014a tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati
analyzed: tāsām rāmaḥ mahā dānam kāle kāle prayacchati

original: 7.089.014c mātṝṇām aviśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu
analyzed: mātṝṇām aviśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu

original: 7.089.015a pitryāṇi bahuratnāni yajñān paramadustarān
analyzed: pitryāṇi bahu ratnāni yajñān parama dustarān

original: 7.089.015c cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan
analyzed: cakāra rāmaḥ dharma ātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan

original: 7.090.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya yudhājit kekayaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 7.090.001c svaguruṃ preṣayām āsa rāghavāya mahātmane
analyzed: sva gurum preṣayām āsa rāghavāya mahātmane

original: 7.090.002a gārgyam aṅgirasaḥ putraṃ brahmarṣim amitaprabham
analyzed: gārgyam aṅgirasaḥ putram brahmarṣim amita prabham

original: 7.090.002c daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi prītidānam anuttamam
analyzed: daśa ca aśva sahasrāṇi prīti dānam anuttamam

original: 7.090.003a kambalāni ca ratnāni citravastram athottamam
analyzed: kambalāni ca ratnāni citra vastram atha uttamam

original: 7.090.003c rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 7.090.004a śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam
analyzed: śrutvā tu rāghavaḥ gārgyam mahā ṛṣim samupāgatam

original: 7.090.004c mātulasyāśvapatinaḥ priyaṃ dūtam upāgatam
analyzed: mātulasya aśvapatinaḥ priyam dūtam upāgatam

original: 7.090.005a pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośamātraṃ sahānugaḥ
analyzed: pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośa mātram saha anugaḥ

original: 7.090.005c gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayām āsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca
analyzed: gārgyam saṃpūjayām āsa dhanam tat pratigṛhya ca

original: 7.090.006a pṛṣṭvā ca prītidaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca
analyzed: pṛṣṭvā ca prīti dam sarvam kuśalam mātulasya ca

original: 7.090.006c upaviṣṭaṃ mahābhāgaṃ rāmaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
analyzed: upaviṣṭam mahābhāgam rāmaḥ praṣṭum pracakrame

original: 7.090.007a kim āha matulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavān iha
analyzed: kim āha matulaḥ vākyam yad artham bhagavān iha

original: 7.090.007c prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭha sākṣād iva bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: prāptaḥ vākya vidām śreṣṭha sākṣāt iva bṛhaspatiḥ

original: 7.090.008a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmarṣiḥ kāryavistaram
analyzed: rāmasya bhāṣitam śrutvā brahmarṣiḥ kārya vistaram

original: 7.090.008c vaktum adbhutasaṃkāśaṃ rāghavāyopacakrame
analyzed: vaktum adbhuta saṃkāśam rāghavāya upacakrame

original: 7.090.009a mātulas te mahābāho vākyam āha nararṣabha
analyzed: mātulaḥ te mahā bāho vākyam āha nara ṛṣabha

original: 7.090.009c yudhājit prītisaṃyuktaṃ śrūyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: yudhājit prīti saṃyuktam śrūyatām yadi rocate

original: 7.090.010a ayaṃ gandharvaviṣayaḥ phalamūlopaśobhitaḥ
analyzed: ayam gandharva viṣayaḥ phala mūla upaśobhitaḥ

original: 7.090.010c sindhor ubhayataḥ pārśve deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ
analyzed: sindhoḥ ubhayatas pārśve deśaḥ parama śobhanaḥ

original: 7.090.011a taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ
analyzed: tam ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sa āyudhāḥ yuddha kovidāḥ

original: 7.090.011c śailūṣasya sutā vīrās tisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ
analyzed: śailūṣasya sutāḥ vīrāḥ tisraḥ koṭyaḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 7.090.012a tān vinirjitya kākutstha gandharvaviṣayaṃ śubham
analyzed: tān vinirjitya kākutstha gandharva viṣayam śubham

original: 7.090.012c niveśaya mahābāho dve pure susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: niveśaya mahā bāho dve pure su samāhitaḥ

original: 7.090.013a anyasya na gatis tatra deśaś cāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ
analyzed: anyasya na gatiḥ tatra deśaḥ ca ayam su śobhanaḥ

original: 7.090.013c rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade
analyzed: rocatām te mahā bāho na aham tvām anṛtam vade

original: 7.090.014a tac chrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto mararṣir mātulasya ca
analyzed: tat śrutvā rāghavaḥ prītaḥ mara ṛṣiḥ mātulasya ca

original: 7.090.014c uvāca bāḍham ity evaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata
analyzed: uvāca bāḍham iti evam bharatam ca anvavaikṣata

original: 7.090.015a so 'bravīd rāghavaḥ prītaḥ prāñjalipragraho dvijam
analyzed: saḥ bravīt rāghavaḥ prītaḥ prāñjali pragrahaḥ dvijam

original: 7.090.015c imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ
analyzed: imau kumārau tam deśam brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ

original: 7.090.016a bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca
analyzed: bharatasya ātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkalaḥ eva ca

original: 7.090.016c mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau
analyzed: mātulena su guptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau

original: 7.090.017a bharataṃ cāgrataḥ kṛtvā kumārau sabalānugau
analyzed: bharatam ca agratas kṛtvā kumārau sa bala anugau

original: 7.090.017c nihatya gandharvasutān dve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ
analyzed: nihatya gandharva sutān dve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ

original: 7.090.018a niveśya te puravare ātmājau saṃniveśya ca
analyzed: niveśya te pura vare ātma ājau saṃniveśya ca

original: 7.090.018c āgamiṣyati me bhūyaḥ sakāśam atidhārmikaḥ
analyzed: āgamiṣyati me bhūyas sakāśam ati dhārmikaḥ

original: 7.090.019a brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam
analyzed: brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharatam sa bala anugam

original: 7.090.019c ājñāpayām āsa tadā kumārau cābhyaṣecayat
analyzed: ājñāpayām āsa tadā kumārau ca abhyaṣecayat

original: 7.090.020a nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtyāṅgiraḥ sutam
analyzed: nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtya aṅgiraḥ sutam

original: 7.090.020c bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau
analyzed: bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyām ca niryayau

original: 7.090.021a sā senā śakrayukteva naragān niryayāv atha
analyzed: sā senā śakra yuktā iva naragāt niryayau atha

original: 7.090.021c rāghavānugatā dūraṃ durādharṣā surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: rāghava anugatā dūram durādharṣā sura asuraiḥ

original: 7.090.022a māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca
analyzed: māṃsa āśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi su mahānti ca

original: 7.090.022c anujagmuś ca bharataṃ rudhirasya pipāsayā
analyzed: anujagmuḥ ca bharatam rudhirasya pipāsayā

original: 7.090.023a bhūtagrāmāś ca bahavo māṃsabhakṣāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
analyzed: bhūta grāmāḥ ca bahavaḥ māṃsa bhakṣāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: 7.090.023c gandharvaputramāṃsāni bhoktukāmāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: gandharva putra māṃsāni bhoktu kāmāḥ sahasraśas

original: 7.090.024a siṃhavyāghrasṛgālānāṃ khecarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇām
analyzed: siṃha vyāghra sṛgālānām khecarāṇām ca pakṣiṇām

original: 7.090.024c bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ
analyzed: bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyāḥ yayuḥ agratas

original: 7.090.025a adhyardhamāsam uṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā
analyzed: adhyardha māsam uṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā

original: 7.090.025c hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā kekayaṃ samupāgamat
analyzed: hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇā kekayam samupāgamat

original: 7.091.001a śrutvā senāpatiṃ prāptaṃ bharataṃ kekayādhipaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā senāpatim prāptam bharatam kekaya adhipaḥ

original: 7.091.001c yudhājid gārgyasahitaṃ parāṃ prītim upāgamat
analyzed: yudhājit gārgya sahitam parām prītim upāgamat

original: 7.091.002a sa niryayau janaughena mahatā kekayādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa niryayau jana oghena mahatā kekaya adhipaḥ

original: 7.091.002c tvaramāṇo 'bhicakrāma gandharvān devarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: tvaramāṇaḥ bhicakrāma gandharvān deva rūpiṇaḥ

original: 7.091.003a bharataś ca yudhājic ca sametau laghuvikramau
analyzed: bharataḥ ca yudhājit ca sametau laghu vikramau

original: 7.091.003c gandharvanagaraṃ prāptau sabalau sapadānugau
analyzed: gandharvanagaram prāptau sa balau sa padānugau

original: 7.091.004a śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvās te samāgatāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu bharatam prāptam gandharvāḥ te samāgatāḥ

original: 7.091.004c yoddhukāmā mahāvīryā vinadantaḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: yoddhu kāmāḥ mahā vīryāḥ vinadantaḥ samantataḥ

original: 7.091.005a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas samabhavat yuddham tumulam loma harṣaṇam

original: 7.091.005c saptarātraṃ mahābhīmaṃ na cānyatarayor jayaḥ
analyzed: sapta rātram mahā bhīmam na ca anyatarayoḥ jayaḥ

original: 7.091.006a tato rāmānujaḥ kruddhaḥ kālasyāstraṃ sudāruṇam
analyzed: tatas rāmānujaḥ kruddhaḥ kālasya astram su dāruṇam

original: 7.091.006c saṃvartaṃ nāma bharato gandharveṣv abhyayojayat
analyzed: saṃvartam nāma bharataḥ gandharveṣu abhyayojayat

original: 7.091.007a te baddhāḥ kālapāśena saṃvartena vidāritāḥ
analyzed: te baddhāḥ kāla pāśena saṃvartena vidāritāḥ

original: 7.091.007c kṣaṇenābhihatās tisras tatra koṭyo mahātmanā
analyzed: kṣaṇena abhihatāḥ tisraḥ tatra koṭyaḥ mahātmanā

original: 7.091.008a taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ
analyzed: tam ghātam ghora saṃkāśam na smaranti divaukasaḥ

original: 7.091.008c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tādṛśānāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: nimeṣa antara mātreṇa tādṛśānām mahātmanām

original: 7.091.009a hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ
analyzed: hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu bharataḥ kaikayī sutaḥ

original: 7.091.009c niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame
analyzed: niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve pura uttame

original: 7.091.009e takṣaṃ takṣaśilāyāṃ tu puṣkaraṃ puṣkarāvatau
analyzed: takṣam takṣaśilāyām tu puṣkaram puṣkarāvatau

original: 7.091.010a gandharvadeśo ruciro gāndhāraviṣayaś ca saḥ
analyzed: gandharva deśaḥ ruciraḥ gāndhāra viṣayaḥ ca saḥ

original: 7.091.010c varṣaiḥ pañcabhir ākīrṇo viṣayair nāgarais tathā
analyzed: varṣaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ākīrṇaḥ viṣayaiḥ nāgaraiḥ tathā

original: 7.091.011a dhanaratnaughasaṃpūrṇo kānanair upaśobhite
analyzed: dhana ratna ogha saṃpūrṇaḥ kānanaiḥ upaśobhite

original: 7.091.011c anyonyasaṃgharṣakṛte spardhayā guṇavistare
analyzed: anyonya saṃgharṣa kṛte spardhayā guṇa vistare

original: 7.091.012a ubhe suruciraprakhye vyavahārair akalmaṣaiḥ
analyzed: ubhe su rucira prakhye vyavahāraiḥ akalmaṣaiḥ

original: 7.091.012c udyānayānaughavṛte suvibhaktāntarāpaṇe
analyzed: udyāna yāna ogha vṛte suvibhakta antarāpaṇe

original: 7.091.013a ubhe puravare ramye vistarair upaśobhite
analyzed: ubhe pura vare ramye vistaraiḥ upaśobhite

original: 7.091.013c gṛhamukhyaiḥ surucirair vimānaiḥ samavarṇibhiḥ
analyzed: gṛha mukhyaiḥ su ruciraiḥ vimānaiḥ sama varṇibhiḥ

original: 7.091.014a śobhite śobhanīyaiś ca devāyatanavistaraiḥ
analyzed: śobhite śobhanīyaiḥ ca devāyatana vistaraiḥ

original: 7.091.014c niveśya pañcabhir varṣair bharato rāghavānujaḥ
analyzed: niveśya pañcabhiḥ varṣaiḥ bharataḥ rāghava anujaḥ

original: 7.091.014e punar āyān mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ kaikayīsutaḥ
analyzed: punar āyāt mahā bāhuḥ ayodhyām kaikayī sutaḥ

original: 7.091.015a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ sākṣād dharmam ivāparam
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya mahātmānam sākṣāt dharmam iva aparam

original: 7.091.015c rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
analyzed: rāghavam bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ

original: 7.091.016a śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttaṃ gandharvavadham uttamam
analyzed: śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttam gandharva vadham uttamam

original: 7.091.016c niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: niveśanam ca deśasya śrutvā prītaḥ sya rāghavaḥ

original: 7.092.001a tac chrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
analyzed: tat śrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha

original: 7.092.001c vākyaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ bhrātṝn provāca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: vākyam ca adbhuta saṃkāśam bhrātṝn provāca rāghavaḥ

original: 7.092.002a imau kumārau saumitre tava dharmaviśāradau
analyzed: imau kumārau saumitre tava dharma viśāradau

original: 7.092.002c aṅgadaś candraketuś ca rājyārhau dṛḍhadhanvinau
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ candraketuḥ ca rājya arhau dṛḍha dhanvinau

original: 7.092.003a imau rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi deśaḥ sādhu vidhīyatām
analyzed: imau rājye bhiṣekṣyāmi deśaḥ sādhu vidhīyatām

original: 7.092.003c ramaṇīyo hy asaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau
analyzed: ramaṇīyaḥ hi asaṃbādhaḥ rametām yatra dhanvinau

original: 7.092.004a na rājñāṃ yatra pīdā syān nāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam
analyzed: na rājñām yatra pīdā syāt na āśramāṇām vināśanam

original: 7.092.004c sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā
analyzed: sa deśaḥ dṛśyatām saumya na aparādhyāmahe yathā

original: 7.092.005a tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
analyzed: tathā uktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha

original: 7.092.005c ayaṃ kārāpatho deśaḥ suramaṇyo nirāmayaḥ
analyzed: ayam kārāpathaḥ deśaḥ su ramaṇyaḥ nirāmayaḥ

original: 7.092.006a niveśyatāṃ tatra puram aṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: niveśyatām tatra puram aṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.092.006c candraketoś ca ruciraṃ candrakāntaṃ nirāmayam
analyzed: candraketoḥ ca ruciram candrakāntam nirāmayam

original: 7.092.007a tad vākyaṃ bharatenoktaṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tat vākyam bharatena uktam pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ

original: 7.092.007c taṃ ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat
analyzed: tam ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat

original: 7.092.008a aṅgadīyā purī ramyā aṅgadasya niveśitā
analyzed: aṅgadīyā purī ramyā aṅgadasya niveśitā

original: 7.092.008c ramaṇīyā suguptā ca rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
analyzed: ramaṇīyā su guptā ca rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 7.092.009a candraketus tu mallasya mallabhūmyāṃ niveśitā
analyzed: candraketuḥ tu mallasya mallabhūmyām niveśitā

original: 7.092.009c candrakānteti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā
analyzed: candrakāntā iti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā

original: 7.092.010a tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ bharato lakṣmaṇas tathā
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ parām prītim bharataḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ tathā

original: 7.092.010c yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire
analyzed: yayuḥ yudhi durādharṣāḥ abhiṣekam ca cakrire

original: 7.092.011a abhiṣicya kumārau dvau prasthāpya sabalānugau
analyzed: abhiṣicya kumārau dvau prasthāpya sa bala anugau

original: 7.092.011c aṅgadaṃ paścimā bhūmiṃ candraketum udaṅmukham
analyzed: aṅgadam paścimā bhūmim candraketum udak mukham

original: 7.092.012a aṅgadaṃ cāpi saumitrir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
analyzed: aṅgadam ca api saumitriḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ nujagāma ha

original: 7.092.012c candraketos tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha
analyzed: candraketoḥ tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāhaḥ babhūva ha

original: 7.092.013a lakṣmaṇas tv aṅgadīyāyāṃ saṃvatsaram athoṣitaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ tu aṅgadīyāyām saṃvatsaram atha uṣitaḥ

original: 7.092.013c putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punar āgamat
analyzed: putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyām punar āgamat

original: 7.092.014a bharato 'pi tathaivoṣya saṃvatsaram athādhikam
analyzed: bharataḥ pi tathā evā uṣya saṃvatsaram atha adhikam

original: 7.092.014c ayodhyāṃ punar agamya rāmapādāv upāgamat
analyzed: ayodhyām punar agamya rāma pādau upāgamat

original: 7.092.015a ubhau saumitribharatau rāmapādāv anuvratau
analyzed: ubhau saumitri bharatau rāma pādau anuvratau

original: 7.092.015c kālaṃ gatam api snehān na jajñāte 'tidhārmikau
analyzed: kālam gatam api snehāt na jajñāte ti dhārmikau

original: 7.092.016a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśateṣāṃ yayus tadā
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasrāṇi daśa teṣām yayuḥ tadā

original: 7.092.016c dharme prayatamānānāṃ paurakāryeṣu nityadā
analyzed: dharme prayatamānānām paura kāryeṣu nityadā

original: 7.092.017a vihṛtya lākaṃ paripūrṇamānasāḥ;
analyzed: vihṛtya lākam paripūrṇa mānasāḥ

original: śriyā vṛtā dharmapathe pare sthitāḥ
analyzed: śriyā vṛtāḥ dharma pathe pare sthitāḥ

original: 7.092.017c trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejasā;
analyzed: trayaḥ samiddhāḥ iva dīpta tejasā

original: hutāgnayaḥ sādhu mahādhvare trayaḥ
analyzed: huta agnayaḥ sādhu mahā adhvare trayaḥ

original: 7.093.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite
analyzed: kasya cid tu atha kālasya rāme dharma pathe sthite

original: 7.093.001c kālas tāpasarūpeṇa rājadvāram upāgamat
analyzed: kālaḥ tāpasa rūpeṇa rāja dvāram upāgamat

original: 7.093.002a so 'bravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ dhṛtimantaṃ yaśasvinam
analyzed: saḥ bravīt lakṣmaṇam vākyam dhṛtimantam yaśasvinam

original: 7.093.002c māṃ nivedaya rāmāya saṃprāptaṃ kāryagauravāt
analyzed: mām nivedaya rāmāya saṃprāptam kārya gauravāt

original: 7.093.003a dūto hy atibalasyāhaṃ maharṣer amitaujasaḥ
analyzed: dūtaḥ hi atibalasya aham mahā ṛṣeḥ amita ojasaḥ

original: 7.093.003c rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala
analyzed: rāmam didṛkṣuḥ āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahā bala

original: 7.093.004a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitris tvarayānvitaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā saumitriḥ tvarayā anvitaḥ

original: 7.093.004c nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasasya vivakṣitam
analyzed: nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasasya vivakṣitam

original: 7.093.005a jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute
analyzed: jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahā dyute

original: 7.093.005c dūtas tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātas tapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ
analyzed: dūtaḥ tvām draṣṭum āyātaḥ tapasvī bhāskara prabhaḥ

original: 7.093.006a tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha
analyzed: tat vākyam lakṣmaṇena uktam śrutvā rāmaḥ uvāca ha

original: 7.093.006c praveśyatāṃ munis tāta mahaujās tasya vākyadhṛk
analyzed: praveśyatām muniḥ tāta mahā ojāḥ tasya vākyadhṛk

original: 7.093.007a saumitris tu tathety uktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim
analyzed: saumitriḥ tu tathā iti uktvā prāveśayata tam munim

original: 7.093.007c jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ pradahantam ivāṃśubhiḥ
analyzed: jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ pradahantam iva aṃśubhiḥ

original: 7.093.008a so 'bhigamya raghuśreṣṭhaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
analyzed: saḥ bhigamya raghu śreṣṭham dīpyamānam sva tejasā

original: 7.093.008c ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvety āha rāghavam
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ madhurayā vācā vardhasva iti āha rāghavam

original: 7.093.009a tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām
analyzed: tasmai rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām

original: 7.093.009c dadau kuśalam avyagraṃ praṣṭuṃ caivopacakrame
analyzed: dadau kuśalam avyagram praṣṭum ca eva upacakrame

original: 7.093.010a pṛṣṭhaś ca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhaḥ ca kuśalam tena rāmeṇa vadatām varaḥ

original: 7.093.010c āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.093.011a tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas rāmaḥ svāgatam te mahā mune

original: 7.093.011c prāpayasva ca vākyāni yato dūtas tvam āgataḥ
analyzed: prāpayasva ca vākyāni yatas dūtaḥ tvam āgataḥ

original: 7.093.012a codito rājasiṃhena munir vākyam udīrayat
analyzed: coditaḥ rāja siṃhena muniḥ vākyam udīrayat

original: 7.093.012c dvandvam etat pravaktavyaṃ na ca cakṣur hataṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: dvandvam etat pravaktavyam na ca cakṣuḥ hatam vacaḥ

original: 7.093.013a yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣed vā sa vadhyas tava rāghava
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣet vā sa vadhyaḥ tava rāghava

original: 7.093.013c bhaved vai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yady avekṣase
analyzed: bhavet vai muni mukhyasya vacanam yadi avekṣase

original: 7.093.014a tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: tathā iti ca pratijñāya rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 7.093.014c dvāri tiṣṭha mahābāho pratihāraṃ visarjaya
analyzed: dvāri tiṣṭha mahā bāho pratihāram visarjaya

original: 7.093.015a sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām
analyzed: sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathām dvandva samīritām

original: 7.093.015c ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ mama ca saumitre paśyet vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ

original: 7.093.016a tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvārasaṃgrahe
analyzed: tatas nikṣipya kākutsthaḥ lakṣmaṇam dvāra saṃgrahe

original: 7.093.016c tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tam uvāca munim vākyam kathayasva iti rāghavaḥ

original: 7.093.017a yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ
analyzed: yat te manīṣitam vākyam yena vā asi samāhitaḥ

original: 7.093.017c kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate
analyzed: kathayasva viśaṅkaḥ tvam mama api hṛdi vartate

original: 7.094.001a śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ
analyzed: śṛṇu rāma mahā bāho yad artham aham āhataḥ

original: 7.094.001c pitāmahena devena preṣito 'smi mahābala
analyzed: pitāmahena devena preṣitaḥ smi mahā bala

original: 7.094.002a tavāhaṃ pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya
analyzed: tava aham pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya

original: 7.094.002c māyāsaṃbhāvito vīra kālaḥ sarvasamāharaḥ
analyzed: māyā saṃbhāvitaḥ vīra kālaḥ sarva samāharaḥ

original: 7.094.003a pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.094.003c samayas te mahābāho svarlokān parirakṣitum
analyzed: samayaḥ te mahā bāho svar lokān parirakṣitum

original: 7.094.004a saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi
analyzed: saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi

original: 7.094.004c mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ
analyzed: mahā arṇave śayāna upsu mām tvam pūrvam ajījanaḥ

original: 7.094.005a bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam
analyzed: bhogavantam tatas nāgam anantam udake śayam

original: 7.094.005c māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau
analyzed: māyayā janayitvā tvam dvau ca sattvau mahā balau

original: 7.094.006a madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā
analyzed: madhum ca kaiṭabham ca eva yayoḥ asthi cayaiḥ vṛtā

original: 7.094.006c iyaṃ parvatasaṃbādhā medinī cābhavan mahī
analyzed: iyam parvata saṃbādhā medinī ca abhavat mahī

original: 7.094.007a padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api
analyzed: padme divya arka saṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api

original: 7.094.007c prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam
analyzed: prājāpatyam tvayā karma sarvam mayi niveśitam

original: 7.094.008a so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim
analyzed: saḥ ham saṃnyasta bhāraḥ hi tvām upāse jagatpatim

original: 7.094.008c rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān
analyzed: rakṣām vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karaḥ bhavān

original: 7.094.009a tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt
analyzed: tatas tvam api durdharṣaḥ tasmāt bhāvāt sanātanāt

original: 7.094.009c rakṣārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvam upajagmivān
analyzed: rakṣā artham sarva bhūtānām viṣṇu tvam upajagmivān

original: 7.094.010a adityāṃ vīryavān putro bhrātṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ
analyzed: adityām vīryavān putraḥ bhrātṝṇām harṣa vardhanaḥ

original: 7.094.010c samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu lokasāhyāya kalpase
analyzed: samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu loka sāhyāya kalpase

original: 7.094.011a sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara
analyzed: sa tvam vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatām vara

original: 7.094.011c rāvaṇasya vadhākāṅkṣī mānuṣeṣu mano 'dadhāḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vadha ākāṅkṣī mānuṣeṣu manaḥ dadhāḥ

original: 7.094.012a daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca
analyzed: daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi daśa varṣa śatāni ca

original: 7.094.012c kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā
analyzed: kṛtvā vāsasya niyatim svayam eva ātmanaḥ purā

original: 7.094.013a sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha
analyzed: sa tvam manaḥ mayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇa āyuḥ mānuṣeṣu iha

original: 7.094.013c kālo naravaraśreṣṭha samīpam upavartitum
analyzed: kālaḥ nara vara śreṣṭha samīpam upavartitum

original: 7.094.014a yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum
analyzed: yadi bhūyas mahā rāja prajāḥ icchasi upāsitum

original: 7.094.014c vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: vasa vā vīra bhadram te evam āha pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.094.015a atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya rāghava
analyzed: atha vā vijigīṣā te sura lokāya rāghava

original: 7.094.015c sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ
analyzed: sa nāthāḥ viṣṇunā devāḥ bhavantu vigata jvarāḥ

original: 7.094.016a śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam
analyzed: śrutvā pitāmahena uktam vākyam kāla samīritam

original: 7.094.016c rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāram abravīt
analyzed: rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyam sarva saṃhāram abravīt

original: 7.094.017a śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam
analyzed: śrutam me devadevasya vākyam paramam adbhutam

original: 7.094.017c prītir hi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasaṃbhavā
analyzed: prītiḥ hi mahatī jātā tava āgamana saṃbhavā

original: 7.094.018a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ
analyzed: bhadram te stu gamiṣyāmi yatas eva aham āgataḥ

original: 7.094.018c hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā
analyzed: hṛd gataḥ hi asi saṃprāptaḥ na me sti atra vicāraṇā

original: 7.094.019a mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām
analyzed: mayā hi sarva kṛtyeṣu devānām vaśa vartinām

original: 7.094.019c sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: sthātavyam sarva saṃhāre yathā hi āha pitāmahaḥ

original: 7.095.001a tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tathā tayoḥ kathayatoḥ durvāsāḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 7.095.001c rāmasya darśanākāṅkṣī rājadvāram upāgamat
analyzed: rāmasya darśana ākāṅkṣī rāja dvāram upāgamat

original: 7.095.002a so 'bhigamya ca saumitrim uvāca ṛṣisattamaḥ
analyzed: saḥ bhigamya ca saumitrim uvāca ṛṣi sattamaḥ
