original: 7.095.002c rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate
analyzed: rāmam darśaya me śīghram purā me rthaḥ tivartate

original: 7.095.003a munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: muneḥ tu bhāṣitam śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 7.095.003c abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: abhivādya mahātmānam vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.095.004a kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham
analyzed: kim kāryam brūhi bhagavan kaḥ vā arthaḥ kim karomi aham

original: 7.095.004c vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām
analyzed: vyagraḥ hi rāghavaḥ brahman muhūrtam vā pratīkṣatām

original: 7.095.005a tac chrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā ṛṣi śārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ

original: 7.095.005c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā
analyzed: uvāca lakṣmaṇam vākyam nirdahan iva cakṣuṣā

original: 7.095.006a asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya
analyzed: asmin kṣaṇe mām saumitre rāmāya prativedaya

original: 7.095.006c viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā
analyzed: viṣayam tvām puram ca eva śapiṣye rāghavam tathā

original: 7.095.007a bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ
analyzed: bharatam ca eva saumitre yuṣmākam yā ca saṃtatiḥ

original: 7.095.007c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi
analyzed: na hi śakṣyāmi aham bhūyas manyum dhārayitum hṛdi

original: 7.095.008a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā ghora saṃkāśam vākyam tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 7.095.008c cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam
analyzed: cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam

original: 7.095.009a ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam
analyzed: ekasya maraṇam me stu mā bhūt sarva vināśanam

original: 7.095.009c iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat
analyzed: iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat

original: 7.095.010a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālam visṛjya ca

original: 7.095.010c niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: niṣpatya tvaritam rājā atreḥ putram dadarśa ha

original: 7.095.011a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya mahātmānam jvalantam iva tejasā

original: 7.095.011c kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
analyzed: kim kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata

original: 7.095.012a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tat vākyam rāghaveṇṇa uktam śrutvā muni varaḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.095.012c pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala
analyzed: pratyāha rāmam durvāsāḥ śrūyatām dharma vatsala

original: 7.095.013a adya varṣasahasrasya samāptir mama rāghava
analyzed: adya varṣa sahasrasya samāptiḥ mama rāghava

original: 7.095.013c so 'haṃ bhojanam icchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha
analyzed: saḥ ham bhojanam icchāmi yathā siddham tava anagha

original: 7.095.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam rāmaḥ harṣeṇa mahatā anvitaḥ

original: 7.095.014c bhojanaṃ munimukhyāya yathāsiddham upāharat
analyzed: bhojanam muni mukhyāya yathā siddham upāharat

original: 7.095.015a sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
analyzed: sa tu bhuktvā muni śreṣṭhaḥ tat annam amṛta upamam

original: 7.095.015c sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat
analyzed: sādhu rāma iti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat

original: 7.095.016a tasmin gate mahātejā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ
analyzed: tasmin gate mahā tejāḥ rāghavaḥ prīta mānasaḥ

original: 7.095.016c saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkham upeyivān
analyzed: saṃsmṛtya kāla vākyāni tatas duḥkham upeyivān

original: 7.095.017a duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam
analyzed: duḥkhena ca su saṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tat ghora darśanam

original: 7.095.017c avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
analyzed: avān mukhaḥ dīna manāḥ vyāhartum na śaśāka ha

original: 7.095.018a tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tatas buddhyā viniścitya kāla vākyāni rāghavaḥ

original: 7.095.018c naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: na etat asti iti ca uktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīt mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.096.001a avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam
analyzed: avāk mukham atho dīnam dṛṣṭvā somam iva āplutam

original: 7.096.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt
analyzed: rāghavam lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyam hṛṣṭaḥ madhuram abravīt

original: 7.096.002a na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: na saṃtāpam mahā bāho mad artham kartum arhasi

original: 7.096.002c pūrvanirmāṇabaddhā hi kālasya gatir īdṛśī
analyzed: pūrva nirmāṇa baddhā hi kālasya gatiḥ īdṛśī

original: 7.096.003a jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya
analyzed: jahi mām saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñām paripālaya

original: 7.096.003c hīnapratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ
analyzed: hīna pratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakam narāḥ

original: 7.096.004a yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi
analyzed: yadi prītiḥ mahā rāja yadi anugrāhyatā mayi

original: 7.096.004c jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava
analyzed: jahi mām nirviśaṅkaḥ tvam dharmam vardhaya rāghava

original: 7.096.005a lakṣmaṇena tathoktas tu rāmaḥ pracalitendriyaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena tathā uktaḥ tu rāmaḥ pracalita indriyaḥ

original: 7.096.005c mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathaiva ca purodhasaṃ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathā eva ca purodhasam

original: 7.096.006a abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ
analyzed: abravīt ca yathāvṛttam teṣām madhye narādhipaḥ

original: 7.096.006c durvāso'bhigamaṃ caiva pratijñāṃ tāpasasya ca
analyzed: durvāsas abhigamam ca eva pratijñām tāpasasya ca

original: 7.096.007a tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
analyzed: tat śrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sa upādhyāyāḥ samāsata

original: 7.096.007c vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 7.096.008a dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: dṛṣṭam etat mahā bāho kṣayam te loma harṣaṇam

original: 7.096.008c lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena viyogaḥ ca tava rāma mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.096.009a tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ
analyzed: tyaja enam balavān kālaḥ mā pratijñām vṛthā kṛthāḥ

original: 7.096.009c vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet
analyzed: vinaṣṭāyām pratijñāyām dharmaḥ hi vilayam vrajet

original: 7.096.010a tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram
analyzed: tatas dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram

original: 7.096.010c sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sa devarṣi gaṇam sarvam vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ

original: 7.096.011a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla trailokyasyābhipālanam
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla trailokyasya abhipālanam

original: 7.096.011c lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya vadhena adya jagat svastham kuruṣva ha

original: 7.096.012a teṣāṃ tat samavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam
analyzed: teṣām tat samavetānām vākyam dharma artha saṃhitam

original: 7.096.012c śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: śrutvā pariṣadaḥ madhye rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 7.096.013a visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ
analyzed: visarjaye tvām saumitre mā bhūt dharma viparyayaḥ

original: 7.096.013c tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam
analyzed: tyāgaḥ vadhaḥ vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayam samam

original: 7.096.014a rāmeṇa bhāṣite vākye bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāmeṇa bhāṣite vākye bāṣpa vyākulita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 7.096.014c lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ tvaritaḥ prāyāt sva gṛham na viveśa ha

original: 7.096.015a sa gatvā sarayūtīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā sarayū tīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 7.096.015c nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha
analyzed: nigṛhya sarva srotāṃsi niḥśvāsam na mumoca ha

original: 7.096.016a anucchvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ
analyzed: an ucchvasantam yuktam tam sa śakrāḥ sa apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ

original: 7.096.016c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā
analyzed: devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ sarve puṣpaiḥ avakiran tadā

original: 7.096.017a adṛśyaṃ sarvam anujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam
analyzed: adṛśyam sarvam anujaiḥ sa śarīram mahā balam

original: 7.096.017c pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
analyzed: pragṛhya lakṣmaṇam śakraḥ divam saṃpraviveśa ha

original: 7.096.018a tato viṣṇoś caturbhāgam āgataṃ surasattamāḥ
analyzed: tatas viṣṇoḥ caturbhāgam āgatam sura sattamāḥ

original: 7.096.018c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha

original: 7.097.001a visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: visṛjya lakṣmaṇam rāmaḥ duḥkha śoka samanvitaḥ

original: 7.097.001c purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt
analyzed: purodhasam mantriṇaḥ ca naigamān ca idam abravīt

original: 7.097.002a adya rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi bharataṃ dharmavatsalam
analyzed: adya rājye bhiṣekṣyāmi bharatam dharma vatsalam

original: 7.097.002c ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam
analyzed: ayodhyāyām patim vīram tatas yāsyāmi aham vanam

original: 7.097.003a praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā
analyzed: praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kāla atyayaḥ yathā

original: 7.097.003c adyaivāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatāṃ gatim
analyzed: adya eva aham gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatām gatim

original: 7.097.004a tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam
analyzed: tat śrutvā rāghaveṇa uktam sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ bhṛśam

original: 7.097.004c mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatā bhūmau gatasattvā ivābhavan
analyzed: mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatāḥ bhūmau gata sattvāḥ iva abhavan

original: 7.097.005a bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: bharataḥ ca visaṃjñaḥ bhūt śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam

original: 7.097.005c rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: rājyam vigarhayām āsa rāghavam ca idam abravīt

original: 7.097.006a satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi
analyzed: satyena hi śape rājan svarga loke na ca eva hi

original: 7.097.006c na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
analyzed: na kāmaye yathā rājyam tvām vinā raghunandana

original: 7.097.007a imau kuśīlavau rājann abhiṣiñca narādhipa
analyzed: imau kuśīlavau rājan abhiṣiñca narādhipa

original: 7.097.007c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
analyzed: kosaleṣu kuśam vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam

original: 7.097.008a śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtās tvaritavikramāḥ
analyzed: śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtāḥ tvarita vikramāḥ

original: 7.097.008c idaṃ gamanam asmākaṃ svargāyākhyāntu māciram
analyzed: idam gamanam asmākam svargāya ākhyāntu māciram

original: 7.097.009a tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān
analyzed: tat śrutvā bharatena uktam dṛṣṭvā ca api hi adhas mukhān

original: 7.097.009c paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
analyzed: paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭhaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 7.097.010a vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ
analyzed: vatsa rāmaḥ imāḥ paśya dharaṇīm prakṛtīḥ gatāḥ

original: 7.097.010c jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: jñātvā eṣām īpsitam kāryam mā ca eṣām vipriyam kṛthāḥ

original: 7.097.011a vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtījanam
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtī janam

original: 7.097.011c kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt
analyzed: kim karomi iti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt

original: 7.097.012a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
analyzed: tatas sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ rāmam vacanam abruvan

original: 7.097.012c gacchantam anugacchāmo yato rāma gamiṣyasi
analyzed: gacchantam anugacchāmaḥ yatas rāma gamiṣyasi

original: 7.097.013a eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ
analyzed: eṣā naḥ paramā prītiḥ eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ mataḥ

original: 7.097.013c hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā
analyzed: hṛd gatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭiḥ tava anugamane dṛḍhā

original: 7.097.014a paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ
analyzed: paureṣu yadi te prītiḥ yadi snehaḥ hi anuttamaḥ

original: 7.097.014c saputradārāḥ kākutstha samaṃ gacchāma satpatham
analyzed: sa putra dārāḥ kākutstha samam gacchāma sat patham

original: 7.097.015a tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā
analyzed: tapaḥ vanam vā durgam vā nadīm ambhonidhim tathā

original: 7.097.015c vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara
analyzed: vayam te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān naḥ naya īśvara

original: 7.097.016a sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca
analyzed: sa teṣām niścayam jñātvā kṛtāntam ca nirīkṣya ca

original: 7.097.016c paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
analyzed: paurāṇām dṛḍha bhaktim ca bāḍham iti eva saḥ bravīt

original: 7.097.017a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam viniścayam kṛtvā tasmin ahani rāghavaḥ

original: 7.097.017c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
analyzed: kosaleṣu kuśam vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam

original: 7.097.018a abhiṣiñcan mahātmānāv ubhāv eva kuśīlavau
analyzed: abhiṣiñcan mahātmānau ubhau eva kuśīlavau

original: 7.097.018c rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
analyzed: rathānām tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāga ayutāni ca

original: 7.097.019a daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi ekaikasya dhanaṃ dadau
analyzed: daśa ca aśva sahasrāṇi ekaikasya dhanam dadau

original: 7.097.019c bahuratnau bahudhanau hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtau
analyzed: bahu ratnau bahu dhanau hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛtau

original: 7.097.020a abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā
analyzed: abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya sva pure tathā

original: 7.097.020c dūtān saṃpreṣayām āsa śatrughnāya mahātmane
analyzed: dūtān saṃpreṣayām āsa śatrughnāya mahātmane

original: 7.098.001a te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ
analyzed: te dūtāḥ rāma vākyena coditāḥ laghu vikramāḥ

original: 7.098.001c prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani
analyzed: prajagmuḥ madhurām śīghram cakruḥ vāsam na ca adhvani

original: 7.098.002a tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha
analyzed: tatas tribhiḥ ahar rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha

original: 7.098.002c śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat
analyzed: śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat

original: 7.098.003a lakṣmaṇasya parityāgaṃ pratijñāṃ rāghavasya ca
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya parityāgam pratijñām rāghavasya ca

original: 7.098.003c putrayor abhiṣekaṃ ca paurānugamanaṃ tathā
analyzed: putrayoḥ abhiṣekam ca paura anugamanam tathā

original: 7.098.004a kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhyaparvatarodhasi
analyzed: kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhya parvata rodhasi

original: 7.098.004c kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: kuśāvatī iti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā

original: 7.098.005a śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca
analyzed: śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatī iti lavasya ca

original: 7.098.005c ayodhyāṃ vijanāṃ caiva bharataṃ rāghavānugam
analyzed: ayodhyām vijanām ca eva bharatam rāghava anugam

original: 7.098.006a evaṃ sarvaṃ nivedyāśu śatrughnāya mahātmane
analyzed: evam sarvam nivedya āśu śatrughnāya mahātmane

original: 7.098.006c viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan
analyzed: viremuḥ te tatas dūtāḥ tvara rājan iti bruvan

original: 7.098.007a śrutvā taṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ kulakṣayam upasthitam
analyzed: śrutvā tam ghora saṃkāśam kula kṣayam upasthitam

original: 7.098.007c prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam
analyzed: prakṛtīḥ tu samānīya kāñcanam ca purohitam

original: 7.098.008a teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: teṣām sarvam yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.098.008c ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca viparyāsam bhaviṣyam bhrātṛbhiḥ saha

original: 7.098.009a tataḥ putradvayaṃ vīraḥ so 'bhyaṣiñcan narādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas putra dvayam vīraḥ saḥ bhyaṣiñcat narādhipaḥ

original: 7.098.009c subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam
analyzed: subāhuḥ madhurām lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam

original: 7.098.010a dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ
analyzed: dvidhā kṛtvā tu tām senām mādhurīm putrayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: 7.098.010c dhanadhānyasamāyuktau sthāpayām āsa pārthivau
analyzed: dhana dhānya samāyuktau sthāpayām āsa pārthivau

original: 7.098.011a tato visṛjya rājānaṃ vaidiśe śatrughātinam
analyzed: tatas visṛjya rājānam vaidiśe śatrughātinam

original: 7.098.011c jagāma tvarito 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ
analyzed: jagāma tvaritaḥ yodhyām rathena ekena rāghavaḥ

original: 7.098.012a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
analyzed: sa dadarśa mahātmānam jvalantam iva pāvakam

original: 7.098.012c kṣaumasūkṣmāmbaradharaṃ munibhiḥ sārdham akṣayaiḥ
analyzed: kṣauma sūkṣma ambara dharam munibhiḥ sārdham akṣayaiḥ

original: 7.098.013a so 'bhivādya tato rāmaṃ prāñjaliḥ prayatendriyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ bhivādya tatas rāmam prāñjaliḥ prayata indriyaḥ

original: 7.098.013c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajño dharmam evānucintayan
analyzed: uvāca vākyam dharma jñaḥ dharmam eva anucintayan

original: 7.098.014a kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayor yuktaṃ rāghavayor dhanaiḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā abhiṣekam sutayoḥ yuktam rāghavayoḥ dhanaiḥ

original: 7.098.014c tavānugamane rājan viddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam
analyzed: tava anugamane rājan viddhi mām kṛta niścayam

original: 7.098.015a na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam
analyzed: na ca anyat atra vaktavyam dustaram tava śāsanam

original: 7.098.015c tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tyaktum nā arhasi mām vīra bhaktimantam viśeṣataḥ

original: 7.098.016a tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tām buddhim aklībām vijñāya raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.098.016c bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva śatrughnam rāmaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: 7.098.017a tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya vākyasya vākya ante vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 7.098.017c ṛkṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca samāpetur anekaśaḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣa rākṣasa saṃghāḥ ca samāpetuḥ anekaśas

original: 7.098.018a devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutās tathā
analyzed: deva putrāḥ ṛṣi sutāḥ gandharvāṇām sutāḥ tathā

original: 7.098.018c rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: rāma kṣayam viditvā te sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.098.019a te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
analyzed: te rāmam abhivādya āhuḥ sarve eva samāgatāḥ

original: 7.098.019c tavānugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: tava anugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahā yaśaḥ

original: 7.098.020a yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: yadi rāma vinā asmābhiḥ gaccheḥ tvam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 7.098.020c yamadaṇḍam ivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ
analyzed: yama daṇḍam iva udyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ

original: 7.098.021a evaṃ teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararakṣasām
analyzed: evam teṣām vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣka vānara rakṣasām

original: 7.098.021c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇam athā uvāca madhuram ślakṣṇayā girā

original: 7.098.022a yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa
analyzed: yāvat prajāḥ dhariṣyanti tāvat tvam vai vibhīṣaṇa

original: 7.098.022c rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthaḥ svaṃ dhariṣyasi
analyzed: rākṣasa indra mahā vīrya laṅkā sthaḥ svam dhariṣyasi

original: 7.098.023a prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa na uttaram vaktum arhasi

original: 7.098.024a tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
analyzed: tam evam uktvā kākutsthaḥ hanūmantam atha abravīt

original: 7.098.024c jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya
analyzed: jīvite kṛta buddhiḥ tvam mā pratijñām vilopaya

original: 7.098.025a matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāval loke harīśvara
analyzed: mad kathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāvat loke hari īśvara

original: 7.098.025c tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya
analyzed: tāvat tvam dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya

original: 7.098.026a tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān
analyzed: tathā evam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvān tān ṛkṣa vānarān

original: 7.098.026c mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt
analyzed: mayā sārdham prayātā iti tadā tān rāghavaḥ bravīt

original: 7.099.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām pṛthu vakṣāḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 7.099.001c rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasam athābravīt
analyzed: rāmaḥ kamala patra akṣaḥ purodhasam atha abravīt

original: 7.099.002a agnihotraṃ vrajatv agre sarpir jvalitapāvakam
analyzed: agnihotram vrajatu agre sarpiḥ jvalita pāvakam

original: 7.099.002c vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhayānaṃ mahāpatham
analyzed: vājapeya ātapatram ca śobha yānam mahāpatham

original: 7.099.003a tato vasiṣṭhas tejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tatas vasiṣṭhaḥ tejasvī sarvam niravaśeṣataḥ

original: 7.099.003c cakāra vidhivad dharmyaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim
analyzed: cakāra vidhivat dharmyam mahāprāsthānikam vidhim

original: 7.099.004a tataḥ kṣaumāmbaradharo brahma cāvartayan param
analyzed: tatas kṣauma ambara dharaḥ brahma ca āvartayan param

original: 7.099.004c kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha
analyzed: kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyām prasajya prayayau atha

original: 7.099.005a avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi
analyzed: a vyāharan kva cit kim cit niśceṣṭaḥ niḥsukhaḥ pathi

original: 7.099.005c nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmād dīpyamāno yathāṃśumān
analyzed: nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmāt dīpyamānaḥ yathā aṃśumān

original: 7.099.006a rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā
analyzed: rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ su samāhitā

original: 7.099.006c dakṣiṇe hrīr viśālākṣī vyavasāyas tathāgrataḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇe hrīḥ viśāla akṣī vyavasāyaḥ tathā agratas

original: 7.099.007a śarā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham
analyzed: śarāḥ nānāvidhāḥ ca api dhanuḥ āyata vigraham

original: 7.099.007c anuvrajanti kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ
analyzed: anuvrajanti kākutstham sarve puruṣa vigrahāḥ

original: 7.099.008a vedā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa sāvitrī sarvarakṣiṇī
analyzed: vedāḥ brāhmaṇa rūpeṇa sāvitrī sarva rakṣiṇī

original: 7.099.008c oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāraḥ sarve rāmam anuvratāḥ
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ tha vaṣaṭkāraḥ sarve rāmam anuvratāḥ

original: 7.099.009a ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ sarve eva mahīsurāḥ

original: 7.099.009c anvagacchanta kākutsthaṃ svargadvāram upāgatam
analyzed: anvagacchanta kākutstham svarga dvāram upāgatam

original: 7.099.010a taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: tam yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ

original: 7.099.010c savṛddhabāladāsīkāḥ savarṣavarakiṃkarāḥ
analyzed: sa vṛddha bāla dāsīkāḥ sa varṣa vara kiṃkarāḥ

original: 7.099.011a sāntaḥpuraś ca bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau
analyzed: sa antaḥpuraḥ ca bharataḥ śatrughna sahitaḥ yayau

original: 7.099.011c rāmavratam upāgamya rāghavaṃ samanuvratāḥ
analyzed: rāma vratam upāgamya rāghavam samanuvratāḥ

original: 7.099.012a tato viprā mahātmānaḥ sāgnihotrāḥ samāhitāḥ
analyzed: tatas viprāḥ mahātmānaḥ sa agnihotrāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: 7.099.012c saputradārāḥ kākutstham anvagacchan mahāmatim
analyzed: sa putra dārāḥ kākutstham anvagacchat mahāmatim

original: 7.099.013a mantriṇo bhṛtyavargāś ca saputrāḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ bhṛtya vargāḥ ca sa putrāḥ sahabāndhavāḥ

original: 7.099.013c sānugā rāghavaṃ sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭavat
analyzed: sa anugāḥ rāghavam sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭa vat

original: 7.099.014a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: tatas sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛtāḥ

original: 7.099.014c anujagmuḥ pragacchantaṃ rāghavaṃ guṇarañjitāḥ
analyzed: anujagmuḥ pragacchantam rāghavam guṇa rañjitāḥ

original: 7.099.015a snātaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣpam anuttamam
analyzed: snātam pramuditam sarvam hṛṣṭa puṣpam anuttamam

original: 7.099.015c dṛptaṃ kilikilāśabdaiḥ sarvaṃ rāmam anuvratam
analyzed: dṛptam kilikilā śabdaiḥ sarvam rāmam anuvratam

original: 7.099.016a na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: na tatra kaḥ cit dīnaḥ bhūt vrīḍitaḥ vā api duḥkhitaḥ

original: 7.099.016c hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam
analyzed: hṛṣṭam pramuditam sarvam babhūva parama adbhutam

original: 7.099.017a draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāṇaṃ rājño jānapado janaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭu kāmaḥ tha niryāṇam rājñaḥ jānapadaḥ janaḥ

original: 7.099.017c saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ
analyzed: saṃprāptaḥ saḥ pi dṛṣṭvā eva saha sarvaiḥ anuvrataḥ

original: 7.099.018a ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi janāś ca puravāsinaḥ
analyzed: ṛkṣa vānara rakṣāṃsi janāḥ ca pura vāsinaḥ

original: 7.099.018c agachan parayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhataḥ susamāhitāḥ
analyzed: agacchan parayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhatas su samāhitāḥ

original: 7.100.001a adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā nadīṃ paścān mukhāśritām
analyzed: adhyardha yojanam gatvā nadīm paścāt mukha āśritām

original: 7.100.001c sarayūṃ puṇyasalilāṃ dadarśa raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sarayūm puṇya salilām dadarśa raghunandanaḥ

original: 7.100.002a atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
analyzed: atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ

original: 7.100.002c sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: sarvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ devaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ ca mahātmabhiḥ

original: 7.100.003a āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ
analyzed: āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ

original: 7.100.003c vimānaśatakoṭībhir divyābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: vimāna śata koṭībhiḥ divyābhiḥ abhisaṃvṛtaḥ

original: 7.100.004a papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca vāyumuktā mahaughavat
analyzed: papāta puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ ca vāyu muktā mahā ogha vat

original: 7.100.005a tasmiṃs tūryaśatākīrṇe gandharvāpsarasaṃkule
analyzed: tasmin tūrya śata ākīrṇe gandharva apsaras saṃkule

original: 7.100.005c sarayūsalilaṃ rāmaḥ padbhyāṃ samupacakrame
analyzed: sarayū salilam rāmaḥ padbhyām samupacakrame

original: 7.100.006a tataḥ pitāmaho vāṇīm antarikṣād abhāṣata
analyzed: tatas pitāmahaḥ vāṇīm antarikṣāt abhāṣata

original: 7.100.006c āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
analyzed: āgaccha viṣṇo bhadram te diṣṭyā prāptaḥ si rāghava

original: 7.100.007a bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha deva ābhaiḥ praviśasva svakām tanum

original: 7.100.007c vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam
analyzed: vaiṣṇavīm tām mahā tejaḥ tat ākāśam sanātanam

original: 7.100.008a tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate
analyzed: tvam hi loka gatiḥ deva na tvām ke cit prajānate

original: 7.100.008c ṛte māyāṃ viśālākṣa tava pūrvaparigrahām
analyzed: ṛte māyām viśāla akṣa tava pūrva parigrahām

original: 7.100.009a tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham
analyzed: tvam acintyam mahat bhūtam akṣayam sarva saṃgraham

original: 7.100.009c yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam
analyzed: yām icchasi mahā tejaḥ tām tanum praviśa svayam

original: 7.100.010a pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā viniścitya mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: pitāmaha vacaḥ śrutvā viniścitya mahāmatiḥ

original: 7.100.010c viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānujaḥ
analyzed: viveśa vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ sa śarīraḥ sahānujaḥ

original: 7.100.011a tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ
analyzed: tatas viṣṇu gatam devam pūjayanti sma devatāḥ

original: 7.100.011c sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
analyzed: sādhyāḥ marut gaṇāḥ ca eva sa indrāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ

original: 7.100.012a ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ
analyzed: ye ca divyāḥ ṛṣi gaṇāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ ca yāḥ

original: 7.100.012c suparṇanāgayakṣāś ca daityadānavarākṣasāḥ
analyzed: suparṇa nāga yakṣāḥ ca daitya dānava rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.100.013a sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇamanoratham
analyzed: sarvam hṛṣṭam pramuditam sarvam pūrṇa manoratham

original: 7.100.013c sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti tat sarvam tridivam gata kalmaṣam

original: 7.100.014a atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha
analyzed: atha viṣṇuḥ mahā tejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha

original: 7.100.014c eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata
analyzed: eṣām lokān jana oghānām dātum arhasi suvrata

original: 7.100.015a ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ
analyzed: ime hi sarve snehāt mām anuyātāḥ manasvinaḥ

original: 7.100.015c bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte
analyzed: bhaktāḥ bhājayitavyāḥ ca tyakta ātmānaḥ ca mad kṛte

original: 7.100.016a tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā viṣṇu vacanam brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ

original: 7.100.016c lokān sāntānikān nāma yāsyantīme samāgatāḥ
analyzed: lokān sāntānikān nāma yāsyanti ime samāgatāḥ

original: 7.100.017a yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat
analyzed: yat ca tiryaggatam kim cit rāmam eva anucintayat

original: 7.100.017c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati
analyzed: prāṇān tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati

original: 7.100.017e sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare
analyzed: sarvaiḥ eva guṇaiḥ yukte brahma lokāt anantare

original: 7.100.018a vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ
analyzed: vānarāḥ ca svakām yonim ṛkṣāḥ ca eva tathā yayuḥ

original: 7.100.018c yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ
analyzed: yebhyaḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ ye ye sura ādibhyaḥ su saṃbhavāḥ

original: 7.100.019a ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire
analyzed: ṛṣibhyaḥ nāga yakṣebhyaḥ tān tān eva prapedire

original: 7.100.019c tathoktavati deveśe gopratāram upāgatāḥ
analyzed: tathā uktavati deveśe gopratāram upāgatāḥ

original: 7.100.020a bhejire sarayūṃ sarve harṣapūrṇāśruviklavāḥ
analyzed: bhejire sarayūm sarve harṣa pūrṇa aśru viklavāḥ

original: 7.100.020c avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat
analyzed: avagāhya jalam yaḥ yaḥ prāṇī hi āsīt prahṛṣṭa vat

original: 7.100.021a mānuṣaṃ deham utsṛjya vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata
analyzed: mānuṣam deham utsṛjya vimānam saḥ dhyarohata

original: 7.100.021c tiryagyonigatāś cāpi saṃprāptāḥ sarayūjalam
analyzed: tiryagyoni gatāḥ ca api saṃprāptāḥ sarayū jalam

original: 7.100.022a divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan
analyzed: divyāḥ divyena vapuṣā devāḥ dīptāḥ iva abhavan

original: 7.100.022c gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
analyzed: gatvā tu sarayū toyam sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca

original: 7.100.023a prāpya tat toyavikledaṃ devalokam upāgaman
analyzed: prāpya tat toya vikledam deva lokam upāgaman

original: 7.100.023c devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: devānām yasya yā yoniḥ vānarāḥ ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ

original: 7.100.024a tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi
analyzed: tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya ca ambhasi

original: 7.100.024c tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam
analyzed: tathā svarga gatam sarvam kṛtvā lokaguruḥ divam
